應用描述:
小月曆，最好的經期跟踪應用程序和最可愛的應用程序已经来到APP商店！

小月曆是最簡便的但卻非常專業女孩大姨媽跟踪應用程序，跟踪您的排卵日，受孕期，經期。

無論你是想懷孕或者避孕，它都是您會一見鍾情的經期(大姨媽)日曆/日記。

除了基本的經期跟踪功能與經期日曆，女孩們可以記錄自己的任何症狀，情緒，性交，重量，溫度，說明或藥丸等等，實際上它可以設計成為您的個人日記和小秘書。

它不僅是最簡單的經期跟踪應用程序，同時也有足夠的安全防範措施，保住您自己的隱私，是您的私密大姨媽日記。如果您需要還可以切換帳戶來跟踪不同人的經期。無論你是懷孕了，嘗試懷孕，或者​​避孕，它能讓你的生活變得更加簡便。

藥物提醒功能不會讓你錯過任何藥物，藥丸，補品或避孕藥類藥物如避孕藥、避孕環、避孕貼、甚至是避孕針。就像你自己的私人醫生，跟蹤你的服藥記錄。

如果你一天服用2次藥物，每天服用補品或維生素，按月服用的處方類藥物，服用21天的避孕類藥物。任何你可能忘記的藥物或藥丸我們都能夠提醒您。

支持同步蘋果健康軟件的數據，並讀取活動能量，睡眠分析，步數，性行為等數據。請點擊“報告”- “時間軸”讀取健康數據。

〜〜O（∩_∩）O〜〜，如果你使用大姨媽跟踪，大姨媽日誌等一樣，你必須嘗試這一女性日曆/日記，它一定不會令您失望的。

如果您有任何跟踪經期，月經建議或者質詢，請向我們發送電子郵件。

特點
* 同步數據到Apple Health
* 支持同步蘋果健康軟件的數據，並讀取活動能量，睡眠分析，步數，性行為等數據
* 備份數據至Dropbox帳戶並从Dropbox恢復
* 獨特的日記日曆設計
* 43 種狀態和64 種心情供選擇
* 懷孕模式
* 經期和排卵日的提醒功能
* 體重和體溫圖表
* 記錄管理
* 跟踪月經週期
* 經期和排卵日預測
* 自訂個人的經期長度和排卵日
* 您可以選擇1個月、3個月或者所有月份的平均數據來作為您的周期長度
* 多帳戶用來跟踪多人的資訊
* 多種語言供選擇

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每月9.99美元，每年39.99美元
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。
 
隱私政策：https://pc.abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html
使用條款：https://pc.abishkking.com/terms.html

評論.標題: Highly recommend for all women to get
評論.內容: I love using this app. It makes tracking your period so much easier. You can track your pregnancy as well. It fits around what’s best for you and your body. They have melody music like rain and beach wave sounds that help relax your mind and body. They have tips and articles on everything about periods. Like how to help cramping, etc.
I love this, it’s very helpful with keeping track of everything this has absolutely changed my life.

Es muy bueno me a ayudado mucho como
Mujer

Esta app es maravillosamente increíble, tengo años utilizándola y soy más organizada con el control menstrual, y entendiendo un poco más profundo el proceso menstrual, teniendo sentido muchas cosas que no sabía aún a mis 34 años!… me encanta! Y a pesar de que los teléfonos ya traen apps de este estilo y controlan tu salud, no dejo de descargar este, me siento familiarizada con la app

Very easy to use, practical, and one of the most beneficial and useful apps a woman can use to track her period or get pregnant and sometimes even understand the nature of her feelings and physical symptoms
I love this app it’s the best one. I’ve tried so far and I would recommend this over the flow app.

I used this app for a very long time but I just have to move on. It’s not working for me anymore. I have extremely irregular periods and this app is not suitable for tracking anything but the standard 7 day period. For one, if you try to make a period longer than a certain amount of days it simply says something along the lines of “your cycle cannot be longer than x days.” And there is no way to click out of this warning. Which is just unfair, because biologically, yes, it is possible for periods to go on for months at a time. I found a way around this warning and figured out how to make it longer but I still get warnings constantly from the app about how I’m “inputting my period incorrectly.” I’ve had to go through a million hoops to figure out how to get the app to let me put my irregular periods in. Instead of just selecting the days, I have to hit start cycle, stop cycle on every single individual day because it auto stops your period everyday after a certain number of days so I can’t just click start period and stop period when it ends, I have to come back every day to click start cycle again. I’ve had my period every other day for the last week and I’ve tried everything, there is physically no way to get the app to track your period if you’re having it 1 day on 1 day off for several days in a row. I simply don’t have the time or energy to monkey around with this app anymore trying to put my periods in because the app thinks that I’m inputting them incorrectly. I’m already exhausted everyday and I’d like to just be able to dedicate as little time as possible to tracking my periods. I’m spending 10+ minutes a day trying to get this app to work for me. It’s made for people who have regular length periods once a month, nothing more.
i like it i mean i dont i live it its very helpful and i can express myself thank you so muck P.C

This app is the best period app ever! It is always right about the day I get my period and it is free!! It tells me why certain things happen and help me navigate the worst week of the month! I totally recommend if you need a good period tracking app!
This is a good app to hope you on your period it sure helped me!

I’m sure this is very useful for those who have regular periods. However a lot of younger women who rely on these apps have irregular periods, and the app doesn’t recognize that. There also isn’t a “first period” option so that messed up my numbers. 

I still use it every period and regularly update it, so it’s a great start. I just hope it goes further.

I don’t change this app for any other. My favorite feature is that you can synch your previous data and even if you change phones, you can still retrieve it. It helps track your period perfectly! I highly recommend it.

Hello! I just want to give a honest review, I love this app it’s always kept track of when my next period starts really well. I may start a little bit after the day it says I’m supposed to start but it still is a good app it’s like giving you a heads up to when you’re supposed to start. Even if you’re on birth control or pregnant. It helps me out any educates me as well and I love that! Most apps don’t do that. Definitely get the app it’s very neat
Been using it to track my cycle for it least 4/5 years!! Love it.
Please support the shamsi calendar!

I sometimes need to check if I’m ovulating quickly. but I have to sit through the longest ads to await the answer. I have used this app for 6 years and never had this issue when I was younger. I have switched to a new app just so I can get MY info without 1000 ads fast. Flo is better or natural cycles! They let you get your info asap.

Deleted the app and now I cannot get into my account, I used my regular old email address when I first downloaded it. New phone and it’s asking for google and apple accounts but I didn’t use any of those when I first made the account. Smh. Years of tracking gone !
I’ve used this calendar for 8+ yrs. I love it.
Lo empecé a usar hace seis años, desde el día número uno que me casé, y así fue como pude llevar la cuenta para poder salir embarazada. Ahora tengo dos hijos.
I’ve had this app for 4 years and I love it! It’s easy to use and it’s FREE! I will always be a loyal customer. Happy New Years!
Thank you so much for this app. It helps thank you.🙏

I use this just so I know when my periods are coming because I hate when you don’t know and u are on the go and have nothing to cover or for the period to go on. So I use this for when I need to know when and so I can prepare for when it is coming 🎀😭
This app has help me keep track of my cycle and helps me manage to maintain my abs five star app worth the download

Es una app muy predecible si ha fallado a sido por un día. Es muy buena y confiable lo mejor es su diseño muy femenino y sencillo me gusta por qué es fácil llevar un registro de mi vida sexual y mi ciclo menstrual

I downloaded multiple period trackers and this is by far the best one! You can choose a wider variety of moods and symptoms to keep track of, with a cute aesthetically pleasing app design. It also helps track different phases of your cycle.

I’ve had this app ever since I got my first period back in 7th grade and I’m a junior in high school now.

This app is great it’s always spot on and helps tracking my period & ovulation easier:) I’ve had it for some years now and it’s never let me down
Good app always on point

評論.標題: Been using this app for years
評論.內容:
I’ve been using this app for YEARS. It’s extremely accurate for predicting my period.

That being said, I am currently pregnant and the pregnancy tracker is wrong. My last period was 11/6 with 28 day cycles. Every other due date calculator I’ve used says I’m due 8/13 and today (12/30) I’m 7 weeks 5 days. For some reason, this app says I’m 8 weeks and 4 days.
I’ve used it for years now. I like to track and add notes to keep up with changes. I like that you can add symptoms too and the lay out is cute and simple!
I have been using this app for over 5 years & it does not disappoint! It’s always been pretty accurate & I have not had any issues. I highly recommend especially since it’s free!

評論.標題: Widget no longer available with new update :(
評論.內容:
I generally like this app, particularly the widget to quickly check where I am on my cycle without opening the app. However, I noticed that the widget no longer works on my phone since the last update. It says it’s only available when upgraded to premium, but I don’t see any option to do so. 

Please bring back widgets for all users!
And help someone when I’m on my period
P.C is really helpful with predicting what part of my cycle I’m on and it’s very accurate, you’ll never be waiting in terror for your next period, you’ll get a fair and accurate warning!

應用名稱: 寶寶生活記錄和育兒日記 - Piyo日誌
應用描述:
夫妻可以即時分享資訊的育兒記錄App[Piyo日誌]。
這是一款母子筆記App，透過一隻手的簡易操作，即可替餵牛奶、換尿布及睡眠等事項做記錄！
並具備了豐富齊全的各種功能，包括哺乳計時器功能、批次處理功能，以及成長曲線功能等等。

◆內建分享功能◆
輸入在App之中的內容可以立即分享，夫妻兩人隨時都能查看寶寶的記錄。
當遇上媽媽外出、由爸爸負責照顧寶寶的日子，
爸爸只要做好記錄，媽媽在外出時也能得知寶寶的睡眠時間和餵乳量，讓人好放心。

◆記錄內容◆
母乳、牛奶、預擠母乳、副食品、尿布、便便、尿尿、睡眠、
體溫、身高、體重、洗澡、散步、
咳嗽、發疹、嘔吐、受傷、服藥、醫院、
其他自由記述、育兒日記（附照片）

◆特色功能◆
•即使是正在哺乳等狀況下也能用單手輕鬆操作的設計
•內建一眼就能了解一整天的概要的時間條功能
•自動統計一天的總量，清楚顯示哺乳時間、餵乳量及睡眠時間等等
•可以將用餐、睡眠、排便及體溫的每週變化匯整成淺顯易懂的圖表，一次查看
•可以透過成長曲線查看嬰兒的成長狀況
•貼心通知您下一次的哺乳時間

Terms of Use
https://www.sakabou.co.jp/app/piyolog/eula_en.html

評論.標題: Life is easier with this app
評論.內容: This app has revolutionized my experience as a new parent! It’s truly been a lifesaver, providing me with a plethora of useful features and making parenting a breeze. From tracking feeding schedules, diaper changes, and sleep patterns to offering growth milestones and visualizations, this app covers it all. It's user-friendly, intuitive, and has simplified the overwhelming task of managing my baby's daily routine. With its convenient features like a feeding tracker, sleep monitoring, and growth tracking, along with seamless synchronization across devices, this app has become an invaluable companion. I highly recommend this fantastic baby tracker app to all parents—it's a game-changer that will undoubtedly make their lives easier and more enjoyable.

App is great especially for allowing multiple people to update the logs.  

I would like them to add the amount per feed along with the feeding time in a single view in the summary.  This allows us to see more easily see a pattern in our baby's daily feed schedule.
Great for families to stay connected to a schedule.

評論.標題: First child Piyo IS A MUST!!
評論.內容: My wife and I tried a few different apps to log our first baby’s routines and everything, but PIYO blew everything out of the water! Easy to use. Great graphs, logs for almost everything you can think of and the ability to creat custom events, my newest was “brushing teeth”. Even if you have more than one child, this app is so useful and easy to use, plus it goes great with Alexa, Siri, Google assistant, which makes inputting any event super easy to do.
This app so far is the best app I used for tracking baby’s daily life. It works perfectly for Apple Watch and iPhone, highly recommended!!
The icons are cute and the share & sync are really easy and straightforward! There are some ads but not disturbing at all. Highly recommend for first-time parents!

Love this app. They have literally thought of everything. 

Some feedback: the weight at the top (“total”section) is not correct. It says my son is 5lbs and he’s almost 12lbs

This app is absolutely amazing and my wife and I can’t get enough of it. 

One issue I have noticed is the feeding graph does not display nursing, I guess because it’s time based and not volume based, but oh well

We just had our first one this week and we are in love with this app! You can track all our activities, there are nice timers for breastfeeding, very user-friendly, there’s a journal section, and mostly, you can share the same kid/tracking with your spouse. Great app, even for the free version!!! Congrats and thank you developers!
I enjoy all the options for logging including a nursing timer.  The summary allows you to see patterns in eating and sleep. So easy to use
This is hands down the best App ever!!
Very easy to use and straight forward we love the app so far

This is a user friendly App. I’m a new mommy- before this App my husband and I wrote his feedings in a notebook. Now we are synced and we’re always aware of his feedings together with amount, naps, etc. This App even reminds you to nurse, keeps record of our baby’s growth and sleep patterns. Everything a new parent needs in one place with the ability to share with your partner.

評論.標題: A must have app for new parents
評論.內容:
My wife and I use this app on multiple devices. It is great for tracking the amount of food we give, the type such as formula or breastfeeding, diaper changes, and the ability to upload photos of their bowel movements in the event we need to show it to our pediatrician. 

There are many more features but we mostly use it for the ones listed above. We highly recommend this app.

I didn’t have anything like this for my first born. This app is amazing for keeping track of everything baby does. I love that me and my partner can both use it on our phones when each is taking a turn with baby. We also add a new photo everyday which is fun. This was extremely helpful in the beginning when we were tracking how many diapers he was going thru. Found out he wasn’t producing enough and we needed to supplement with formula. You can also see patterns of sleep with the graphs and that’s super helpful to start a sleep routine. Can’t recommend this app enough
So helpful to keep up with feed and soiled diapers in the first month

I was looking for a breastfeeding tracker I could just start and stop and not have to watch the time. I found that and so much more with this app. I can keep up with diapers, growth, bath, pumping, milestones. This app has everything and I’m so glad I found it to use with my newborn, wish I had with my other 3 kids.

評論.標題: Keep finding new reasons to love this app
評論.內容: Where to begin with why I like this app so much? Super helpful that it can be updated by multiple devices, I’m easily able to log nursing, sleep, diaper changes, etc, with as much detail as I desire, all in an incredibly cute interface with fun graphics. The data visualization is well thought out and the UI is intuitive to interact with. Any time I think of something new I want to use the app for, the function is already there and more! For instance, I just discovered the iPhone widget this morning and my experience has been further elevated yet again. It is PURE JOY to use, both as a former UX/UI designer and a first time parent. I’m so glad I found this and will definitely recommend to all my friends.

Wish I had found this a few months back when my baby was born. It’s so easy to lose track if time w a newborn/ baby , and there’s really no time or energy to log things. This app fixes these 2 things. Super easy to use and convenient . Love it pairs with my Apple Watch and u can speak to Seri to log events. That needs a little tweak because she sometimes doesn’t understand, but I can easily log myself from my watch as well.

評論.標題: Simple, intuitive and all one needs
評論.內容: Best app ever. Helped me to track my baby activities and  was very useful, especially during the few first months.
It used 5 minute increments instead of just recording the actual time for events.  How can the developers be so stupid??

I have been using the app for a couple of weeks not and I must say that I’m impressed. It tracks all the basic information and you can also use custom icons as well. 

I downloaded the app for my granddaughter because I am watching her while my daughter and her husband are working. They see all the information that is recorded and it even helps to keep the baby on schedule on the weekends.

It really is a great app!
This app is essential for every mom. It keeps track of everything from nursing hours and duration, diaper change, napping time, etc...

This app has been so useful.  We had a baby a week ago and I don’t know what we would do without this app.  Being able to have both parents access the info from different phones is wonderful because we take the baby in shifts—we can even leave notes for each other, and even if the other person is too tired to function we can just check the log and see what’s up. You can also get reminders about when it’s time to nurse again.  Love love love 💕

評論.標題: Love the Watch and Widget Option
評論.內容: It makes recording fast. Also the alexa option too.

I’ve never rated an app, but this one has earned it. As a first time mom of a 4 day old, this app is an amazing way to track feedings and output in a easy and efficient way. I would definitely recommend this app.

I started using this app when my son was born in May 2020. It has been phenomenal to keep track of everything. I love that my husband and I can both connect and not have conflicting information.  The only thing I would probably change would be to edit and remove the icons you don’t use or be able to move them to what you use the most. 
Thank you so much for making it.

Everything you’re looking for in a baby logging app. Super easy to use and even has extra features I didn’t expect to have (like the nursing timer, pumping tracker, diary, notes sections in each tag, etc). This app should honestly not be free because it’s packed with so many useful features!!
Excellent options for nursing with timers and sides, very nice and convenient to do from the watch.
I have tried several ones and this is by far the Best!!! Super friendly user :)
Nice app intuitive design

This app has helped me so much transitioning into being a new mom. It does everything I need and allows for so much customization for day to day changes. It’s easy to use and export weekly/monthly reports for doctor visits and keeping my husband on track with our routines :) this app is a must have for any parent for tracking everything you need and want to with your child’s growing life.

I’m the nanny/auntie 😉 Nantie and while daddy is deployed I’m helping track feedings. This really easy to use for anybody. My only recommendation would be making the emojis faster to scroll/search or maybe I need a bigger iPhone🤷🏾‍♀️.

This app is absolutely amazing. As first time parents, it’s hard to keep everything organized and this app does all the work for us. The app is especially helpful with breastfeeding as it has the timer, tells you which side you started on, and has a great reminder system. The “expressed breast milk” option is a nice added bonus!

I love that it syncs instantly so my fiancé and I are always on the same page. I also love the summary at the top that shows total wet diapers, etc as it’s very helpful in determining whether or not my baby is breastfeeding enough!

I don’t know what I would do without this app, truly.

My recommendations:
-Ability to customize the order of the log options (I have to scroll awhile to get to pump)
-Feeding reminders sync between users
-Smaller feeding increments for more accurate logging
It just immediately closes when I click on app, didn’t happen before and I already updated my app.
Best app for tracking baby stuff. Love that you can sync with a partner. It has no hipster frills, just function. Fantastic, no complaints

I love that I have all options ready at the bottom and even more that I can pick and choose which tabs I want or not want. literally has made my life so much easier for this first time mom :) highly recommend it!!
The app works awesome for tracking nursing and and baby’s habits. The child’s age has a silly typo that I’d love to see fixed - my baby is 13 days old, and the app says she’s in her 13rd day lol.

應用名稱: 超慢跑節拍器-180步频慢跑，超慢跑計時器，健康瘦身、減肥
應用描述:
"""超慢跑節拍器是為所有人設計的跑步步頻節拍器，適合跑步初學者、健康減肥者、想要提高心肺功能、減少運動傷害的跑者。透過精準的節拍控制，超慢跑節拍器幫助您維持恆定的超慢跑步頻，從而優化跑步效果，讓您的每一步都充滿節奏感和舒適感。

為什麼推薦超慢跑：

超慢跑的原理是基於「低強度、長時間」的有氧運動理論。
低強度的運動可以讓心率維持在最大心率的60%-70%之間，這一區間被認為是最佳的脂肪燃燒和心肺功能提升區間。在這個心率區間內，身體主要使用脂肪作為能量來源，而非肝醣，有助於脂肪減少和體重管理。

超慢跑有什麼好處：

-提高心肺功能：長期的超慢跑可以增強心臟功能，提高氧氣利用率。
-減少運動傷害：由於跑步強度低，對關節和肌肉的壓力小，因此能顯著降低運動傷害的風險。
-促進脂肪燃燒：在低強度運動下，身體更傾向於使用脂肪作為能源，有助於體重控制和減肥。
-提高睡眠品質：規律的超慢跑可以改善睡眠質量，幫助身體和心理更好地放鬆。
-增強心理健康：慢跑過程中，跑者往往能享受跑步帶來的放鬆和快樂，有助於減少壓力和憂鬱情緒。

 超慢跑節拍器指南：

-步頻調音器-
支援步頻調節，根據您的日常習慣選擇你的跑步步頻，包含爆火的180步頻慢跑、150步頻、200步頻等經典步頻，還有幾十種不同速度的步頻，不管你是騎腳踏車踏頻，還是健走，還是快跑，總有一款適合你，快定制你的跑步節拍吧！

-超慢跑節拍-
超多跑步節拍音樂供選擇，跟著節拍一步一步跑，不傷膝蓋。音樂與節拍的結合，邊跑步邊享受，讓跑步充滿樂趣~

-計步器-
你只管跑，數據交給我們，每次慢跑都會幫你記錄步數、公里數、消耗的卡路里、跑步時間~

-倒數計時器-
每天一個小目標，設定鍛鍊時間，即可啟動超慢跑計時器，定時提醒！

-數據分析-
詳細記錄您的跑步數據，包括速度、步頻、跑步時間和消耗的卡路里，並透過圖表和分析報告展示您的進步。

-客製化通知-
想運動又怕忘記怎麼辦？超慢跑節拍器支援客製化通知哦，週一到週日每天都可以設定運動提醒，到點定時運動提醒，不怕忘記~

-免費無廣-
綠色安全，純粹無廣，免費噠！沖鴨~


 一天15分鐘，不喘不累、強化心肺，不管你要鍛鍊身體，還是要健身減肥，超慢跑節拍器都是你不二選擇，沖鴨~
立即下載，改變從現在開始！

評論.標題: 非常感謝有這個節拍器！
評論.內容: 從八月中下旬開始練習超慢跑，有這個想法在心中孕育了大半年，後來實在是身體健康狀況不佳，加上我也71歲了！心想有需要這麼拼嗎？最後還是決定開始超慢跑，我跑了快兩個月時，到家庭醫生那驗血，後來結果下來，我的家庭醫生，打電話告知我血糖、三酸甘油酯高低膽固醇，一切正常！問我怎麼做到的？我説我練了將近兩個月的超慢跑！ 我今年71歲了！一個人住在洛杉磯，這個超慢跑並不要特別準備什麼，對我來説很方便！ 再次感謝你們的團隊 馮梅莉 只是我一直在App上留言，沒辦法傳出去！ 我的超慢跑卡住了！一直沒辦法還原到主畫面，1️⃣直停在最後一個回答處 且有一個提醒 小主你有新通知提醒 不用了！我改別的慢跑App就可以！反正只是跑步而已！也不是只有你們的可以用！ 謝謝了！ 今天11/2美國時間！超慢跑App可以使用了！可是不穩定，一下可以，過一會又卡住了！我跑了三十分鐘，都沒記錄下來，新的版本沒以前的好用，不過給你們時間，we see!Thanks!

Apparently they loaded an “improved” version this past week. Crashed the app. It no longer works. Fell bad about it as it was a pretty good app. Better than the alternative. Plus I lost several months of data.
第一天20分钟，150频不知道可伤害膝盖，难啊
第一次用，感觉非常好！
是一项輕鬆不必選天氣、選埸地的運動，值得學習以恆！

應用名稱: 168斷食 - 間歇性斷食追蹤器，Fasting
應用描述:
Fasting Tracker 是最熱門的斷食應用程式，受全世界的使用者所信賴。

這是個直觀的斷食工具，可以引導您保持健康習慣，擁有自律的生活。讓您有效減重，並感到更有活力！ 不需節食，也不會有溜溜球效應。

為什麼要選擇間歇性斷食？
√ 最自然的減重與塑身方式
√ 不需要節食和運動就能減重
√ 燃燒體內儲存的脂肪
√ 促進生長激素
√ 讓您感覺更有活力
√ 改善身體與大腦機能
√ 不需計算卡路里攝取量
√ 在“我的”頁面打開“Apple Health”開關，同步你的身高，體重信息到Apple Health

斷食追蹤器的功能
√ 計時器：開啟計時器，我們會透過提醒在計畫中引導您。
√ 統計資料：直觀的圖表可以追蹤您的目標完成度、體重趨勢和感受等。
√ 客製化：設定您的目標、調整您的斷食/進食期，來建立您獨一無二的計畫。
√ 檢查狀態：可了解您的身體狀態和體內變化，並獲得您健康狀況的個人化見解。
√ 智慧追蹤工具：按一下就能開始 / 結束斷食。可在圖表上自動追蹤您斷食的時間。
√ 學習：提供具有科學根據的訣竅和文章，解答常見疑問。

具有科學根據的多種斷食計畫
√ 一天略過一餐：14-10、16-8、15-9、12-12
√ 一天吃一餐：18-6、19-5、20-4、22-2、23-1
√ 週計畫：6-1、5-2、10in2、自噬
√ 28 天計畫
√ 初學者與經驗豐富者皆適用

有效嗎？
間歇性斷食經過證實可促進快速減重。在斷食期間，隨著體內的肝糖消耗，身體會進入酮態，亦即人體的「燃脂」模式，因此這是有效的燃脂方式。

安全嗎？
是的，這是最自然且安全的減重方法。研究顯示，長時間進食會導致人體無法停止消化，因而產生健康問題，例如糖尿病。斷食就像是暫時休息不吃東西，可以減輕肝臟的負擔。

我適合使用斷食追蹤器嗎？
斷食追蹤器提供多種斷食計畫，不論是初學者或經驗豐富者、男性或女性都適合使用。追蹤器會引導您執行計畫，不需要改變飲食，就能輕鬆地執行計畫。

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每月NT$ 440，每年NT$ 1,350
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢
 
隱私政策：https://fasting.abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html
使用條款：https://fasting.abishkking.com/terms.html

I have this app on my phone now for a few years used it on and off i was never consistent, I told a few people about it and they lost weight using it so I decided to give it another try after literally trying everything else to lose weight, I started in September and I’m already down 24lbs so excited I can’t believe it I told a few people at work about it, its a great app keep me on track.

I’ve been using this product often on for almost 4 years. I recently became interested in using the calorie tracker. You can take a picture and then put some calories but let’s say for example I took a picture of my latte. It states that it’s a coffee and puts some calories in there a coffee and a latte. There’s a bit of a difference in the calories. So it doesn’t really have a sophisticated database that it taps in or that you can manually enter the name of what you’re eating and then it gives somewhat accurate count of calories. So this part of the app I would not get excited about the rest is pretty good but to me this is a important part of using the app and getting greater results.

評論.標題: Overall good, but not always helpful
評論.內容: The fasting app is really neat. There are lots of helpful features to help guide you on your health journey. I especially appreciate the fasting and sleep timer. Initially I was excited when I saw the food diary.  It doesn’t count the foods correctly. If you manually record foods it’ll be there to choose again. I wish the foods would be alphabetical and individual. There’s times when I’ll eat the same foods, but not in combination like I did previously. I don’t use this feature anymore because it’s inconvenient. The other features I still use regularly. When I went to leave a comment in the app it said I had to get another mailing app in order to submit the comment. Even after I got this additional app, it still did not work. A little bit odd to me.

I can’t believe how easy this app makes fasting. Not only educational, but it breaks down the benefits of fasting hour by hour. When a friend told me about this app, I thought it was too good to be true, but it’s everything and more! The free version is great, but the paid version is fantastic!
I like how the app tells you about each phase you are in.
Muy bueno aplicación
Terrible set up for entering your food.  Most everything I tried to scan came up as not found.  Very frustrated with this part of the app.

I’ve done intermittent fasting before & always lose the pounds I need with this app! I started back on 10/20/24 at 180lbs, I began 16:8 and it’s been 5 days 10/25/24 I am now 172lbs. Of course I’m addicted to the app and seeing my results! I also enjoy tracking my water intake. 
I will update my weight loss in December
Works as intended, minimal ads, very informative

評論.標題: An app that has it all!
評論.內容:

The only thing I wish I could search for foods in a database instead of having to guess when I have to manually add a meal versus a picture of it which is not always accurate.

評論.標題: The update deleted all my diet records!
評論.內容: I waked up today to see the app updated and all my diet records are deleted. The feature to scan my meals and calculate calories is also gone! I have purchased the paid plan for this feature and now you remove it without prior notice. I want a refund.

This app was great during the free trial. As soon as I got charged the $49.99 for the year they took away the “Meal” feature which allows you to take a picture of your food and the app automatically calculates your macros. It WAS a phenomenal app and is now completely useless. And I can’t get my money back. HUGE SCAM. Save your money.

They updated and took away the food tracker showing you how much you’ve consumed and how much til you’ve reached your daily goal. I paid for the app just for that. . Everything else I can get with a free vs. so sad. I’ll be canceling my subscription.

This is the best IF app I’ve tried so far. Based on other’s reviews, I installed it to track my progress. It seems to have all the features to keep you motivated. I’m not using the meal plans, but I’ve use all other tracking features. The AI meal photo scanning is pretty amazing, it recognizes most food. Granted, you might need to subscribe for premium to experience the same excitement. I do have an advice, when you install the app the first time, you have about 15mins opportunity to subscribe to premium for like 65%? off - that offer disappears afterward so I’d suggest you sign up quick. Anyway, this app has kept me motivated for over 3 weeks of IF I’ve done multiple challenges- I’ve even loss 5lbs! 👍

應用描述:
以「30天健身挑戰」實現你的減重和增肌目標！

沒有設備？沒問題！我們提供個人化的家庭健身計畫和專業指導。告別藉口，迎接更健康的自己。準備好與我們一起實現健身目標吧，我們是你值得信賴的AI教練。

輕鬆打造理想體態！我們提供各種健身計畫和豐富的運動庫，針對各個部位進行訓練。無論你想減重還是增肌，我們都有相應的定制計畫，讓你一步到位。

在短短30天內獲得令人驚豔的效果！立刻汗流浹背，發現更健美的自己！

隨時隨地運動，更快地塑造身材！
* 通過分析你的身體數據和偏好，我們將為你量身定制一個30天的計畫，讓你更快更有效地實現目標。
* 隨時隨地運動！無論你是在家、辦公室還是外出，在我們的應用程式都能滿足你的健身需求。
* 不再枯燥乏味的運動！我們的應用程式提供多種運動方式，包括有氧運動、高強度間歇訓練和力量訓練，讓你的運動充滿樂趣和刺激。
* 探索各種零設備家庭運動，適合各種健身水平。使用我們的應用程式，快速找到符合你需求的任何運動。
* AI教練能夠立即回答你的所有疑惑，把問題轉換成實際的洞見，無疑問地協助你達成健身目標！

驚人功能
- 個人化計畫：根據你的目標和健身水平量身定制的減重和增肌計畫。

- 簡單易行：清晰的指導和詳細的視頻，讓你能正確、安全地進行運動。

- 目標導向的訓練：300多個特定的運動，針對問題區域實現你的目標。

- 定制運動：輕鬆創建符合你偏好和需求的運動。

- 健身教練：我們精心設計的運動計畫，讓你更輕鬆、更安全地燃燒卡路里。

- 每日進度追蹤：使用我們方便的進度追蹤功能，保持動力並追蹤你每天的運動。

- Apple Health：將你的計步器與Apple Health同步，追蹤每天的步數和卡路里消耗。

- AI教練：您可以詢問任何有關鍛煉、休息和飲食的問題，獲得精確的健身指導。

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格：每年NT$2,290.00。
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。
 
隱私政策：https://30dayfitness.leaphealth.fitness/privacypolicy.html
使用條款：https://30dayfitness.leaphealth.fitness/terms.html

應用描述:
你戶外冒險的記錄冊。

追蹤活動、拍攝照片，並記錄印象深刻的地點。

無論是走過的小徑、探索過的國家公園、新發現的路線，都能一舉收錄進你的個人冒險記錄冊。

和親朋好友分享你的探索旅程，或是當成你珍藏的私密日記。

捕捉你的戶外生活
• 透過 app 追蹤活動
• 連接 Garmin、MapMyWalk 及其他第三方追蹤器
• 在活動時直接追蹤，或是回家後再行記錄
• 儲存下來供自己回味，或是分享給親朋好友
• 收集熱門小徑、國家公園等地點

標記你在意的瞬間和地點
• 標記你感興趣的地點，不論是美景、咖啡店、野餐區都可以
• 加入照片和影片
• 留下筆記
• 標記你看到的野生動物
• 以自己的方式訴說自己的故事

快速匯入所有活動歷程
• 輕鬆匯入你的戶外活動歷程
• 從其他服務匯入照片和活動
• 數分鐘內即可手動建立戶外活動歷程

重溫並分享你的回憶
• 將活動變成影片
• 查看路線的 3D 地景
• 加入你和朋友的照片
• 分享戶外成就

The oversight of not having the ability to select an overall video length is wild. You want to make a reel? Good luck getting it a minute and a half or less. Want to make a YouTube short? Good luck getting your video to a minute or less. 

Such a massive oversight. Makes this app practically useless.

評論.標題: NOT worth the premium upgrade/TERRIBLE connection
評論.內容: This app, in theory and on the few occasions it stays connected and works properly, is good. BUT it is the biggest waste of money bc it rarely stays connected and you constantly have to deal w it freezing or having to press RESUME bc it has disconnected. I contacted them and they had the audacity to just blame it on me instead of dealing w the issue which is that their network is weak. Read other reviews online and you will see. How is it that my Fitbit, Apple Watch, and Strava can all simultaneously work and stay continuously connected during a hike, but the relive app doesn’t stay connected tot constantly freezes. How about when you disconnect and then find connection, you don’t make the user have to magically and psychically guess that it’s disconnected so they look at their phone and press resume? I will not be renewing and regret ever upgrading. Terrible!

Maybe with this change in the near future, many pilots will use your app to make videos of their tracks.

Have had wonderful results in the past with this easy to use app.  Having a visual topographical tract to go with the pictures makes a great record of activities.  However, in the past couple of months there seem to be increasing number of ‘fails’ when I’m trying to create videos.  Yesterday’s activity has failed over eight times when attempting to create the video.  I have reset my iPhone and reloaded my app to no avail. I have tried creating the video with and without my VPN on but still no success.  Worse, numerous times I have tried the Help menu and get endless looping but no support.  What gives?  I downgraded app from 5-stars to 3 but if recent issues go unfixed, the app won’t be worth even 1-star.
Digging the app however I would love to see them import the Appalachian Trail shelter locations and prominent features.
I’d like to put these on TikTok or Instagram stories. Put this feature in your next sprint please!
Making videos keeps failing.  And sometimes when opening app, everything is zoomed way in.  Huge font.  Unable to see entire app interface.  Cannot zoom out.

I don’t know if somehow today I just happened to have more video clips then usual but the program limited the video clips and I believe this is a serious limitation on usage of the app. Seems like as long as you use only photos, you should be Ok, but the problem is that video is the only way to show certain things. Sometimes photos just aren’t enough and while the tracking is kind of cool and works well, it will become stale after a few times if you cannot be more creative with the videos it creates.

Great idea, but serious shortcomings.  I suppose if you use it for yourself on a mobile device and don’t share, then it might be OK.  But not if you want to share your activities.

To view someone’s activity you must create an account login, even if they want to share with you. But you can’t create an account on a desktop/laptop, not can you follow someone on a desktop/laptop.  That means that someone who doesn’t have a mobile device can’t follow you or view your activities.  So if you have elderly or mobility-impaired folks that have no mobile devices, then they can’t follow your activities.  

It’s also not very intuitive to set up.  Nor can one expand the photos to see them better.

I wouldn’t use it except to follow two friends backpacking journey.  Once they are done, the app will be removed from my device.  Perhaps the folks that make it will improve it with time.

I’ve used this app to record several family vacations, where in the app crashes and loses track. Disappointing because I’ve invested a lot of time in making these videos only have the application fail.

I’m using Strava and want to switch to Relive, but it’s missing a crucial thing Watch app! Which I’m using as main device for recording rides. I’m using it’s battery and background app refresh, also live hearts rate! So I will never use my iPhone to record activity! Since it will consume too much battery! Only using my Watch.

評論.標題: I really want to like this app
評論.內容:
This app comes close, it comes SO CLOSE to being great. But unfortunately it had a single giant flaw that prevents it from being useful for my situation. 

My biggest complaint is that there algorithm to group photos into “Moments” is pretty bad. Feeding it a 5 hour track with upwards of 250 photos, and it groups them into just 10 “Moments”. Rather than spacing them out closer to where the photos were actually taken, it tries to group them far too closely together and has many off by dozens of miles. I understand their logic of not needing to be super ultra accurate with photo location, but this goes way way too far into the oversimplified direction.

To make it worse, when you do add “Moments”, you have to manually add the location/time when they were taken. The app won’t just read that data off of the photos that you import, even though it would be so easy for it to do. All of that data is right there.

This big flaw of adding moments being an incredibly manual process, when it should be so easy to have automated, is the biggest disappointment of this app. It’s a shame, because if that were just fixed I would have subscribed in an instant.

Incredible visual recollection of this most incredible cycle adventure journey.

Can you make a treadmill exercise can you do that I have one so I want a treadmill exercise

The app itself is fine, that's not what's driving a 1-star review.

You should know that this company is very inflexible in its renewal policies and refund policies. 

I thought I had cancelled this renewal some time ago, but couldn't find any documentation to that effect. I wrote to them as soon as I was billed for the renewal to request immediate cancellation and a refund. Here’s their reply.

Hi there, 

According to our system, your subscription was not cancelled before the renewal. When you joined Plus, it was stated that the subscription will renew automatically unless you cancel it. We won't offer a refund on your Relive Plus subscription.

You will still retain access to Relive Plus until your current subscription period ends.

See you on the outside,
Janie

———————————-

Most of the apps and services I subscribe to annually send a reminder prior to renewal. Relive did not.

We are “adulting” here; Responsible for reading the fine print of the EULA as well as accepting the consequences for failing to. It just feels like a money grab on their part.

In summary, I have no complaints with the app or its functionality, and the timeliness in their response to my refund was great. But, most of the time when you miss an unsubscribe deadline a company will let you out. Just beware that Relive won't.
… and no way to contact support about it. In fact Fitbit doesn’t even show up in a search of their help documents, not even so much as to say that they don’t support it and here’s why.

評論.標題: So much great opportunity to become better
評論.內容:
I just came across this app and love its concept. As an ultra runner I do a lot of trails on steep inclines and mountains and document alot  of workouts/runs via photo and video. A few ideas to make this better:
- Allow me to incorporate audio from my videos so people have a better idea of what’s going on.
- on steeper elevation portions zoom in on that section so people can see in a 3D way how intense the vertical actually is and have a stat for the elevation grade for that portion
- allow me to use music from my iTunes library
- Strava integration so you can have a feature for Strava segments highlighted in the video.

Would love a response from the developers to see if these items are coming down the pipeline. I know alot of people who would use this app if those ideas were implemented!😊
Easy to use and pause during the rides. Haven’t spent enough time to learn all the features. Don’t want to pay to add music but cool enough.

評論.標題: Lots of notifications- if you love being hounded to engage endlessly you will love this app!
評論.內容: Once this app decides it wants to document a walk you’ve taken recently it simply won’t stop harassing you about it until you agree to let the app do it. There is no cancel. There is no ignore just pure harassment until you make the movie whether you want it or not.
wery not good

Awesome concept and great bang for your buck… let’s face it, we all like to take pics and vids on some of our more scenic rides but when it comes to putting things together nothing rivals Relive. Love the 3D route progress tracking. 
A few kinks still need to be ironed out and processing times for the video to be ready can be a bit long even with a subscription… sometimes the creation fails and needs to be submitted again but no loss of work occurs. 
I wish editing minor aspects of the video such as titles would not result in re-processing of the video. 
The only other minor annoyance pertains to fact it’s not appear to be possible to replace/resubmit a video that was already added. I mistakenly submitted an unedited video and was later unable to replace it with the edited version of that video. I also could not upload a new copy of it and delete the old one…
Again, fantastic app though

評論.標題: Good, not great. Plus membership is too limited
評論.內容:
I like this app, some bugs and content heavy vids fail to create repeatedly. Content light vids work fine and quickly. 

BUT, worst part of Plus membership is limited to just a few preloaded music options and not able to use your own music clips. Either 1) give plus users MANY more options on preloaded music or 2) allow us to select our own music from our library. 

Otherwise people who use this often are stuck with repetitive clips that make them uninteresting.

應用描述:
“寶寶生活記錄”專注於記錄和統計新生寶寶的日常生活，幫助您定量了解和分析寶寶成長狀況，並能隨時記錄寶寶生活中的趣事。

“寶寶生活記錄”已對iOS 16進行優化。

“寶寶生活記錄”提供兩個版本：
版本一：免費版
可永久免費使用絕大部分功能，包括數據同步功能；可在14日內免費使用全部功能；14日後將顯示廣告，並鎖住“統計圖表”功能。
版本二：內購升級為完整版
無廣告，完整功能

1、功能全面
“寶寶生活記錄”能對寶寶的生活輕鬆記錄、編輯和統計分析，並能在多設備間同步數據，也能方便的導出、打印數據和圖表。 “寶寶生活記錄”包括寶寶今日（主頁）、記錄、編輯查看、統計四大主要模塊，具體包括如下內容：
* 哺乳餵食--可記錄母乳，母乳瓶餵，配方奶，輔食的記錄和統計，能自定義食物種類和數量；母乳可計時方式記錄；能設置鬧鐘提醒下次餵食時間。
* 換尿布--可記錄噓噓、便便、混合和乾爽四種狀態，並能設置鬧鐘提醒下次換尿佈時間。
* 睡眠--可計時方式記錄，並能設置鬧鐘提醒下次睡眠時間。
* 成長--除了記錄寶寶身高、體重、頭圍數據，更在統計圖中反映世衛組織（WHO）百分位曲線，方便評估寶寶的成長狀態。
* 里程碑--可記錄寶寶成長過程中的重要事件，通過拍照來留下美好瞬間。
* 歡樂時光--通過照片和文字來記錄寶寶生活的點點滴滴。
* 其它活動--可自定義適合寶寶的任何記錄項，可計時方式記錄。

2、方便易用
“寶寶生活記錄”的豐富功能均能方便快速地實現。根據移動設備的特點分別為iPhone和iPad優化的界面和操作方式，讓您記錄、查看、編輯等操作能通過最簡單的步驟完成。

3、支持記錄多個寶寶的活動
可以方便地記錄和管理多個寶寶的生活

4、完善的數據同步和備份
連接寶寶生活記錄伺服器，提供穩定的數據同步。同時有iCloud或Dropbox兩種雲同步/備份方式可選，更靈活。

5、支持數據和圖表的打印、email、導出（csv格式）

6、貼心的夜間模式，讓您在夜間也能輕鬆操作

評論.內容: I think it’s cool that it has graph and it’s so detailed but with all of these details it’s just too much for me and a crying newborn. Nice app but too much going on!
I like the ability to track information for parent. I need more options to track child’s progress. Tummy time and other gross motor skills.
Just gives you a lump sum of time that you breastfed each day with no feeding breakdown for the day.

Paper logs are a pain in the butt, trying to do the math of how long baby fed when you’ve slept for 20 minutes in the past 24 hours ain’t it. This app is incredible. I want to say thank you to the developers for the peace of mind and ease of use with this app. 10/10 I recommend it to everyone!

This has been a game changer for me. Before this app, I was keeping a log on my notes and that eventually turned into a pdf 😵‍💫 I came across this app first try and I’ve been in love with it since. I had my son 3weeks early and keeping track of his feeding has been made so simple for me because of this app. 10/10 recommend !!

This app is perfect. I know it’s not the fanciest UX but it’s the information you need without added clutter. I especially like, when you go to nurse, that tells you which side you started on last time. It also works with my Apple Watch so I don’t even have to have my phone. I can just log things on the watch. I couldn’t find another app that did that well.

評論.標題: Updated: widgets fixed with latest app update.
評論.內容:
Edited to add: the latest app update fixed the issue I described below. However, I had already paid for a new app by the time it was fixed. Original review below: 

I have used this app with two babies so far. I love it, but the latest update totally ruined both of the widgets I had, which I use for even quicker access to information like when I fed last. Now I have to fully open the app to see that information, instead of glancing at my widget on my Home Screen or Lock Screen. My Home Screen widget is now just a black box, and my Lock Screen widget disappeared completely. I hope they put out another update to fix this problem, and if they do, I’ll update this review!
Love it and it was so great for tracking baby feeds, love the watch feature too
This app is sooo good and so easy to use it so simple. Is a life saver for new parents.
every time it updates it resets my settings it's very annoying. and i paid for the full version. a waste of money

Wish I could customize it to only track and show pumps… other than that. Lately its been glitching out on me. I can no longer edit my logs (delete one I accidentally made and I prefer using “ml”measurement instead of “oz” but it keeps switching back to “oz” on me… so much so that I’ll be switching to Huckleberry.
This app has been a parenting game changer, especially if parents are on a separate schedule and sleep deprived! I don’t know how I would track my son’s medicines and food without it!

This app has been great. We’ve been using it for a year now and probably will for a while yet. We use the free version with the family sharing option. It’s perfect because my husband and I can each track and the others app will be updated with any additions. It’s been great to help keep track of stuff when you’re sleep deprived. We started using it the day he was born and haven’t had any desire to find a new app. Thanks for the great product!

Just need to be able to add a shortcut to the watch face (a “complication” or widget) and maybe be able to track snacks - otherwise it is PERFECT and I do appreciate the one time price, not subscription based service!
Simple, easy to use. Worth the money.

Very thoughtfully made. Super helpful in tracking patterns and determining whether my baby is crying because she’s tired or hungry. Was about to ask about tracking solid food separately so it doesn’t interfere with milk but they have already built a setting for that

i’ve been using this app for almost 5 months. I loved that you could track pumping as well as baby, but now when you start a pumping session, it automatically starts both sides like right now I’m feeding baby and pumping on the other side, but it says I’m nursing baby and pumping both boobs.

I love this app. It’s so easy to track diapers, eating, and sleeping. My husband and mom are able to add on here so we can all easily see when the last time he ate or was changed! Makes it very easy for that first appointment when they ask lots of questions and I have everything written down or when I saw the lactation specialist. The only reason I have the app a 4 star is because I wish it had a feature to better track milk storage! I notice that the amount it off (honestly sometimes by operator error). I end up being able to freeze milk and I just wish there was a feature to add in when you do that! My only suggestion and then it would’ve been a 5 star review!!

Absolutely love! Like that you can easily switch between profile for multiple kiddos, it records everything you need (diaper changes, feedings—nursing, expressed milk, or formula amounts) records pumping, naps, and diaper changes. Love that all the features are free too, been using it for 19 months and have zero complaints!

I’ve had this app for 3 years. I’ve used it since my baby was a newborn. It’s great to document everything related to taking care of babies. For people that like to be on schedule and not wonder when was the last time I feed, changed, pumped, gave meds, etc this app is great. You can sync devices and have people that help take care of baby know what was done when. It’s even helped me with taking care of pets/livestock. I’ve also used it to document bottle fed kids (goats) feeding schedules. Overall it’s a wonderful app. You’ll always have data as long as you input it.

I’ve been using this app since 2020 and it has checked every box for my growing family. I tel everyone about it, from friends to healthcare professionals. A major plus is that it’s only $4.99. That’s it. No subscription.
Very helpful app

評論.標題: Totally love app but there’s a update glitch
評論.內容: This app is great, but my most recent update made it so that I cannot hit the left nursing play button. You can still edit it after you save it on the right, but it’s very annoying to not be able to use the left key.

Truly one of the best apps for anything ever. The free version is so useful, the ads aren’t intrusive, and everything works pretty intuitively. Our kiddo is having some food problems and this makes it so that we can easily enter her food and both see it!
Super helpful to keep track of everything with a newborn. It’s user friendly and tracks all the important information.
Super easy to log everything and very user friendly.

評論.標題: Good app, Things you might want to improve
評論.內容:
Very helpful app!!! Just one thing I think you might can do better is, when multiple people using this app, the app widgets only record the time from thus phone, let’s say I feed baby 3hrs ago and 5 mins ago and I record it from my phone 3hrs ago and my wife record it 5mins ago from her phone, in the app, both me and my wife’s phone shows baby feed 5mins ago, which is perfectly.
But from the widgets, either Lock Screen widgets or home page widgets, my wife’s phone shows baby feed 5mins ago, but my phone shows baby feed 3hrs and 5mins ago, which I think it didn’t sync the information that my wife put in.
Not sure if I make this clear…
Very easy to use to keep track of the important info. Helps to stay organized and even have charts!! Love this app!
Can’t believe this is a free app.
Super well made app, controls are intuitive. Thank you for making the premium version a one time payment instead of a monthly fee. Automatically five stars for me.

We used this app for our first and have continued to use it three years later through breastfeeding, bottle feeding, nannies, baby led weaning, potty training and endless illnesses. 
It’s no frills, but extremely effective to track your baby as they grow, allowing you to view your data and trends in different time spans. 
Now with our second, we use both profiles alongside each other and can look back and see the differences between the two. 
It’s been ages, but I’m pretty sure I paid for no ads, which in my opinion is worth it so you’re not being sold yet another thing like other tracking apps.

I love this app!  It’s so awesome! We just welcomed baby number 6 to our family! I remembered that I used this with number 5 to help him through lip and tongue tie healing and relearning to breastfeed. He struggled to gain weight. With this  is an able to remind myself of everything my baby needs and learn his schedule.  I was able to show the doctor everything he needed know. We will be using this amazing app once again! I am so thankful for this app it makes record keeping easy even for a
Large family!
Great and simple app. Exactly what you need with a newborn.

This app was isn’t intuitive to use and feels like it was made years ago and hasn’t been updated. Good luck trying to delete entries right away or delete your account. Had the worst experience using this app.

Great app for new, tired parents! Have you considered dark mode to make night feedings easier?

Dynamic Island takes over the entire bar and I can’t see the time, which seems unnecessary given the small font used

I really like using this app. It’s straightforward and covers the basics of what you need to track with a baby very well. I love being able to see the time my baby has been asleep or eating from my lock screen. There are a few features I wish the app had: (1) customizable items to track, e.g. so I could add mother’s sleep time. (2) comparison of today’s running total of sleep, eating, etc. to the previous day’s or an average running total. (It’s nice to know at midday if we’re on track for a good night’s sleep.) (3) not needing to unlock my phone when I stop the clock for sleep, eating, etc.
Developers of this app are doing  a favour to all the new parents.

I love this app! The only reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is it needs a babysitter option to account for hours when baby is with babysitter or at daycare. The option to also share information between the babysitter (who uses app too) and myself would be great. This would help with more accurate information on feeding, sleeping, and bathroom habits

This app has been so helpful and user friendly when tracking nursing sessions, diaper changes, and medicine during my son’s first year. I especially love how it shows up on the Home Screen when in use to make life just a little easier. Definitely recommend for first-time parents or any parent who is looking to take the brainwork out of keeping track of all the schedules.
This app is better than huckleberry and it allows the widgets with timers for free. It’s so straightforward and easy. I’m a huge fan!

I love this app, and it’s been a lifesaver but the floating ad bar at the bottom is too easily pressed and makes the ease of the app feel like it’s going away. I know they have to monetize somehow but is there another location for it? Hard to use the app when it keeps getting clicked away from by their own design

This app was an absolute life saver for the first three months aka the newborn stage. I was so delirious from sleep deprivation that I couldn’t remember anything from when I last changed my baby to when he was last fed. This app made it easy to track when my baby’s needs were met. You can even track when you last gave your baby medicine! Now that the newborn stage is over I don’t use it much because I get way more sleep, but I couldn’t have survived without this app! 10/10 recommend

I really love this app it has been so helpful as i am such a nerd and need to track everything. The only thing that i wish it had was a feeding option for combo feeding without having to use two separate feeding entries. It gets confusing when looking at total feedings when i have to enter everything separate. Other than than i am a huge fan!

This app is so stream line and dead tired mom easy to use. The only issue I have is when it’s 2am and my baby is screaming at me and I go to check when I last fed/changed her I’m blinded by the brightness of the app. It would be so awesome if you could have a dark mode/ setting that the user could set for their preferences. Love the app overall

I really love this app, it makes it so easy to track food and sleep, my LO goes to my parents three times a week and this has helped us so much with communication! The only thing I would change is to have the ability to add medications like Tylenol or reflux meds.

We love this app, but on occasion the logs wont update. If I add something, my significant other won’t see on their end or viscera. This makes it difficult to know if the baby is due for a feeding or should be woken up.

When it works right, it’s very helpful for both parents to see and enter info. The bad part is that it has randomly kicks my husband out of his account multiple times which is so annoying. And it sometimes has a delay in syncing.

Not sure if it's just me,  the app doesn't allow me to delete a feeding record that i just put in. I tried to go to Review and swip left to delete a wrong feeding input but it won't show the trash icon.

I love this app! It not only allows you to track what you pumped and when you last pumped, but it tells you your inventory for the day. You can add pictures of your baby and temperatures, sizes - essentially anything you would want to track at home when it comes to your little one. Thank you for the awesome and useful app!
We are using this on our second child and it’s simple and not too busy or complicated. Exactly what we need and very intuitive. Thanks!

應用描述:
免費下載智抗糖 App，開啟你的全方位健康管理！

我們將資料轉化為清楚、有用的資訊，協助您找到適合的血糖管理方式、輕鬆掌握健康：

* 清楚的圖表與簡單介面：簡易操作、快速掌握健康趨勢。
* 支援串接多款血糖機、血壓計和體重計：快速整合血糖、血壓、體重數據，讓記錄更方便！
* 個人化分析與提醒：根據數值提供個人化建議，全面提升健康管理效率。
* 豐富衛教知識與社群支持：免費閱讀超過 500 篇實用衛教文章，還能與其他慢性病友交流、互相關懷。

智抗糖 App 連續 3 年受美國健康媒體 Healthline 評選為 「最棒血糖管理 App 」之一！

面對慢性病及持續監測並不容易，讓智抗糖成為您的健康管理好夥伴，一起輕鬆掌握健康趨勢。

-

智抗糖功能簡介：

【血糖、血壓記錄】
除了手動記錄外，還可串接羅氏 (ACCU-CHEK)、福爾 (FORA)、瑞特 (BIONIME)、穩豪 (OneTouch)、欣活、優安進、歐姆龍 (OMRON)、優盛 (Rossmax) 等機器。

【糖化血色素 (A1C) 記錄】
清楚記錄並追蹤糖化血色素（A1C）的長期變化，了解血糖控制趨勢。

【連續血糖監測 (CGM) 連接】
結合飲食日記，透過連續血糖曲線圖分析餐後血糖波動的原因，清楚呈現餐前與餐後血糖的上升幅度。

【食物辨識｜台灣限定】
拍照即辨識！為你快速記錄當餐的食物種類，並估算攝取的熱量、碳水化合物、蛋白質等營養素。

【飲食熱量與營養素比例】
從完整的飲食與血糖日記，了解一整天攝取的總熱量和營養素，讓飲食更均衡、幫助你的體重管理。

【體重記錄】
記錄體重與體脂肪的變化，設立個人化目標並查看趨勢，進行有效的體重管理。

【藥物記錄】
手動輸入或串接 Mallya 賽諾菲胰島素筆、諾和諾德Mallya® 魔力芽® 、SoloSmart® ，讓藥物管理更方便 。

【動態圖表】
一目了然的圖表與表格，一眼看出近期血糖、血壓、體重及 A1C 的變化。

【日記回顧】
篩選血糖、血壓等日記項目，方便快速回顧過往紀錄，也能用圖表方便查看數值變化。

【夥伴頁面】
邀請親朋好友成為夥伴，隨時關注你的健康，也可以尋找附近的診所，加入診所夥伴帳號即可輕鬆分享健康數據，與醫護溝通更順暢。

【傳送紀錄】
把你輸入的日記彙整成完整的 PDF 報告或 Excel 檔案，快速分享數據紀錄給醫護人員，或方便自己查看。

我們知道對抗慢性病及持續監測並不容易，希望我們的服務可以讓您覺得管理健康是有意義的。


免費下載智抗糖 App，開啟你的全方位健康管理。


-- 免責聲明 --

* 智抗糖 App 中所列出的各種儀器，不見得皆已在您所居住的國家獲得使用許可。您可於我們的網站進一步檢視儀器的使用許可資訊： https://www.health2sync.com/device_list_pdfs/device_availability.pdf


將您的儀器連接至智抗糖 App 前，請洽詢主管單位或製造商確認。


想了解更多有關 Health2Sync 智抗糖 App 請上我們的官網：https://www.health2sync.com/tw

評論.內容: This app does everything you need to keep track of your diabetes. AI provides instant feedback at the push of a button.  The layout is excellent and not complicated.

I have been a Type 1 Diabetic for most of my life. I’ve spent a fair amount of time researching & looking for an App to track & self manage my diabetes.
Health2Sync does just exactly what’s needed, tracks on a daily basis, medication reminders that work consistently, glucose check reminders as well.
This is very important in keeping diabetes in check along with suggestions & meal tips you can’t ask for a better App..
Setup is easy, Account works on more than one device which is awesome since I see my reminders on my Apple Watch as well.
The Support is awesome, quick response to any inquiry usually within 24 hrs & a follow-up as well.
Updates are always provided when needed which shows this is a Company that cares…
Awesome work Health2Sync Staff well earned 5 Star, if I could give more than 5 Stars I would…
Better than most orthers

評論.標題: OK but needs improvement in fields offered in tracking progress
評論.內容: I like the organization of the diary, but it needs improvements. It does not have a specific field for tagging a reading as fasting, premeal or post meal but relies an time and broad time based set of pre and post breakfast/lunch/dinner which is awkward since meals cannot be at a time called breakfast, lunch or dinner. There is no note field for adding information on readings. It does sync with meters, but getting the sync timing is a challenge
I’ve been looking for an apple like this for a while. I can log my information and bring it to my doctor as I as needed. It helps me stay on track.
對糖友而言非常好用與實用！希望百尺竿頭更進一步！
Great product

I find this app very helpful to keep track of all the many components of my type two diabetes. I feel like this information is very important and this gives me a really good platform to present this data to my healthcare provider so we can make better decisions on my health care. It also keeps me accountable from day to day and encourages me to to try better to improve my daily stats.
记录血糖、血压变化、很好用
New update caused the app to fail to open. Only the beginning symbol shows and goes no further then crashes. Please fix!

While I don’t use this app specifically for tracking my glucose I do use is as much as my main app. There some parts of the app I don’t use but some I use daily.  

First the parts I really like about this app. The blood glucose selection shows the high low and in range numbers as well as a pie chart and line chart. Simple and quick. The blood pressure section works the same. The high low and normal along with the pie and line charts.  The ability to change the date range is easy.  14 day, 30, 60, 90 and custom. I also like the ability to put in info about any lab work I’ve had.  I find myself looking forward to the weekly message it provides. Giving updates on you glucose levels, blood pressure and every once in a while an estimated A1c. 
 
The things I wish were better:  the weight section. The line chart has no way to adjust the max and minimum. Goes fro 0 to 400.  I’ve lost over 25 pounds but the chart looks like a straight horizontal line.  I don’t really care for the before/after breakfast lunch and dinner part because my schedule is always changing. 

Overall I really like this app. Most of the issues I have are really personal preferences.  If you need an app to log you glucose levels give this a try.  It works well especially if you’re keeping track of a lot of details.
good
毎回体重記入。 時々血圧他測っています。 日記を見ると変化が一目でわかるのが良いです。 最近年間の定期検診とか行ったのか行かなかったのか忘れがちなので、 これからはDr.に行った記録とか予防接種の記録とかを記入していきたいと思います。
Works great love it

評論.標題: Doesn’t automatically sync and too noisy
評論.內容:
My old meter just automatically synced this app requires me to tell it to sync. I miss the old app

This is a jungle of features most I can’t use. There should be a way to pick the ones I use and hide the others.
Love the app just think it needs more options
The app is user friendly and easy to use. No tutorial needed. I like it because it keeps track of my blood pressure and blood sugar reading that I can just show my doctor.
好用

Good system for accountability. Helps maintain the record so drs visit has something tangible to show progress or lack thereof. Easy to use and comprehensive. Covers the major areas of routine health monitoring. Need to add a column for the new Kardia readings. Good work - keep it up!! Kudos!!!
Health Sync is easy to use.  It keeps me informed at a glance regarding my personal health trends

One stop shop
Allows me to track my BP and sugar

Interface is brilliant and intuitive

評論.標題: Ray Lew The most important app I used everyday tracking important meds.
評論.內容: The most important app I use to track Blood Glucose. My Doctor like the 90 day averages. I like how it works. Did have a little problem with app not working. Had to uninstall and reinstall.
Helps me keep track of blood sugar, blood pressure, weight and more. Also alerts you of trends and warns you if you’re numbers become out of control
This program has been great, it has helped me do better with counting carbs for meals, my doctor liked my printout of my last two weeks of my blood pressure and blood sugar.

After trying several I found this app to be the easiest to use and having numbers accessible. 

I like the notes section and even the mood choices when applicable.

I wish it would sync with Libre 3 and maybe sync with more CGMs.
This is the best friend of any insulin dependent diabetic and their caregivers!

評論.標題: Hard to get Summary I want
評論.內容: Would love to be able to get calories consumed in the day so far as well as clearer way to access Fitbit info
Healthsync2 helps me keep my info, syncs with my Fitbit and gives me analysis. Thanks!
You can use this to track as little or as much info as you want. The charts and graphs are really good for seeing trends. I like that I can also send a screenshot of important info to my doctor

評論.標題: Better than the blood meter’s data
評論.內容: I like the chart, table, and the pdf report is much better than the one from my glucose meter.  It does lack capability to sync with my old and new meter’s so I have to enter data manually.  Also doesn’t sync with my scale.
I like the bot showing me trends along the way. I like one app tracking multiple things like Bg, Lb, BP, Food, notes. Nice.  One star lost for capping sharing to just three times.
More than I thought track every thing I need and connects with my Dr.s health app

I have a iPhone 12 Pro plus with IOS15.6.1 and I am unsatisfied with the this application the slowness kills it. Some updates don’t show and it lack auto update communication on some good fields. 
Dan
Loved this app for over a year, then after last update, app just freezes. Hope they fix soon.

評論.標題: Cannot Connect My Bluetooth BP & Glucose Monitor
評論.內容: I don’t get it! This app is kinda useless, there’s only a few option to connect my Bluetooth Blood Pressure. Yes they do have an OMRON Blood Pressure but it’s in a different model 😤, so with with my Glucose Monitor it has a CONTOUR but of a different model? This site never updated their Blood Pressure and Glucose monitors!😩🥴
You are the best

評論.標題: Finally - an app that tracks it all!
評論.內容: I have been tracking blood sugars, food, weight, exercise, etc. all manually and in different apps. This app does it all now with the exception of it not syncing with my smart watch. It’s super simple to use, the layout isn’t too feature heavy and I can easily share data with others (apparently there’s a limit to how many times I can share with the free version). Customer service is non-existent and offers no support when needed, and is why I’m not giving this the full 5 stars.
I love that I can track EVERYTHING on one app.  I haven’t tried the reports yet, but I’m confident that they will be great by the way the app is easy to use.  Thank You.  Brenda
I like the way I can download to an Excel spreadsheet and fax to my GP

After downloading this app I plowed through the terms of use agreement. After 15 minutes of reading, I finally came to the hold harmless, indemnification clause. 
WOW. 
After reading further I decided that giving up so many rights just wasn’t worth it. I then deleted the app WITHOUT accepting. 
I suggest you read it carefully as it could come back and bite you. This is the longest and most inclusive hold harmless agreement I have encountered. Before you accept, READ.

This used to be a great app, but they added so much complexity in clicking through screens to just add a reading! The latest version requires multiple screen clicks to just add a reading! Bring back the previous version! It worked great!

I am so glad I stumbled upon this app!  It is by far the best app I’ve used to track BG.  It is very stable and response is quick.  Syncs well with my meter.  I love that I can track other data as well and the trends and graphs are just what I needed!

I have type 1 diabetes and this is the first app that is easy to use and gives me the information I need in a simple format. Plus I love that I can enter my sugars in myself, rather than syncing with the monitor. This is truly a life saver for me!

I am finding this app a little confusing.  Like meds.  I take a lot of meds.  Do you want all my meds or just my diabetes med, that is not clear. I also cannot find some of them.  I just feel like I am flying blind on how to use this app.

I’m wondering how this app got such a high rating. I can not complete the setup on an iPhone 11. No keyboard comes up in the Personalization section. There appears to be no way email them on their website - the Submit button never activates.
=========
Update: the next morning all went well and I completed the setup!

I made the mistake of allowing notifications for this app. Now the app is spamming me with promotional notifications. 

If you’re going to notify me of something, it better be more important than promoting your app.

Deleting.
Been using for 2 months now and it was very easy and intuitive to get started and use. Very easy to input data and not overly complicated. I would highly recommend!

Have used several apps for tracking my Glucose and Blood Pressure! With automatic Bluetooth sync and easy notes, this is far and away the best that I’ve tried. Love the pdf reports as well for the trips to my doctor! Bought the 6 month and will renew each time!

After searching for a while for a reliable app that I can use to record both my blood pressure and glucose level, I decided to try this one out. After 3 days of using and testing it, I was so amazed at the marvelous graphs, presentations and reporting details that I decided to go for a 6 months premium membership. I am very pleased with this app. It has truly exceeded my expectations. Very professional and well designed product indeed!
Should be able to download data without a monthly charge, maybe a one time fee. Otherwise I like the app.

Pinterest is hands down one of the best platforms for creativity, organization, and discovery. Whether I’m planning a party, redecorating my home, or looking for new recipes, Pinterest always has fresh and inspiring ideas.

The app is intuitive and easy to use, with features like boards and sections that help me organize everything seamlessly. I also love how the recommendations get better the more I use it—it feels like it truly understands my style and interests.

If you’re looking for an app to spark your creativity or help you stay organized, Pinterest is a must-have. Highly recommend!

But since I first downloaded it, it has gone downhill so much that I could never spend as much time as I used to spend on it, due to the drop in quality. Every other pin on my page is a ad, and there is so much AI content on here. It’s so disappointing and it ruins the aesthetic and usability of the app. I was to see fun content and projects for me to take on and fanart and things I love, not an add for dog food or an Amazon product every other pin. It makes me hate using the app and I can’t stand it.
So cool ! Has tips , recipes , etc !

Also, if I click on one ad, I get so many of them. Like I just clicked a hoodie ad and I got a whole page of hoodie ads. Adding on, if I add one pin related to idk strawberry smoothies, my next like 100 pins are strawberry smoothies. One last thing, sometimes there are pins in my for you pages for specific boards that have nothing to do with the board. Like a painting board page might have a pin that is a strawberry smoothie! Also there are a lot of repeat pins from people who repost. Like if they repost a video it just shows a big random triangle that is the play button. They don’t even give credit and it’s really annoying for people who r creators on Pinterest.
I get a few adds and ticktock videos, but otherwise I see nothing but frames.

Pinterest still works really weird because it will show me post I have already likes and saved a bunch of times, it hides most of my boards (it took me 10min to find a board once), it also will make my subsections disappear. 
Most of these problems arrived when I switched to apple but its weird. Imma start looking for similar apps.

訂單追蹤通知和實時更新會直接發送到您的手機上，不會錯過任何送貨。

真實的產品評價
我們只允許從 iHerb 購買過產品的顧客對其進行評價。這確保了評價的真實性，從而幫您做出更明智的購買選擇。

如果您不滿意，可以在購買後 30 天內提交申請，我們將爲您提供退款服務，請放心購物。

我們每週 7 天、每天 24 小時通過虛擬聊天工具爲您答疑解惑，解決您的訂單問題。

以 19 種語言購物
用您自己的語言玩轉 iHerb App（英語、簡體中文、繁體中文、日語、韓語、俄語、葡萄牙語、阿拉伯語、法語、德語、西班牙語、希伯來語、烏克蘭語、泰語、印度尼西亞語、意大利語、波蘭語、保加利亞語和土耳其語）。

按類別選購：
維生素、補充劑、礦物質、草本、抗氧劑、胺基酸、魚油和 Omegas、加強免疫、鎂、膠原蛋白、蛋白質粉、鍛煉前、肌酸、水合與電解質、益生菌、體重管理、Green Superfood 系列、順勢護理、韓妝系列、美容美妝、沐浴個護、媽媽和孕產婦以及寵物用品。

按健康話題選購：
消化支援、逆齡與延壽、清體、頭髮、皮膚與指甲、女性健康、骨骼、關節與軟骨、兒童健康、大腦與認知、男性健康、心臟健康、睡眠與情緒、舒緩壓力、眼睛與視力、季節性敏感、着涼與流感、舒緩疼痛、全素、素食、無麩質、有機、零殘忍、Non-GMO

關於 iHerb
iHerb 是一家位於美國的電商，銷售 1800 多個廣受歡迎品牌、超過 50000 種天然健康產品。28 年以來，iHerb 一直是健康領域的全球先鋒，產品包括維生素、膳食補劑、運動營養、食品百貨、美容美妝、個人護理、寵物用品和健康家居等。
