評論.內容: This app is extremely easy to use and saves you tons of time. Highly recommend! You have to love Iherb. They ship overseas at really reasonable prices. We get all our supplements from them and quite a few grocery items as well.
I love this app and shopping from this site. It gives you different options and prices to choose from . You order, blink and theres yr order on yr door step!! Love this!!

شكرا ل ايهرب على مجهودهم وتنوعهم الشامل في مجال الصحة والتغذية وبالخصوص خدمة العملاء تعاملهم وخدمتهم سريعة والى الافضل دائما 👍بس عندي ملاحظة صغيره انه تكاليف الشحن باهظة فوق انه الجمارك ماخذين حصة من التكاليف الرجاء تخفيض الاسعار للتمكن من الطلب بشكل مستمر ولكم خالص الشكر على مجهوداتكم الاكثر من رائعة
I have compared prices and iHerb is excellent! I have told EVERY person I know to use this company!
I'm able to locate and purchase health products with ease!

應用名稱: Clue 生理期 懷孕日曆日記
應用描述:
Clue 不單是一個經期追踪程式，更是一個準確的月經行事曆、排卵 app 和每週懷孕情況追踪程式，讓你掌控你的生殖健康。

Clue 是月經週期追蹤程式，可預測您的下一次月經、經前症候群和較可能或較不會懷孕的日期。 您的情緒是否與您的月經週期有所關聯？ 僅須追蹤您想更瞭解的事項，Clue 會為您搞定一切 此程式非常精準。 

使用 Clue 可：
+  瞭解您的下次經期何時開始
+ 下一次月經週期、經前症候群和受孕期間之前，在 iOS 裝置和 Apple Watch 上收到提醒。
+ 找出您的月經週期之獨特樣式。
+ 知道哪些日子您較可能或較不會懷孕。
+ 透過特定的孕期追踪分類、嬰兒成長階段的視覺比對、懷孕日曆和懷孕健康指導等功能，每週追踪你的懷孕情況。
+ 追蹤性行為、疼痛、情緒、子宮頸黏液、避孕藥和基礎體溫。

Clue 也包括：
+ 31 種追蹤類別，包括月經週期、痙攣、情緒、體重、皮膚、頭髮、睡眠、運動、活力、渴望及更多。
+ 保證絕對不會使用花朵、蝴蝶、委婉用語或粉紅色。
+ Clue 週期報表是您個人週期的視覺化呈現，可儲存並提供給醫生。
+ 市面上所有週期追蹤程式中最快的資料輸入速度。
+ 深入剖析月經週期，包含醫學和科學參考資料。
+ 具備可從您輸入的資料學習之演算法。您使用越久，程式越聰明。
+ 自訂密碼可保護您的隱私。
+ 過去週期的歷史概觀可輕易觀察到趨勢。
+ 選擇性帳號登入可備份您的資料，或在多重裝置上登入。

獲得 Buzzfeed、紐約時報、Wired、TechCrunch、每日郵報、VentureBeat 及眾多網站推薦。

訂閱資訊

想更好地利用 Clue？訂閱Clue Plus

购买成功后，订阅将会自动更新，若要在iTunes账户里关闭自动订阅，请在至少在支付日期前24小时操作。

請注意：Clue – 週期追蹤程式無法避孕。

**請留言**
若你遇上任何問題，支援團隊隨時樂意協助！ 請透過 app 聯絡我們，這樣我們能更迅速的解決問題。

在 helloclue.com 獲取與經期、性行為和月經健康等相關問題的答案

服務條款 - https://www.helloclue.com/terms.html
隱私權條款 - https://www.helloclue.com/privacy.html

評論.標題: too many pop up ads now
評論.內容: i used to love this app so much and it’s still a great period tracker but the pop up ads for the clue subscriptions and add ons is way too much. i almost hate opening the app because i know i’m going to be bombarded with them and have to click out of a bunch of stuff. so annoying. didn’t use to be like this. they have an option to hide the banner for a month as well and it definitely doesn’t do that for me. i already pay for tampons and such, i’m not gonna pay to track my period!!
Hi! The app is literally not working, it is being very annoying, it does not let me see past months or my period , literally goes to other years the app and keeps loading
Every single month my period is off by days and days and I’ve been using this for months. How is it not catching on to my cycle??

I use to love it but since I got clue+ I just have got scammed I can’t do anything that clue+ offers and it’s so bad the ads and everything I have got scammed and  it not even my money it my mom that has to pay for it and I feel bad for her he paid for the subscription and then the next day it just did not work I don’t know what to do at this point like this is such a  bad problem and I hate it can someone who made this app fix it please or I can’t live like this anymore.

評論.標題: I just want to use the app
評論.內容: Super frustrating to have the subscription option pop up for every option I tap.

Good app, useful, helped me a lot when I was trying to get pregnant and it’s sweet and simple. Now it sends me notifications and emails trying to get me to buy the upgrade. It has an add that I have to click through to use it at all and it’s obnoxious. If I wanted to buy the other features I would have. The only reason I’m keeping the app is because I know the other ones are obnoxious too, and this one has like three years of health history.

I had this app probably since it came out and there used to be way more free things atleast in 2022 and before. I stopped using the app from 2022- recently from having 2 under 2. 

I can barely get on anything anymore! Flo was the same way.. everyone is money hungry.
Excessive ads, pop ups, runaround settings and impossible to delete my account due to poor app functionality.

評論.標題: Change the logging out when we do t use the app for a bit
評論.內容: Any time that I don’t come into the app regularly then I get logged out by the time my actual period comes and then signing back in with the hassle is just annoying please fix the logging out after a certain amount of time. But if yall added period brain it would be nice.

I’ve been using Clue (and later the subscription) for 10 years now. It’s the best way to track my cycle. It was a validating resource across multiple healthcare provider conversations. Even before I joined the subscription, I loved the insights/explanations to better understand how I needed to track for accuracy. This app taught me a lot about my body; more than that, it helped me better understand what happens with my body throughout the cycle. The more you use it the better the accuracy. And honestly: my dedication to tracking and attention to detail has been honed because I’ve been using this app daily for a decade. 
I’ve tried using other trackers, before finding Clue and after, but none of them were as accurate or gave as many options as Clue. A massive win in Clue’s favor is the option to choose what you track. 
The few times I’ve had issues with the app, the turnaround time for a response is quick, everyone is beyond lovely, and it makes me love the app even more. The woman owned and woman ran company is what drew me into the app - the love that is so easily identifiable throughout the regular and paid version is the reason I keep supporting. Their dedication to women’s health care is why I chose to switch to the paid subscription (about four or five years after I started using the app) and I did it simply to help the women behind the scenes. Women supporting women. And the articles that are available are educational and frankly more in-depth than most resources you could find at your OBGYN office for all stages your body may go through: menstruating, ovulating, pregnancy, perimenopause, etc. 
I never leave reviews on things (adhd probs). But I can’t tell you how many times I’ve written one for Clue in my head over the years. Instead the best review I’ve given has convincing several friends and strangers to download the app. I’ll talk off anyone’s ear about how much I love this app. All of this is my honest opinion after using it ten years straight and a bit of a love letter 😅🥰

評論.標題: To: Anna & Ilaria from the support team
評論.內容: I’ve had this app since i first started my period at around 13, im 18 now and i love the app, the only problem was it didnt have a dark mode. i get chronic headaches and its worse on my period so the blinding white background when i would open the app was very irritating. I went through the feedback option on the app and asked if they could add a dark mode and told them my reason. Within the same month they added the dark mode and communicate with me about my feedback multiple times throughout me waiting. I honestly didnt even expect a reply to my feedback but they made it happen. Im extremely happy to know they value and listening to the people that use clue. So again thank you support team ❤️.

Too may pop ups. After each input, it needs to be saved with the button, used to automatically save. Over the years, they’ve made it less and less intuitive. Every time the app is opened, or even interacting with basic things, constant pop ups. Honestly debating switching apps, as it’s not worth it to deal with these annoyances. I understand they need to make profits somehow, but these pop ups are more likely driving away customers.

I’ve used Clue for 5 years (since 2019) but the app recently updated, and is now so terrible that it is completely and utterly unusable. Every single thing you do makes a pop-up ad appear asking you to purchase something, and they hide the X button. And even worse, you can’t get rid of their twice-a-day pop up notifications asking you to buy the subscription. Then they got rid of so many things that used to be available and hid it behind a paywall. For an app on women’s health, hiding information and advice on health is absolutely shameful and anti-woman. So frustrated that I have to delete it now and start over with another app.

評論.標題: Conflicting stance on messaging and privacy
評論.內容: Every now and then you’ll get a notification on your homescreen like “Want to know all about periods? 🩸🩸😩”. I don’t want people nearby seeing this. It’s a confusing stance on privacy because when it comes to other notifications, I can be discreet and write custom notification messages like “special event is about to begin”. But when it comes to promoting their blog content, there is no discretion. Imagine if this was an app for ED!

Overall the app is nice and easy to use; however, the partner feature seems to be an afterthought. I feel there should be a way to have your partner feature on the main screen if a code is shared with you. It would also be nice if clue had notifications sent to the partner about logged information such as BBT (such as: your partner just logged their temperature today!). It’s frustrating for my partner to have to click through multiple screens to see my data.
It’s a pain to use because every time I change something another ad pops up. I’m probably going to use another app.

This is the best period tracking app I’ve ever used (and it’s not pink!!! 😃🎉). I’m happy to be a paying member for such a useful app. It’s gotten so much better over the past couple years, with useful additions including tracking severity of symptoms and (finally!) having a field for daily notes. Most recently, I’m loving the new dark mode! Thank you so much for implementing this option!
This would be a great app except for the CONSTANT pop ups to upgrade. Totally ruins the experience.
I didn’t like it at all, everything is paid even changing important information.

評論.標題: Lost favorite feature with update; stop pushing paid version
評論.內容:
The update with a new tracking interface looks good and is more user friendly, but I sincerely miss being able to enter my own symptoms to track. That was literally the reason I choose Clue several years ago. Now I can only choose from the standard ones. A hugely important aspect of my cycle is that my asthma comes and goes with different phases of it, and I used to be able to track this. Now I can’t. PLEASE bring back custom symptoms tags. And where did cervix tracking go? I was just learning to use that to tell where I was in my cycle, and you took that one away too. 
UPDATE: It’s so annoying how Clue asks me *every* time I open the app, as well as every time I complete tracking, if I want to upgrade to the paid version. No! I don’t! Can you ask less often, please? I know what to do if I ever want to upgrade; I don’t need it shoved in my face.
I love this app!  I can't remember anything so it's SUPER helpful!!  It's my favorite app!!
Regret that I purchased a whole year for this app. It lacks the features I was looking for. Like tracking your weight easily. Also it promotes abortion.
I feel like it only tracks o t when I type it in manually and it is not really reliable to when. My next cycle is due but besides that it’s a good app

評論.標題: The most disappointment I have ever felt from an app.
評論.內容:
I have been using Clue since I got my very first period at age 13, and am now a 22 year old woman. This app has been my absolute rock when it comes to period, symptoms, and sexual tracking. Now, they seem to only care about money. You used to be able to share your cycle with others, get your period analysis, and so much more, all which is very important for people struggling with medical issues like myself. Everything except marking when you are bleeding is locked behind a pricey subscription that I will never be paying. I understand they need to make revenue, but why is literally everything that made the app great no longer available to loyal users for years? It seemed to work for so long, so why not anymore? 

Every 5 seconds, I receive an ad begging me to buy clue plus. The more I see it, the closer I get to switching apps. I have heard friends using a different app called Flow, which I am considering switching to at this point. I feel betrayed along with many other women, which is shown in the hundreds of reddit threads online of women sharing their travesties with this app since the new cash grabbing tactics. 

The one question I have for this company- In app subscriptions are shown to be bought by only a very small percentage of users….. is the couple extra bucks worth ruining your reputation and betraying your most loyal users? I would much rather sit through A FEW ads each time I use the app than be tainted with constant money begging. 

Under negative reviews, they are basically saying “don’t care, sorry!” You care about women and advocate for women to understand their bodies….. But only the women who can afford the ridiculously high cost of it? This company needs a serious reality check. You’ve lost thousands of loyal customers… Other period apps offer so much more for free now.

I have used this app for a couple of years and I appreciate what it does, how it does it, and who it does it for! Just thank you for creating and easy to use, thoughtfully created, no frills and nonsense app. What you stand for is brilliant and I thank you for it.
This app is amazing for tracking! The articles also really help if you’re wondering so many things from period cramps to menopause. 10/10 recommend this app.

I got the paid version because despite the constant pop ups, I thought the features Clue was previewing could be helpful. When I gained access to them, I realized that the app is still really basic. The user interface on the analysis page is not good. I have to do the work myself to figure out where in my cycle the symptoms occurred. Clue claims to be about empowerment and science but doesn’t listen to its audience re pop ups or stay consistent against crisis pregnancy centers - just read the reviews. It’s a blatant cash grab and data grab, and it’s profiting off the very people it claims to support with a product that isn’t worth their money.

評論.標題: Used to be a great app
評論.內容: I’ve had this app since 2015, nearly 10 years. I used to love this app but it’s nearly impossible to use now because of the constant pop-ups asking to upgrade. Also I can’t go back and look at my old entries and data which rubs me the wrong way like why are you gatekeeping my own info?

Update! And the app got worse. Said I would only have a period for 2 days and I tried over and over to edit. I paid for this app and I also deleted it even though my membership is not up until Aug 2025. 

This app is not great. I’ve used other apps that are not as challenging as this app. I only use this app to track my period. As my husband had a vasectomy and we do not want any more children. I keep trying to log my period. It won’t register it. Says it’s two days late as it is but I started today and need to track it as I use this to plan vacations. I emailed support. An automatic reply came back with troubleshooting. Still nothing is working.  Completely disappointed.

Had this app since 2016, had years of data stored on it. Now all of that is lost because I had no notification that they were updating anything. I cut my losses and planned to start over with the updated version of their app but it’s unusable. The full screen popups are so bad, I have to navigate a minefield of subscription buttons just to track my flow for the day. I understand that subscriptions are important to support the app but the popup ads do not need to be actively destroying the functionality of the free version. A banner at the top of the screen would be fine. Because of the popups I am considering moving on to a new tracker instead which is extremely disappointing because I really enjoyed using clue before.
It’s super easy to use and I love that they are funding research for women.

This app is great for tracking periods. I would leave a 5 star review but their ads for clue plus is actively making me dislike their platform. Every time you open the app an ad blocking the page pops up. And anytime you record something, boom, an ad blocking the page pops up.

評論.標題: It used to be a good app until
評論.內容: It used to be a great and useful app when it was free. After it asked for subscription fee, they cut off most analysis functions. It was such a disappointing change so I decided to use other app to record my period.

評論.標題: Ads every time I open the app
評論.內容:
It’s really frustrating to get an ad every time you open the app about Clue Premium. It makes me want to go to another platform where I can track my cycle in peace. Also, I had to turn off the daily notifications (which got turned on recently), because the messaging was so weird. And the fact that I’m also constantly getting notifications outside of the app for premium is frustrating too. 

News flash: showing ads every 2 seconds does not make a user more likely to subscribe. This is just bad UX. Please be better.

I have been using this app since around 2017. It has always been spot on with when my period started and when I would ovulate and etc.. The app itself is fine. The thing I have a problem with is that pretty much everything that once was free now costs money. So, like, I used to be able to add daily notes and come up with my own tags, etc. but now you have to upgrade and get a monthly or yearly subscription to even use those features. And I absolutely HATE when you go to save something you want to track and the ad pops up after every single save. It is the most annoying thing ever! And it truly makes me enjoy this app less and less. There should honestly be an option to where we can opt out of seeing the ad if we are not interested in upgrading any time soon or ever.

評論.標題: Way to many ads to upgrade so obnoxious
評論.內容: I used to love this app ever since I started my period I have had this app but I finally am so frustrated and deleting it for another app specifically due to the amount of promotion all over the app to upgrade. I’m sorry i’m not upgrading something I use once a month. Clue needs to do better.
Your pop ups are making this app impossible to use. If I want a subscription I’d get one the first time.

The app itself is fine, I still use it regularly but every time I open it I’m bombarded with trying premium, and it gets even more annoying when there’s a sale. I just wish there was a snooze button for premium marketing because it’s really annoying, I don’t have a use for the premium version and I’ve been using this app for years.

評論.標題: The ads for premium are a bit much
評論.內容:
The free version of Clue is great but getting bombarded by ads for ‘premium’ every time I open the app or switch between pages got old really fast. I left my old period tracking app of 8 years for the better privacy protection Clue offered but I think I’m going back to the basics and tracking on a physical calendar for the foreseeable future. 

I love the app layout, aesthetic, and features! Just a shame it’s impossible to enjoy it without constant ads for something I don’t want or need.

Every time i go in this app it’s ALWAYS trying to get me to purchase premium or have me purchase something ridiculous. The ads in this app are incredibly irritating, they seem to be getting worse and worse. Deleting the app and downloading Flo instead

Constantly being asked to subscribe is frustrating. I can’t open the app without about 3-4 ads telling me to subscribe to Clue Plus. I’ve had this app for at least 8 years, maybe longer. I’ve seen features that used to be free get locked behind a subscription. I simply want to track my cycle, if I wanted the works, I would get it. I understand advertising, but this is over the top and I’m about to move on completely.
By far, the best app on the market. Responsive team committed to privacy and a great product, and education. The app keeps getting better. Appreciate the perimenopause mode. Thank you for everything!
Now all I get are the pop ups to upgrade and so many of the features I used are now paid features.

This app helped me get pregnant and I couldn’t be more grateful. As someone who is in their early 40s I thought it would be hard for me to conceive but thanks to the accuracy of this app, I now have a beautiful 5 month old boy. The predictions are spot on! I thank the developers and brains behind this app. Thank you so much clue! I will continue to invest in your app.
NO IM NOT MAKING ANY PURCHASES. IM USING THIS TO TRACK MY PERIOD. WHEN I EX OUT THE POP UP ASKING ME TO PAY FOR STUFF, DO NOT MAKE IT POP UP AGAIN 5 SECONDS LATER. STOP PLEASE
i’ve used clue for almost 4 years now and i’ve never had any complaints. i like how it can track if ur pregnant too but i just use it for the period tracker lol
I am glad this app is helping me to be a better person and I am now knowing when my period might start or end thank you
Every single time I open app I get the pop up trying to get me to buy the subscription. Every time. Something small but it’s very annoying. App is great otherwise

I have been using this app for a long time and recently I changed my phone and the information of about a year was lost, using the same account. The previous time I changed my phone only lost a month so I didn't give it importance.

評論.標題: Helpful way to track irregular periods
評論.內容: Coming off birth control for the first time in 25 years and quickly approaching pre-menopause meant I needed something to help me understand what’s happening and when. My only complaint is that there isnt a category for spotting, just “light” which isnt an accurate representation.

應用名稱: 喝水時間 - 健康喝水提醒助手
開發者: Shenzhen Xinchuang Information Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
水對人體至關重要，大家卻常常忘記喝水，長期缺少足夠的水分會導致健康問題。

喝水時間 讓你用最簡單的方法跟踪你的水平衡，通過提醒你按時喝水來養成新的健康習慣。

=== 特點：
- 方便快捷地自訂喝水提醒
- 隨時隨地檢查身體的水平衡
- 計算每日的水消耗量
- 簡單直觀的個人統計數據和圖表

=== 注意：
喝水時間 與 Apple Health 集成，以讀取你的體重，性別和水記錄，並寫入你的水和咖啡因數據。

我們使用體重和性別來計算你每日推薦的喝水目標。我們記錄你的水和咖啡因攝入量以方便你查看。你可以根據需要在 Apple Health 中開啟或關閉這些權限。

=== 注意：
喝水時間 不是一款醫療應用。如果你想將此應用用於醫療目的或者獲取特定的水分需求，請諮詢你的醫生。

=== 訂閱：
- 您可以在訂閱期內無限制訪問 喝水時間 的全部功能。
- 訂閱週期：3個月。
- 價格：具體價格請見 App 內部付費頁面。
- 付款：通過用戶的 iTunes 賬戶扣款，用戶確認​​購買後即付款。
- 續訂：蘋果 iTunes 賬戶會在到期前24小時內扣費，扣費成功後訂閱週期順延3個月。
- 取消續訂：如需取消續訂，請在當前訂閱週期到期前24小時內，手動在 iTunes/Apple ID 設定管理中關閉自動續訂功能。
- 服務條款：https://www.gaoxinmao.cn/#/terms
- 隱私政策：https://www.gaoxinmao.cn/#/privacy

----------
有任何問題都可以和我們交流。
臉書：https://www.facebook.com/MyWaterTracker
微博：@喝水时间App
電子信箱：hustapp@foxmail.com

評論.內容:
I had another drinking app that was ok but it was frustrating having to wait through several adds just to enter one drink. 
There was no purchase option. 
I was willing to sacrifice features to have an app to track my hydration intake if I could find one that I was able to just purchase without monthly subscriptions. 
I stumbled onto this app and not only did I not have to sacrifice any features from my previous app, it included some real cool extra features like creating your own drinks and a quick launch you can setup with your common drinks. 
This was well worth the money I spent. 
Huge thanks to the developers. 
If I had one suggestion it would be to have an icon creator or editor.
Not a dealbreaker still an amazing app.

This app is very good for logging and reminding you to drink water. You can also log tea coke ect. You can choose to pay for the premium version but i personally wouldn’t. There is only one reason why this app is not a 5 star, because that would mean perfect and the only perfect person/thing is christ.
Would give this application 5 stars however I can’t update the weight area in the settings. It reverts back to the Weight I was when I first started using the application.
All of a sudden the app does not work. I can log onto the app, but I can’t press any button buttons whatsoever for two days now.

評論.標題: 以前的喝满集动物图标没了
評論.內容: 好久没用了，重新下下来怎么以前喝满今天的目标会解锁一个动物图标的功能没了呀
I got this app based on good reviews and I love it! It syncs between my phone, iPad, and watch seamlessly. Exactly what I wanted!
Whenever I said, my icons tinted in my iPhone, the widget does not work. It goes white and doesn’t show anything.

I'm disappointed that the latest update has made adding drinks via the Apple Watch a more tedious process. What used to take two taps (complication, then the favorite item) now takes three (complication, favorite menu, then the favorite item). Same goes for adding a drink from a list. Before you could select the drink type and amount on the same screen. Now you have to click through two screens. Also three drink types show in the box instead of one. I assume the one in the middle is the selected one? I dunno, but this update seems completely unnecessary and makes me dislike the app now when previously I loved it.

評論.標題: Request support for app icon matching dark mode
評論.內容: Everything works perfect, only wish the app’s icon could match the dark mode theme on iOS 18. Many thanks!

I tried numerous water apps before settling on this one. It allows you to track all kinds of fluid intake, not just water, and calculates the amount of water content for you. In addition to dozens of preset items (water, sports drinks, milk shakes, etc., etc.), it allows you to add your own. 
Entering a drink that you’ve consumed is easy and quick. It also allows you edit entries, even from previous days. 
It has optional settings that allow you to customize many things. And it’s creative without being overly “cutsie.”
Best of all, when you contact “support”, you get responses in a timely manner.

this is app is good that I have to make a review on it asap. The all the other apps are unfortunately locked and I don’t want to spend money on it. :( But! water tracker, has premium but does have a lot of benefits that’s free, suitable for me. I love it, from the first start and had to investigate why people loved it so much. There’s a reason why it’s good at 4.8 stars‼️‼️

Why have sounds available if they’re not going to make a sound? I have notifications on, sound applied, everything as it should be. I get a notification on my Apple Watch but it makes no sound or vibration (watch is set up to do do) so I miss it.

評論.標題: 更新之后手机的小组件没有用了
評論.內容: 更新之后手机的小组件没有用了

評論.標題: Great way to see how much water I drink each day!
評論.內容: Before this app I had no idea how much water I drank each day. Now I can track it through out the day!
Recent update caused coffee to be an alcoholic beverage. Even with update 4.26.2 did not solve the issue.

Coffee or another coffeine beverage can’t help to fulfill water goal. It leads to dehydration and you need to drink even more water but this app counts caffeine beverages as water. So you can literally drink 2 liters of coffee, according to this app, and close daily water goal.
Developer needs to fix that
I have been using this app for over a year and it’s been amazing how easy it is to monitor your daily water and fluid intake for your health. Make sure you give it a try.
I accidentally deleted the pro app from my phone and when I re-downloaded, my data reappeared, but I have to pay again for the pro version. Unsat.
I love it & use it for health recording, you’ve made a loyal customer.   The reminders are great and PRO is way worth it!
没有记录酒精功能，希望在后续的版本中可以得到改善
Good water tracker.  Like the reminders.  I hope they add support for the Smart Stack on Apple Watch.  Be nice to have quick access to it there without taking up a complication spot

評論.標題: Best hydration app for the price
評論.內容: Love that this is not subscription based,  phenomenal job with the app; I’ve felt more awake and have consistently been feeling better since using it; did not realize how little I was drinking before.  I’ve also lost weight as a result of not feeling as hungry throughout the day.

評論.標題: I would give you a five starts but you haven’t updated
評論.內容: Please update the app it getting dusty how long it has since it been thought about an update or even a mention of one by you

評論.標題: 挺好用的为啥不更新了？

評論.評論者: 彻底哦长久的维持委屈
評論.內容: 非常好，有效果
You should add food like watermelon

評論.標題: Easy to use the free version
評論.內容:
I just purchased the full version now it won’t install on my watch again. 
 I like to track my water on my watch. 

  I wish I can install on my watch.
I’ve been hardly ever drinking water, But now I do it every day on time

I love this app and use it daily. it’s improved my motivation to be consistently hydrated, even on the weekends. The one problem i’ve noticed with the app: when i try to edit the names of the “often used cups”, it won’t save my changes. If they could fix that one bug it’d be a flawless app.

Well it’s Raining right now where I’m at so what better time to stop and talk about this Great Design water tracker 5 Star app! This app is outstanding for your Health myself and our family! It truly lets you know the amount of water intake you need to accomplish to keep you myself and our family Healthy! I hope you will download this app and give it a try I don’t believe you will be disappointed! (really ) . Well time for me to put my umbrella up and move on. So Mr Developer thanks for creating a great unique outstanding app! I Tip my Hat to you 🎩”Thanks “
I think the app is great all the way around except one thing… I have 52 notifications right now and can’t figure out how to check and clear them out.
在app点了仅在手表提醒，手表设置了静音，其他如微信等消息可以震动提醒，但是这个app不可以震动提醒，很不方便

評論.標題: $5 for an awesome water tracker with no annoying pop-up ads? Count me in
評論.內容: All I can say is it was worth it

This would be a great app if it worked as designed.  The add cup records for the moment but is not included as a drink item for future convenience.  Edit often drinks is a good idea but they don’t seem to work either.  Navigation is not easy to find the feature your looking for.  While $4.99 is not much at all for a one time lifetime subscription, you want it to work at any cost.  Other than that it’s like through $5 in the trash.  I will be looking for another water tracker app.
I simply love everything about this app!
Water tracker is a brilliant tool for maintaining adequate hydration. The tools and settings are excellent and applicable. The app is bloatless and efficient. I am thankful to have found it!

I downloaded 4 or 5 other water trackers before this one and I instantly knew this was the one. I love how much you can customize it, and edit it if you enter something wrong. The visuals and simple and clear. My only request would be to add an easy option to adjust your goal for just one day if you do something sweaty.
Keep coming back, still be best. Both in terms of functionality and aesthetics.
It doesn’t include electrolyte drinks
After the app I used to use became awful after an upgrade I looked around and found this one.   I just upgraded to the permanent version I like it so much!
I use this how much is a dozen times a day. It’s a must have app.
All of the other apps wanted a monthly or yearly subscription. This app you pay a one time fee. All I needed to do is track my water why pay more to do that?

I have never before been able to reach my daily water intake goal until I got this Water Tracker put on my phone. It is so great! Keeps track of all liquids you drink using an easy chart to choose the drink. Had daily, even hourly plus  reminders and reminders all through the day to help you reach your goal. I am consistently reaching my goal each day! Very encouraging and positive app too! Highly recommend this. Enjoy!!

評論.標題: Crashes Often _ can no longer open the app
評論.內容: This used to be my favorite water tracking app.. but I have not been able to open this app since April.. I am guessing one of the latest updates are not compatible.. please update this app, so I can love it again.

A couple of morning, I’ve added my drink amount at around 7 am, for the earlier time of the morning. The tracker did not add it in.

I don’t understand why two different mornings, early, I’d not be able to add but the one drink. Otherwise, I love this app! The rest of the days of the week, the app runs great!

評論.標題: 功能挺棒的，有一些建议
評論.內容:
首先通知手表只能默认通知手机。建议在都锁屏的情况下，如果手表佩戴，则默认通知到watch；
另外换图标，watch不同步
No longer works after update. I bought a premium subscription and it won’t sync with the app.
I love this app because it reminds you when you have to drink water. I always struggle drinking water until I downloaded this app now I remember to drink water regularly.

I like this app the best after downloading 5 different water reminder apps and trying for a day. 

Pros
-Simple to use
-Good graphics
-Many customization options 
-Best Apple Watch app interface
-Apple Watch Complications icons
-No need to pay monthly or annual subscription 
-life time purchase option I own at a reasonable price

Cons (hope developer can fix this bug as of Jan 2022)
-caffeine drinks like coffee has wrong hydration ratio (for example, when you keep adding coffee to the log, you will be hydrated which is wrong. It should work like alcohol drinks where you need to drink more water to compensate for caffeine drink)
Affordable, simple to use, cute widgets, adorable complications for the apple watch. Everything I needed and more.

應用名稱: 潮汐 - 冥想、助眠、白噪音、睡眠監測、夢話打鼾與HRV壓力
應用描述:
# 2023 Today 編輯精選
# 171 個國家和地區專題精選推薦
# 全球 3000 萬人使用，120,000+ 真實五星好評
# iPhone 裝機必備
# 精選健康十佳應用

潮汐是一個陪伴你睡眠、冥想、專注與放鬆的身心健康應用，為你提供高品質的自然白噪音、正念冥想、睡眠故事等海量精品內容，更有睡眠監測、夢話鼾聲記錄、番茄鍾與心流計時器等強大功能，以極簡主義產品美學呈現，從而幫助你「睡得更好、焦慮更少」，迴歸一種身心平衡、自然鬆弛的生活狀態。

◎ 專業團隊研發的正念冥想
- 深度系列課程：正念冥想·入門、CBT正念減壓、7 天焦慮緩解、晨間活力喚醒、7 天斷舍離、自律、提升效率、晨間運動、應對壓力、有效溝通、提升幸福感、一杯冥想...
- 場景化主題：專注、孤獨、午休、減壓、沮喪、晚安、通勤、一週晨間、緩解疲勞、醒後解乏、小憩、身體療愈、三步呼吸空間...
- 助眠冥想專題：YogaNidra 系列、深度睡眠療愈、5 天睡眠習慣養成、美好夢境、深度睡眠、睡眠盒子、快速入眠...
- 更多正念練習：情緒自愈冥想指南、學生正念減壓指南、提升幸福感、健康飲食、呼吸療愈、親密關係、身心清理...

◎ 海量高畫質的自然白噪音
- 精選全球自然之聲：海洋、春雨、雷雨、篝火、蒲公英、森林、櫻花、流水、遠山、林風、夜海、長路...
- 聲音藝術家匠心創作：軸韻、七絃、手談、磨硯、她的城市、冥想、柔軟之境、幻境、曠野、光年、浮空、迷泉...
- 好玩好聽的混音空間：風信、圍爐夜話、須臾之間、新芽知春、暮蟬、海邊假日、落葉秋意... 即可前往，創作你自己的專屬聲音；
- 杜比全景聲沉浸呈現：銀河漫遊系列、三頓半風味星球系列... 更多空間音訊內容上新中。

◎ 為睡意而生的睡眠故事
- 旅行目的地：Z323次列車、江城夜櫻、皖南古居、泛舟湖上、夜宿海洋館、徽州魚燈、茶海、里斯本之行、神的後花園、雨泊、江城夜櫻...
- 文化與藝術：姑蘇團扇、夜遊者、菩提樹下、武夷山炒茶、春日牡丹亭、我們為什麼要睡覺、和平飯店、流螢、臥船聽雨眠...
- 自然紀錄片：雨夜獨坐、山間溯溪、藍色星球、海邊松、海龜之旅、樹屋、時空洞穴、一棵杉樹...
- 以自然、藝術和旅行為靈感，搭配影視級聲音製作，為你呈現聲音慢劇場，滋養忙碌一天後的疲憊心靈

◎ 睡眠監測、夢話鼾聲記錄與分析
採用最新的機器學習技術，結合自研演算法校準睡眠資料、判斷睡眠區間、分析睡眠資料、識別記錄夢話與鼾聲，全面記錄你的睡眠情況，生成專業的睡眠報告，從此輕鬆洞悉每晚睡眠。

◎ 自然輕柔的喚醒體驗
潮汐獨創的自然輕喚醒 Natural Wake-up 功能，在你處於輕度睡眠時，透過不同主題的自然場景將你喚醒，從此告別痛苦絕望的鬧鐘體驗，讓你每一天從全球不同的城市、自然和景觀之中慢慢醒來。不至於此，「數字天氣」動態鈴聲甚至還可以基於你醒來時的天氣狀況，播放對應的定製天氣主題鈴聲將你喚醒。

◎ 極簡設計的心流計時器
基於全球流行的番茄工作法（Pomodoro Technique）理念開發，支援番茄鍾、倒計時與無限計時模式，更有專注白名單、翻轉專注等創新功能，搭配沉浸式的介面設計與海量專注場景，即刻打造你的專屬工作和學習場景，一瞬進入心流狀態。

◎ 精心設計的鎖屏與桌面小元件
完美適配 iOS 17 最新，支援 StandBy、靈動島與實時活動功能，還有各類精心設計的鎖屏和桌面小元件，為你的桌面增添平靜體驗。

◎ 每日精選的靈感格言
儘管日常忙碌庸常，但詩歌、悠閒與愛，才是我們生活的意義。每日更新的金句格言，搭配精心選擇的主題圖片，迎接每一個充滿力量和靈感的清晨。

◎ 更多功能與體驗
- 放鬆身心的呼吸法，支援平衡呼吸與 4-7-8 兩種呼吸模式
- 視覺化的資料日記，記錄你在潮汐的點滴時光
- 精美設計的分享卡片，留下彼時彼刻的平靜體驗
- 獨創音樂融合播放功能，一邊聽歌一邊聆聽大自然

◎ 潮汐適合以下人群
- 睡眠不好、深受失眠困擾的都市人群
- 常常分心、無法專心致志的拖延症患者
- 身處嘈雜環境、經常被打斷的創意人
- 長期焦慮、精力疲憊的高壓人群
- 追求平和身心的冥想練習者

◎ 使用者聲音
- 潮汐是我手機裡唯一讓我溫暖平和的存在。—— 陳鯨魚
- 最被需要的 App，白天專注放鬆、夜晚助眠冥想，現代人的一劑良藥。—— Shannon
- 用過很多同類番茄工作法和白噪音 app，這個的風格跟 muji to relax 有些類似，但是更自然優雅。簡單易操作，適合工作和學習使用。—— yon73
- 簡潔好用！即是番茄鍾，又有白噪音，喜歡！因為這個app正在糾結到底要不要繼續用 forest 了 —— 陳毛毛710522
- 最被需要的 App。這個理念太好了，現在最被需要。希望開發者堅持簡單純真的風格，做極簡的番茄工作法，少些花哨，我們本來就太嘈雜了。—— 花咪夫人
- 視覺享受！App 的圖示就超讚，介面視覺上也非常舒適。潮汐的白噪音我特別喜歡，聽著就很舒服，以前每次進入番茄鍾都會很掙扎，想著又要 25 分鐘，現在就特別想聽海水的聲音，真的很喜歡這款番茄工作法的 App —— Neshow
- 無依無靠的心靈需要聲音的陪伴。就是像標題所寫的那樣，孤獨的心靈沒有排解的方式，這樣的白噪音伴我入眠。—— 門前一棵松

#自動續訂說明#
針對不同地區，潮汐提供了不同的自動訂閱選項，具體選項請檢視會員頁面。

其他規則：
- 確認購買後，將向您的 iTunes 帳戶收款
- 訂閱會自動續訂，除非在本期結束前 24 小時關閉自動續訂
- 在本期結束前的24小時內，將向你的 iTunes 賬號收取費用
- 你可以在iTunes帳戶設定中關閉和管理自動續訂功能
- 若在試用期內購買，試用期將會提前結束

評論.內容: 7年前就下载该软件使用，软件越做越差，越来越臃肿，一些有的没得的乱七八糟的东西都加入进来。实在是受不了，注销账号，卸载软件了。第一次在app store写评论给差评，国产中文软件都一个德行，用户就是待宰的羔羊，毫无用户体验度可言。再见，再也不见，潮汐，一款用了7的软件。

評論.標題: How do I contact customer service?
評論.內容: How do I contact customer service? The Website and Support links in the App Store go to a page in Chinese that Google Translate can't translate. My iPhone app now makes an ocean noise on the Home screen. I can't figure out how to turn the background noise off. How do I turn it off?

I don’t want notifications every two seconds about your faulty assumptions of my mood. You know why I’m stressed? Because this app notifies me every 2.4 minutes that I’m stressed. 🙄😒 

I turned all notifications off in the app and I kept getting them. Eventually had to disable notifications for this app entirely in my iPhone‘s settings.
I couldn’t find a place to request support. Why does the soundscape stop when I start focusing? Doesn’t that defeat the purpose? It didn’t used to do that.
كلش حلو هذا البرنامج دا يفيدني اني و دا ادرس ب ال فوگس 💗💗🦋🥹

I love this app a lot. However, they recently removed some free features including very importantly to whitelist three apps. It used to be one could whitelist up to three on the free version and more on the plus version. I think that’s very unfortunate. Sometimes there are critical apps, that I need to be able to use during a focus session.  I started using tide as a student. Even now I barely ever pay for apps, however if there was $1/month subscription ($12/year), I would do it. Or pay once and never again for all the premium features. Or if they had a donate button, pay for our coffee type of button, I would occasionally donate as I feel grateful for it’s existence (prior to removing whitelist options). If they keep removing free features and don’t bring this one back I’ll have to find/make another app. The pricing model is way too expensive for what the app is.

This app has frozen in IOS in focus mode. I had to restart my phone and then all my apps were still locked until I restarted and restored the tide session. Please remove these  bugs.

評論.標題: Used to love this app until they brought the new update
評論.內容: Now i constantly have to install and uninstall it because it keeps crashing on me. Please fix this!

I’ve been with TIDE for four years (with paid subscription) and it went from an amazingly simple sound app to a horrendously complicated bloated application. You can do breathing exercises, you can do meditation, you can sleep, you can do HRV, you can connect to the new Apple Watch (btw loved that little commercial that you all programmed in there - NOT!) you can do this, you can do that!!! At some point, I’m sure they’ll even get it to do my laundry!
Oh my gosh! I loved the simplicity and quickness of the app. But the changes over the past year have not only slowed the app (about 3 to 5 seconds to load each screen) but the latest update includes so many options that it’s ridiculous. If I wanted an insanely complicated app I would’ve signed up for Calm.

Even with all this I put up with it, until now. I just needed some music to focus with and that process was just an absolute nightmare to accomplish. Not only do I have to wait 3 to 5 seconds for each topic in the sound section to load but it takes about 2-3 seconds to load the audio as it slowly fades in with a background. And now, if you realize that’s not the sound you want, and you decide to go back and choose another one, you have to confirm on a pop-up that Yes! I want to replace the currently playing audio with the new audio I just selected!!! Please stop with the Microsoft “are you sure you’re sure?” popup screens.  

I opened the app so I could get some nice serene music to focus and calm me down because work/computer had me mad. Only it did the opposite and brought to a new level of anger I can only describe as livid! Absolutely completely livid! 
Something that was supposed to be relaxing, simple, and useful is completely DREADFUL! 
I am done with this app! I’m done! I am canceling my subscription!
crashed on ios 15 ( my iphone Xr btw)

評論.標題: Update has spoiled Tide iOS integration
評論.內容:
The most recent update has broken iOS Shortcuts’ ability to automatically start a Breath.  

It worked for years, but since the latest update a few days ago, the “Start a Breath” action in iPhone Shortcuts merely opens the Tide app to its Breath page, requiring you to MANUALLY tap a button in the app to start a Breath.  

The developers should fix this as soon as possible.  !!!!
Please fix it.
Expensive!  Plenty of choices.  No way to set timer.

My experience is that if an app is more expensive, it will have more bugs. This app reinforces this experience. It can easily frozen your phone with one or two sound. Other sounds are very very expensive. Thinking about how simple to develop such app, this is really ridiculous.

Love this app! Just wish it had an Apple Watch app as well.

Updating to request the standalone Apple Watch app!!

評論.標題: Love this app but may look for another with Apple Watch support
評論.內容: I love this app, but I’m looking for something that will work on my Apple Watch. Not sure I’ll find anything as good, but I might migrate in that direction anyway.

Great features have been using this for years and the visuals and timers not only function great for focusing, meditating or napping but are beautiful and the daily quotes are empowering and uplifting. It’s perfect for anyone looking to focus more and there are even ways to customize your focus background sound!

Love that I can add relaxing audio to my breathwork meditation, add vibration to keep me focused, set a timer for how long I want to meditate, and that they’re free. However, I think the subscription cost for guided meditations should be more affordable. I feel $7 at the most is reasonable, and even adding the option for a one time fee lifetime membership would be good.
Excellent app! Just a bit on the pricey side but I suppose that’s how things work now. Great sounds though!

Or availability for purchase Would greatly appreciate it for more free sleep sounds. And I don’t mean free for a week or so then locked for subscription only. Considering what’s available for subscription. Our free option is severely lacking. Been with tide for years now the best sleeping app I trust to use because the quality is great. My only standing complaint is not enough free choices for sleeping tunes. Or the option to purchase some sounds were to still be there. Yes I was around when that option was available. Quality sound choices for free are just as important as the subscription choices. It’s been feeling stagnant for some time now and I hope to see this improve.

評論.評論者: マアイヤムカマルナム
評論.內容: with a balenced routine, my mind associates the sleep sounds with going to bed, and this app is so amazing. No complaints, just amazing

評論.標題: Never seen such a good APP!!!!!
評論.內容: Five stars praise!
I started waking up earlier and less tired

評論.標題: love this for the muse sound

 When I first adopted this app, it wasn't fully translated to English yet, but the design was so simple and user friendly that I didn’t mind. 評論.標題: Very Good, But Has Been Crashing Lately
評論.內容: This is a very good white noise app. I use it every night for white noise while I sleep. There are no advertisements, and there are overall very few restrictions on the free version. I have tried many other white noise apps in the past, and I have deleted all of them within a few days because of the very annoying pay walls that they have set up. This is not the case with Tide, which I have been using for at least 1.5 years now. However, in the past month or so, the app has been crashing midway through the night midway. This has caused the white noise to stop, which wakes me up. This has been a huge problem, and I am not sure why it is occurring. Maybe it is because I have an older iPhone (7)? Either way, I hope the Tide developers look into this crashing problem, but to all the readers of this review who are looking for a white noise app, you should definitely try out Tide, as it is one of the best out there if you don’t want to pay to play white noise while you sleep.

應用名稱: Plant Nanny 植物保姆 喝水提醒 健康喝水紀錄
應用描述:
水是生命最重要，也最容易被忽略的養分。《植物保姆》是一款可愛且趣味盎然的喝水提醒 App，用充滿樂趣的方式鼓勵你多喝水，追蹤你的每天喝水量，陪伴你一起養成規律喝水的好習慣。

太忙忘記喝水怎麼辦？水喝不夠好苦惱？
你喝下的每一杯水，都將同時灌溉《植物保姆》中的愛水小植物。不再煩惱過於忙碌而忘記喝水，讓小植物貼心提醒你，在日常中紀錄你的喝水足跡。一起健康滋潤、閃閃發亮的生活吧！

一起看看多喝水的好處：
# 讓身體更輕盈有活力，皮膚更加光澤，並能提升新陳代謝進而維持健康體態。
# 改善便秘、容易疲勞、提高專注力等日常生活中的小困擾。
# 讓大腦更靈活，避免在下午時刻昏昏欲睡，還能減少焦慮，讓情緒更平靜。

《植物保姆》會根據你的個人生活型態，與你一起制定專屬的喝水計畫。透過簡潔的圖表與介面，你可以輕鬆掌握每天、每週和每個月的喝水進度，並在蒐集可愛植物的同時，不知不覺也讓自己的身體變得更加健康。讓小植物滋潤你的心靈、照料你的身體，與你一同培養良好的飲水習慣。當「多喝水」成為你生活的一部分，你會變得更健康，更有活力。

-------------------------
◈  令人興奮的新功能！ ◈
-------------------------
1. 選擇喜愛的植物：3 種不同難度的小植物，循序漸進地陪你一起輕鬆培養喝水習慣
2. 進階的喝水資訊：選擇依月份顯示或與上個月相比，讓你的喝水足跡一目瞭然
3. 快速的編輯功能：快速「新增」或「移除」喝水記錄，精準掌握每一滴水份
4. 有趣好玩的圖表：透過可愛圖表和喝水小挑戰等，讓你在喝水的過程中享受樂趣
5. 迷人的溫室圖鑑：陪伴小植物成長，解鎖溫室，還有機會與神秘生物相遇。

還有：更友善可愛的喝水提醒 Widget 
將桌面小工具添加在裝置主畫面，隨時關注自己的水分攝取進度和小植物的健康狀態

＊想體驗要更貼心有趣的喝水通知？訂閱解鎖完整功能！
> 無限種植可愛植物，激勵你喝水照顧自己
> 貼心的喝水提醒，依你的作息和風格設定
> 進階喝水紀錄，追蹤水分更精準、更輕鬆
> 零廣告打擾，享受更愉快的喝水體驗

-------------------------
◈  自定義和管理你的水份攝取目標 ◈
------------------------- 
＊根據個人身體資訊和運動量，推薦每日適合的飲水數值
＊主動提醒你喝更多的水，幫助你建立喝水習慣
＊自訂適合的喝水提醒時間，選擇最適合自己的喝水步調
＊輕鬆設定並創建常用的杯子容量：毫升（ml）與盎司（oz）
＊連續登入獎勵和小任務，陪伴並鼓勵你達成喝水計畫及目標。

--------------------------
◈  簡單圖表和優雅的界面，讓你一目瞭然 ◈
--------------------------
＊圖像化追蹤每日水分攝取比例和進度
＊紀錄你的喝水歷程，快速查看每天、每週和每月的趨勢
＊簡潔的畫面設計與友好的用戶界面，讓你輕鬆培養喝水習慣
＊針對不同屏幕尺寸優化畫面，適配多平台裝置

--------------------------
◈  多種可愛又栩栩如生的植物 ◈
--------------------------
＊你喝下的每一杯水，也同時讓植物獲得水分，讓植物伴隨你成長
＊各式各樣的特色花盆，為你的植物選擇一個可愛的家
＊解鎖並收集各種植物，還有機會與神秘生物相遇

▼植物保姆已接入 HealthKit，可同步喝水數據到「健康」

▼ 生活飲水計畫：
生活飲水計畫是植物保姆的訂閱計畫，幫助你養成喝水習慣，並提供好玩的喝水體驗。確認訂閱之後，您將開始 7 天免費試用， iTunes 將於試用到期後扣款，並於接下來每個月自動續訂。您可以隨時到 iTunes 帳號取消訂閱。iTunes 將於每次有效期結束前 24 小時內自動續訂，請您注意有效期來管理您的訂閱。任何未用完的試用期將於付費後失效。

▼有任何使用問題或寶貴建議嗎？歡迎透過：
《植物保姆》> 選單 > 設定 > 常見問題與支援，來尋找解決方式
如果該說明無法協助你解決問題，請在該說明的右上角找到『信封』圖示，
點擊填寫問題來與「花園助理（客服專員）」聯繫：）

▼ 歡迎你給我們一點意見：
關注 instagram 和我們一起互動：https://link.sparkful.app/instagram
隱私權與使用者條款：https://sparkful.app/legal/privacy-policy

身體 70% 由水分組成，每一滴水都為你的健康注入新的活力。與《植物保姆》一起從手中那杯清爽的水開始，循序漸進地培養喝水習慣；透過貼心有趣的喝水通知、富有樂趣的喝水挑戰，讓喝水不再是單調乏味的事情，而成為每日生活中的小期待與樂趣。

你的小植物夥伴正在熱切地期待著你的加入，一起喝水、健康成長。和《植物保姆》一起開始你的喝水之旅吧！

應用描述:
Flora 是一種全新的方法來幫助你遠離手機、清空待辦事項、以及養成生活好習慣。每當你想更接近自己的目標時，就用 Flora 種下一顆種子。在你努力的同時，這顆種子將會長成一棵健康的樹。讓樹當你的教練，並隨之一起成長。你會驚訝原來你可以這麼棒！

§ 種樹的番茄鐘

就是無法放下手機？Flora 用輕鬆的方式阻擋令人分心的 app，並幫助你專注於現實生活中更重要的事情。如果您無法抗拒手機的誘惑而在種樹時離開 Flora，那麼樹就會被殺死！不過如果成功，你將解鎖新的樹。

§ 一起種樹效率加倍

當你挑戰朋友一起種樹時，事情將變得更加有趣，因為你們會看到「誰」殺死了樹（哎呀）。但是，如果你們一起遠離手機，那麼每個人都將額外贏得一棵隨機朋友的樹。你們也可以透過聊天或分享進度來為對方打氣，並確保大家都保持前進。＊

＊ Flora 是「一起種樹」的原創 app，並提供了最棒的功能來提昇你與朋友們的生產力。

§ 待辦事項清單、小工具

Flora 是一個待辦事項清單，並且功能更多。簡單輸入待辦事項並設置提醒，你就永遠不會忘記任何事情。更棒的是，您可以用待辦事項標來記種過的樹，以輕鬆追蹤每個生活目標的達成進度。無論是每日、每週、或每月目標，Flora 都會幫助你堅持到底並實現它。

§ 健康行事曆

享受充滿回饋的日常好習慣。如果規律地種植樹木，你將獲得一座美麗且充滿活力的花園。看看它，並為自己感到驕傲！這裡的每棵樹都記錄了你的毅力和邁向健康生活的一小步。你還可以查看你在 Flora 中的每日、每週、或每月活動統計，以找到機會改善你的時間管理和規劃技能。

§ 種植「真樹」發揮影響力

何不在精進自我的同時種下真正的樹？ Flora 自豪地提供 Price 和 Care 服務，讓你可以自由選擇加入。只要啟動這些服務，你即可在 app 中殺死或成功種植樹木的同時，在地球上種下一棵真正的樹苗。我們與非洲和東亞的植樹組織（例如 Trees.org）合作，專門種植那些快速幫助土壤肥沃、提供多樣營樣與果實收入、以及可以變成飼料和薪柴的真樹。這些樹皆有助於綠化地球，並為最需要幫助的家庭提供長期經濟援助。

聽起來不錯？現在就下載 Flora ，加入 2,000,000+ 全球高生產力使用者的行列！

應用描述:
居家時的專家指導
在家使用 NTC 應用程式，持續你的健身與健康之旅。

體驗各種免費的運動計畫，包含 HIIT、活力瑜伽課程、只需要簡單器材或無需器材的自重訓練，以及可以加速心跳的有氧運動。 超過 185 種適合所有程度的專業運動計畫，全由世界級的 Nike Master Trainer 設計，歡迎你來挑戰。 我們還有精心打造的運動計畫系列，可以靈活地融入你的生活，幫助你達成特定訓練成果。

居家運動計畫系列
探索居家運動計畫系列，在家也能持續運動，比如：
- 適合小空間的強大運動計畫
- 全家人適用
- 振奮心情
- 透過瑜伽重獲新生
- 最棒的腹肌、手臂與臀大肌訓練

任何空間，各種器材皆可
在客廳、臥室或任何空間，透過引導式運動計畫挑戰自己。 大多數運動計畫只需要自身體重，或一組簡單的重量器材就可以完成。

適合各種程度的運動計畫
Nike Training Club 的訓練和運動計畫資料庫中包括：
• 強調特定部位的運動計畫，著重訓練腹肌與核心、手臂與肩膀、臀大肌與腿部
• HIT、拳擊、瑜伽、肌力、耐力與活動力運動計畫
• 運動計畫所需時間從 5 到 45 分鐘不等
• 入門、中級和進階等級
• 低、中、高強度
• 只靠身體重量、輕量或全套設備
• 分為計時和計次兩種

訓練計畫：
你會喜歡的運動計畫
不管目標為何，透過為期數週的訓練計畫往前邁進。 不論是健身新手還是想要挑戰自己，都有適合你的運動計畫。

適合所有程度
每個人都是從新手開始的，「啟動訓練」計畫非常適合健身新手或已許久沒有健身的老手。 均衡的肌力、耐力與活動力運動計畫組合，給你恰到好處的挑戰，助你提升體能。

無需器材
沒有器材？ 沒關係。 「自身體重」計畫專為鍛鍊肌力和促進新陳代謝設計，完全不需要搭配器材。 運動計畫所需時間從 15 到 45 分鐘不等，無論你有多忙碌，都可以輕鬆融入行程，痛快地流一場汗。

雕塑和柔軟度
適合各種程度的「雕塑身形」六週計畫，以專門鍛鍊耐力的運動計畫加強肌肉和心肺功能。 可自行選擇要不要使用器材，所以不要再找藉口啦！

獲得個人化的推薦
專為你推薦的全新運動計畫和系列，盡在「運動計畫」標籤頁中。 利用 Nike Training Club 所做的訓練越多，建議就會越來越符合你的需求。

支援 APPLE WATCH
家裡充滿各種干擾，非常容易令人分心。 在 Apple Watch 上使用 NTC 應用程式，更能專注運動，不被手機分心。 輕鬆進階到下一個動作，或是暫停、跳過動作及其他更多選擇，同時監控心率和卡路里資料。

所有活動都很重要
在 NTC 的「活動」標籤頁中輸入你做的其他運動計畫，完整追蹤自己的健身旅程。 如果你有使用 Nike Run Club 應用程式，所有的跑步資料都會自動記錄在活動歷程記錄中。

Nike Training Club与Apple Health合作以同步锻炼并记录心率数据。

應用描述:
Pikmin Bloom透過有趣的方式，鼓勵大家和好友一同出門探索並獲得獎勵！現在推出全新的每週挑戰功能，讓玩家能和其他人組隊，無論彼此相隔多遠，都能合力達成步數目標！

收集超過150種特殊飾品皮克敏！有的身上背著魚餌，有的夾在漢堡麵包裡，有的還坐在紙飛機上，造型五花八門。

探索社區，讓更多皮克敏加入你的隊伍！走的路越多，就能找到越多花苗和水果。

與好友組隊打倒蘑菇，獲得獎勵！組成夢幻皮克敏隊伍，增加分數並取得更稀有的水果類型！

讓走過之處開出美麗花朵，妝點這個世界！欣賞你和周圍玩家在地圖上種滿的繽紛花海！
出門探索自己的社區，讓世界綻放花朵！

_______________ 

玩家允許存取後，Pikmin Bloom會使用「健康」，讓玩家不用開啟應用程式也能累積步行距離。

請注意：
- 本應用程式基本為免費遊玩，並提供遊戲內購買。遊戲針對智慧型手機最佳化，而非平板。
- 建議在有網路連線的情況下（Wi-Fi、3G、4G、5G或LTE）遊玩遊戲，以取得準確的位置資訊。
- 不具GPS定位功能或只能連接Wi-Fi網路的裝置可能無法運行遊戲。
- 必須開啟「健康」權限，Pikmin Bloom才能準確記錄你的步數。（iPad不支援此應用程式。）
- 相容性資訊隨時都有可能變更。
- 目前資訊自2022年8月起適用
- 支援安裝iOS 14或以上作業系統的iPhone® 6s或以上裝置。
- 不支援越獄裝置。
- 並非所有裝置都保證能運行遊戲。
- 在背景執行時持續使用GPS功能可能會大幅消耗電量。

- 使用部分功能時，需要以下服務：
ARKit：為了保持優質的遊戲體驗，建議你使用RAM至少達2GB的裝置。如果在遊玩Pikmin Bloom應用程式時經常遇到裝置當機或延遲的問題，請嘗試進行以下疑難排解步驟。
遊玩期間請關閉Pikmin Bloom以外的所有應用程式。
請使用最新版本的作業系統。
如果問題依然無法解決，請參閱iOS疑難排解指南。如果需要額外協助，請聯絡我們並說明詳細狀況。
請注意：許多沒有內建數據網路連線的裝置不具有GPS感應器。如果玩家身處網路壅塞的地點，這類的裝置將無法穩定維持遊戲所需的GPS訊號。

評論.內容: I have been talking with the Niantic Support for an upgrade purchase for the last few days, and the only response I got was a generalized recipe like restarting the phone, removing the browser data, reinstalling the app, all of which of course did not solve the software issue that they’re having. It is pretty lame to keep asking the app user to do something while the problem is clearly on the app.

評論.標題: A nice incentive to walk, just one thing
評論.內容:
I’ve been really enjoying my time in this game. The more I get invested into it, the more it is I am wanting go out and about. You can dedicate as much or little time as you want, and something I really appreciate is not having any FOMO mechanics that make we want to login when I don’t want to. 
  My only real complaint is how hard it is to accumulate coins. You really need to invest time and effort to even get a small amount. I know they are primarily used for cosmetics, but you are able to use them for storage increases for your Pikmin and items. That makes the process of acquiring coins that much more annoying as you have a reason to get coins even if you don’t care about the cosmetics. And another thing I don’t care about at all is how typically 1 coin equals 1 cent(yes I know there are bonuses,but for the sake of my argument), but when you look at how much it costs to do a storage upgrade, the amount of coins it takes to upgrade is way higher than the dollar amount when converted. For example, nectar storage costs $1.99, so you’d think it would take like 200 coins to upgrade. Instead, it takes 350 coins. That’s an extra $1.50 in coins. Which might not seem a lot, but when you are trying to play free to play with how hard it is to farm coins, it actually is quite big. 
  I know you need to make money. I get that. And I really do appreciate that you don’t do ads. But I think it’s unfair for people who don’t have the means or simply just don’t want to give money to be sort of punished because of it. I’d say either lessen the amount of coins it takes to upgrade, or increase how fast it takes to farm coins.

I’ve been playing this game about 2-3 years now. And it’s still got my attention! I play every single day, and I’ve gotten multiple family members-even ones that don’t play Pikmin-to play this game. As a long time fan of the Pikmin series, this is exactly the best way to make a mobile Pikmin game. This game has also gotten me through so many hard times in life. I have Chronic illnesses which often keep me bed bound. However, because of pikmin bloom, I have incentive to leave my bed, my room, and my house. I’ve made so many friends because of this game!

I’ve been playing Pikmin Bloom for 2+ years now, and I’ve really been enjoying playing this game, probably a lot more than Pokémon Go. I like how you don’t need to go to a specific place just to get a certain Pikmin type, although you do need to go to certain places to get their decor. Another thing I also like is that you don’t need to have the game open all the time to find fruits and seedlings, you just need to walk around they will eventually appear in the area. The only thing I don’t like is that (unless you’re willing to pay with your own money) the only way to earn coins in this game is by planting flowers, and it’s really slow, considering that the minimum amount of coins you need to buy anything is 100 coins. Other than that, it’s a great game and I really like to walk around with the Pikmin!

***全世界下載最多的宮縮計時器！英國，澳洲，加拿大，意大利和其他國家排名第一的應用程序！ ***

這是最簡單易用的宮縮計時器, 可以觀察你的子宮收縮情況，並決定何時要去醫院。
如你決定在家分娩，這程序可以告訴你正處於分娩的哪個階段。

每次陣痛開始和結束時，點一個簡單按鈕就能記錄陣痛的過程。計時器可以分析陣痛的持續時間和頻率，並通知你什麼時候應該去醫院。

全世界已經有幾千名孕婦使用我們的程序成功生產。

關於陣痛的頻度和持續時間，請一定諮詢醫生意見。
本程序並不是醫療器械，我們的建議只是基於一般標準。你的分娩過程可能有所不同。所以不要單純依賴本應用程序。
若陣痛的時間和頻度未與標準指數一致，但陣痛變得難以忍耐，建議盡快去醫院就診，避免在家中或路上分娩。要相信你的身體。

如您有任何疑問或建議，請電郵至neumandev@gmail.com與我們取得聯繫。您的意見對我們十分重要。

評論.內容: I downloaded this app when I was suffering with false labor pains for two days already , until the last day something in me told me to download an app where I could track my contractions but would ALSO tell me when to leave the hospital because the night before I had been sent back as a first time mom I didn’t know anything about how labor would feel or how contractions even really felt. Downloaded it last night & ALL night the window popped up to go the the hospital , I ignored it thinking it was false till I made my boyfriend drive me to the hospital at 3 am and the app was correct! About 24 hours later we welcomed our baby boy to this world 🩵

評論.內容: Its a trap

I was referred to this app from an expecting parent GC. The first time I used the app was 5 days prior to me going into labor. On the day I went into labor I used this app at 4 AM and the app informed me to Head to the hospital, when I got to the hospital I found out I was in labor! I had my baby by that afternoon! With it being my first child I wasn’t sure if I was having contractions or counting them correctly on my own but I will say with this app and it notifying me to head to the hospital I’m glad I downloaded it because I had to travel far to the hospital and risked going into labor home!

So I never write reviews… but this app was a saving grace during the early stages of my labor. After my water broke, I didn’t want to immediately go to the hospital so I used this app to track every contraction (length and frequency) so I knew when it was time to go. On top of that, the app notifies you (based on your stats) of when it thinks you should go to the hospital. That way you don’t have to analyze the data yourself. I’m so so glad I had this for my birth. I will definitely be recommending it to other birthing parents.
It’s its simple and user friendly! Perfect for when you’re dealing with contractions

This made it so I couldn’t log the next contraction so this app is unserious about helping.

評論.標題: Plays noisy ads preventing you from logging contractions
評論.內容: This is my 4th baby so I’ve used a couple different apps and there are plenty of great free ones that aren’t as inconvenient as this one. You can’t delete a contraction if you accidentally bump it so it is included of your frequency log even if it wasn’t correct. It also PLAYS NOISY ADDS THAT YOU CAN’T SKIP even if you need to end or start a contraction. It’s not just an read advertisement you can press the x. It’s got sounds and everything. I’m so glad I had the opportunity to trial it with a false labor incident so I don’t have to deal with it in real time. It would have completely thrown off my relaxation. Don’t use this app. There are numerous others that work great.

應用名稱: 喝水 減肥計劃 喝水提醒 Waterllama
應用描述:
** 2022 APP STORE 大獎 文化影響獎 **
** 2022 APPLE 設計大獎 入圍作品 **
你知道自己需要喝更多水吧！

• 全天可用的智慧型提醒
• 完成 9 個有趣的健康挑戰
• 收集並填滿 45 個可愛的字元角色
• 追蹤所有你喝的飲料中的水份: 40+ 種最常喝的飲料
• 方便的 Apple Watch 應用程式
• 酷炫的主畫面小工具
• 每月一次的應用程式內攝水活動

• 用可分享的回顧插圖來慶祝一天
• 根據體重、活動和天氣來計算自己的每日飲水目標
• 建立自己的飲料
• 攝水歷史日曆
• Apple 健康 同步
• 盎司/毫升測量單位

水對我們的身體非常重要，而且水份幾乎對所有主要器官系統的維護，都有極重要的影響
如果你喝太少水，大腦會進入生存模式並在體內儲存水份，而導致腳、手和腿部腫脹
需要水份才能為你處理食物中的所有養份
脫水會讓你感到疲累，喝一杯水吧

透過保持水份平衡來提高工作效率
攝取足夠的水份，來提高心理和身體機能
喝足夠的水，能看起來更好看、更健康
喝足夠的水會感到更快樂

保持充足水份及愉快心情！

Waterllama 提供按年度訂閱或一次性購買。購買確認後，將從你的 iTunes 帳戶收費。除非在收費期間結束至少 24 小時前關閉自動續訂，否則將會自動續訂。你可以前往 iTunes 帳戶設定來管理你的訂閱，並關閉自動續訂。

應用名稱: Flo：經期追蹤、懷孕紀錄、排卵期追蹤器
應用描述:
排名第 1 的女性健康應用程式 Flo 由 100 多位健康和醫學方面的一流專家共同打造。Flo 為全球超過 3.8 億使用者提供排卵和經期紀錄、月經週期日記和孕期助手服務。無論是想更瞭解月經週期、正在備孕還是已成為準媽媽，Flo 都能滿足你的各種需求，快來加入我們吧！

FLO FOR PARTNERS
要找到恰當的詞（或時機）來解釋目前的身體狀態可能並不容易。我們推出了 Flo for Partners 來幫助你的伴侶瞭解你的身體狀況。伴侶接受邀請並使用你的專屬代碼加入後，就可以：
- 進一步瞭解你的月經週期。
- 查看你的孕期動態。

Flo 的成就：
- Flo 是首款達到國際認證資訊安全標準 (ISO 27001) 的經期和排卵期紀錄工具。
- 我們的內容經過 100 多位醫生和健康專家審核。

月經週期與經期紀錄
你可以選擇並記錄 70 多種症狀和活動，以獲得最精準的預測結果及建議。

排卵追蹤與懷孕日曆
提供最佳受孕日期和量身製作的指引，讓你在懷孕路上備受呵護。準媽媽們可以利用我們的應用程式追蹤寶寶的成長狀態、計算預產期、設定倒數，甚至還能學習新生兒照護方面的基本知識。

健康報告與助手
我們的虛擬健康助手會根據你記錄的症狀提供簡單易懂的資訊。我們每個月還會產生含月經週期圖表和規律變化的個人化健康報告。

匿名模式
既能擁有個人專屬指引和精準預測，同時又能選擇更完善的隱私保護。Flo 在匿名模式下只會處理月經週期和症狀等健康資料，並將這些資料留存在不包含任何任何身分識別資訊（例如電子郵件或姓名）的帳戶。

訂閱資訊
- Flo 推出的訂閱方案帶來更升級的個人化體驗，你還能無限次存取整個身心健康多媒體內容庫。
- 在確認購買後，我們將透過你的 Apple ID 收取費用。
- 若未在目前訂閱期結束前 24 小時取消自動續訂，系統將自動續訂。
- 我們將在目前訂閱期結束前 24 小時向你的帳戶收取續訂費用。
- 訂閱交由使用者管理，使用者購買後可以前往帳戶設定選擇關閉自動續訂。
- 使用者選擇訂閱後，所有在免費試用期間尚未使用的內容（若有）將一律視同作廢。

如需更多資訊，請至 https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039。
隱私權政策：https://flo.health/privacy-policy
使用條款：https://flo.health/terms-of-use
無障礙聲明：https://flo.health/accessibility-statement-ios

Flo 使用 HealthKit 將 Flo 活動匯出至健康 App 及讀取月經週期資料。

存取權限聲明：
為了傳送通知給你或存取你的相片或音訊，Flo 可能會透過應用程式內通知要求你提供權限。你可以選擇是否授權。
- 通知：傳送通知或提醒給你。
- 相片：上傳要用於私密聊天中論壇討論的所選相片。
- 音訊：在你參與 Flo 引導群組聊天時，為了進行群組討論，選取將錄音內容上傳至非公開群組聊天。
Flo 不會自動存取你的內容。你可以根據我們的指南，選取要分享的內容。

Flo 並非診斷工具，請勿將 Flo 的預測結果作為避孕或助孕手段。請勿以 Flo 應用程式取代專業醫療建議、診斷或治療方法。

I used Flo regularly about 10 years ago and enjoyed it. I downloaded it again a few months ago and have experienced only frustration and annoyance. The ads encouraging you to upgrade to premium are obtrusive, relentless, and interfere with the functionality of the app. Any time you open the app or try to do anything you are bombarded with 2-4 ad screens that you are forced to cycle through. The free version of the app isn’t even worth it because it’s actually kind of hard to see patterns, which is the whole point of a tracking app. For example, on the main screen it doesn’t even tell you what day of your cycle you are in- you have to click into the calendar for that. I can’t speak to the paid version since I haven’t tried it. But as far as I can tell the paid app is designed for people who don’t know how to Google things.

評論.標題: 9 years worth of data lost despite paying for a PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION !! Beyond upset.
評論.內容:
I’ve had this app for 9 YEARS, have bought 3 phones and has no problem with my account. Cut to those month, I get a new phone and go to sign into flo, not knowing that it would claim I do not have an account. Flo support says I will have to start from the beginning. 
Are you KIDDING ME? Nine YEARS of logging daily symptoms and cycles FOR NOTHING?? 
And to think this year I finally decided to get the premium subscription because I’ve loved being able to safely store all of my women related issues and symptoms. 
How is it I have a premium subscription that expires in November 2025 yet I have no account? 

I’m so furious. I just want my data back.

評論.標題: Lost 244 dollars to one of their “Major booking sites”
評論.內容:
I recently went through Trivago to book a hotel in Tampa. It led me to a booking site called Algotels. I paid for the room, but never got a confirmation number, so on the day before I was supposed to leave I called them to cancel. They said they would refund me and I ended up booking through the hotel website. They confirmed my room and gave me a confirmation number. Then I got an email mail from Algotel not only refusing to refund me, but they gave me the same email confirmation number I booked MYSELF through the hotel. I complained to Trivago and they said they couldn’t do anything because it was a 3rd party site. BEWARE! Trivago does not hold these 3rd party sites responsible, nor does it seem like they vette any of these sites for legitimacy. You are out on a limb, once you make an interaction. I may not get my money back, but at least I may help someone else from making the same mistake.

UPDATE: Trivago vettes ADVERTISERS, not booking agencies. My mistake. What are people downloading Trivago for? Advertisements? Folks there you have it, straight from the source itself. Again, learn from my mistake and save your money.

I was planning a trip to Arlington, and I was looking at a certain hotel. First time I looked at it, it was around $489 a night. Next day, it was $613 a night and I booked it. Due to technical difficulties, my reservation was refunded with a $150 credit. Looked this morning, the room shot up to $840 a night! Almost doubled in basically 2 days! Checked Expedia, $490 a night. Screw this app, will never use again.

評論.內容:
These guys invested a lot of time making this a premium app. The appearance and attention to detail is amazing. I’ve worked in app development for a leading marketing organization in Chicago and have seen top quality professional design and this app is at that level. 
Having a full suite of body workout is great - exercises, high quality instructional videos, tasty recoiled with the nutritional information, etc all in one place is great.
The additional benefit is there are multiple trainers / influencers who take body health seriously. This provides the opportunity to select which style and personality best suits yours. Wonderful idea!
Though I’m a guy and won’t use the app, it’s good to see this type of high quality, highly usable app is available for my wife and daughters. I strongly recommend it to them and any other woman who wants to get control of their body health.

評論.內容: This is the best app focusing on women’s health

This is a great app! The aesthetics and usability of the app are so smooth. You can choose which program to follow based on experience and strength which I love. You can also try healthy recipes with all the nutrition facts available. Each adaptable workout allows for enough rest time, but are also challenging. Check it out for yourself!

The color of the app is quite cute that I give one star. To support the female bosses I subscribed. But the app is not good- very bad I would say. 
It is literally no different from doing your workout with a paper and a timer. The only difference could be in paper/timer mode you need to cross the box on paper and in this app you click it.
The workout inside was quite basic. 

I would just follow a YouTube video.. a waste a money and I am very disappointed.

應用名稱: 私人健身教練 - 無需器械
應用描述:
想增肌和減重嗎？私人健身教練應用程式能滿足你的需求！
不需任何器材，輕鬆在家跟著做。
遵循量身定制的計劃和專業指導，帮你变得更健康、更強壯！

私人健身教練應用程式经过精心打造，提供各種運動課程和計劃，適合從初學者到專家的所有人。

無需器材，您可以隨時隨地進行運動，無論是在家裡、健身房還是室外。

還不只如此！私人健身教練應用程式還提供個性化的計劃，根據您的個人需求量身定制，無論您的目標是增肌、減重還是保持健康。

此外，您的訓練數據將自動記錄，您將不會錯過任何一次進步。那還等什麼呢？立即開始使用私人健身教練應用程式，改變您的身體吧！

使用私人健身教練應用程式，實現健身目標從未如此簡單。
1. 隨時隨地開始
不需任何器材，簡單易行。不論是在家、健身房還是室外，您都可以隨時隨地使用私人健身教練應用程式進行運動。

2. 專家量身定制計劃
增肌、減重或只是保持健康——私人健身教練應用程式提供量身定制的計劃，完全符合您的目標和生活方式。最棒的是，它效果迅速且持久。

3. 多樣化的運動課程
每個人都能在這裡找到所需的運動課程，無論您是想減脂、針對特定肌肉、伸展身體還是提振心情。私人健身教練應用程式提供各種針對性的運動課程，滿足您的需求。

優質功能，私人健身教練應用程式帶你開始運動：
• 量身定制的個人計劃：根據你的健身目標和重點區域，獲得量身定制的計劃，快速見效。
• 500+ 多樣化運動課程：各種運動課程，滿足你的個別需求。
• 智慧健身追蹤器：自動記錄你的進展，幫助你保持在軌道上。

其他不可錯過的功能：
• 專業視頻指導：有效運動，預防傷害，激發靈感。
• 與 Apple Health 整合：無縫整合你的健身數據（卡路里、步數...），更好地追蹤進展。
• 清晰數據圖表：追蹤體重和卡路里趨勢，作出明智決策。
• 客製化提醒：不再錯過任何一次訓練課程。
• 與朋友分享：互相啟發，激勵。

無隱藏費用，告別意外「驚喜」。

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每年39.99美元
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。

隱私政策：https://maleworkout.leaphealth.fitness/privacypolicy.html
使用條款：https://maleworkout.leaphealth.fitness/terms.html

I found it difficult to figure out the proper amount of certain exercises and I gave up on certain workouts before. Once I started using this app I found that all I had to do was remind myself to complete specific workouts each day, stay on pace with the videos, and I would be fine. 

The app lets you go at your own pace which is great compared to working out in a group where you have to keep up with everyone else. Eventually you can increase the intensity as you see fit. The hardest part of doing the workout is finding the motivation to start it, but this app uses a similar system to Duolingo which is great at keeping you hooked. Great app overall! There’s plenty you can get done with just the free version.

Very good app. Main app page is a little “busy” (lots of options & not very intuitive). One of the biggest drawbacks is that you can’t add pull-ups as an exercise. For some reason they think gyms don’t have pull-up bars. This is a huge oversight. It’s one of the best and most popular exercises around but you can’t log them on this app. They have plenty of exercises that require a bench and/or weights. But for some reason pull-ups is a no-go. Overall, this is a good app with lots of exercises to choose from. I’ll happily give 5 stars when the app navigation is more intuitive. Please add pull-ups to the mix.

應用名稱: 大眾點評 - 內地搵飲搵食生活情報
應用描述:
大众点评是一个聚焦本地生活吃喝玩乐的消费方式分享平台，帮助大家探索和发现城市内外的精彩好去处，丰富休闲好时光。

这里不仅有丰富的新热商户/景点等目的地信息，还有用户实地打卡的照片和评价，为你在选择美食餐厅、酒店民宿、景点门票等相关信息时提供帮助。

【美食推荐】新开热店、网红餐厅、老字号、本地人爱去的街边小店...这里有各类餐厅和真实用户评价，为喜爱美食的你随时发现身边的惊喜美味。还能一键买单，享受团购优惠。

【旅游攻略】休假去哪里，周末去哪里？全国热门旅游目的地、景美人少的小众景点、城市周边游、市内赏花踏青免费好去处，上大众点评查看旅游笔记、攻略，买票、订酒店同步搞定。

【亲子娱乐】适合遛娃的综合商场、儿童乐园、艺术/科技展览、绿地公园...享受周末高质量的亲子时光，分享家长们的遛娃经验。

【新奇去处】年轻就要体验不凡。一下午紧张刺激的剧本杀，一次说走就走的徒步露营，一段静下来的手作慢时光，在城市里冲浪、潜水、攀岩，晚上到酒吧轻吟浅酌，与志同道合的朋友们火速拼团，体验不一样的周末吧。

除此之外，你还能在大众点评上找到如美容美发、结婚摄影、健身运动、装修保洁等多种生活服务。

評論.標題: Needed for China but fake reviews
評論.內容: This app lets you discover different venues in Chinese cities (mainly) but unlike Yelp, this app mainly ONLY promotes good reviews. Most of the reviews in China are fake, businesses pay for fake reviews from different groups. They often put a pretty girl on the cover to get clicks. A spa that I recently charged a 1000 membership shut down over night, the business owner ran away, leaving all members holding the bag. No explanation. Phone number down - no customer service. “Welcome to China”. I tried to write a half a star rating and was rejected by DianPings corrupt system for “violation of usage rules” whatever the f that means. This app is as corrupt as its business registrants. So use due diligence when using anything Chinese. When everyone has 5 stars, you need to use some common sense on what’s actually good or bad. This app is a disgrace!

應用描述:
Strava 让健身追踪变得社交化。我们将你所有积极的旅程都集中在同一个地方，以便于你与朋友分享了。方法如下：

把一切记录下来：跑步、骑车、远足、瑜伽和 30 多种其他类型的运动。你就把 Strava 视为你的运动大本营吧。

随处探索：我们的路线工具使用去识别化的 Strava 数据，可根据你的偏好智能地推荐热门路线。你还可以构建自己的路线。

建立支持网络：Strava 的目的是庆祝运动。在这里，你会找到适合你的社群，并互相鼓励。

以更智能的方式进行训练 - 获得数据洞察力即可了解自己的进度并了解自己应该如何改进。你的训练日志是你的所有锻炼记录。

更加安全地锻炼 - 在户外锻炼时与亲人分享你的实时位置，从而给自己多一层安全保障。

同步你最喜爱的应用程序和设备：Strava 与成千上万的应用程序和设备兼容（Apple Watch、Fitbit、Garmin，数不胜数）。

参加并创建挑战赛 - 和数百万人一起参加月度挑战赛，以追逐新目标、收集数字奖章并保持责任感。

拥抱未经过滤的事物——你在 Strava 上的动态栏中充满了真人的真实努力。这就是我们互相激励的方式。

无论你是世界级运动员还是初学者，你都可以在这里找到属于你的位置。只需记录并继续锻炼即可。

Strava 上有免费版和提供有高级功能的订阅版。

Strava 通过 HealthKit 将你的 Strava 活动导出到健康应用程序，以便于读取心率和生物特征数据。

你可以用你的 Apple ID 在 App Store 上订阅和付款。确认购买后，系统会从你的 Apple ID 账户中扣除款项。除非在当前订阅期结束前至少 24 小时前取消订阅，否则你的订阅会自动续订。系统会在当前期限结束前 24 小时内从你的帐户收取续订费用。订阅可以由用户管理，购买后可通过转到设置中的“管理订阅”页面关闭自动续订。免费试用期的任何未使用部分（如果提供了的话）将在用户购买该发布的订阅时被作废（如适用）。订阅会以相同的费用续订。

服务条款：https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
隐私政策：https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

評論.內容: Amazing app manage and share your trainings.

評論.標題: Focusing on AI, Ignoring Core Features
評論.內容: Recently Strava has really gone all in on their new “Athlete Intelligence” which provides essentially nothing you can’t get from looking at the data yourself. In the meantime, however, numerous core functionalities of the app no longer work, such as the entire routing tab. It is completely broken and has been for weeks.
Love it for tracking
The recording function stops when you close the app. Feels pointless to use the most basic function of the app.

It took them over a week to get back to me on a support ticket. Not that they would do anything about their horrendous support for indoor cycling with the Apple Watch. I have to manually import to and export from RunGap to get all of my ride data into Strava.
Uploads my iFIT workout twice so I have to manually delete one every time. Very annoying.

評論.標題: If it’s not on Strava does not count
評論.內容: Great way to keep up with stats and share with friends - easy to use app

It misses a lot of key features that other exercise apps have like being able to sync your phone and watch when you start an activity and a vibration notification when you stop to remind you to stop the activity.
Fantastic apps to get me back every time.

App clearly needs an update. I’ve been a huge fan for years but I can’t tell you how many times I’ve been half a mile or more into a run and the thing has said I’m running and logged nothing. Plz fix.

I love Strava. It has been an invaluable help in monitoring and evaluating my training. It lets me know how much training I am doing and how well I am doing compared to my other runs, bikes or swims,etc.. I also the positive feedback and encouragement I get from Strava, which my family and friends are not really able to provide because they don’t know exactly what I’m doing.

評論.標題: Most basic feature does not work
評論.內容: Strava has suffered a slow decline over the years in terms of functionality. An issue that I’ve dealt with for over 9 months is the fact that the timer for weight training does not keep accurate time. It will stop when the phone locks. Strava support (when they actually do respond) claims they are aware of the issue and are actively working on it. They also told me to just upload my workouts manually. If they cannot make a simple timer work correctly, who knows what else is wrong with the app.

Why is it every single update breaks the iOS widget? Every time I update Strava I have to delete the widget and then re-add it, sometimes multiple times, be for it functions again. And now after today’s update the widget isn’t event there. This isn’t an issue with any other apps or widgets I use, but without fail Strava updates render the widget inoperable. This is admittedly a minor issue, but it is extremely frustrating nonetheless.
As long as I cannot opt out of the annoying quick edit pop up you cannot opt out of this 1 star review

評論.標題: Does not properly record distance without fitness watch.
評論.內容: When using only an iPhone, the strava app only records 1/10 the distance. The iPhone health and fitness apps have no trouble accurately recording the proper number of steps and distance. The Strava app is useless without fitness watch.  Strava blames the issues on GPS accuracy but none of my other apps have any issues with my devices GPS.

評論.標題: App crashed, entire year of progress gone
評論.內容: Started a run right as the ball dropped on 1/1/25. 14 days and 1111 miles later (angel number) and the app now crashes every time I open it. Never running again.
should be free

It's hard to believe that over a decade ago before I joined so many bike shop mechanics and salesmen tried to talk me out of joining Strava. I was hooked the second I joined. One of my top 3 apps of all time.

評論.評論者: Did I use ai to write this?
評論.內容: A lot of the features are locked behind a paywall when they shouldn’t be. This app would be a lot better if there were more features available without a subscription, including segment leaderboards.

評論.標題: Not sure why i am paying for this app anymore
評論.內容: So basically, Strava is trying to push AI on its users. I personally want nothing to do with AI. What seemingly started off as a great idea, now your location usage search, history, diagnostics, and pretty much everything you do on your device is bought & sold. I wouldn’t recommend strava anymore due to its lack of transparency and privacy.

With the popularity of "rucking" with a weighted vest or pack, I wish this was an option so I could see stats and compare to fellow athletes. Same mapping feature by add in the weight carried as a drop down

Supper annoying app but helpful at same time, I ran 1 mile Today recording it on my watch yet when I finished it and did some ab workouts the workout didn’t upload. Like if u wait 10 minutes after using watch without being near your phone it “deletes” the run like it never existed. Yet this app is also helpful in many ways

Cool app, but seems to be run by greedy people who intentionally do not notify you that a free version is turning into a subscription. Just got charged $80, which I don’t think is at all worth it for this app. I would say maybe it’s worth $20 a year. Lots of new competitors every day, and if my club didn’t use this app, I probably wouldn’t either. Shame on the owners, greed never ends well.
I don’t care to see athletes I follow walk their dog, or go to the gym.  I’d really like to only see bicycle rides and running.  I’ve asked for this filter often over the years.

I’ve started getting engagement bait in the form of notifications I turn off. Please stop sending me “trending routes”
Edit: please stop sending me “Got a few minutes”
Start a run or ride on my Apple Watch then notice it stops tracking/recording for some reason. At times I’ll have to start it all over again. Read online this is happening to others. Please fix!!!

The few latest updates made the app much slower and unstable. It crashes from time to time upon extensive scrolling; maps not loading for extended periods of time, especially detailed views when trying to zoom in. Additionally, the timeline presentation changed from continuous to random order (just like Facebook and etc.). The worst feature is feed refresh which happens often and sometimes right when one tries to scroll continuously to see updates missed from few days back. Not a good long term direction for a widely used app.
They killed farmer so so they can force people to subscribe, and got rid of all of the needed functionality. I would never recommend this app to a friend

I’ve subscribed to Strava annually for the last 4 years, but this moronic app refuses to recognize that fact. Any time I try to do something that requires a subscription, it tries to sell me another one that I don’t need. Scammy rubbish.

I use Strava as a one stop shop to keep a history of all my runs and bikes. However it consistently overstates the mileage and pace of all my runs. I can run both Nike Run Club and Strava on my phone at the same time, and Strava will consistently overstate the stats. It’s the same if I run with someone else and compare stats. It also overstates when comparing to my Apple Watch or Garmin. Bottom line - why would you pay for premium if the app can’t give you accurate stats.

I will run on the treadmill and the Strava app on my watch will disappear losing time from my run. I switched to the native apple app but it often doesn’t sync those workouts making your overall analytics incorrect.

評論.標題: Got rid of the manual activity button and their ai chatbot is useless
評論.內容: With the new update on the Strava app it’s taken away the option to add activity manually by adding access to your profile from where the plus sign used to be. So I asked the chatbot if there’s another way to add activity manually and it responded saying to use the plus sign to add manual activity. Which again, there is no plus sign. Also have no idea how else to reach out to Strava so came here. Fix your app and updated your website with the updates you put onto the app.

Harder/ impossible to manually add workout data!
Very limited options for free users.
Premium is constantly forced down our throats.
I’m incredibly disappointed. 
Not everyone cares about team functions etc, just let us log our basic workouts!!
The only thing I used on fatmap before being decommissioned was the 3D map of ski areas now with the old app gone this app isn’t useful

評論.標題: Doesn’t work on my iPhone 13Pro Max
評論.內容: Refuses to accept that I have Motion and Fitness enabled. Followed the troubleshooting on the webpage to no avail. Even attempted restarting my iPhone, and reinstalling the app. Nothing worked.
Useless for what i would use it for. As a mountain guide and endurance athlete I’m disgusted. I have no interest in $80 of worthless Strava just to get FATMAP info. Never again. Buyer beware.
Great
Nothing makes sense anymore.

I’m extremely disappointed with this app. It blatantly takes advantage of its customers by withholding basic information that most other apps in the same category provide for free. Instead, they push users toward paid features without transparency or value. It feels exploitative, especially when competitors are offering the same (if not better) services at no cost.

If you’re considering this app, save yourself the frustration and look elsewhere. The lack of transparency and focus on nickel-and-diming users makes it hard to trust this platform.

Free version is great for almost anything a new or intermediate runner/biker needs. Lots of cool features. Payed for version is too expensive for me but for someone with money it unlocks a lot of really cool things that really are worth it
Best app in existence.
Why would this be removed with the update??

I have been using Strava for about 10 years now.  Seems like every year or so Strava marketing peeps keep removing features to force “free subscriber” to sign up for premium.  I tried premium, but I am a “weekend warrior” rider, I am not joining clubs or challenges, don’t care if my map is 3D, (the maps are 5 or more years outdated), and want my PR history.  I miss being able to look at my own history and miss seeing who else rode the trail I did that same day.  Strava marketing should make a “light” membership for the rest of us that just want to ride when we can.  That’s about it…

Manually adding a workout is difficult to navigate. I understand the priority is GPS navigation while using the app, but manually adding work outs to log your history is important as well. This needs to be more intuitive.
Why did the Product team think to get rid of the + button on the home page to log manual activity? Can’t find it now. Dumb dumb dumb.
Auto Charged full price for student. Contacted support 10 days ago still no reply…

I’ve just gotten a new phone and have been hit by a series of different weird bugs related to syncing activities from my watch to my phone. As soon as I fix one bug another one begins. Cool to be able to share workouts etc but holy cow I’m spending so much time trying to troubleshoot.

New version you cant upload a manual activity. Looked everywhere and can’t find it. I’ve been a paying user for years and not being able to upload a manual activity makes the app useless. Please update with a way to add manual activities again or if it exists tell your users where to locate it!
Won’t let me manually upload runs now, so I can’t upload tread runs or races
