評論.標題: Dont bother if u have a high heartrate
評論.內容:
I love the idea of having a heart rate app that tracks my heart rate at least SOMEWHAT ACCURATELY. I was in the search of a heart rate app and stumbled upon this one hoping it could track my heart rate when needed and help with my POT syndrome. Sadly i was wrong. This app counts my heart rate way off most of the time. My heart rate will be at anything from 110-180 standing but it tells me around 60 bpm! This app tends to work when my heart rate is 50-70 anything above that it gets completely wrong…Also out of curiosity i put the heart rate app monitor on a chair to see what it said. It said THE CHAIR HAD A HEARTBEAT of 80BPM. Now its got me wondering if the heart rates are just completely random. Hoping the creators of this app can figure out a solution. Amazing idea but its just not working out and im sure im not the only one having problems like this. Hope you take my review into consideration 

If your reading i would not recommend getting this app

 Thanks

應用名稱: StressWatch: 壓力即時監測 & 健康管理
應用描述:
StressWatch 已被全球 171 個國家/地區蘋果應用商店推薦——
◎ 八月最佳 APP
◎ The Best Apps for iOS 18
◎ 首頁主打推薦
◎ Apple Watch 必備
◎ 新 APP 推薦
◎ 本周編輯推薦

StressWatch透過分析蘋果手錶HRV心率變異性和靜息心率等數據，幫助你理解當前身體疲勞和心理壓力程度，及時提醒壓力狀態，幫助你更好地感知、管理與應對壓力。StressWatch透過讀取蘋果手錶存儲到蘋果健康內的心率數據來檢測你的HRV（Heart Rate Variability，心率變異性）和靜息心率，及時提醒你的壓力狀態，通過統計分析給出相關洞察，讓身心更平靜輕鬆。生活慢一點也可以溫柔閃亮！

StressWatch可以怎樣幫到你

當我們在深夜加班的時候，StressWatch可以在手錶上提醒我HRV偏低注意壓力——我意識到我今天不需要再卷了，工作留到明天做吧；
當社恐的我們混在派對裡強顏歡笑的時候，提醒我HRV偏低注意壓力——我意識到我不需要迎合他人，於是換個讓自己更開心的社交方式；
當我們在喝悶酒時候，提醒我HRV過低壓力過載，我意識到喝酒並不是排解壓力的好辦法，於是會少喝一些更愛惜自己身體；
把HRV讀數放在手錶表盤上，一抬腕就知道最近的壓力狀況，決定接下來是要卷還是躺；
堅持良好作息、運動一段時間後，通過每周、每月的統計告訴我這段時間的壓力值比上個月明顯有所下降，整個人狀態都好了很多。
為什麼做這個產品
這是一個內卷又焦慮的時代，AI每天都在爆炸性的發展，彷彿要取代我們所有人的工作。每家公司都在996，每個人都活在一不努力就可能被時代抛棄的巨大壓力中。曾經我們也是公司裡的卷王，經常為了公司項目從早上八點一直卷到晚上十二點，跨時區會議多數還拖堂到凌晨。週末彷彿變成了一個遙遠的概念，為了產品能按時上線，放棄週末去加班變成了基本操作。卷得太劇烈，壓力過大，身體都默默承受了，後移的髮際線是身體的求救信號。於是我們開始思考，有沒有更及時的方式能讓我們了解身體的壓力水平。偶然機會了解到HRV這個概念，借助它可以很好地量化我們自身的壓力。

設計理念
做StressWatch這個App的初衷是想幫助大家在這個焦慮的時代減少壓力慢下來。StressWatch的科學依據是基於HRV（心率變異性）數值的靜息心率的壓力測量，但僅僅告訴用戶冰冷數字容易營造出悲壯的「壓力過載」氛圍（我們不希望大家比慘），生活中也已經有太多的數字了，OKR、KPI、NPS。我們一直在思考，如何給理性的數據注入一些溫度？應該用什麼樣的情感化表達，幫助大家更好的和產品連接以產生共情。
於是，就有了「壓力泡泡」這個產品形象，「泡泡」就是我們克服壓力緩解焦慮的夥伴，他會隨著你的壓力狀態變化改變自己的顏色，但是無論壓力如何都能泰然處之。我們沒法控制外在的環境，就像我們沒法控制天氣一樣。但無論外面是晴天、雨天、甚至暴風雨，當不同壓力狀態的你每次打開app，都能看到一個神情自如、可愛輕鬆的泡泡。TA提醒你慢一些，在你最慌亂的時候給你的心一個柔軟的擁抱。

未來產品功能規劃

- 更豐富的手錶表盤掛件
- 手機桌面小組件
- 快速HRV測量
- HRV和靜息心率趨勢
- 每日恢復狀態評估
- 歡迎聯繫我們

小紅書 @StressWatch App

非常期待聽到你的建議，你的支持和建議是我們不斷迭代的動力來源！
蘋果健康整合
StressWatch通過蘋果健康讀取來自蘋果手錶的心率健康數據。StressWatch需要獲取蘋果健康的讀取授權，以提醒、統計壓力時刻、提供建議，否則無法正常使用。請放心，你的健康數據僅儲存在本地，我們不上傳任何你的健康數據。

訂閱價格和條款
StressWatch可以免費下載，若選擇升級到StressWatch Pro版本，則可以解鎖所有付費功能。
我們提供一次性購買、按月和按年自動續訂三種不同的購買選項。

按月或按年訂閱的說明：確認並支付後，將通過你的蘋果iTunes帳號自動續訂。扣費成功後，順延一個訂閱周期。若需退訂，請在當前訂閱期結束前至少24小時內，手動在iTunes / Apple ID設置管理中關閉自動續費功能。試用期內，如不取消訂閱，則會在試用期結束時自動開通訂閱並扣款。本服務由您自助選擇是否取消，若您選擇不取消，將為您開通下一個計費周期的續費服務。

健康建議的免責聲明
StressWatch提供的所有信息和建議不可以被視作醫療建議或診斷，請勿替代專業的診斷和治療。如果感覺壓力過大無法調節，以及做出任何醫療決定之前，請及時尋求專業醫生幫助。

評論.內容: Really nice app

If I sit too long, say watching a movie, I get warned that my HRV is too low. But I’ve recently been in car accident, my husband just found out he needs major surgery, and my father in law is in the hospital and may not be able to live at home anymore. I have a tension headache to end all headaches. Plus, I didn’t sleep much last night due to all the anxiety. 

But according to this app, my realtime stress is low and I’m going great. Yeah, what a joke. I gotta say I don’t think it works.

Obsessed with this app but the widget is mostly unusable. For some reason every time I use my phone the widget shows no data. I have to open the app then quit for it to show. Unfortunately it resets to 0 each time throughout the day. Please fix your Home Screen widget! Data should persist like other apps.

評論.標題: Don’t waste your money and use free version, or don’t use at all. Wildly Innacurate.
評論.內容: Keep in mind, I have not been diagnosed with any heart conditions nor ever had one. This app is wildly inaccurate, mostly because of when exactly apple watch makes the measurements. When I am fully at rest, I keep getting notification of “Pay attention” and overload, but I feel absolutely fine. Free version might be fine for some ease of analyzing the HRV readings, but do not waste your money for the only useful paid feature, realtime stress, as it’s inaccurate and useless.

Update - now the watch faces are no longer compatible with 18.2. I will have to cancel my subscription and find one that does. 
I absolutely loved this app and relied upon it. After iOS 18 came out and I updated my watch, it has been sporadic at best. I have followed all the online suggestions. Settings on both the watch and the app are correct. Watch and phone have both been restarted. App has been uninstalled and reinstalled and it still does not properly work.

I have been using this app for a while on my watch and just had to take it off. When I am relaxed and happy it will tell me to check myself and when I am upset or anxious about something it will tell me I’m in the good range. I then will get even more annoyed because as soon as I get upset my watch sends an alert to tell me I’m doing good. It’s like telling someone when they are angry to calm down.

I love this app and am a paying member for the time being. This has been helpful in training me to tune into my body and recognize what stress feels like. I’ve even started to notice high stress levels on my own a few times now which is a really big deal for me. 

I’m giving 3 stars because the data analysis is just not where it needs to be in my opinion. In the paid version you can see historical data back as far as it goes and you have the option to log how you are feeling mentally and physically at the time of a stress notification. You can also associate that notification with things like work, fitness, and alcohol and you can add your own custom ones as well. While logging these things has been helpful for personal reflection and recognition on my own, there is zero analysis of this data in the app. Here are examples of what would be useful:
-Your HRV is lower and more controlled on days you have not logged alcohol.
-Your reported feeling focused or energized more on days you have logged fitness.
- On average you log feeling tense and overwhelmed between 2-5 pm on weekdays 40% of the time. 
- or 60% of your highest stress levels last month were logged between 2-5pm on weekdays. 

I want it to recognize patterns in the data so that I can make changes to my life that prevent stress BEFORE it happens, not just while it is happening. 
For now, I’m going to keep using the app to continue building my skills in recognizing my own body sensations. But after another month or so I will likely cancel my subscription because $13 a month or $40 per year is too expensive just to be able to log how you are feeling and view historical data that has no helpful analysis or pattern recognition.
Free bits are not very helpful and paid portion is too expensive.
It’s always wrong. Telling me my stress level is low when I’m drowning in my own stress!

An excellent companion to the data Watch is already collecting, making it even more useful and accessible in realtime.  The accurate metrics and anlysis have given me actionable items to further improve my health and had made a measurable difference in the couple of weeks I have been using it already.  I wear Watch mainly in Airplane mode and this is still functional as a standalone app, which is fundamental to my use.  Thank you for developing such an important service, sincerely!

I’ve been using this app for about 10 days and it honestly INCREASES my stress level. There are so many variables that can affect HRV that are just part of living … have a heavy meal? Have a glass of wine? Have a cold? Drink a cup of coffee? You’ll get alerts. I’m aware these things have a physical impact on my body, but if I can’t eat a normal meal at a restaurant without 3 hours of being panicked by “overload” readings, there’s an issue. Plus my Apple Watch essentially allows me access to similar data. For the record, I’m active (runner, yoga, etc) and hydrated and generally careful with what I put in my body … but this had me in a constant panic … discussed issue with my physician, but testing shows I’m fine. Also, pretty overpriced given I can get most of the data free.

Well I will use the free days but the watch interface is not available for any of them. Which makes this app useless to me. I don’t need real time updates but I would like to use the watch to annotate my day. Seems like false advertising to me.

評論.標題: Useful for those who lack interoception
評論.內容: I’m an autistic adult and I have a hard time monitoring my body for signs of stress. This means that by the time I realize there’s a problem, I’m already panicking or melting down. This watch has been helping me keep track of signs of stress and I’ve found it to be pretty accurate. Correlation doesn’t equal causation but there are a lot of trends to my data that I never would have seen if I hadn’t used the app to track it. It works and I love the addition of real time tracking now, too.
Every time I’ve been actually stressed since I’ve had this app, it tells me I’m not. But when I’m relaxing it tells me I’m deeply stressed. Seems like a scam.

I have tried multiple stress monitoring apps and subscribed to the in app purchases.  Fortunately they are all great and what not.  But what drew me back to StressWatch application is the easiness of understanding how your stress is measured and the addition of more frequent notifications coming to my Apple Watch.  And most importantly is the colored face you get notified based on your stress levels.  I’ll also add that this app keeps me calm on  hard stressful days from work!!!

Once in a while I am on red and I don’t quite know why, but it makes me think whether I am hydrated, if I ate, and makes me cognizant of my emotional state. Iwill take some deep breathes and do what I need to. I think this level of awareness is the great benefit of this app and I have suggested it to several people I know.

I love the layout and the little faces and during the day it appears accurate but I would like to use it longer to see how accurate it is. I would like to know if sleep apnea affects it as I wear a cpap and im getting “overload” notifications from the middle of the night and first thing in the morning.

At first I believed whatever it showed but later on tried testing it out with my therapist. It kept telling me I was “overload” and high stress when I felt great, but kept wondering what if I was stressed and didn’t know it. Then when I was going through one of the worst most stressful moments the app notified me right then on my watch that my stress level was “great,” that’s when I realized the app was a gimmick and didn’t actually work! Don’t waste your time believing this can track your stress! In fact it’s way more stressful to get the notification that you “are stressed” then being stressed without it. Do yourself a favor and free yourself of this wasteful product, go outside, take a deep breath and go for a walk!

評論.標題: Useless on watch if you don't pay
評論.內容: I switched to istress, I can see my stress on the watch without paying.
Adding custom watch themes don’t work. complications fail to appear. This App doesn’t even show up in the Watch app.

When you are in the middle of freaking out and having a meltdown, it’s bad enough , BUT when the little face happily pops up and tells you that your stress is normal, it creates the stress of ripping off the watch, letting it learn to fly, and then finally feeling satisfaction while deleting the app. 
It looks nice, but you have a lot of work to do. You must better understand that simple statistics and graphics will not present a true picture of one’s state. Maybe some day.

I initially downloaded this app to help manage my severe anxiety attacks after being hospitalized a few months ago. I was hoping it would provide insights into my episodes since I hadn’t experienced much anxiety before my hospitalization. Despite the high ratings, my experience was disappointing. I used the free version for some time but kept running into glitches, so I was desperate enough to try the free trial. Unfortunately, it was to no avail. The data was hours behind, alerts didn’t come in real time, and it glitched frequently with my watch. After the trial was over, it glitched even more. I tried to fix and repair it, but nothing worked, and deleted the app from my watch and phone. 

I requested a refund after a day of trying, but it was unsuccessful. The most frustrating part was the lack of customer support. Despite reaching out multiple times, I received no assistance or satisfactory explanations for the issues I encountered. This was an expensive mistake, and I hope my review helps others avoid a similar error in judgment.
I never write reviews, but I felt compelled to warn others before purchasing this product. While it wasn’t the most expensive app, having something that doesn’t work as it should shouldn’t be the customer’s burden. Despite the high star rating, consider this app a fraud, even more so after my experience. As a few other people like me have had the same issue, I hope this review helps others avoid a similar mistake.

應用名稱: Motivation - 励志语录和正能量
應用描述:
無論你是正在經歷艱困時期，還是需要額外的動力才能完成任務，亦或是你喜歡在社群媒體上分享勵志名言，Motivation 都能滿足你的需求。

積極的提醒是精神成長最簡單、最強大的工具之一。這一切都是為了從一開始就把正確的思維放在首位，如此一來，在你最需要這些思維的艱困日子裡，你都可以得到激勵。

現在，在 iOS 14 中，有了「Motivation 小工具」，你甚至無須嘗試，即可思考積極的想法！只需在主畫面中安裝小工具，並在應用程式中自訂內容即可。你可以添加無數的小工具！

自訂佳句設計，與好友分享當天振奮人心的訊息，或將圖片用於 Instagram 或設為桌布。

此應用程式包含廣泛的主題，例如：自尊、人際關係及應對壓力，以及一系列精心設計的布景供你選擇，主題會經常更新。

+ 閱讀不計其數的佳句
+ 查找勵志書籍
+ 儲存或分享你的佳句
+ 設定每日勵志提醒
+ 儲存你最喜歡的佳句
+ 變更字體與色彩
+ 依據類別篩選佳句
+ 設定主畫面 Motivation 小工具

從關於健身的佳句到愛情與家庭佳句，Motivation 應有盡有！瀏覽我們依據類別排列的數千條金句：
– 更加努力工作的動力
– 愛情語錄
– 訓練與健身的動力
– 協助對抗憂鬱
– 提升你的自尊與自信
– 擺脫失戀陰影
– 人生經驗與名言
– 引自運動員與教練的運動佳句
–  商業、金錢、成功及事業
– 活在當下並銘記於心
– 引自女性與專門給女性的佳句
– 來自最優秀思想的哲學語錄
– 感恩擁有一切的佳句
– 帶來快樂的靈感
– 電影名言
– 聖經中的經文
– 還有更多！

現在有了 「Motivation 高級版」，你可以：
+ 移除廣告
+ 解鎖所有主題與類別
+ 設定背景圖片
+ 獲取無限制的提醒
+ 搜尋金句

若要瀏覽「Motivation 高級版」的內容與功能，你可以選擇終身、每月及每年自動續費訂閱。這是一項定期交易，在確認購買時，將從你的 iTunes 帳戶中收取費用，除非你在訂閱結束前至少 24 小時取消，否則系統會自動續訂。續訂費用將在當期結束前 24 小時內收取。你可以在購買後前往 iTunes 帳戶設定，管理訂閱，並關閉自動續訂功能。

隱私權政策 http://monkeytaps.net/privacypolicy.htm
使用條款 http://monkeytaps.net/termsofservice.htm

評論.標題: Horrible Quote Algorithm: DON’T USE - They are Better Apps
評論.內容:
I rarely leave anything but 5-stars. If I have an issue, I reach out to support or cancel and delete app. This has been a singularly bad experience and it seems to be the trend with some bad apps in 2025. 

I have the widget on my Lock Screen and every single quote has been horrible. They’re not even quotes. They’re 10-word lame fortune cookie quotes or quotes from love songs. 

I wanted to try it out (and a 3-day trial is way too short - shortest trial out of any app I’ve ever tried) and I asked for a reminder before they charged me the annual fee. Didn’t get it. I should’ve canceled it the minute I downloaded it and then done the free trial.

Also, their app support has NO method of actual contacting a person inside the app. There is no chat bot or contact form inside the app.
Not even 4 seconds into using this app it gave me a quote that I needed
I'm so tired of apps claiming to have a free version and a premium version, when in reality you only get it for "free" for a couple of days before they charge you. Eff off with that.

應用描述:
已有 20+ 百萬使用者熱愛 StepsApp。
StepsApp 將你的 iPhone 變成一個簡潔又美觀的計步器。
只要把手機放在口袋就可上路！
設定目標，計算步數，檢視結果。

STEPSAPP 功能有

• 自動計步
• 驚艷圖表及動畫
• 新功能：透過地圖追蹤、心率區和洞察進行鍛鍊。
• 整合 Apple Health
• 支援 Apple Watch 
• 動態卡路里
• 健身 – 使用 GPS 追蹤
• 分析
• 趨勢，總計，紀錄。
• 強大的日、周和月檢視表
• 3D 獎牌獎勵
• 可置於你的主畫面的 iOS 14 小工具
• 深色和淺色模式
• 6 種美麗顏色 – 也變更了應用程式圖示
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• 通知
• 社群媒體分享
• 支援輪椅
• 匯出資料
• 不需額外硬體

你的活動一目了然

• 快速總覽你每日步數、距離、時間、爬樓數、以及動態卡路里。
• 美麗週、月、及年度圖表。
• 在 today widget 裡直接看到你的進步。
• 在 app 圖示上顯現你當下步數或輪椅推進數。
• 通知，當你達到每日活動目標時收到通知。
• 每週報告
• 設定並達成你的目標... 一步一步來。

APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH

• 從 Apple Health 同步並匯入你的活動資料。
• 使用你的 iPhone 及 Apple Watch 追蹤活動。
• StepsApp 會自動合併你的腳步。
• 現在正在使用 Apple Watch 健身
• 在 Apple Health 中安全儲存你動態燃燒的卡路里。

為每個人而生的 STEPSAPP 

• 也可藉由 VoiceOver 使用 StepsApp。
• 除了步數外，也可藉由你的 Apple Watch 追蹤輪椅推進數。
• StepsApp 支援 20 種以上語言。

個人化＆分享

• 使用 6 種美麗顏色妝點你的圖表。
• 也變更了應用程式圖示
• 在 StepsApp 中直接於社群媒體上分享你的成就。
• … 或使用我們全新的 iMessage app！

適用於走路及跑步

StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy

* StepsApp 需運行於 iPhone 5s 或更新機種

評論.標題: Upgraded to IPhone 16, app now counts backwards after achieving goal of 10,000 steps-EDITED 1-21-25
評論.內容:
EDITED TO ADD-the support people were able to get me instructions on how to change the settings on my phone difficulties. Being retired, I didn’t realize I wrote in on the weekend which caused a delay in getting an answer. I waited a few days after fixing the problem. However when I factory reset my old phone, the App glitched again. Reset everything one more time and it has worked just fine since then. I’m back to living g the app again. No more counting my steps backwards. 

Although I’ve used this app for years and been satisfied with it, upgrading to an IPhone 16 has caused huge glitches in how it works. Out of the last 12 days since I upgraded, I’ve walked over 10,000 at least 7 of those days. I have watched the app count backward and reduce my numbers by 3000-5,0000 steps. Sometimes it happens the same day. Other times, it waits 1-2 days to reduce my numbers. Very unhappy with this app right now. I know you can do better because the app worked great for years.

應用名稱: 計步器 步行計算器 - 跑步紀錄、走路计数器、卡路里追蹤
應用描述:
可以免費使用的計步器 App！不但能記錄步數，還能計算燃燒卡路里量/距離/步行時間/時速。步數等資訊可透過圖表來確認。

「計步器」能紀錄您走的步數，並顯示步數、燃燒卡路里量、距離、步行時間和時速。

用法簡單。只要像平常一樣隨身攜帶智慧型手機即可。
當然把它放進口袋或是包包內系統也會自動持續記錄。

步數等所有資訊隨時都可以用圖表來確認。
讓我們跟著這款 App 一起快樂健走吧。

使用方法
・只要輕點步數、燃燒卡路里量、距離、步行時間、時速，該項目的資訊即會以圖表顯示。
・輕點圖表將會突顯對應的時間或日期資訊。
・若要看前一天的紀錄，請往左滑。
・若要改變外觀設定，請更換主題。
・若想正確顯示燃燒卡路里量，請輸入正確的年齡、性別、體重和步幅。
・若想正確顯示距離和時速，請輸入正確的步幅。

我們推薦這些人使用計步器
・想確認自己步數的人
・想用用看計步器的人
・想瘦身的人
・正在找保健 App 的人
・有在健走或散步的人
・有在慢跑的人
・想使用熱門計步器的人
・想在 SNS 上分享計步器畫面的人
・工作上常走路的人
・想使用容易使用的計步器的人
・想增加走路量的人
・想建立走路習慣的人
・想在計步器使用自己喜歡主題的人
・覺得帶計步器出門太麻煩想用智慧型手機代替的人

應用描述:
**Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant)**:
一整套追蹤和訓練工具，幫助您開始跑步，或只是讓您跑得更好。現在為 Garmin 使用者提供個性化的形態教練提示！

與一個擁有超過 1 億名運動員的社區共同保持靈感，大家共同致力於健康和健身。

- 被《衛報》評選為跑步者十大應用之一
- 出現在《紐約時報》，TechCrunch，Wired 和 TIME 中
- 被 About.com 的讀者評選為最佳跑步應用

無論您是剛開始您的健身旅程，還是經驗豐富的跑步者，您都會找到保持正軌和激勵自己實現目標所需的功能和工具。獲取可自定義的訓練計劃，個性化的教練提示讓跑步變得更加輕鬆，還有更多。

連接應用和可穿戴設備
- 從您的 Apple Watch 應用直接追蹤跑步，並在實時中接收視覺、觸覺和音頻進度更新。
- 通過 Bluetooth 連接專為應用和可穿戴設備設計的連接鞋，提供高級體驗、更多數據以改善您的跑步和路線追蹤。
- 與最新的應用和大多數可穿戴設備同步，包括 Apple Health、Apple Watch、Garmin 等。

追蹤和繪製您的訓練
- 記錄超過 600 種活動，擁有最大的活動選擇，包括：跑步、騎自行車、走路、健身房訓練、交叉訓練、瑜伽等。
- 獲取 GPS 跟蹤跑步的實時音頻教練，根據步速、距離和海拔等統計數據可自定義聲音。
- 連接 400 多個設備，以便在一個地方導入和分析所有數據。
- 使用路徑功能查找附近的跑步地點，保存您喜愛的路徑，添加新的並與他人分享。

像專業人士一樣訓練，享受 MVP 高級功能
- 解鎖最佳工具，將您的目標轉化為可實現的計劃，享受高級會員資格。
- 使用實時追蹤給您的親友帶來安心 — 我們的安全功能可以與受信任的家人和朋友安全共享您的實時跑步位置。
- 執行訓練計劃，實現減肥或距離目標，個性化的計劃會根據您的健身水平動態調整。
- 監控和分析心率區域，根據目標調整訓練。
- 為您的跑步設定目標，並透過音頻教練更新保持在軌道上，包括步速、踏頻、距離、時長、卡路里等。

完整的條款、條件和隱私政策可在以下網址找到：
https://outsideinc.com/privacy-policy/
https://www.outsideinc.com/terms-of-use/

最終用戶許可協議（EULA）：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

注意：在背景中持續使用 GPS 可能會顯著減少電池壽命。

Apple Health 的權限使我們能夠準確跟蹤您的心率，更新活動環，並保存您的訓練數據。

評論.標題: Great app for all your running needs
評論.內容: Had some bugs a while back like the tracking would break once a call came in (or other app opens like music) without warning. Looks like they’ve fixed it. Live the tracking feature when I’m traveling for work and trying to keep the same distance on runs.

Didn’t allow me to do the best therapy for myself, and it has been really hard and they got into a very, very, very deep holetoday for the first time I’m running again and I feel like. Metaphorically hitting the big hills and not stopping even though I was running at a very slow pace has been a time in my mental health. I do attribute the encouragement along the way to not run as I like How it announces my time and distance. It serves as a gentle internal motivator to continue to have a faster split. Thank you at my run.

評論.標題: Accurate GPS tracking with Apple Watch for runners
評論.內容: This is officially my favorite running app for my Apple watch. I used a different one for years but it started giving me problems due to new iOS versions creating glitches. I like this one because the GPS tracking is pretty accurate and is MUCH more accurate than Apple Watch’s app, Workout, which lets you believe you’re a much better runner than you really are since tracking starts to go off after you hit the half mile run. I compared about 5 Apple watch compatible GPS running apps and this was the only one that was reliable from an accuracy perspective and is user friendly. It has other advantages such as not having that awful auto pause that other apps don’t let you turn off. I like that I have to turn it on if I want it. The only small con is that the Stop button sticks and I have to hit it about 5 times for it to work each time I finish a run.
I've been participating in the "you vs the year" challenges for years and now and it's great. The leader board seems a little shady though. 25 to 40 miles a day? Shenanigans!

評論.標題: Best App for tracking your WINS
評論.內容: Absolutely love this app.  It helps me in maintaining my fitness as my activities change from running, walking, and hiking.  ESSENTIAL TO MY SUCCESS!!!
Wish it would pause if you have to stop. Otherwise I like the app

This is a good running app overall especially if you wanna do just straight out runs rather than a training program. The training program is all right too by tempo runs are inconsistent. A lot of the time the programming of a tempo run doesn’t match the description and sometimes even what it tells you during a run doesn’t match with the programming. Seems to actually be doing. I’m not quite sure if it’s possible from the user and to fix this.
Idk what you guys are doing but you broke the app. The workouts section doesn’t load. Fix it.

I have been using this app since 2011 and used to love it. When it was powered by Under Armour it worked well - it was fast with minimal glitches and I never had issues tracking runs. Since Outside has taken over, runs pause for no reason and the app glitches and freezes constantly. It takes 10 minutes to load previous runs making looking through statistics a pain. Very disappointing to see it go downhill!
Map My Run only “maps” your run occasionally.  Most of the time, when you complete your workout and save it, there is no map of your route.
The apps great, just hate running.
I love running and this app has compounded that love

I love this app.  It tracks my workout, from running to yoga, maps route, and provides time per mile.  There are other additional features that I like too, like what the weather conditions were at the time of the workout.  Plus, it syncs to my Apple Watch so my activity is logged!

I have used this app for 10 years and I have a reliable record of thousands of hikes.  I have run into a few glitches over the years, but they have been short lived.  I am glad to have it as I make good use of it every day.  Thanks!

Today the program quit working and locked up on a black screen about 3/4th the way through a hike. Frustrating that it sometimes works well and other times not so much. Specifically it would be awesome if this app did not have such a profound effect on draining the battery.

評論.標題: App pauses while on a run frequency without notifying
評論.內容: This crappy app pauses all the time while I'm on good runs making good time thus ruining my records. Doesn't notify you that hey, you may have just accidentally paused. Don't use this.
Came back to this app after many years, other apps are “cool” but have been filled with superfluous features and lost the plot.
I wish there was a one time purchase where I could stop the ad for upgrading to premium from popping up. It’s so annoying! Or if I could just turn that pop up off.

A key missing from the app is a comparison table. Most training apps have a week on week table where I can compare one session to the next and track progress over time. A graph of sorts where I can pick for example all 5k runs or marathons and compare one session to the next. It quite difficult to for example find my best 5k time for the year and compare it to my current training program. This addition will move my rating from a 3/5 to a 5/5. All the data is there, I would just like to use it in the app rather than copy it into a spreadsheet to crunch the split comparisons from week to week. I’m sure all serious athletes are also looking for a “split comparison over time” table. Thanks in advance for the consideration.
I love this app
Great app for tracking running, biking and many other things

The WORST app I’ve EVER used.  Map My Run was a great and they RUINED IT.  Incorrect tracking miles, “Edit” function completely useless, does not apply after using that option.  Customer Service is NON EXISTENT,  literally NOWHERE in the app OR their website is there ANY option for customer service.  I just deleted the app & replaced it with one that actually, you know….works.
Started my run, checked it after 15 minutes and it says resume. It hasn’t tracked any of my run. This happens all the time. I’m over it at this point.

I have used this app for years to keep an account of my daily activities: running, biking and walking. It is a great tool for tracking your goals in any event in an effort to improve my overall health! Mental and physical fitness health!
The newly updated app no longer allows to click on persona name or profile pic to view their previous work outs. Is this a bug or what?
I hope that there are plans to have a You Vs 2025 challenge even though Under Armor is no longer the sponsor.  I check that multiple times a day and it really helps me run

Not an issue previously
For the most part i love using this app.  I dont understand why it stopped working on my last trip but i will continue to use this app as long as it dont do it again.

評論.標題: Excellent - but activity ending needs work
評論.內容:
Have used this for years; love it, even though it’s annoying to learn it needs an update by it not logging an activity.

Would be great to have an option to go back and continue/resume the exercise if the ‘hold to finish’ button is accidentally held. I had my phone resting on my knee while stopped for some water and my knee managed to hold that button. I would have loved to resume instead of having to stay a new workout. Thanks!

I find my app works better when I’m doing outside activities. When I’m inside the app works a little slower. On the WiFi. The pause doesn’t work the way it should. It will not stop when I stop! And it doesn’t always start be when I start.
I have had this app since it teamed up with UA and it always worked well. Now that the UA relationship is gone everything costs even things that were always free.
I tend to log some of my workouts, and I’d love it if I could have 4-5 favorite workouts that I choose routinely sitting at the top of the workout list! That would be great!
This app has kept me running, and mapped my progress for almost 3000 flawless miles. Love everything about it.

評論.標題: Been a big fan for many years
評論.內容: It’s my go to fitness app for many years

The app works well any where.
Thanks 
I love it
What’s the word, bud.

Been using this app for months as it was a very good basic run tracker. I wanted to try out the subscription as I prepare for a 10K, and was extremely disappointed. 

The paid features are a joke. 
- Setting your run to “interval training” doesn’t actually do anything. 
- There is little customization for audio feedback/reminders, and it won’t even tell you your split pace for each interval. It only gives you your average pace for the run as you go about your intervals.
- It won’t automatically stop tracking after each interval, even though there is a setting for that. Doesn’t work.
- In the analysis section I ALWAYS have 1 or 2 “spikes” where it says I was running a 4 minute mile. Completely ruins my data, not sure why these outliers arent flagged and deleted.

Really disappointing, seems like really basic stuff that could be added quite easily. I will be unsubscribing and looking for a more serious app for my training.
This App is very accurate and easy to use. I love everything about it. A runners best resource.

應用名稱: Keep - 跑步健身骑行瑜伽，一键开动！
應用描述:
【Keep - App Store 年度精选 App】
【App Store 官方推荐的移动健身 App】
在「Keep」，和 3 亿+ 运动爱好者共同开启健康有趣的运动生活！在这个充满活力的运动兴趣社区里，你可以无拘无束的记录每一次运动时刻。分享你的运动心得，让每一个努力的瞬间都留下痕迹。

你是否遇到以下问题：
- 想在家里运动，空有热情但无从下手？
- 明明定好了跑步计划，但就是坚持不下来？
- 各种运动数据散落在不同平台，查看起来不方便？

「Keep」解决的方式：
- 根据你的健身目标、场地以及有无器械，智能生成最合适你的运动训练计划
- 热门城市跑步路线定期更新，一键搜索精彩路线、赛事活动与运动俱乐部，还可以约上好友一起跑  
- 健身、跑步、骑行、计步数据全记录，用Keep全方位了解自己运动数据

在「Keep」，你可以拥有：
【全品类运动】
直播课、跟练课、增肌、减脂、力量训练，专业教练带你科学健身；
跑步、跳绳、冥想、瑜伽课程，助你减压、缓解疲劳；
HIIT、Tabata 有氧燃脂，带你减脂、燃烧你的卡路里！
更有女性专属生理期、产后恢复训练，遇见更美的自己；

【丰富的活动】
丰富多彩活动，每日挑战赛、周赛冲榜，让你动力满满；
特色奖牌，记录你的每一份努力与坚持，参与活动，赢取丰厚奖励；
与全球健身达人一同竞技，共享赛事活动乐趣，让健身变得更有趣，更有成就感！

【多样户外路线】
城市街道、自然小径，丰富的跑步路线带来不同的跑步体验；
一键搜索附近路线，轻松开跑体验周边的美好；
多人组队跑，和好友互鼓励，感受更多跑步的乐趣；
剧情跑，跑出穿越感、跑出科技感，更有惊奇队长带你惊奇行动；

【个人数据中心】
健身、跑步、跳绳、瑜伽、骑行、计步、羽毛球、飞盘、手环、跑步机… 所有运动数据一站式记录；
时刻关注自己的运动表现，记录体重、三围等减肥/增肌数据，看到自己的蜕变！

【IP 课程内容】
汇聚众多IP达人，课程内容丰富多样！无论是初学者还是健身达人，都能找到适合自己的课程；
专业指导，科学训练，让你在轻松愉悦中享受健身的乐趣。与IP达人一同开启健身之旅！

注意事项
- 由于跑步功能具有后台语音提醒，切换至后台播报时仍会保持 GPS 连接。语音播报可以帮助用户在切换至后台时会播报速度等相关参数，但是 GPS 在后台持续运行会影响电池续航时间。
- 持续使用跑步 GPS 在后台可能会衰减您的电池寿命。

評論.標題: Does not work for phone number outside China
評論.內容: As titled

評論.標題: Asks for phone number to use
評論.內容: The app won’t function unless you hand out your phone number. I understand that in China, the government tries to collect and track every aspect of people, but it doesn’t give users from other country another choice.

評論.標題: I usually don’t give reviews like this.
評論.內容: I am a startup owner and have been trying to be fit while everything keeps me at my desk. I tried Peloton, Nike+, P90X, and many other online fitness programs and apps. I gotta say that KEEP is the only one kept me going and drove for result. I really liked the feature of assessment and customized program which last for months. Since I’m in the US, I couldn’t used any of their smart wearables. But I still enjoyed their smartness - understanding where and when I was likely to quit then gave me the push I needed. The coaches in the kickboxing program Johnason was very professional and experienced. I wish there is a more robust diet and calories database to capture everything we eat and drink. Well, it is still acceptable. I would recommend this app to all my friends. It is not expensive and it really keeps you trying. That’s all I need...keep trying.
这就是一个骗人的app，当我买了第一个月的课程之后，就开始自动续费了。第一次我觉得金额不对，我以为是自己记错了，并没有在意。当第二次自动续费之后，我才意识过来！

應用名稱: Goals 跑步與慢跑與步行紀錄
應用描述:
準備實現自己的健身目標？通過免費 GOALS 應用程序設定你最喜歡的鍛煉目標，改善健康狀況。想減肥，或者只是計算你燃燒的卡路里或是步行距離！從今天開始，跟踪你的所有健身活動，例如跑步、慢跑、騎自行車、越野行走和山地自行車！

本應用程序還針對Apple Watch 進行了全面優化。順便說一句，你還可以通過語言（Siri）來控制你的鍛煉，是不是很方便？係好鞋帶，下載應用程序並開始跟踪你的健身活動。

你的每日目標是什麼？選擇我們獨有的目標之一：
- 距離
-卡路里燃燒
- 時間長度
- 海拔
- 步數

選擇你最喜歡的活動：
- 跑步（慢跑）
- 步行
- 騎自行車
- 北歐式健走
- 山地騎行

應用程序特色及優勢：
- 使用 Siri 開始你的鍛煉（例如“使用目標-健身開始 1 英里跑步”）
- 使用目標小部件開始新的鍛煉或控制正在進行的鍛煉。
- 在鍛煉時聆聽你最喜愛的 iTunes 播放列表
- 分析你的體育活動，了解如何進一步提高你的表現
- 活動及成就的月度總結
- 創建自己的目標配置文件，使其成為你的個人訓練和鍛煉應用程序
- 分享你的健身結果，成為大眾激勵者

高級會員的專屬福利
- 訪問所有可用的目標，如燃燒的卡路里和海拔
- 真實語音教練：關於持續時間或距離的音頻反饋
- 真實語音教練：可配置參數（速度、卡路里燃燒……）
- 高級統計與分析
- 跑步訓練計劃（初學者、5000米、10,000米）
- 步行、跑步減肥訓練計劃（間歇訓練）
- 創建自己的間歇訓練 (HIIT) 和心跳率訓練
- 鍛煉期間和總結中將包括的心率和步數
- 實時圖表：在鍛煉期間查看你的表現
- 實時間隔：查看你的間隔表現
- 使用 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 進行心跳率訓練
- 心率通知，通知你何時放慢（或加快）速度 - 也適用於 Apple Watch 

APPLE WATCH功能：
- 鍛煉期間測量你的心率
- 實時查看你當前運動的詳細信息，在手腕上即可控制你的鍛煉

還在等什麼？立即下載應用程序，設定你的目標，讓健身更上一層樓！

Goals 是免費的。我們為更高級的功能提供高級升級。 1個月¥ 45.00; 1年¥ 238.00（價格可能會因地區而有所不同）。訂閱自動續訂，除非在續訂日期前至少24小時取消訂閱。這也適用於免費試用期，如果試用期到期前24小時未終止，則免費試用期將成為自動續訂一個月訂閱。

付款將在您確認購買時向您的iTunes帳戶收取。您可以在購買後在App Store設置中管理iTunes訂閱。

使用條款:
http://apptuitive.at/terms-goals-fitness-tracker

隱私政策: 
http://apptuitive.at/privacy-policy-goals-fitness-tracker.

Apple Health App：Goals 訪問心率，步數和鍛煉。

請注意：繼續使用全球定位系統，可以大大縮短電池的壽命。

應用名稱: Femometer-女性經期紀錄、備孕懷孕紀錄、排卵期計算器
應用描述:
Femometer懷孕預測管家女性經期紀錄助手是首款基於女性基礎體溫和排卵測試等數據，通過人工智能 (AI) 算法，精準量化管理女性生理期和排卵期健康的應用程式。通過準確計算月經期和排卵期，Femometer備孕懷孕紀錄女性生理期助手可以幫助備孕女性大幅提高懷孕效率，幫助準媽媽科學管理孕期和産檢日程，幫助所有女性科學預測經期，告別尷尬。Femometer女性經期紀錄-備孕懷孕助手是一款將備孕、懷孕和經期管理集於一身的女性健康管理助手，是可以陪伴女性一生的健康伴侶。

●Femometer女性經期紀錄-備孕懷孕助手俘獲女人心主要功能●

#智能基礎體溫#

- 配合Femometer基礎體溫計使用，只需每天30 秒，即可輕鬆測量基礎體溫

- 自動生成基礎體溫曲綫，卵泡期、黃體期、月經期、易孕期、排卵日一目了然

- 自動生成高溫綫，方便查看曲綫變化趨勢

- 機器學習算法優化曲綫，易讀模式看趨勢更直觀

- 自動提醒黃體功能不足、黃體期過短、多囊卵巢綜合症等多種常見婦科病症


#排卵及早早孕試紙拍照識別#

- 拍照自動智能識別排卵試紙結果，排卵期計算器

- 智能提醒排卵試紙測試時間，不錯過每一次排卵日，高效備孕

- 準確識別大衛、金秀兒、可麗藍毓婷等市面上所有主流排卵試紙，全面進入排卵測試2.0時代

- 拍照自動識別早早孕試紙結果，第一時間知曉好孕結果

- 配合Femometer智能排卵檢測器使用，更加精準計算排卵日，還可以根據促黃體生成素曲綫輔助診斷部分婦科內分泌疾病


#專家課堂#

- 定期邀請各大醫院婦産科主任專家開課，爲女性答疑解惑

- 知名醫院婦産科專家，免費網上問診醫生諮詢，助您早日好孕，高效備孕

- 多囊卵巢綜合症(PCOS)、經前期綜合症(PMS)、試管嬰兒等專題講座

- 孕前檢查、婦科炎症及疾病、孕期護理、不孕不育等專業問答


#專業知識庫#

- 孕前準備：備孕知識大全，助您科學好孕

- 孕後須知：孕早期、孕中期、孕後期，孕期各階段所需要健康百科知識應有盡有

- 生理週期：生理週期背後的科學知識，讓您更好地瞭解自己，掌握自身健康密碼


#每日記錄#

- 經期記錄：姨媽流量、血色、血塊、痛經和經前期綜合症(PMS)都可以記錄

- 日常性生活記錄：愛愛時間

- 白帶詳情記錄：基礎體溫結合白帶記錄，智能症狀體溫法(Sympto-thermal Method)讓排卵日預測更加精準

- 體重管理：BMI指數結合飲食記錄，孕期體重管理，産後减肥都可以

- 睡眠記錄管理及日常活動記錄管理

- 每日心情日記：圖文小日記，辣媽日記，每個女孩都應該有的秘密花園


#Femometer母嬰商城#

- 各種Femometer母嬰産品應有，專爲高知媽媽和其寶寶量身打造

- 通過使用Femometer懷孕管家女性生理期助手積累積分，免費兌換Femometer母嬰商城的各種産品


Femometer女性經期紀錄-備孕懷孕紀錄助手與蘋果健康應用程式兼容，您可以將您的基礎體溫和白帶數據同步到健康應用程式（需要iOS 9及以上）。

請從以下方式獲取Femometer女性經期紀錄-備孕懷孕紀錄助手相關資訊：

聯絡Femometer女性經期紀錄-備孕懷孕紀錄：help@femometer.com

評論.標題: Too many technical difficulties, but good app design
評論.內容: I love the app setup and was really excited for a Bluetooth syncing option. I ordered the Femometer ring, which within a few weeks started having issues and was not accurately taking my temp. They exchanged the ring for me, which I’m super grateful for. The second ring accurately took my temperature, but then the app was not successfully syncing AND saving my data. I realized no data saved when I went to look at my monthly chart a few weeks later and it was empty (big bummer). I ordered their Bluetooth thermometer, hoping it might work better, but ran into the same issues. It stopped working and died after 3 weeks of use. I would not recommend Femometer, as there are too many technical issues, and I couldn’t track my temperatures and cycle effectively.

Update: Customer service/devs were so helpful and fixed my issue. Thank you!!! Been using my vinca 2 for over 3 years and love it and this app Feel like I’m experiencing a bug from the last update where it logged the wrong period start date and won’t let me change it. I’ve tried deleting and re downloading the app, ‘edit period’ from different screens. No luck 😕

I have a smart ring which has had multiple issues pairing and connecting with the app, meaning my data is lost and I am not able to use the ring as intended. Customer support gives the same advice over and over which doesn’t work. 
There is a community site called Tribe that is built into the app - you can’t opt out of it and it has little red notification dots to draw your attention to it, so if you’re like me and can’t stand the little notifications you are forced to use this site. Some may appreciate and want the community features but others like me find the anxieties and concerns and stories of miscarriage and such that abound on these pages overwhelming and stressful to the TTC process. Please please please make this Tribe site available but with the ability to opt out (or better yet, opt in). 
The tracking options and information is useful but you can get that other places that have better technology and don’t force you into a community you don’t want to be a part of.

應用名稱: MyFitnessPal 的卡路里計算機和膳食追蹤工具
應用描述:
使用 MyFitnessPal 追蹤您的營養、體適能、減肥和飲水目標進度。這款綜合飲食追蹤和健康應用程式就像一個可以始終隨身攜帶的營養導師、間歇性斷食追蹤器、飲食規劃器、和飲食日記。

MyFitnessPal 並非另一款節食應用程式。這款健康應用程式可以幫助您了解各項習慣，洞悉您的飲食，協助做出更明智的飲食選擇，尋找動機和支援，然後實現您的健康目標。

馬上下載並開始免費試用 Premium 30 天、獲取獨家飲食追蹤、間歇性斷食計時器、和健康記錄工具。您很快就會發現 MyFitnessPal 為何成為全球首屈一指的飲食和營養追蹤應用程式。

各項功能遠超卡路里追蹤應用程式和飲食日記

感覺就像在身邊隨身攜帶一名營養師、私人教練和營養導師。

■ 記錄飲食 – 各種易於使用的工具讓飲食追蹤更輕鬆、更簡單
■ 追蹤斷食 – 安排您的斷食期間並追蹤進展
■ 追蹤活動 – 利用體適能追蹤工具添加健身活動與步數
■ 自訂目標 – 減肥、增肥、維持體重、營養與體適能目標
■ 查看進度 – 總體追蹤或詳細分析營養和卡路里
■ 聯繫社群 – 在活躍的討論區尋找朋友與動力

功能與優勢詳細介紹

透過飲食記錄獲取有價值的分析資訊
發現哪些食物能夠以最佳方式為您提供能量。這並非單純的節食應用程式、減肥卡路里計數器或者更快的減肥方法，而是讓您對自己負責，並了解每天攝入的食物。 

■ 最大的食物資料庫之一–可追蹤超過 1,400 萬種食物（包括餐廳菜式）的卡路里
■ 新的間歇性斷食追蹤器–安排您的斷食時間並以日記記錄進展
■ 快速和簡單的食物追蹤工具–輸入以搜索，從歷史記錄中添加食物，或使用手機攝像頭掃描條碼
■ 卡路里追蹤工具–自動計算卡路里，並見證自己每天的進步
■ 宏觀追蹤–按克數或百分比洞悉各種碳水化合物、脂肪和蛋白質的詳細資訊，無需獨立的碳水化合物追蹤器或生酮飲食應用程式！
■ 營養追蹤和洞察力–分析營養攝入並設定具體的目標：宏觀目標、膽固醇、鈉、纖維和更多其他目標


自訂您的應用程式體驗
選擇各種設定來幫助您實現目標。

■ 自訂目標–按餐膳或按日子追蹤卡路里，設立宏觀目標和更多內容
■ 個人化儀錶板–選擇您希望總覽查看的統計資料
■ 蛋白質計數器–設定蛋白質目標，並記錄您每天攝入的蛋白質數量
■ 添加自己的食物/膳食追蹤–保存食譜和膳食，以進行快速記錄
■ 連接 50 多個應用程式與裝置–從體適能追蹤應用程式到智慧手錶應用程式
■ 透過可穿戴作業系統進行追蹤–在您的錶盤上顯示卡路里追蹤器、飲水追蹤器和宏觀追蹤器。


訂閱價格與條款

MyFitnessPal 可供免費下載和使用。如果升級到 MyFitnessPal Premium，我們可提供每月和每年自動續期的訂閱服務。

在確認購買後，將透過您的 iTunes 帳戶從您的信用卡扣除付款。除非在購買後，您在 iTunes 帳戶設定中關閉自動更新，或者在訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時取消訂閱，否則，訂閱會自動續期。

檢視我們的條款與條件和隱私政策的完整版本：https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

評論.標題: I think the separation between free and paid is slightly off
評論.內容:
The app is incredibly efficient and useful, if you use it for its intent, so immediately 4 stars. However, my main gripe is the difference between the paid and free subscription; namely the use of scanning or not. 

There is no difference in the foods you have access to in the MFP database, the only difference is whether or not you can scan it when you’re trying to find it and that’s incredibly annoying. I don’t want to use it for macros, other diets, intermittent, etc, but I fully believe that access to a dietary plan should obviously be an additional charge. The fact that I can’t scan unless I pay $80/year - but can still manually type every food - just seems like you’re charging for convenience rather than any actual program. 

That’s it though. It’s a great tool regardless, but even if you added a like….$15/yr charge option to scan that would be nice.

應用名稱: ShutEye - 夢話鼾聲錄音睡眠監測小助手
應用描述:
一晚好眠並非唾手可得，而良好的睡眠對精神狀態非常重要。你是否經常受失眠、睡眠品質差的困擾？每日的壓力、工作學習的焦慮是否讓你在夜裡輾轉反側、無法放鬆？ ShutEye將幫助你解決這些睡眠問題！

ShutEye作為一款睡眠健康應用，將引導你以一種放鬆且自然的方式安然入睡，記錄你每夜的睡眠質量，並培養你健康的睡眠習慣。

ShutEye具備了豐富多樣的助眠工具，幫助你快速入睡並且睡得安穩：你可以使用白噪音功能營造完美的助眠氛圍；或者被智能鬧鐘輕柔的喚醒；又或是你在起床之後查看睡眠分析的結果，從而提供針對性的睡眠建議。在睡眠專家精心製作或是你自行混音的環境聲中，你將安然入睡，為即將到來的明天恢復精力。

功能特性：
· 助眠音樂：幫助你在漫長而充滿壓力的一天后，能夠充分的放鬆身心
· 混音功能：七十餘種混音可任你組合，創造屬於你自己的助睡聲音
· 睡眠分析：幫助你從科學的角度了解你的睡眠週期和睡眠狀況
· 智能鬧鐘：自定義鬧鈴及視頻，於晨間將你輕柔的喚醒
· 鼾聲探測：讓你了解夜間打鼾的情況
· 夢話記錄：精準的記錄你昨夜的夢話內容，與朋友分享有趣的夢
· 桌面小組件：將ShutEye組件放置在你的桌面，一鍵開始睡眠追踪吧

適用於以下人群：
· 經常失眠或者睡眠質量差（入睡難、經常做噩夢、睡眠很淺）的人
· 喜歡冥想或想嘗試冥想的人
· 壓力大、經常焦慮的上班族
· 容易被環境噪音影響的人
· 因考試、課業壓力大的學生族
· 想提高自己的睡眠效率的人
· 想記錄自己夢話以及呼嚕聲的人
· 需要照顧寶寶的寶媽寶爸們
· 工作學習時需要聽放鬆音樂的人

特別支持：
- 支持iOS 14小組件
- 已接入HealthKit，支持將睡眠數據同步至健康應用（打開ShutEye App中“我的-系統設置-Apple健康“開關，並同意ShutEye寫入數據即可）

從現在開始，你無需繼續忍受長久以來的失眠和倦乏。讓ShutEye幫助您平靜身心，安然地入睡，然後精力十足地醒來。今晚就試試ShutEye吧！

訂閱信息：
ShutEye提供每年HK$473/NT$1990的年訂閱方案（自動續費），期限內您可以無限量地使用應用內所有的VIP功能。確認購買後，蘋果商店將從您的iTunes賬戶內收取費用。您可以在您蘋果商店內的‘賬戶管理’管理或取消您的訂閱。您的賬號會自動續訂，除非您在當期訂閱結束24小時前關掉自動續訂。距離當期訂閱結束24小時內，蘋果商店將向您收取下一期訂閱的費用。當您取消訂閱時，當期的訂閱不會被取消。自動續費會停止，但您當期的訂閱不會退費。所有未使用的免費試用時長將在任意訂閱發生時作廢。

電子郵件：contact.sleep@enerjoy.life
隱私政策：https://enerjoy.life/privacy-policy
服務條款：https://enerjoy.life/terms-of-use
iOS應用程式支援：www.enerjoy.life/contact-us/

評論.內容: I take great care not to disturb anyone in the house most of all my wife when I get up. I typically wake up 1-4 hours before she does and when she wakes up she has great difficulty falling back to sleep. I snore and I thought this app could help me begin tracking the problems I’m having to help reduce the snoring and enhance my sleep quality. I worked the app into my sleep routine effortlessly. I always have a silent alarm on my watch that only I can feel to allow me to wake up soundlessly. But to my shock at 5AM my phone starts blaring music through this app. I had my phone on silent and the volume all the way down. No warning from the app end that there would be an audible alarm playing at the wake up time. An alarm I didn’t ask for because I already have one. A SILENT one. Doubtless this app works great when all the data is collected and you use it properly. But absolutely not for those wishing to keep peace at the wee hours of the morn.
Waste of money…

評論.內容: Hello to the developers of this app, I tried the free trial and did not liked it and completely forgot about the app, missed it by 1 day and I was charged basically 60$ I really did not liked the app please give me my money back.

I am struggling with insomnia so I’m trying various sleep apps to see which one I like best. 

Shut Eye data is way off the other apps and not even in a consistent way.  Most of the time it reports that I slept 2 to 5 hours less than other apps (and my own guess) but occasionally it overestimates time slept. 

I tried ShutEye because of the 7 day free period.  Shut Eye charged me on the 6th day for the full year. I tried getting a refund but no go.

I was within my 7 day free trial and wanted to cancel.  They have no place on the app to cancel so I found their email by reading their long terms and conditions page and emailed them to cancel.  They never replied and I have emailed 2 more times.  Of course they charged my card the $50 for 6 months so now I have to dispute it.  They obviously intentionally make it impossible to cancel your "free" trial.  Scam company

應用名稱: Grow - 你的健康貼心好夥伴
應用描述:
# App Store 編輯推薦
# 173 個國家和地區專題推薦
# 90,000+ 全球五星評價
# 精選 iOS 18 & watchOS 11 Apps

Grow 是你的 Apple Watch 健康與運動貼心好夥伴，輕鬆跟蹤你的步數、睡眠、HRV 壓力、運動、飲水、冥想、曬太陽時間等，通過溫和的挑戰激勵你達成運動目標，並衡量每日身體指標，幫助你更好地瞭解身體狀況，從而實現健康生活好狀態。

---

► 達成完美一天
實現當天目標，即可獲取「金色小太陽」完美一天獎勵。
自定義難度模式：自律還是溫和，看你自己。
周目標模式：設定了周目標的習慣，本週提前完成後，剩下日子裏就不必強求，會自動跳過。

► 加入健康挑戰
與全球用戶一起加入各類健康挑戰，每個月贏取精美的數字徽章。

► 衡量 HRV 壓力和身體指標
元氣滿滿，還是注意壓力，跟隨 HRV 壓力指數，傾聽身體的聲音。
睡得好，還是睡得差，昨晚生命體徵監測你的各項身體指標是否正常。

► 豐富的小工具
各類健康運動習慣小工具，都能完美搭配你的主屏、鎖屏、待機模式、控制中心。
豐富的聯名壓力主題和錶盤小工具：HRV 壓力、昨晚生命體徵，小黃鴨喝水等等。

► 同步和分享運動記錄
自動同步 Apple Watch 健身運動記錄，並支持自定義分享。

► 跳過今天
跳過今天，休息一下，它不會打斷你當前的連續達成記錄和影響你的「完美一天」計劃。
自定義跳過標籤：下雨了 | 太熱了 | 生病了| 加班 | 假期 | 休息日 | 生理期 | 太累了。

► 隱私與安全
我們知道您的個人健康數據特別敏感。Grow 通過 Apple HealthKit 只在你的設備上直接讀取和寫入數據，你的所有數據只存儲於本地，或者其他你主動開啓 iCloud 同步服務的設備之中。

---

► Grow 高階會員自動訂閱說明
成為 Grow 高階會員，你可以解鎖所有 Grow 付費功能，享受未來高階功能的免費更新，以及承諾沒有廣告。

確認購買並支付後，將透過您的 iTunes 賬號自動續訂。蘋果 iTunes 賬戶會在到期前24小時內扣費，扣費成功後訂閱週期順延一個訂閱週期。如需取消續訂，請在當前訂閱週期到期前24小時以前，手動在 iTunes/AppleID 設定管理中關閉自動續費功能。試用期內，iTunes 賬戶如不取消訂閱，則會在試用期結束時自動開通訂閱並扣款，未使用的試用時長在購買訂閱之後將會自動作廢。本服務由您自主選擇是否取消，若您選擇不取消，將為您開通下一個計費週期的續費服務。

使用者協議：https://floatingislandapps.com/terms-of-service
隱私協議：https://floatingislandapps.com/privacy-policy

The icing on the cake is, after declining your “gift”, I get asked for a review. Haha, so here’s your review as requested. 1 star. Is that a better gift for you? 評論.標題: My sleeping schedule is not working
評論.內容: I used to have this app, but I got a new phone and didn’t have it for a while. When I checked my sleeping schedule, it always showed zero. I remember putting it in sleep mode, but it still showed zero. I found out that I put my sleeping schedule on my old phone, so I changed it to my new phone, but it still didn’t work. I put it in automatically and it didn’t work. Can you please help me? I really want to see how much I sleep.
So glad I found this app. Gives great feedback on the progress towards your fitness goals, water consumption and calories burned. Highly recommend.

The user interface of this app is fantastic, and I love that I can integrate fitness and mindfulness into my “perfect day” score. The *only* thing missing from this app for me is a recovery/readiness score. If it had that, I’d recommend this over Athlytic easily.

The app has so many cool features that I like to keep on my day to day. Great UI, looks good and runs well on all my devices and helps me keep an eye on the things that matter to me without nagging me to compete with more serious athletes. Once upon a time, there was a fitness app that seemed almost too good to be true. Imagine the ideal workout companion: a powerful tool that was fully customizable, beginner-friendly, and so simple that even the least tech-savvy could navigate it with ease. It was the app for everyone, designed with care and attention, and it built a reputation to match. In the days of free access, users everywhere celebrated its 4.9-star rating as more than deserved.

Yes, there were ads—but they were only brief interruptions after a workout, a small price to pay for something so extraordinary and free. And in return, we had everything we could ever want: effective workouts, guidance for every level, a seamless experience, and no strings attached. It felt like the developers had put users first, as though they truly cared about our journey to better health.

Then, seemingly overnight, everything changed. The developers took this beloved app and slapped a price tag on it, demanding subscriptions for the same features that were once free. No added perks, no extra benefits—just the same app at a monthly cost, as if our loyalty and positive reviews suddenly meant nothing. The joy of using it has faded, leaving only the bitterness of feeling exploited.

It’s heartbreaking to see something so perfect turn into just another cash grab. What was once a remarkable tool is now a reminder that, in the end, we were only customers.

This went form an actually useable a helpful app that I recommended to people for years, to an usable trash app, in what universe does it make sense to take a system that works and scales nicely to jumping too a time based system? For example: what use is doing leg raises for 50 seconds helpful if you struggle to do eight of them? Or maybe you struggle with T planks, you go form having to do 3 or 4 reps each side to 16+ seconds? I can understand the desire to enforce strict form, and maybe that’s what they were attempting with the timer? But its poorly implemented and poorly thought out. This was one of my go to apps, and now it’s just another trash bin app to be deleted and forgotten about. Wouldn’t recommend this to anyone who’s actually trying to improve their fitness, wouldn’t recommend it to anyone trying to maintain their fitness, and wouldn’t recommend it to anyone who just wants to download an app to look like they’re working out. Would rate lower if possible, the last update neutered it 0/10.

評論.標題: How to delete baby on the list?
評論.內容: We had early miscarriage so I made it stop counting but how to delete it?

初産だったので不安な中このアプリはすごく頼りになりました。
周期毎にインナートラブルや赤ちゃんの変化のアドバイスがありそれがピッタリ周期と合っていました。症状にはどんな理由があるかなど勉強になる事も多く不安が緩和されたのとアドバイスにより安心できた事を覚えています。
これから出産する方にはぜひおすすめしたいです。
我非常喜歡這個app，但是當我換寶寶時會卡住然後黑頻，希望可以改進

評論.標題: Love this very detailed and considerate app
評論.內容: I love this app. I can share the just necessary info with anyone I want. I love the all the details and very gentle and thorough comments and advice. I feel that the app is taking care of me better than my midwife. I hope that they will put the daily message in English as well. I love the small comments that they give me everyday in Japanese.

We just got our finished book and I couldn’t love it more! ❤️👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼This app made it super easy to update and track our pregnancy journey from start to finish. The images supplied are adorable! You, Dad, and anyone else you choose can make journal entries and add photos/screenshots/emojis. You can also track mom’s health and symptoms optionally. The final product is an adorable diary of your pregnancy conception to birth. Do not be discouraged at check out that the dollar amount is listed in Japanese currency, this book is not expensive - just look up a currency calculator to figure out your total. Also, there are options for regular or deluxe. I just can’t say enough about how much we love our book. My only regret is I didn’t know about this with my other children! It’s adorable!

評論.標題: Cannot see mom weight despite setting set
評論.內容: Other app did a better job than this app, quite useless and full of ads
Babyのページの左右に矢印をつけて簡単に前日/翌日に移動できると便利
妊娠がわかってからトツキトオカを使い始めて今日1歳になりました。妊娠中から1歳になるまで毎日優しいメッセージをくださって、挫けそうな時にとても励まされてここまでやってきました。トツキトオカ、ママパパに寄り添ってくれて本当にありがとう。

評論.標題: Yea, I know it's a good app but
評論.內容: It would be nice if the baby's skin tone was more diverse when setting the baby's information.

I want an app I can use with my partner but his app keeps saying, “your partner has not registered your baby. Please wait.” even though I did and I updated multiple days in the diary that he got notifications for. Only thing is he can’t see anything on his app or do anything. Everything gives that same message. How do we fix it?

fun to learn some facts throughout a pregnancy if you can stand the assumption that you’re a straight cis married couple. but the number of times the “fact” has just been “don’t gain too much weight!” is just way too many. i had issues with not gaining Enough weight earlier in my pregnancy, i don’t need an app telling me not to eat or to exercise more, especially as someone with a history of disordered eating. not to mention the only art options are pale skin with light hair or dark hair lol. overall, very much for a specific kind of person that isn’t me.
可以下载A PP，但是打不开用不了，坐标国内

評論.標題: Great but wish it was more inclusive
評論.內容: My wife and I are expecting and this is a great way to do a baby book. The only thing I wish for is that there was a choice to change gender for other partner. Otherwise it’s a great app.

7歳になる娘を妊娠した時初めてこのアプリを使い始めました。
この度第3子を授かりいくつかアプリをインストールしましたが、
やっぱりトツキトオカが一番ママのために考えられて作られているアプリだと感じています。
初産の時は何もかもが初めてで、色々な事が心配で必要以上に情報を集め過ぎてしまうお母さん方も居ると思います。
今はインターネットで何でも簡単に情報にアクセス出来ますが、一番大切なのはお母さんがゆったりした気持ちで安心して過ごせる事です。
必要な情報だけをちゃんと与えてくれ、十分フォローしてくれるアプリ。
毎回動いて成長を目の当たりにしてくれる、お腹の赤ちゃんのイラストやコメントも可愛らしくて癒されます。
男女育児に奮闘中、流産も経験した私が太鼓判を押してオススメします！
サポートして頂けている事、心から感謝申し上げます、ありがとうございます。

余談ですが、「パパへのアドバイス」みたいに、世に言うイクメンに急には変われません。w
が、何でも良いから、嫌そうでも何かひとつでも協力してくれたら、例えドヤ顔をしていても！旦那さんをいっぱい褒めてあげて下さい。

評論.標題: Pregnancy is not just for moms
評論.內容: We just started using this a week ago, and we love it so much!! I was so eager to find an app that not only tailored to me, but for dad as well. For us, dad is a HUGE part of the process and he wanted to be involved as much as possible! This helps us share the moments together, gives him tips and advice, gives us knowledge to know what’s going on, and we LOVE that we can journal together through this experience! We definitely plan on making our book once we are done. This app, by far, the best pregnancy app!
It’s very helpful for us to understand and prepare for every stage. Also very convenient to keep track.

評論.標題: The only baby skin color option is white.
評論.內容: As a woman of color I would like to be able to see the illustration of my baby in a color that would represent him. Could you please update and allow more skin colors?

The layout is a bit messy and difficult to navigate. It’s a Japanese app and the English translations are a bit off. There’s no option to switch from metric to imperial. If you want to track weight in pounds, you don’t have the option. If you're a Japanese speaker who uses the metric system, you’ll probably get more from this app.

All this said, I love this idea! I haven’t found any other app that enables you to make a book based on your pregnancy rather than following the baby’s life. These are things I would love to share with my future child in addition to their milestones and photos outside of the womb.

I think it’d be cool if it utilized a bit of Qeepsake’s features, where we get guided questions pertinent  to our pregnancy texted and emailed to us.
Just would like some color for my baby...

This app needs to introduce itself in manor that it supports single moms, single dads and parents that are still together. Instead of just assuming that both parents are still in the child’s life or still dating each other. It lacks the option for just mommy or just daddy. I’m a single mom so it upsets me that I can’t even have an app to track my pregnancy that doesn’t remind me every time I open it that the father to my unborn daughter walked out. App creatures need to start considering certain things.

The app is slow and gets hang often while I type my journal and then I have to start over again. I am not able to change the baby's name and to select a gender now that we have found it. The app needs a lot of improvement in that part. Otherwise, great app with nice features of writing logs and cartoons 😄

If this App worked properly it would be great but I’m not convinced but I’m not going to lose everything! It crashes at least 3/5 times I open it, usually before I type anything, tonight after I typed an entire diary entry!

I have used this app for my whole pregnancy I am due any day now.. so far it’s amazing it’s really easy to use, the animations are adorable, it works great for both my partner and I to update send cards back and forth, and the printed book looks positive.
Love this, helps me keep on track as well as useful information for each week in pregnancy. Would highly recommend! 👍👍👍👍👍
I used it every single day and will use again for my second pregnancy:) loved it!!!
It’s a good app for any information, but it would be great if it can use without internet

I can keep track of how many weeks
And records my feelings/ symptoms everyday. It also shows expectations of baby on each week.
Good apps, provide good advice
App doesn’t work. I kept trying to enter my information and kept sending me to adds for breast pumps and stuff. After 10 mins of trying to figure it out I gave up and deleted.

Only app I’ve found that actually works for twins. But it needs to give option in settings to use lbs vs Kg and inches vs cm! This is a big down fall for me. I don’t want to have to convert everything every time I need to input something or know something.
Great for dads and great for parents to be of twins. It’s missing a conversation place where mothers to be could talk to each other, get advice or ask things
I love to see how an image of my baby changes frequently! Adorable💕

評論.標題: How do you add new baby!
評論.內容: How do add a new baby?!
This APP is really useful! We can understand how is the baby grouping week by week!
It helps u to know what is going on with your baby and what to expect during the coming weeks with your body especially for first time mom like me... absolutely great app! 👍🏻

This app and its information helps to build a strong bong between Dad,Mom and Baby.

The adorable characters will met your heart and get you prepped for pregnancy.

I love this app!! It makes the countdown fun. I use it every day. It really makes me feel like my baby is talking to me from my stomach lol. They also have a lot of information to learn about the baby’s development.

It starts as most pregnancy apps do where you enter some information. It asks baby’s name and due date. Truth is most of us aren’t sure of that info when we first find out we’re expecting. I’ve used other apps where you can enter your LMP and it will calculate a due date for you. I don’t see that option here and if it is here it’s hard to find. So from the start I wasn’t impressed. There are better pregnancy apps out there. Skip it.
Thanks for this app everyday! It’s so helpful❤️
This app is awesome I’m able to keep track how much I gained and I’m able to write things down. This is an amazing app I love it. My kids love the little pictures of the baby
No comment! This is really nice! :-)

My wife and I really love this app. Everyday we  monitored the progress of our new first baby..very reliable app.

Thumbs up to the team/developers of this App !! 👍👍👍👶🏻👶🏻👶🏻

One of the best App to monitor the progress of your baby inside womb! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👶🏻👶🏻👶🏻
I’m a father-to-be and really learning a lot through this app. The art is also incredibly cute with adorable messages that encourage me to be a better husband and father. Keep up the great work!
Its so cute app. The most i love when we tap the circle its like the baby talk to us. For further enhancement maybe you can add baby heartbeat sound
It’s fun to open app everyday. Illustration is cute.

As a dad to be, I just love this app. I probably wouldn’t know nearly as much about each stage of our baby’s development without 280 days. It’s well designed and interesting like every great app should be. I honestly check it every day and sometimes it even brings me close to tears with its poignant advice. 5 stars.

評論.標題: ONLY for mom DAD NOT WELCOME
評論.內容: the interface is okay. the feature look great. but what in a world is that link feature just for read only even you are the dad of the baby. all info are not allow to edit if you are the dad that link to the baby that created by the mom. all i can do is send some useless gift card and write daily log? i cant even add or edit the baby info or hospital info. i ended up uninstall this app and use other app that are daddy friendly.
Cannot link between an adroid phone and an iphone.

評論.標題: Easy to use very helpful app
評論.內容: Sweet words and status pictures. It is easy to use and highly recommended!
Its great for keeping track. The cartoons are an extra plus!! Love it! Me and my husband look forward to each week as the baby changes and the facts/advice changes.

應用描述:
為進一步給更多使用者帶來更全面、更專業的健康管理體驗，「Amazfit」 App將於2020年8月25日起正式更名為「Zepp」App， 並同步更新軟體圖示。您所持有的Amazfit產品依然能與升級更名後的Zepp App關聯使用，現有功能將不會受到影響。

Zepp 將致力於打造一個專業的個人數字化健康管理平台， 並為全球使用者提供數字化健康管理解決方案。

透過對日常生活全場景的連接 ，依託領先的數據分析能力和 AI 算法體系，Zepp 可以成為每個人的隨身健康管家：幫助使用者輕鬆瞭解身體變化，記錄日常運動狀態，更能透過對各項生理指徵的全面、實時的 AI 分析，及時提供健康預警和專業指導，實現對健康的深度掌控。

Zepp 相信，如果可以更好地借助科技管理生命進程，那麼每一個人都可以有幸福美滿的人生。「智慧隨心，健康隨行」，追尋美好生活的路上，Zepp始終與你相伴。



Zepp App的主要功能有：

健康資料顯示：記錄身體狀態資料，並可以隨時查看專業解讀
運動資料分析：支援記錄運動後的資料展示，可以查看詳細軌跡及各種運動資料的指標分析
智慧設備管理助手：提供Zepp與Amazfit品牌智慧設備的管理設置功能：通知管理、錶盤更換、小部件排序等
如對Zepp App有任何意見或建議，可在應用中提交意見回饋，我們會認真對待每一條回饋，與您進行真誠的溝通。

溫馨提示：

- 本應用支援 Apple「健康」應用，授權後可以將你的步數、睡眠、心率等健康資料同步到「健康」應用。
- 持續運行 GPS 在後臺可能會降低你的電池續航時間。
- 應用中的測量數據不適用於任何醫療用途（包括自我診斷或諮詢醫生），僅用於一般的健康和健身目的。

Please provide the readiness as you portray in the recent update for everyone. It is over a weeks since the update and yet no readiness tab is showing up.
Was the best watch/app but now since the last update the app just keeps crashing.  If I connect to one of my Android phones it has no issues. Only on iPhone am I experiencing this.
This app is horrible anyone saying it isn’t is paid by Zepp. It doesn’t load, doesn’t refresh, doesn’t sync. It’s a useless app and the watch that uses it is going back to the store.
Super brutal

The watch functions just fine for step tracking, workout tracking, and basic functions. 

The app is not great. The sleep reminders are condescending and unhelpful. There’s no way to delete it, and I’ll be switching brands because of this. Additionally, the Bluetooth refuses to sync for messaging (and I’ve read other reviews who have this same issue).

LOVE IT!!!

評論.內容: crashes. can’t use app since this update.

Watch is ok but can’t use Alexa app that was already on the phone as a selling point.

It links ALL calendars on my phone to the app, meaning my family calender, three work calendars, personal calender, and US holiday calendars for all three sync to my watch.

Debería ser más práctico al menos el acceso a el comienzo del ejercicio y al terminar. Hay que andar buscando las cosas. Debería ser más práctico el acceso al menos esa parte
Really good my daughter loves it

評論.標題: I DON’T NEED YOUR INSIGHT!!! Sheesh!🤬
評論.內容:
I HATE EGGS WITHOUT SAUSAGE AND CHEESE!!!

I HATE WAKING UP TO YOUR INSIGHTS ABOUT MY HEART BEATING TOO SLOW THOUGH I WAS SLEEPING PEACEFULLY!!!

THE PREVIOUS DAYS, I WAS TRYING TO RECOVER FROM MY SICKNESSES!!!

I HATE HAVING THE WATCH LIGHT TOO BRIGHT THAT THIS DISTURBS MY SLEEP PATTERNS!!!

AND I HAD YOU MUTED!!!

NEXT TIME THAT I BUY A WATCH, GO WITH ONE THAT ADJUSTS THE BRIGHTNESS SO THAT IT DOES NOT DISTURB MY SLEEP PATTERNS AND SETS NOTIFICATIONS TO “DO NOT DISTURB” AT NIGHT!!!

YOU WOKE ME UP ON 
THE WRONG SIDE OF 
THE BED!!!

Now, I Hate Your App!
I DON’T WANT YOUR WATCH ANYMORE!!!

評論.內容:
Ever since the app update, when I try swiping to the right or to the left nothing happens
I only can swipe up and down to info
It also will not let me make changes to preferences 
Please fix the app
Talk about breaking something that was working ok before. Hate the updated interface. What happened to recording naps also?  Dump this mess and go back or I’m looking for something else.

The latest update to the app (sometime in 2024) took an app that was great and made it frustrating at best.  It used to be easy to move around, view, and compare your data from day to day.  Not anymore.  Data is scattered all over the place and to compare different days of the same data requires you to keep going back and forth between screens.  I can only hope they get enough complaints to revert to the old app.
watch is ok but they need to get rid of the juvenile faces and make the info larger and easier to read

All of a sudden I’m taking frequent naps. Even today, vegged out watching football and it was recorded as a nap. Friday night me and spouse watched a movie, app recorded it as an early bedtime. Even while at work if I’m sitting for a bit it gets recorded as a nap. Any idea how to change the sensitivity?

The watch needed recharging every day for 1 week and today it stopped working. 
I wrote to Amzfit support but NO response 
Please don’t but this watch

With this new app layout, you've made my T-Rex 2 almost entirely useless to me, except as a simple watch. Most of the monitoring systems are too wordy, and I dont want to be lectured on my sleep needs when all I want is a simple line graph showing REM and light sleep levels.
Quentin has been addicted to zepp and is ALWAYS checking his heartbeat for NO reason at all he is 12

評論.標題: Just one year till to update the Zepp app software
評論.內容:
Today goodbye amazfit7 and zepp app which are not working together since updated Zepp application. I can’t follow my heartbeat during exercises, even the number of exercises decreased the choices 4 (running, walking, treadmill and cycling) … so there is no functioning, just after the company updating the Zepp App.
Goodbye amazfit and zepp. Never ever come back amazfit again.
They updated the app in November I believe and it stinks! I miss the old app!
Great app! However, they are missing certain activities on the watch like tennis. Great battery life!

My experience with Amazfit watches has been largely positive. Currently using this app with the Cheetah Pro, and it’s been good at sleep and activity tracking. And notifications are nice as well since you can fine tune what comes through to the watch. 

The calendar function is terrible; it doesn’t allow you to select certain calendars, and you can’t disable notifications if you allow the app access to your device calendars. The weather app/complication is also not so great because it doesn’t update very fast, and it shows the sun out at all times of day and night (why not show the moon and stars during the night?).

I have had this app for years now, because of the watches.  I decided to try the Aura premium features recently because I’ve been having a hard time sleeping.  There was a deal last month with a 40% discount following a 2-week trial.  I signed up, and after the trial, premium features stopped working despite my subscription saying it’s not up until November 2025.  App support page doesn’t load.  I’ve already updated and tried logging out and in again.  I’ve now been up all night unable to sleep because something that WAS starting to help me now was abruptly stopped.
Screen on sign up freezes and I am unable to create account!
When I was setting up a lock on my amazfit band 5, the screen froze!
My watch will take multiple tries to sync the workouts.

The first time I saw the newly updated Zepp I hated it, even deleted it from my phone. I like things I’m familiar with and resist change, but after a week or two I loaded Zepp back on my phone. Now I really like the changes - like the way it runs in the background making it easy to see my stuff immediately. Good job Zepp!

It is an amazing app which fully support hardware with most of the useful watch features commonly found in sport smart watches. I find almost a steal the way that some Garmin watches are over 1000$ but the Amazfit T-Rex 3 is able to compete in some aspects and only for a third of that price. The app itself great in having the analytics very easily access to find.

評論.評論者: Guy who used to love this app
評論.內容: I enjoyed this app and my watch for last year and now the new format makes my workout information less informative way harder to understand and less accessible. I’d very much like the old format back as far as workouts go. The sleep info is also more tedious to review and I don’t understand the changes. It feels like it’s been made less convenient and more cumbersome. Please developers I ask you kindly and without malice to change it back or at least make it easier to use and access the information like it was before.
Unless I open the app it won’t sync my watch.  It won’t update the weather, steps or anything unless I open the app.  It worked fine for android but not on the iPhone.
Not sure what happened..watch won’t work anymore. As soon as I took it off the charger it died. Tried factory reset and nothing.

評論.標題: Absolutely do not like new format
評論.內容: The format before late November 2023 was easy to read and understand. I think format gives less information for free. Can’t find out how to talk to customer service.

You can only add music through your phone. You can’t manage you music library through it. Tedious to do through the watch. Also very difficult to understand the process. 

Workout feature is also strange, you need to start an exercise for it to record properly. Wish it would alert remind you to start or have an auto detect feature if heartbeat was fast enough.

Would honestly rather control my watch through a desktop application then phone app. Don’t like that I need a phone app to start watch.
I think there shd be better directions on how to use this watch

應用描述:
Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。  隨時隨地都能將音訊、影片、照片、筆記等安全地儲存下來。

「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》

「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創數位日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記應用程式。

簡單好用，讓人著迷
• 獲獎設計，美觀大方
• 無限文本條目
• 強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown
• 記錄生活點滴的全新方式*

私密又安全
• 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目
• 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密
• 透過密碼、TouchID 或 FaceID 保障日記條目安全
• 提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有

養成並保持習慣
• 「連續記錄」和「行事曆檢視」功能讓你保持寫日記的動力
• 可透過簡訊或電話通知設定提醒
• 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙
• 可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條
• 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事
• 與健康應用程式整合，為你追蹤內觀時間


勝過千言萬語
• 無限量照片和影片*
• 自動匯入你的 Instagram 貼文*
• 可手寫條目或繪圖*
• 可錄音並轉錄文字*

隨時隨地寫日記
• 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用
• 可透過簡訊或電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中

專為記錄回憶打造
• 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶
• 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容
• 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點
• 列印功能讓你將數位日記變成優質實體書

減少打字卻能記錄更多內容
• 每筆條目會自動加入時間、日期、天氣、月相等內容
• IFTTT Applet 讓你從 Spotify、YouTube、Strava、Fitbit、Facebook、Twitter 等地方匯入資料
•Siri 捷徑可以自動幫你撰寫更多日記內容，功能強大
•「分享列表」讓你新增 Apple Photos 和 Safari 等其他應用程式的內容

*Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及錄音功能。
立即開始免費試用。

使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

Problem seems to be fixed.
Great app except I can’t get it to open

評論.標題: Can’t Journal if I Can’t Begin to Type
評論.內容: I wanted to begin journaling and saw that this app was highly recommended. For some reason, my 2019 iPad Pro with the Magic Keyboard accessory can’t type anything using the app. Restarting and redownloading the app doesn’t fix the issue. My keyboard isn’t the problem since I’m using it to type this review.

this is the best app I’ve ever downloaded and my favorite app ever. i’ve had this app since 2018 and it’s just so great to have the easy access to it on my phone. I have so many memories and thoughts that would have been lost if I didn’t have it. it’s organized super well and I love that under every note I can see the time it was made, where I was when i made it, what I was listening to and even the moon phase, weather, and health info of that day. There is so much more I could say, but just get the app and explore it for yourself. if you are sentimental or very thoughtful and enjoy nostalgia you will certainly love this app!

This is my all time favorite app for organizing my thoughts, photos, recipes, to do lists and projects.

I love it so much that my fiancé shares a “brain dump” journal with me where we list things we need to remember to take care of. But he can’t edit anything that I put it in there. So he never gets that rewarding feeling of “marking off” a honey-do task that I put in there and it depletes his motivation for using the app.

Please add shared journal editing. I do NOT want to search for a new app for us to use when this one is so good but it is a downer there’s no editing in shared entries. Commenting is not enough! 

Thanks.

評論.標題: Started ok but…	then it kept deleting my entries
評論.內容: After 3 days of entering thoughts, feelings and experiences, only to have them disappear and no where to be found.  I went ahead and entered them again and they appeared to be fine but they disappear again.  I started a new Journal hoping that whatever was wrong with my first one would not duplicate in the second one… only to find the entries gone next time I opened the app.

Beautiful app and UI with end to end encryption (you are solely responsible for keeping your encryption keys, not Day One). I use this app daily for all my thoughts and writing; it’s a life saver app (so spill your thoughts and vent!)

It’s nice that this app supports all types of media formats so it’s very flexible: audio recordings, videos, photos, scribble, etc and let’s you get your inner most thoughts out. It syncs via iCloud if you have multiple devices. Total worth the investment if you want to go Premium. Support takes a few days to get back to you (better than weeks!) and they update this app so often (almost weekly) you’re guaranteed bug fixes; so if support takes awhile to get back to you, rest assured an almost weekly update will fix it the next time. Highly recommended, especially for Premium.
Cancelled key features just after subscribing and neither Apple nor Dayone offers any support. Not worth the money . Definitely a scam

評論.標題: It could be perfect with handwriting function
評論.內容: Overall good experience. It could be perfect if adding handwriting function. A bit expensive by the way.

評論.標題: Used to work perfectly, now completely broken
評論.內容: I have used this app for years with no issues and everything was fine.  Lately however, the app won’t let me type in it.  It completely ignores all keystrokes from Magic Keyboard and won’t allow the iPad’s virtual keyboard to even open.  I literally can’t write in this journal now.

I can’t think of anything more valuable than a history of memories and this app makes it so easy.    It’s super easy to learn how to use because it makes sense the way it’s put together.  I use it on my phone and air book.  I have used Day One for years sometimes daily for two straight!   I’ve slacked off lately but what a beautiful record I have!   Thanks Day One!

評論.標題: Original Paid app no longer supported…bait and switch
評論.內容:
I started using Day One back in Jan 2015 and paid my one time fee of $8.49. Now they want an annual subscription for not just new features but features I have been using since day one. No longer can I add multiple photos to an entry. No longer are all of my photos accessible to add to entries. And no longer can I synch with my MacBook. I’m done paying for more and more monthly subscriptions. If Apple Journal would import my entries, I’d gladly pay just to get away from an app that changed the rules. Bye bye Day One!

Update:
Received a reply from developer explaining pricing. However, no explanation as to why features I originally paid for are no longer available unless I upgrade.
Update 1/7/25:
I reached out to developer as recommended. I received a reply stating that the version I purchased  is no longer supported. So now I understand. The developer was allowed to change the name of the app and no longer support that version and no longer will provide the same features as I had originally purchased unless I pay $35/year. You would think original users would be grandfathered into the new version since the original users are those who helped with their success.
With every update that comes out I look forward to the day I can write and see colors to display my various moods. It seems so simple but for some odd reason Day One doesn’t implement it.

I’ve used this app for years and absolutely loved it, but I took a little break and when I can back, the pop-up for premium simply doesn’t go away. I have no interest in being forced to pay $35 a month for this. It’s very frustrating to suddenly lose access to everything and not have any way to get ride of the pop up.

This journal app is amazing! I love the templates and are all so helpful. The only thing that might not get me to stay is the lack of Apple Pencil support outside of the drawing function. Even if the drawing function had a lines edit, it would be a bit helpful. Ideally a handwriting function (not just scribble) would make the iPad app top tier!
Just wanted to journal, confusing and super extra.

This app is the coolest for people who can’t or don’t like to write their journaling - first my memory is bad so it started as me remembering what I did during the day- then I found myself venting. Then you can # and memories and pics and have multiple journals. 10 out of 10 app honestly. Well worth it. My OCD makes it so my writing needs to be perfect so if I mess up a letter I have to redo that whole page. This solves that problem for me. Thanks guys!!!!!

I have Day One app for over 10 yrs. Paid subscription. Recently within the last month specifically I have not been able to open the app. I can even send a message to the premium support team since I am not able to open the app. 10+ years of photos / videos / journaling etc. First I got a message that the developer needs to update the app to new IOS ( Apple user running 18.2  IOS ) Today I get a message The request to open com.bloombuilt.dayone-iOS failed. Please help !!

Amazing! Absolutely loved it!
I have been using day one over a year ago and now the apps in my iPad being shown loading process which I can’t use anymore. Even I can’t reinstall it. Can someone help me to fix it please.
I have been using this App for over ten years and love it!

I have had it 4 years. I now need support because the app won’t restart, won’t update. I spent 20 minutes chasing my own tail, trying to get support with no way to contact anyone other than go around in circles in circles off of their so-called help God. No way to email Support no chat. Very successful app and yet they put the money all in their pocket and won’t put out a little help to those that have supported it for now four straight years. Start a chat ability or release give an email right upfront. You have a choice spend 20 minutes of your life and chase your tail or go ahead and email. It will help you and treat you like a human being. This is very frustrating when companies do this to people. I literally have gone my fifth time when I clicked to do another thing it takes me back to the help God.
Wish I could easily add emojis

I love this app! I write info, poems, lyrics, sermon outlines, Bible studies, names and addresses, novels… and so much more!

I would love to see column type: Left, Right, Justified.
