I finally got a subscription and so far I would love to say that this app is great for doing exactly what it sits out to do. However, part of the reason I got this app was to avoid ads and solicitations for further subscriptions. I can't seem to get this app to stop suggesting that I give a gift subscription. It shows it right on my homepage. So it tells me to take a breath, and then it inundate me with the request to give a gift. I do not see how this induces an attitude of calming. Instead I said here feeling like I should give a gift to someone that I care about in the hopes that they could find some calm in their lives, while I become irritated with the fact that I paid for an app that still has, in my opinion, ads. I wish there was a way to get rid of this feature so that I can enjoy the app that I paid for, for the purpose of that I paid for without being bothered to give a subscription to someone else.

應用名稱: AutoSleep – 在手錶上追蹤睡眠
應用描述:
自動通過手錶*追蹤您的睡眠。無需使用任何按鈕，甚至連手錶應用也是可選的！只要睡覺就好！

完全隱私。
-----------------
AutoSleep沒有用戶分析追蹤，沒有植入廣告，沒有第三方代碼，沒有數據上傳。
問下您的“免費”睡眠應用是否也是這樣。

包含一切。
-----------------
沒有額外的應用程序内購買。無訂閲費。

關於AutoSleep
-----------------
AutoSleep使用先進的啓發式方法計算您睡了多長時間，這樣您就不需要做什麽了。

如果您配戴手錶睡覺，那您什麽都不需要做。AutoSleep將會追蹤您的睡眠和質量，並在早上發送通知給您。

即使您不配戴手錶睡覺，AutoSleep也能追蹤您的睡眠時間。非常簡單。
如果您不配戴手錶睡覺，那麽在睡覺前把手錶摘下即可。早上您只要碰觸手機或者把手錶戴上，AutoSleep就會知道您已經醒了。

每個人都有點不同。如果您的睡眠很不好，AutoSleep提供一個簡單的設置向導和一個選項用來微調。

如果您配戴手錶睡覺*，AutoSleep還將分析您的睡眠質量。通過使用睡眠時間、安穩度、清醒時間和心率，它可以為您的睡眠質量評分，並提供一個全面的夜間分析。

與 Apple「睡眠階段」應用程式完全整合，使您可以選擇使用 Apple 睡眠應用程式並在 AutoSleep 中檢查所有資訊。

AutoSleep 包括睡眠監控所需的所有資訊和功能，包括：
睡眠時間 – 睡眠時長和睡眠銀行餘額
睡眠評等 – 對您的睡眠進行綜合評等
睡眠環 – 用高品質的睡眠來填充您的睡眠環，包括心率、深度睡眠和快速動眼
Apple 睡眠階段 – 可使用 Apple 睡眠應用程式中資料的選項
睡眠呼吸中止症 - 了解您是否有睡眠呼吸中止症
睡眠血氧 – 睡眠時的測量值
呼吸頻率 – 記錄您每分鐘的呼吸
噪音 – 環境噪音測量值
睡眠分析 – 檢查您的睡眠週期的詳細圖表和細節
睡眠燃料 – 衡量您的睡眠品質和效率
今晚就寢時間 – 根據您的習慣推薦您最近的就寢時間
就緒 – 表示您的身體和精神壓力
溫度 – 追蹤您睡眠時的手腕溫度
睡眠一致性 – 瞭解您的就寢時間習慣
熄燈 – 追蹤入睡時間
即時睡眠追蹤 – 檢查您夜間的睡眠統計資料
智慧型鬧鐘 – Watch 內建的智慧型鬧鐘，可幫助您從較淺的睡眠中醒來 
小工具 – 各式各樣超棒的 iPhone 小工具
複雜功能 – 多種 Watch 錶面選項 
HomeKit – 與 Apple HomeKit 完全整合 
表情符號和筆記 – 記錄對睡眠時段的評論和標籤
探索 – 深入分析視圖
Siri – 透過 Siri 語音指令使用
捷徑 – 建立您專屬的 AutoSleep 的捷徑
調整 – 調整您個人睡眠/醒來偵測的簡單功能
歷史 – 進階圖表和趨勢
組態 – 變更主題並設計您的時鐘睡眠環
設定 – 自訂您的睡眠目標、設定通知和提醒
匯出 – 匯出選項以儲存資料 

AutoSleep還與我們首要的心臟和活動監測應用HeartWatch合作，並將您的睡眠信息錄入Apple Health。

*需要運行Watch OS 4或更高版本的蘋果手錶。

評論.內容: Works great with my iwatch!  Used for years.

Once you get the hang of the features and settings, it’s reliable and helpful. I downloaded it because I was taking care of my partner and waking up every hour or two to get her medication. The gentle wake up feature helped me avoid irritability or over-snoozing, despite being sleep deprived.

A friend who researches everything and has sleep issues recommended this app. I’ve been using it for 4 years, and it has been so helpful in tracking my sleep and getting data (such as the negative impact of alcohol on my deep sleep and #of REM cycles) that has been life changing. No surprise charges after the initial app purchase, and it transferred seamlessly to my new Apple Watch SE 2d series.
Love this app because reading is  accurate and customer service is great!!

This app helped me immensely in monitoring my sleep schedule. I use it on my Apple Watch & iPhone. It really made a difference in working on sleep schedule and understand the sleep quality & other vitals during  the sleep. During illness I really noticed how app was tracking and giving indicators. It’s best app in the market.
The app crashes on loading.

Awesome app I have sleep apnea and  use a CPAP machine it really helps me to keep control to be able to tell my doctor how my sleep patterns are fantastic. I just signed up for the detailed reports for only $3.99 lifetime subscription 

Keep up the good work guys I recommend for everyone who has trouble sleeping.
It hasn’t worked for me in over a week. Doesn’t matter how many times I delete and redownload, it just force closes as soon as I open it.
i’ve used this app every day for years and now it crashed immediately upon opening. it’s not an IOS issue because other users are getting the same problem. please fix!

評論.內容: Can’t open the app.  Deleted and reinstalled but still won’t open.

Really like this app. Gives you a lot of information. However I didn’t give it five stars because there is no way to have your night time start in the morning. I work nights so  my evening starts in the AM so the days are messed up. Wish you could change your bedtime to AM morning hours.
No better value anywhere.  Amazing data utilization and presentation.

While I do see that the app is made to be used with a Watch, I was given the impression that you can also track your sleep without it. But it doesn’t seem to work. 

I laughed at the ERROR sleep results the next morning because I haven’t slept more than 2-3 hours at a time (and often per night) since October 2024. But I’m annoyed I paid $9 for something I won’t be able to use. I’m not going to sleep in my watch so it can die while I’m at work the next day. 

Has potential and I’m glad it works for others. But I’m back on the hunt for a sleep tracker.

評論.內容: It’s a good app and has been stable. However, app doesn’t come up (crashes at start) for last two ish week. Are you guys aware? Is there a fix planned? FYI - reinstalling app doesn’t solve the problem. Watch version of the app is working fine. Hope this helps!

It really helps to track and understand our sleep schedule and habits

We’re all unique and this app doesn’t tell you how you slept; it learns from you how to best represent your sleep. That’s priceless!

I have loved this app for years but the most recent update causes it to crash during the opening intro screen. Five stars when the app works, one star currently.
Great data and content in an easy to read/use format. Can definitely correlate lifestyle choices with sleep quality from app data. Would recommend 100%
Great supplement to the new AI Apple Intelligent watches.

評論.標題: Used this for over 3 years daily
評論.內容: Amazing insight into my sleep- but beyond that. I realize how alcohol affects my sleep, being sick, getting regular exercise, being on a new medication, etc. I got it over three years ago right after I got my first watch. It’s great. A bit of a learning curve but honestly it’s fascinating so it’s simple. I don’t pay attention to everything it offers, but that’s just because it provides more than enough information. Worth paying for once… no ads makes it so I actually open and use it.
完全无法使用，打开就闪退
Absolutely love this app! So interesting to track our sleep patterns.  It makes me mindful of how important sleep is and what I need to accomplish to get enough rest to live a happier healthier life.
This is a very thorough and informative app that is very simple to follow! Highly recommended.

This app is so inconsistent.  One day the rating will be good, the next, with the same readings, it will be poor.  Some days it will report all the data, other days the data field is missing entirely on the display.  Some days it displays one way, the next day different display charts appear.  I get more accurate information from my horoscope.

This app is better than the Apple health sleep info. It’s not perfect by any meaning, but that’s sleep trackers in general. I look at the patterns overtime and see what may be influencing better sleep. Has been very helpful to help me identify things to help improve my sleep

評論.標題: Very good app with one issue
評論.內容: The app seems to be consistent and reliable, however, there is a large discrepancy between deep Sleep on the app and what Apple’s health app shows. AutoSleep seems to be more optimistic about the amount of deep sleep.

I bought this bundle a while ago and had been very pleased with it but after a recent iOS update had issues with the watch tracking my sleep and emailed support to be rather disappointed by their response. I was told that I MUST have a passcode which I haven’t done in past and had no issues with recording my sleep. The rep even said he didn’t know why I would have it on, not considering there are personal reasons why & circumstances vary for individuals. I’m working now to get things straightened out on my own as the “support” I got didn’t resolve the issue.

The app crashes every time you try to open.
Please fix this 
Several reviewers have reported the same behavior

For years, I have had problems sleeping, and I’ve gone to doctors and therapists, but this has helped me more than any of them. I had no idea that I was so self competitive. I love to see the waking green rings and it motivates me to work harder at going to bed earlier and not to plan things before I would naturally wake up.  Yesterday, I actually had my deep sleep cycle closed for the first time and I felt like I should get a trophy. I did not take a nap during the day and felt great. The only problem is with me, I forget sometimes to make sure that I’m wearing my watch and that it is unlocked and charged so then there are no results to see and I am disappointed. Haha

I just started tracking my sleep and I was surprised by how low my numbers were…I have started trying to change my habits to improve my sleep… with this app there is lots of data some I still do not understand but love how it integrates with my Apple products…it is slow to see my data it takes a few hours to see it update from my Apple watch while my spouses Oura ring he can see when he wakes up.
If you wear your watch to bed, it really is automatic. I love how it displays my sleep data.
Terrific App
The sleep stages keep resetting and won’t save.

I started using AutoSleep years ago because it was the only app I could find that automatically detected when I was asleep and my sleep stages.
It was really good then, but it's just gotten better and better over the years!
The insights it's provided me into my sleep have been life-changing.
100% recommend! 
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

For anyone tired of being subscribed to death, this is your app! The one-time fee is well worth the information you’re given after each sleep. I have recommended this app to a few friends and others a couple of them taking the plunge and they always tell me, and others, about how great of an app it it.

Just a normal average Joe trying to improve my health. This tool really helps me understand the nuances of my sleep and I make adjustments to improve it as I go. The results are a happier, healthier me.

The only thing I don’t like is how Apple finally came up with their own sleep application (probably after studying apps like this) and Apple seems to have  snuck their version into being the primary app tracking my sleep and Apple’s version isn’t as good as “auto sleep” app.

recent changes have made this unreliable. ever since the apnea tracker was added. now if I sit down it thinks I am sleeping! Watching TV- I am sleeping. hope this gets fixed. I have used this for many years and hope I don’t need to get a different app!

應用名稱: 運動秀-跑步骑行划船健身
應用描述:
運動秀是一款為室內及室外有氧運動愛好者開發的應用軟件，在室內可以通過藍牙與跑步機、健身車、踏步機、橢圓機等健身設備連接實現地圖、程序、目標等多種運動模式；在室外通過GPS信號和手機傳感器記錄跑步、騎行等運動數據。用戶可通過註冊登錄查看歷史運動數據，規劃每週或每月的運動目標。

-持續使用後台GPS可能會衰減您的電池壽命；
-運動秀需要訪問HealthKit來同步您的運動數據。

Free Membership: Access the basic features of Virture Run without any cost.
Premium Membership: Unlimited access the exclusive features, and advanced customization of Virture Run. Flexible subscription plans
Weekly Plan: $2.99
Monthly Plan: $5.99
Annual Plan: $59.99
Privacy Agreement: https://www.fitshow.com/article?key=privacy

Join us and transform your indoor workout into exciting world explorations.

This remarkably free app is packed with features. Initially i just wanted to control my treadmill from my phone - but the workout plans and robust data tracking has made this app invaluable to me.

I just updated this today, Saturday, June 15, 2024
As I started out, it stated I was going 17 mph where I know I wasn’t everyone else on the track was going top speed of 3 mph. I did eight laps and 22 minutes. I just don’t feel that this is accurate. It was before the update. Plus every lap that I took I had a different name. The name I use wasn’t even posted so after my eight laps, I was in second place according to everyone’s stats on how many miles they went and again it wasn’t my name that I use. I should only give this one star after this update, not very accurate at all!!!

I want to love this app, and I do appreciate the integration with my under-desk treadmill. Unfortunately the data doesn’t sync accurately with Health. Yes, the steps and distance show up under data sources, but they do NOT display in my Health app. They don’t roll up to main display. It also indicates there is a Watch app, but there isn’t and my Watch won’t sync with Bluetooth. So it’s kind of just a fancy way to start and control the treadmill. Fix these issues and it’ll be an awesome app instead of just a high-tech start button!

Twice a day. Sadly that was 12 years ago. With the help of homeTro I intend to get back to a healthy lifestyle.

應用名稱: 奔湃 - 健身&運動日誌 運動紀錄 運動計劃
應用描述:
記錄創造身體。

為什麼要記錄運動呢？

去健身房運動已經很花時間了,還要記錄不覺得很麻煩嗎?

其實在所有運動中,「漸進式超負荷」的原則非常重要。舉例來說,漸進式超負荷就是指,如果今天舉起10公斤,下次就要挑戰舉起11公斤,藉此讓肌肉強度逐步提高。如果今天比昨天多舉了1公斤,那今天的運動就是成功的。

但是如果不記錄,怎麼知道今天的運動是否比昨天進步呢？

奔湃讓您輕鬆記錄煩人的運動細節。

也許你知道要寫運動日記,卻沒有真的實踐過?

從重量訓練到居家訓練,使用奔湃記錄今天能記錄的所有運動項目。

讓我們與奔湃一起日復一日地朝運動目標邁進吧！

你只要記錄,奔湃就幫你完成各項運動數據分析！

從今天開始養成記錄的好習慣！

\[除了記錄,還有很多實用功能！\]

記錄類:

- 一鍵複製/貼上運動項目
- 記錄每天的筆記和心情
- 運動後可記錄心情和筆記
- 儲存和分享運動記錄圖片

學習類:

- 透過運動GIF學習正確姿勢和動作
- 透過YouTube觀看居家訓練影片

追蹤類:

- 為初學者推薦客製化運動計劃
- 提供專業的BurnFit運動課程
- 為有具體目標的你,提供目標追蹤功能
- 每月寄送個人化運動報告
- 以圖表呈現個人運動能力的變化

其他貼心功能:

- App內建間歇、運動、休息計時器
- 所有運動資料雲端備份

\[Pro進階功能\]

- 與Apple Watch同步數據
- 使用個人化運動計畫
- 查看更詳盡的分析圖表
- 解鎖更多特製課程
- 支援槓鈴架
- 移除廣告,專注運動

還在等什麼,從今天開始記錄,讓自己的身體越來越進步!

確認購買或免費試用期結束時，將向您用於iTunes的Apple帳戶收取費用。

如果在訂閱期結束前24小時未取消自動續訂，訂閱將自動續訂並收取費用。

您可以在「設定」>「App Store」>選擇「Apple ID」>「查看Apple ID」>「訂閱」中管理訂閱並取消自動續訂。

※關於App存取權限的說明

奔湃需要以下存取權限才能提供服務。

[必要存取權限]

- 無

[選擇性存取權限]

- 相片：記錄今天的運動時需要上傳照片。
- 通知：計劃運動並在當天提供鬧鐘時需要。
- 外部儲存空間存取_READ：需要透過內部DB查看奔湃記錄。
- 外部儲存空間存取_WRITE：需要儲存您想要的奔湃日誌。
- 使用某些功能時需要允許上述存取權限，但即使不同意允許，也可以使用奔湃。

應用描述:
HIIT 健身組合！超慢跑！跳繩！
RUMBO 你的毛茸茸健身小夥伴在這裡，為你的鍛鍊日程增添一些樂趣！
讓我們一同與他邁開肉球手掌，走向更健康、更快樂的自己吧！

- 可愛又老實的角色 Rumbo 將帶領著您們進行基礎健身運動，在日常生活中，透過健身，讓身體更加健康。
- 非常用心的製作 30 多種健身動畫 + 直覺的自定義健身組合，隨意排列組合，組合出屬於你個人的 HIIT 健身組合。
- 超人氣燃脂運動，超慢跑登場，跟 Rumbo 一起達成理想中的體型吧！
- 連結 Apple 手機生態系統，像是可以將健身的資訊同步紀錄到 Health，iCloud 跨裝置紀錄，以及透過 Apple Muisc 資料庫連結，隨時撥上自己最動感的音樂，進行健身運動。
- AirPlay 時，也可以旋轉手機成 landscape 透過大螢幕健身。

應用名稱: 生理期追蹤器精簡版 (Period Tracker)
應用描述:
生理期追蹤器使用相當簡單，畫面相當可愛。
* 在每月生理期開始時，點擊開始鍵。生理期追蹤器記錄妳的資料且根據前3個月平均週期計算出下次生理期的開始日。
* 在簡單的月檢視日曆中可以查看當月或未來的生理期日、排卵日、受孕期、妳的心情、及症狀。
* 好看的圖示將會出現在妳的首頁螢幕點綴妳的 iPhone！另外它只會隱密地出現 \"P Tracker\"字眼。

生理期追蹤器具有多項特點：
* 記錄經期每一天的心情和症狀。
* 輸出妳的生理期日及備忘錄至電子信箱以供備份，或看醫生時參考用。
* 倒數計時下次生理期的到來，或計算延遲的天數。
* 在螢幕上透過可愛的圖示顯示妳的排卵日及八天受孕期。
* 使用密碼機制保護妳的資料。
* 追蹤妳的體重和體溫。
* 懷孕模式
* 自定義情緒
* 自定義症狀
* 觸摸ID
* HealthKit
* 3D觸控

評論.標題: Great tracker, secure, easy to use
評論.內容:
I’ve used this tracker for over 7 years and have appreciated its usability and functionality. A few years ago it turned out a bunch of period and fertility apps were selling women’s data to various companies. I did a deep dive on this app and from what I could find, this is one of the only major apps that was NOT selling our data.
One major thing that could make this app better is if it offered a mean, median, and mode for length of cycle. I think it just bases your cycle length off your last cycle. But each ovary is different, and I wish the app accounted for that, too. Each of my ovaries behaves slightly differently, so Every other month I have a slightly different experience and length of cycle (by like 1 or 2 days). Most of these apps are basically counters, calculators, and storage, so I don’t see why different types of averages couldn’t be included, as well as accounting for each ovary having different indicators/symptoms and lengths of cycles.
Overall great experience!

應用描述:
「30 天內減重」為您量身打造快速又安全的減重法。不只具備系統性的訓練，更能隨時提供您上百種的飲食建議。 經科學證明，能有效促進您的健康與身形。您的運動與卡路里資訊將會同步儲存在 Apple Health。只要堅持下去，您的體態會比過去更窈窕美麗。 

这些訓練計畫包含手臂、臀部、腹部和腿部的訓練，有助於您減去多餘的體脂肪並雕塑您的身材。只要您跟著動畫與影片指示，就能確保您在每個運動中的姿勢正確。訓練計畫無需器材，您可以在家裡或其他地方輕鬆訓練。

您可以透過圖表追蹤您的減重進度，並能清楚計算您消耗的卡路里，也可以設定自我激勵的目標。由於運動的強度會逐漸提高，所以要記得每運動三天要休息一天，身體才能逐步調整。 

特色：
- 追蹤減重進度
- 追蹤燃燒的卡路里
- 上百種低卡路里的飲食建議
- 動畫與影片指示
- 多種鍛鍊課程
- 逐漸提高運動強度

- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。

應用名稱: Gentler Streak 健身 | 健康 | 追蹤器
應用描述:
Gentler Streak致力推廣可持續的活躍生活方式，並會根據你的能力和健康情況，度身設計個人化指導。無論是運動新手還是體壇健將，我們包容的鍛鍊方式將在大家的健身之旅途中提供扶持，一站式滿足你的鍛鍊、身心靈健康與睡眠等需要。立即加入我們的行列，將日常鍛鍊輕鬆變成持久習慣，同時享受當中的無窮樂趣。

• 2024 Apple Design Award得主（社會影響類別） | 2022 Apple Watch年度最佳App | 每日最佳App | 編輯精選
• 獲The Verge、Forbes、TechCrunch等雜誌專題報道。

全新[完整睡眠分析]
無論是入睡時間，還是恢復性睡眠長度（深度+快速眼動睡眠），所有資料應有盡有。你還可以查看14晚的睡眠時間、一致性和階段，以便識別睡眠規律，並協助改善睡眠衛生。

▶全面的身心靈健康管理◀
[日常健康]
有早晨摘要伴你迎接新一天，即可輕鬆盡覽重要健康指標和睡眠質素，方便你在問題發生之前做好準備。你更可參考鍛鍊建議，根據自己每日的完備程度計劃活動。

[月經週期追蹤]
了解自己處於月經週期的什麼階段，同時參考個人化支援，當中包括按目前狀況制定的「流動鍛鍊」等健身建議，讓你輕鬆根據月經週期隨心休息。

▶按照自己的步伐保持活躍◀
[持續活動與狀態]
為了聆聽身體需要，在持續活動時切勿忽略必要休息。生活上總難免遇到生病、受傷等情況，或者偶爾想放假休息一下，歡迎隨時按照實際情況調整狀態，而且毋須因此感到內疚。

[屢獲殊榮的APPLE WATCH鍛鍊追蹤器]
實時追蹤訓練效果和心率區間，以便管理鍛鍊強度，避免過度訓練。此外，透過「過度訓練」計了解自己的努力程度，更有助避免過勞。

[個人化鍛鍊追蹤]
運用詳盡的地圖和測量指標圖表，追蹤日常家務以至各式鍛鍊等140多項活動，輕鬆保持健康的活動水平。

[度身設計的日常鍛鍊]
根據健康指標與完備程度，每日獲得個人化鍛鍊建議，輕鬆作出休息以至高強度鍛鍊的決定。Go Gentler更會透過手錶提供建議，讓你根據實時表現及健康指標，隨時調整鍛鍊時間和/或強度。

▶無可比擬的鍛鍊日記◀
[個人化摘要]
透過重新命名鍛鍊紀錄、新增備註及相片，以及收藏表現出色的鍛鍊環節，並在有需要時運用RPE圖表調整努力程度，將鍛鍊摘要變成個人健康日記。這些重要細節不但能夠清楚反映你的活動清況，更可體現你獨一無二的健身故事。

[進度圖表]
透過每週、每月與年度圖表了解進度，並可輕鬆查閱每月及年度回顧。

[即時動態與小工具]
透過iPhone的即時動態功能追蹤鍛鍊，並在主頁、鎖定螢幕上加入互動小工具，活動情況盡在掌握。

[適合任何人士]
全面的輔助使用功能涵蓋粗體文字、動態字型、降低透明度、增加對比度、動態效果調整及旁白等。

[私人資料保持私隱]
你的健康資料全數經由Apple HealthKit存於裝置，絕不外流。

透過訂閱月費、年費計劃，或選購終身使用計劃，立即升級至Gentler Streak Premium，盡享更多專業功能及和家庭共享選擇。

如果你沒有在目前的訂閱計劃屆滿前至少24小時關閉自動續訂功能，訂閱計劃將自動續期。系統將在本期訂閱計劃屆滿前的24小時內收取續訂費用。你可以在「設定」>「Apple ID」>「訂閱項目」中管理訂閱計劃和關閉自動續訂功能。

請注意，Gentler Streak並非醫療裝置，不應視作專業醫療建議的替代品。

服務條款：https://gentler.app/terms/
私隱政策：https://gentler.app/privacy

評論.內容:
I really love this app and the concept; however, get frustrated by the integration of the HR zones with my other apps. The bulk of my workouts are done at Orange Theory where I wear a heart rate monitor that tracks my HR the entire workout. Unfortunately, this HR data does not fully transfer to the Gentler Streak app, which eliminates the purpose of this app as an exertion/recovery-based indicator. 

As an example, Gentler Streak typically only collects my HR data for ~30-50% of my Orange Theory workouts.

These challenges could be avoided with a manual input of the % spent in each HR zone (this would be in addition to the perceived exertion).

I have worn a Fitbit and an Oura. Fitbit always felt overwhelming and the Oura always seemed inaccurate. Gentler Streak tracks all the important metrics and it does it with a smile. It tells me when I am good to push hard and when I need to take a rest day. It’s intuitive and fun to use. Absolutely love it.

At first I wanted to delete this app and get a refund for my subscription, HOWEVER after using it for a few weeks I have come to really appreciate it!  It looks too simplistic - as the metrics are mostly abstracted away, but that is the beauty of this app.  The novelty of having “all of the data” has worn off for me after a few weeks with other metric heavy apps.  Gentler Streak provides a meaningful daily summary that actually motivates me.  I also like the design, whimsical characters, and colors.  At the end of the day this app provides me with what I truly need - a summary of my recovery plus just the metrics I care about.  I appreciate the workout suggestions even if I can’t always follow them due to schedule.  Strangely this app actually has changed my mental state with regard to resting.  I no longer feel lazy if I don’t work out on a given day - especially if GS has indicated I should rest.   A win for mental health!
Abundante, exitosa,bendecida ❤️

Okay where do I begin.  I just purchased a lifetime subscription for this product a I truly belive in the team and message behind this lovely app.    As someone with general anxiety disorder I found most fitness and health apps tend to overwhelm    Gentler is a beautiful, incredibly designed app that is friendly, warm, and charming.  It’s encouraging and its presentation of metrics are easy to digest.  The app allows me to start my day on a positive note and makes me feel okay if I can’t push myself.   At the same time I find its overall charm encouraging. Thank you for developing an app with people like me in mind.

Gentler Streak has been both reassuring and frustrating to use. Reassuring and helpful when reviewing my metrics, how I feel, and how that compares to the data it collects and displays. I really like the improvement in sleep info that it displays. It shows some additional info vs Apple’s standard Health app, so it’s definitely helpful.

Unfortunately, it’s helpfulness is marred by unreliable mirror tracking - which for me, was the primary reason I bought the app. Mirror tracking lets me see on my iPhone workout data that’s being collected from the watch. It works maybe 50% of the time. Sure, restarting my watch and phone will fix the problem, but that’s a lengthy process especially once I’ve got setup and am ready to workout. Don’t add another barrier to me working out! The problem has been happening for some time, so I’m hoping they can get it fixed. Or hopefully Apple makes mirror tracking native for all their workouts and not just cycling and I won’t have to deal with the frustration of using Gentler Streak.

I don’t know what I’m missing here but I took a slow mile long walk and did some gentle yoga and it keeps telling me I’m over reaching. Maybe this app just isn’t for me? But I feel like maybe something in my settings is wrong. I’ve tried to reset my heart rate zones but it’s still doing it. My heart rate maxed out at like 102 on my walk and didn’t get nearly that high in yoga so why does it keep acting like I’m over exerting myself?
I don’t see anywhere on this app about needing a smartwatch, I have a smartwatch but it’s not an Apple Watch, do I need an apple watch ?

I downloaded the app a month ago because I liked the look of the app. I work a high-stress job and wanted something to monitor my stresses! I don’t have that, I have “Getting to know you”! 

I’m done with your app.

This app would be much better if it guided you through a run on your watch that it suggested based on your training readiness (like Runna or Garmin) instead of just giving you the recommended HR zone and a time. Not that helpful unfortunately.

評論.標題: Not sure why you need this app
評論.內容: I downloaded this app after seeing the editor pick and some reviews. After using it, I’m not sure why you would need it. It does not do anything further than Health. It’s less than the same health matrix. It seems to be the same thing as any other “health” app with cartoons. I guess it just didn’t do anything for me.

The app appears to be decent with a good summary of information the phone and watch collect. The nutrition articles should be taken with a grain of salt. 

I took points off for their high-pressure sales tactics. I felt as if I was at an auto dealer being asked “what can I do to get you in a car today.”

I subscribed to the app, checked it out, and the. Cancelled my subscription. It’s not worth the black-Friday sales price.

Since I cancelled my subscription, the app has thrown up a “Prolong your Subscription” view and it doesn’t go away! (There was an “X” button but tapping did nothing.)

Time to ask for a refund.
Recent improvements have improved the app. It is tracking my unlogged exercises better now. I really like this way of tracking effort!

I subscribed to Gentler Streak for a year and really enjoyed some of the data. I did end up letting the subscription expire because I feel I have a better handle on my own training load now. On the positive, the app is well designed and I do feel like it was pretty decent at knowing when I needed to work vs rest, especially at first. However, once I got in a routine of regular workouts, it kept telling me to work harder to maintain my streak. Doing 30-60 minutes of strength training 3-4x per week and walking a lot seems like it should be plenty to keep me fit, but once Gentler Streak adapted to that routine, it started pushing me to do more and more in a way that felt unsustainable. 

I just returned from a 10-day trip to Europe, where we walked minimum 20K steps a day. I know the point of the app is to add more than just apple’s rings, but throughout that entire trip, the messages kept telling me to work out more and eventually “lost” my streak. I don’t mind that of course, but it’s wild that it can’t consider that I was walking 10 miles a day. 

I also think it’s absurd that period tracking isn’t included in the free version. Feels like holding back an extra feature for 50% of the users.

Gentler Streak, an app I highly recommend, is displeased with me because I have spent two days of strenuous forestry, which clashes with its health maintenance tenets. Its focus on recovery and maintenance makes it an app I wholeheartedly endorse, distinct from those aimed at athletes.

I have dysautonomia exacerbated by long Covid and I’ve been finding this app incredibly helpful for slowly building stamina and feeling better about taking extremely crucial rest days. After a few months I’ve gone from logging a couple minutes of walking or chores to logging hours of hiking and aerobics. Your mileage may vary, but this is one of the most accessible (and gentlest) apps out there.

評論.標題: Not a good tool for me
評論.內容: This app kept yelling me to go gentler until i eventually got down to only walking and yoga. It was STILL telling me I was going too hard! Needless to say Its not a good motivator for me at all. I am requesting a refund.

Graphics are nice.  I paid $28 for the premium version only to find out it gives me nothing more than the free Apple health app provides. If I want more I really need to spend nearly $60. Pricing not transparent at all and so I cancelled the subscription.
I’m a fit older outdoor enthusiast. Go Gentler has nailed the right balance of reasonable health info without the hyperbole. Way to go!

The app has a great looking UI and the functionality is exactly what I was looking to ensure that I am pushing the right amount during my trainings.
However it has 2 major flows that really really bother me.

1. The app does not sync on Strava or any other major "social fitness" platform. In 2024 this is really unacceptable. Everyone is connected and we like to maintain the social pressure as part of our motivation for working out. Just this flaw will translate in me not using Gentle Streak on the apple watch to track the runs, meaning that I am not able to use the great "body battery" indicator... 

2. The app is awesome to give you information on what to do today. It does not provide you with an upcoming plan for the week/month. That would be great to prepare properly and, if needed, organize the agenda accordingly. We are all busy and the possibility to prepare an adjustable plan will be more than welcome.

There are pros and cons in every app, but these 2 items (particularly #1) are so annoying that I wonder if I should maintain the subscription....

評論.標題: What about all of my other activity?
評論.內容:
I love this app and I am a long time subscriber, but it misses a huge part of my physical activity.

As I’ve seen in other reviews and in a support request, the developers dismiss the idea of using the data collected in Apple’s “Move” and “Exercise” rings. Only tracked workouts are taken into account.

The app uses the Training Impulse (TRIMP) method to quantify the training load and stress placed on an athlete's body during exercise with the (admittedly) more accurate workout data.

However, ignoring all of the other physical activity that we do means that when we have an above average day of non-workout activity, the app’s recommendation is no different and it asks us to push too hard during our workouts.

The developers dig their heels in over not being able to use the less accurate non-workout data to determine the toll that this activity has on our bodies, but they already use: sleeping heart rate, sleep duration, wrist temperature, heart rate variability, respiratory rate, and oxygen saturation to estimate our overall wellbeing. These don’t fit anywhere in the TRIMP formula and are imperfect data that creates an imperfect estimate.

I appreciate the developers’ goal of using a science and data backed approach to be sure that their app serves and protects us. I hope that they can find a way to bring the same rigor to expand the capability of the app to bring non-workout activity into the fold to provide a better picture of our workouts, overall activity, and recovery.

I was hopeful this would track steps in real time vs. the health app that only updates periodically. I’m glad I read the reviews before purchasing the annual service. 

I get that they can’t track the impact to our bodies, but some of us use steps to track our movement in the day just in general and have other things we participate in that require steps tracking. 

It’s a shortcoming of this app to not have something as simple as a daily step count.

I’ll update the stars for this app as I use it more.

評論.標題: I like it except for one glaring issue
評論.內容: Your women’s health section ignores menopause.  Maybe add an opt out on exercising with a period or do some research on menopause and exercise and give a choice.  There is a wealth of research being developed on the Importance of weight bearing exercises to keep bone strength, difficulty of adding muscle, etc.

The Activity Path is awesome. It considers all the data I’m shoving into Apple Heath with my smart devices and boils down into actionable context. It shows me the medium term (weeks) benefits of exercise and gives me short term (today) confidence in my activity decisions.

I’m currently using Gentler Streak alongside Runna, Oura and Apple Fitness. Gentler Streak provides a useful additional perspective on the data.

I tried the Go Gentler suggested workouts for a while. I found I usually wanted to work harder than it suggested. I still use it for informal things like active housework and chasing my kids at the playground, but I currently prefer Runna for structured training.

Being able to validate the way my body feels with Gentler Streak is amazing. The ability to read my measurements and give me an overall idea of what I should do today for activity is exactly what I needed.

評論.標題: Like it a lot, but two major flaws for me
評論.內容: I like this app much more than others, even Apple's and I would actually become paid user, however there are two flaws that are too big for me to ignore. First of all, the AWU action button doesn’t start designated activity most of the time, it seems that this feature wasn’t properly tested before release. Second is dog walking activity, as it seems that they just renamed it and took all the parameters from walking one. Dog walking includes frequent stops, turns, sometimes even circles and the app is constantly nagging with activity seems to be stopped screen. If those two things are fixed in the near future, I will probably opt-in for paid version.

If I forget to end my walk, this app will keep on adding minutes to my time while I'm sitting still for 15 minutes or more. When I didn't "end" before I took my watch off & it went into Nightstand Mode, it added an 8 hour overnight walk. I know my Apple watch knows when I stop moving - I know there's a coder someplace who could fix this: don't know why the folks behind this app don't take the trouble to find one.

評論.內容: I purchased the lifetime app and am now being told I need to purchase plans.

評論.標題: Exactly what I was looking for
評論.內容:
I wanted an app that would let me set daily goals, but also goals that could be 3x per week at my discretion which day or on set days. I didn't think there would be an app that would perfectly meet my needs, but this one does. Perfect and worth the 3.99 for the paid app that lets you have more than five reminders.

Update after lots of use: The only reason I dropped my rating to five stars is that really often when I check off a task it stays frozen, that is shifted right with the check mark displayed. I have eight habits and it never makes it through all eight without freezing. To get it to register that the habit was done I need to hard close the app and relaunch it. That is a small daily annoyance that I end up doing a couple times each day. 

Besides that, in terms of function and design, this is by far the best app I’ve found, which is why I stick with it despite the minor annoyance of having to hard close it to register which habits are checked off.

They just more than doubled their yearly subscription and have not been fixing bugs or introducing new features. App looks the same after two years. Timer doesn’t work half the time. You have to quit and restart for your changes to show. Finally cut the cord and found a new app. So much happier.

I redownloaded this app lately so that I can create my create my own custom app. But the app now forces you to define your goal so that it can force you to pick a habit from a list of predefined ones which is annoying. Not everyone cares about existing habits in the app. Other than that it is a pretty good app
Used to love this app but next year are doubling the price to $80 a year that’s insane and I will not be renewing my subscription

Though the app itself was moderately helpful, you will be auto charged despite any “free” trial. They will also auto charge you a year later, which I found out last month, despite having no active Apple subscription or a web account. The emails are bogus. I filed a complaint through Paypal to get a refund. Unless you want to give money to them annually forever, don’t use.
I used this for many years and paid but they tripped the price. I’m using paper for tracking habits now. Goodbye. The only thing these people care about now is money.
I think this is a very important app

While I enjoy this app, there are some updates that have long been needed that haven’t happened. For instance, not being able to set a routine at a regular regular interval (every other day). After years, they have not added this feature and it’s making it hard to continue to use this app. For the price I would have expected better updates. Won’t be renewing next year.
Trail is 7 days. Waste of download space

評論.標題: Okay, but not worth subscription increase
評論.內容: The app itself is okay. I found the interface a little unintuitive but workable. However, I got a notification that the subscription would be increasing to $59.99/year. I can’t remember if the original cost was $15.99/year or $29.99/year, but either way: it’s an increase of at least 100% for the same app. I also don’t recall ever receiving any kind of “we’re increasing our prices” announcement, which I kind of expect for a change that significant (though I acknowledge I could have missed it).

I used this app for a year and found it had a positive impact on my life. However, with the annual $80 renewal approaching, I reconsidered whether it was worth the cost. I discovered other apps on the App Store that offer a similar, if not better, experience for much less. While the app works about 85% of the time, it occasionally breaks streaks without reason, experiences significant lag, and has no way to sync with its web version, as confirmed by customer service. Despite these issues, I might overlook them, but the $80 annual fee just isn’t justified.
They scam you in pricing. VERY OVERPRICED and scammy founders. Just do any research and you’ll see the greed these clowns are.

Productive is a great app with good functionality and an intuitive interface. It’s a shame that they have inflated the cost for the pro version to nearly $300 a year. It’s a good app, but it’s not worth that much!

How can anyone stand this kind of app? It starts with a bunch of annoying juvenile questions as if it’s going to run my life for me, and knows what to ask. Then the options are limited when you start. Then it thinks it knows what’s best for me when presenting options. I guess if you’re 13 and haven’t a clue about who you are and what your habits are or should be, this kind of silliness would be good for you.

i absolutely love this app. i’ve even using it and things i always wanted to be habits are now habits. 

one suggestion, and it’s really not a big deal, is to allow the user to add their own measurements. 

for example for a reading goal, the user could enter chapters scenes etc.

many of the habits i have or want to have don’t fit well with the pre-determined list of measurements.

like i said not a big deal at this app is amazing, just a suggestion:)

評論.標題: Great app, wish they didn’t upsell plans so much
評論.內容: I really enjoy using this app for its simplicity and creative UI. It’s exactly what I need. However, one part I find annoying is that everytime I open the app, they show me the screen asking me to upgrade to their paid plan. I’m on the free one and I wish I had more habits to track for free, but that’s okay. At least don’t show me this paid plan every single time I open the app! Other than that, the app is great and I mainly use the widget on iOS to mark the habits that are done!
By far the worst user and metadata tracking policy of any of the habit trackers on the App store. Again, this is for a habit tracker. Gross.
4 Stars
Terrible app just all around
The ad to purchase the subscription for the app (which is NOT cheap) pops up every time you open the app. It’s so infuriating I’m moving to something else. Ridiculous.

評論.標題: Bold move for little if no improvements
評論.內容: Going from $17 to $54 a year is a ridiculously bold move.

My wife and I have both been using this app for years and years. I was fine with $29.99 per year but $79.99 per year means I’m done. 

 Really - nearly tripling the price? 

Didn’t even need to think - just canceled. 

 I hope other people don’t actually put up with this. Keep the price reasonable and I’ll update my review. I won’t hold my breath though.

I can’t use paper habit trackers because I HATE looking at the little empty boxes for a whole month. This does the job perfectly, without the blatant display of my intermittent failures. It tells me when I’ve done so many tasks in a row, and pops up a little celebration screen when I do a good job. I recommend starting small - one or two habits at first. It’s easy to work with if you start small. I recommend this app.

EDIT: I see a lot of people talking about the price. I used this app many many years ago, and paid for a subscription way back when. When I reinstalled it recently, all features were available. I thought there was some sort of mistake so I tried several times to login at the website but it kept erroring out. So I said F-it and just started using the app as it was, all features open. Just wanted to let you know about my experience.
Insanely expensive.

Support team won’t respond unless you send two emails, and if they’re busy, or decide that your question can be answered by their knowledge base, they just won’t respond. Save your money for a better app.
Amazing
Went from $35 per year to $80 per year. What a joke, I’ll use my notepad.

評論.標題: Just go with a different app
評論.內容: A price increase just to remind me to clean my room? no way
From 29.99 to $79.99 annually? For a limited use app? Bananas.

評論.標題: Would be great if not so buggy
評論.內容: Timer based tasks are completely broken - unless the productive app is the active app the timer will stop. Completely useless if it stops counting every time you literally use any other app. This seems like an easy fix too.

I bought the premium version years ago. Recently unable to log back back in without repurchasing a much pricier version. As a special Ed teacher I used to recommend this app to everyone. Now I’m looking for a new app but sad to lose 8 years of habit data!
I’m out

評論.標題: Good app, but not worth price
評論.內容: I’ve used this app for a few years, but never understood why it cost as much as it did. It’s simple and easy to use, but has limits on the customization. I still had to use the Reminders app for a few tasks that required more specificity than Productive allows (for example, something that needs to be done on the 4th Saturday of each month). But now that the develops have announced that they are nearly tripling the price, it’s not worth it. I’ve cancelled my subscription and I’ll no longer be recommending it to my audiences.
Bought the premium app years ago, now they want an exorbitant amount for the subscription. No thanks.

I used to have the free version of this app, after I deleted it, I realized it was useful in reminding me with day-to-day activities. Upon redownloading it, I can’t use it without subscribing either $5.99 weekly or $99/year which is crazy— why would anyone pay that to be reminded to drink water or stretch? I just liked the UI but I’d rather just set reminders for free…
Great app, poor support. I’m a paid web-based user and iOS app stopped being able to access data recently and support emails go unanswered.

I am looking for a habit-tracking app that is easy to use, doesn't require a subscription, and doesn't force you to watch advertisements.

This app asks you a couple of basic questions and then builds a personalized program for you. I really like that you can set custom reminder sounds because I know some other applications require a paid membership for that.

Adding a personalized habit requires a subscription which renders this application useless to me. The premium plan subscription is $100/year or $6/week, total bummer.

評論.標題: Developer is out of their mind
評論.內容:
$25/mo for full features for a productivity app, seriously? Or $99/yr? Completely bizarre pricing scheme aside, I would be willing to take this app much more seriously if the suggested habits weren’t still from Covid era. There’s literally still a “staying at home” and “preventative care” section in 2024. Makes me think that the developer is no where near this app any longer but still think it’s worth $99/yr. 

There isn’t even an apple health sync option. What exactly are you offering for $25/mo or $99/yr?
Now it’s been acquired by Bending Spoons, so that means bad things coming, like a weekly subscription model.
I love the functionality of this app but it is such an eyesore! Please at the very least have an option for a light mode - the black is so depressing and unmotivating 😞

The app was a 5 star before. It did everything I needed for $30 a year. But they recently changed prices to $80 per year, which is outrageous. 

Deleted the app. Sad to see it go, but I’m not paying that price :/
I’ve attempted several times to create an account or log in with Google. The profile is created in the browser but the app won’t let me login!

I have used this app premium version for two months now. It has been amazing. It is exactly what I need. A habit tracker where I can actually analyze the data to see which habits I still need to work on. 

I gave it 4 stars because I’ve been having issues with its timer feature. If I turn on the timer and move to another app, the timer stops working. If I play music or a video, the timer stops working. It’s very frustrating especially since I like using its Pomodoro feature to complete tasks. It throws my data off. 

Another feature that needs to be fixed is displaying data if you completed some of the work. There are some goals that are time based. For example, if the goal is 30 minutes a day, but you only completed 20 minutes. It would be nice to see it in the stats section. You only see if it is completed or not on the calendar even though you have a symbol for some done. 

Additionally, I wish I could export my data to an excel file. If I’m tracking my goals this would take it to the next level.

I know that many have complained about the price increase. I am paying about $35 a year for it. This is pricey but I think it’s worth it. Now if it jumps up to $80 that would be really steep.
used to be a good app for the price, nothing close to what it was anymore

I’m sorry, but I literally can’t do anything on this app without the premium version!!! And I can’t even delete this app because my phone is broken. I can’t participate in challenges or add certain tasks to my day just because I don’t want to pay $6 a week. DO NOT RECCOMEND
This app was exactly what I was looking for, however, you can only add 5 habits in the free version. The premium version is $6 a week!
Why would it jump to $79/year?  That is outrageous. I like using the app, but that is very sneaky to jump to that price.

應用名稱: Hikingbook - 登山健行、跑步、單車，安全探索戶外
應用描述:
【出發前】行前準備，一次到位

• 3D 地圖，立體視界
更直覺地掌握地形與高度變化，播放 3D 鳥瞰影片，準備行程更有自信。

• 超過 1700 條步道資訊
完整的路線、導航、天氣、社群路況回報，直接下載路線參考最方便。

• 規劃路線
快速估算距離、高度變化與行進時間，高度客製化彈性，爬百岳必備規劃工具。

• 裝備清單
建立行程專屬清單，背多重＆帶多少裝備，一目了然、不怕遺漏。

• 戶外社群
每天都有上百筆紀錄分享至社群，快速下載 GPX，與同好一起享受走進自然的樂趣。

【活動時】不只安全，還很精彩

• 免費下載離線地圖
無網路也知道自己身在何處，安全不迷途，全球圖資都能快速下載。升級至 Pro 會員，就能直接在地圖上看手機通訊點與水源，並顯示困難路線。

• 偏移警示
偏移參考路線時，即時接收通知與語音提醒，登山、戶外探索更安全。

• 留守人功能
行前可分享路線計畫給親友，並在你記錄期間，自動分享最新位置。若你逾時結束，你的親友會收到超時警報提醒，不錯失求援時機。

• 記錄行程
完整記錄你的行程軌跡與運動歷程，並添加文字與照片讓紀錄更精彩。每一筆紀錄都會完整保留於 Hikingbook 中，想追蹤運動表現也輕而易舉。

• 支援 Apple Watch
免拿手機就能快速記錄，支援雙指互點兩下功能與 Ultra 機型的「動作」按鈕，給你最便利的操作體驗。

• 與你的 iPhone 功能完美結合
想快速開啟地圖、快速記錄、或在記錄時即時查看數據？不用開 App，通通做得到！Hikingbook 完整支援最新 iPhone 功能，你可以從控制中心快速開啟離線地圖、或使用Apple「捷徑」功能直接在主畫面開始/暫停/結束記錄，用 Siri 操控也沒問題。

【下山後】重溫回憶，快速分享

• 以 3D 鳥瞰影片回顧精彩活動
播放高度沉浸的 3D 影片，重溫當下感動。

• 一鍵上傳
活動紀錄快速上傳雲端，換手機也能無痛轉移。

• 自動同步
連接你的 Garmin、COROS、或 Fitbit 帳號，就能自動上傳你的活動，在同一處掌握全部運動歷程。你也可以連接 Apple「健康」，將你的體能訓練資料匯入，讓 Hikingbook 成為你運動生活的中心。

• 輕鬆分享
用活動快照輕鬆分享你的活動，展現個人風格。上傳活動後紀錄自動彙整，免整理文字與照片，分享完整資訊最方便。

▲▲ 升級 Pro 會員，解鎖超過 10 種專業功能，擁有更棒體驗！首次體驗 7 天免費，下載 App 了解詳情 ▲▲

◆ 更多獨家功能

• 專欄好文定期更新，學習更多戶外必備知識與路線推薦。 
• 整合 Apple「健康」應用程式，可追蹤行程的距離與體能訓練資料。 
• Hikingbook 匯出的檔案，包含天氣、圖片等資訊，可呈現更豐富的登山歷程。匯入 Hikingbook 所匯出的登山行程，可完整呈現紀錄資訊。 
• 支援臺灣常用的 WGS84、TWD67、TWD97 大地測量系統與 TM2、DD、DMS 常用座標格式。

◆ 貼心提醒

• 若開啟軌跡紀錄功能，App 會在背景模式執行 GPS ，長時間在背景模式執行 GPS 可能會加速耗損電力以及降低手機電池的壽命。 
• GPS 雖然能增進在野外活動的安全性，但並不能完全取代指北針、地圖等傳統的定位定向工具。此外，GPS 會因植被、地形和天氣等因素產生定位誤差，甚至沒有收訊，使用前請務必了解其侷限性。

◆ 與我們聯絡

找客服，很容易！如果你有使用上的問題，請透過以下任一方式與我們聯絡：

客服信箱：support@hikingbook.net
FB 粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/HikingbookTaiwan
需要使用教學嗎？歡迎到支援中心搜尋：https://support.hikingbook.net/

服務條款：https://hikingbook.net/terms

評論.內容: Not intuitive
離線也能用

應用描述:
Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Use the free version of Endel with no time limits. Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

You can get access to Endel Premium by subscribing to a recurrent plan of your choice or with a one-time Lifetime purchase.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.


For more information:


Terms of Use - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003558200

Privacy Policy - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003562619

評論.標題: Great app to wind down to
評論.內容: If it’s relaxing, focus on work, or trying to go to sleep; this app really has different options in sounds when it comes to pitches and editing what you’d like to hear. Easy to use and customizable. I enjoy using this app more than I thought I would. #5stars & would recommend to friends.

Bought the subscription and was charged, said “You’re all set.” Then another message came up saying “Request failed. There is already another active subscriber using the same receipt.” But the app options remain locked. Meanwhile I’ve been charged. Stay away from buying this.
This app did not repay my subscription fee through the App Store, 120 dollars taken out of my account and never returned. Shame on you! I’d give negative stars if I could.

It used to be my go to app when I was feeling anxious and couldn’t fall asleep. I would put it on timer and fall deeply asleep. Now with the “updates”, which means almost everything is only available on premium, it’s unusable. You get only 10 min of soundscapes if you don’t want to subscribe to premium. I’ll be deleting it now :(

評論.標題: Wait for the 70% off coupon or don’t buy
評論.內容: The free version is rubbish. They have 3 total sounds to choose from which all sound indistinguishable to me. You can play them in 6 or 10 minute intervals and that’s it. The sounds all contain this sort of cosmic wave sound in the back that makes me anxious. Nothing like the add. If you’re going to buy it, shake the tree and say no until you get a 1 year subscription for $35. Awful.

This app has become useless unless you have premium, and it’s not enough to close on the upsell to premium which is too overpriced for its viability within the increasingly expensive stack of subscriptions that I am having to bankroll. I don’t think this pricing is viable long term and I’m going to be looking for free alternatives. If the pricing was much lower and the free version at least worked how it used to I would potentially be upsold to premium which — if it was even possible for this app to be a daily habit anymore. Devs have lost touch with the fundamentals of a freemium to premium biz model.

My iPhone became unable to connect with the Internet. I spent at least eight hours dealing with the problem, both online and in person with Verizon. They finally sent me a new phone. After loading the new phone, the problem persisted. I happened to see this app on my phone, which I realized I had downloaded six days ago. I deleted it. MY PROBLEM RESOLVED, INSTANTLY.
I feel the 876hz or whatever truly does help, feels like it resets my brain. The timers are pretty useful as well, and getting the subscription helps me commit to using it for work.

評論.標題: The very best color noise generator in iOS
評論.內容:
I will let the results speak for themselves. The first time I used this before going to bed, I slept for almost 8 hours (from 3 hours normally) and the following night over 11 hours. 

I have had other white noise apps before, however they are more distracting as I can hear when the sound loop repeats every time. This app doesn’t suffer from that issue. It has made a significant impact on my sleeping quality and length. I have not tried any of the other uses for the app yet, but much appreciate the Sleep mode that does work well for me.

Even with a 30% discount, $7 a month is wildly overpriced. $5 month a la cart or cheaper with annual subscription is more in line with the simplicity of this app. 

Neat app, but the developers need a reality check overcharging for beeps and boops. 

As of late, basic Free functionality has crippled the app in an attempt to stiff arm you into purchasing a subscription. 

Consider making an option for one time purchase even, but a subscription for this is laughably out of touch with reality. Best of luck.

I used to love this app. I have a hard time sleeping and this app was my go-to on difficult nights when I was struggling to relax. I recently went through some issues with my phone where I lost all my apps. When I went to redownload this app, it had totally changed and now will only give you 10mins of sound before shutting off, and if you want more, you have to pay for premium. To my embarrassment, I had just recommended this app to a friend who struggles like me, and had to reach out and apologize to her, saying I didn’t know it had changed. She told me she had tried it, but with it shutting off all the time, defeated the purpose for her. And I agree.

This app knows me better than I know myself! I don’t remember how, but they determined my energy profile, and they are SPOT ON!!

I used to pay for a mish-mash of a few different apps cobbled together to get what I receive far more completely completely in Endel.

Don’t knock it til you try it!

I know I’m not using this app to its full potential yet. While I think it’s reasonably priced, I do wish it were easier to get to the user manual.
App is not free and does not work very well unless you subscribe and pay monthly. Free trail is only 7 days. Don’t download unless you are willing to pay.

The app won’t function without a subscription so how do I know if it will even work? I would like to hope that it works and I see a lot of good reviews which can be bought or created so I’m completely without confidence that this works and I can’t try it, but I didn’t find out that I couldn’t try it until I gave them all of my contact information. Yay I don’t feel used at all.
I was unable to even explore the free trial because the app kept closing. Frustrating! The opposite effect I was hoping for!
Such useful and incredible soundscapes.

評論.標題: Top tier iOS app ever made!
評論.內容: Lifetime subscriber here! I have never written any app reviews, as this is my 1st time doing it, I  wanna thank everyone who is involved to create this app, from designing the app to color choice to sound design , layout…everything about this app is so advanced, feels like an app from a sci-fi movie…I wish you guys made a Windows & Mac version desktop App as well🙏 Amazing App! It really boosts my mood, focus & sleep!

評論.標題: Great for iOS, not as great for Mac
評論.內容: We need feature parity between iOS and Mac.  I really dislike dealing with the interface, but I like the focus timer and shortcuts integration within iOS.  If the shortcuts I built in iOS would run on Mac OS, I would be able to set my focus mode, set a timer, and play my focus soundscape all with the click of a button.

Why is the free version now limited to 10 minutes? I use this app to help me focus whilst studying and sleeping and after the latest update it suddenly went silent because the devs thought it would be a good idea to limit how long you could listen at a time? That’s so selfish! I can’t afford premium and used to love the app, unfortunately I will be uninstalling
I signed up for the 7 day trial and within minutes they had drafted $19.99 from my account.  I immediately cancelled but have know way of contacting them for a refund!

Wasn’t sure how to find premade actual songs with the beats needed for happy brain. lol 
If anyone knows how I can find that… I would be so open to purchase this app. I need happy soothing brain stimulating beats to great songs. Kinda bummed. I’m sorry
I will give this a bad review because support does not answer questions. This seems to be a project with finish and sell with only profit in mind.

評論.標題: Not worth your time or money
評論.內容:
I see reviews about how great the app USED to be and I’m absolutely jealous I missed the experience.

First. 10mins is not enough ESPECIALLY for a neurodivergent, you guys know this. That’s why the app was created in the first place, to give us the ability for long focused sessions.

Second. Your subscriptions are predatory at best, $100 a year just so we have the ability/comfort to focus on basic everyday tasks that neurotypicals can just do without help. Neurodivergent people struggle with cost management, forget to cancel subscriptions, make little money as it is. 

We struggle enough without you dangling false promises and shady tactics to envelope us in this false hope that we can function normally using your application.

“Free” sounds now only play for 10 minutes. I guess I’ll have to find something else to play sleep sounds.. 

what a joke. This app used to be great. Now they’re just money grabbing. $85 a year for sleep sounds? Rip off.
I used to use this app every night for sleep abd it worked amazing, it really went downhill recently, the free version is practicaly useless and the subscription is ludicrusly expencive

A wonderful app, but unfortunately I’m the type of person who like to receive everything with full transparency. No subscriptions or cheap tricks to get me to pay the $100 per year subscription fee. The constant ads to get the premium subscription is annoying at best and devious at its worst. And this is an app made for neurodivergent people, yet most ND people (including myself) are below the poverty line and thus can’t even afford or have the luxury to pay for the full experience. It’s deceptive to claim your app is made for ND folks yet wring them out of every cent we have. It’s basically extortion. I deleted this app because I’m tired of the lies they claim to help.

I used to really like this app, but now I can only use this app for 10 minute sessions, unless I pay them. I’ve used this app for years, enjoying the focus sounds as I work. I guess I have to uninstall now. Thanks Endel!

Offer your users meaningful items to purchase. Don’t all of a sudden try to make your users pay for something that they’ve always been able to use.
only 10 minutes of noise.

I just got an apple Vision Pro and immediately downloaded the Endel app. It is just a very great experience. I have been a user for a long time now and I wouldn’t go without the app. It’s worth subscribing or you miss out on something extraordinary.

評論.標題: Not sure if I want to try

If it offered the free trial and let me click on the one month I’ll would do it but na thanx
So many steps and screen to get through to USE the app. I couldn’t focus enough to get through and answer their “survey” that doesn’t even affect the app.

This was a great app until the developer decided to add a splash screen every time you open the app that tries to sell you on a lifetime purchase (even if you already pay for an annual subscription). The splash screen should show up once and give you the option to accept or decline. The fact that appears every time you open the app, even if you’ve already declined the offer 100 times is incredibly annoying.
I’ve used Endel for years now, many days while I work to help me focus, and most nights to help me sleep. It’s a constant companion, and I’m so grateful.

Free version very brief time limits make it unusable for its intended use.   Over $100 for a lifetime subscription to an app that generates sounds to relax to or monthly pricing the same as a real streaming service?  No thanks.

評論.標題: Another great app lost to subscription model
評論.內容: More of the free features are ending up behind paywalls. Too bad I really liked this app.

評論.標題: I wanted to like this app
評論.內容: I gave this app 2 months. But it would start up in the middle of my job and interrupt the times I played Duolingo. It was like having a jealous toddler.

評論.標題: UPDATE: predatory pricing even though it was only ever worth the space on my phone
評論.內容:
I've been using this app for actual years to fall asleep. JUST to fall asleep. I use the sleep sound and the shut-off timer for twenty minutes every night and I'm out like a light. Guess what? The shut off timer is $60 a year now. Keep your money and your lousy music. Deleted the app. I'm going back to rain sounds.

Dude, a SHUT OFF TIMER? $60 subscription?? Every single app and device on the planet has a shut-off timer and not once in all of human history have they been worth $60. You are not offering anyone a "premium experience" anymore, you've turned your unfinished noise app into a money-shredder for people who became reliant on it. Shame on you.
This app is constantly removing features and has become worse over the past year. It used to be a good app with access to soundscapes, but now you got five minutes per soundscape.

This app used to be incredible, I’ve even had the pro version which was great. But all of a sudden, after over a year of use, you can only use the free version for 10min sessions? There’s so many better substitutes for focus and sleep sounds in that case. The app has no utility unless you pay $80+.  

App is not worth downloading anymore.

評論.標題: Endel should have never launched this app without committing to building out content.
評論.內容: I am an Endel lifetime, premium subscriber, and in Apple Vision Pro day one owner. I had high hopes for this app, but the four coming soon options I’ve still never been developed. How is recalled coming soon as something that was cursed in an over commitment because it reflects so negatively when you announce something and then under deliver. What is soon? Is it ever coming? It looks like the answer is no and this app was thrown out there to say we’ve got Apple Vision Pro, but when reality settles down. It’s clear this app isn’t the prioritythe Endel team.

評論.標題: Previously glorious, now tainted by paywalling
評論.內容: I’ll keep things brief. Used to be absolutely fabulous even with free version: sounds help me focus and drown out background noise like nothing else. Easy 5/5, didn’t need to buy premium yo enjoy. But recent blatant cash grabs have dropped them 2 stars at least, would give 2.5 if I could. The most recent is the most egregious: free users are subjected to a 10-minute “session limit.” Every 10 minutes, I have to pick up my phone, open the app, click “no I would rather not buy premium at this moment [skip],” and THEN press play again. Deeply annoying and inconvenient. Tbh I’ll probably crack and drop the $125 on a 50% off lifetime premium membership before long, but I will not be happy about it. Hope you’re happy your cash grab is working, Endel, because it’s going to cost you a lot of users.

I used to love Endel and even subscribed to premium from time to time when I could afford it but today I'm deleting the app. They now limit sessions to 10 minutes. I have insomnia and Endel's sleep mode used to help me fall asleep. Unfortunately I can't fall asleep in 10 minutes so this is no longer useful to me.

I could deal with the incessant advertising for premium but limiting sessions to 10 minutes at a time is going too far. I understand they need to make money but this is just silly.
Restarted phone and everything, app opens and shuts down to home screen

I love Endel. I’m a lifelong subscriber. 
I use if for sleep, to improve focus, to warm down after exercise, on walks. 
It’s been very effective at helping me manage increased anxiety and brain fog lately due to serious medical issues. 
Listen, your body can’t heal if you’re running around in fight or flight survival mode. Get Endel.

Says free trial then it charges you right away. Then i see the price of the subscription $5.99 for 3 months not $29.99 like they charged me. Such a scam they set up the options yo trick you into choosing the not free trial. I deleted the app and Apple refused to give me a refund. I want my money back.

I've used this app for years now and they are getting greedy. they've recently changed their free user plan to only 10 minutes, before it was endless.
you could get gifts and i got an exclusive sleep sound only to then get it stripped from me.

They will put a bandaid over our reviews saying "this is going making our product better" even though they were doing phenomenal before. they're just greedy and seek profit.

This app was the only thing that helped with my chemotherapy induced tinnitus. I used to recommend this app to so many people but now with the ten minute limit, it is practically useless. I don’t understand how charging customers for this will help make improvements to the app when nobody is going to pay for this without having used the original version and most people who downloaded the original version are uninstalling. I am unfortunately uninstalling and looking for better alternatives to help me sleep.
The price increase is absurd for an app like that. Not ok. Think you guys have clearly lost your ways!!

應用名稱: 睡眠偵測：睡覺睡眠紀錄與白噪音助眠Sleep Monitor
開發者: Xi'an Monster Software Technology Co., Ltd
應用描述:
Sleep Monitor睡眠偵測是一款幫助您輕鬆入睡，記錄夢話錄音，追踪睡眠週期的睡眠健康應用。我們致力於讓您睡得更好、睡得更香，從而更好地了解自己的睡眠行為，保持健康與活力。

每天清晨在舒緩的音樂中開始新的一天，我們還會為您提供詳盡的睡眠報告分析,幫助您養成更好的睡眠習慣，通過各類舒緩助眠曲和冥想曲，減輕焦慮與壓力，保持專注平靜，放鬆身心。

#Sleep Monitor適用於以下人群
-存在睡眠困擾的人群（入睡難、易驚醒、多夢、淺眠）
-想要自我診斷是否存在睡眠質量差的跡象
-想要探索睡眠的奧秘，從而改善睡眠質量
-不想花錢購買智能手錶等可穿戴設備來監測睡眠質量的人群

#特色功能#

【輕鬆入睡】
-為您提供100+舒緩助眠曲，包括自然、輕音樂、冥想曲、ASMR、白噪音等，總有一首適合你。
-在輕鬆舒緩的音樂氛圍中，集中註意力，放鬆自己，更快地入睡。

【記錄夢話錄音】
-記錄睡眠中發出的打呼聲、鼾聲或夢話等其他睡眠噪音，第二天早晨收聽夜晚的各種聲音，趣味無窮！

【追踪睡眠週期】
-晚上睡眠者將有4或5個睡眠週期。通常，睡眠者將在一個睡眠週期中經過四個睡眠階段：非快速眼動1（醒來與睡眠之間），非快速眼動2（輕度睡眠），非快速眼動3（深度睡眠）和快速眼動睡眠（做夢）。
-這些階段從1到REM循環進行，然後從階段1開始。一個完整的睡眠週期平均需要90到110分鐘，每個階段持續5到25分鐘。
-每天晚上我們都會追踪您的睡眠，這樣您就可以從科學的角度了解自己的睡眠週期。

【提醒睡眠&溫柔喚醒】
-允許通知權限來提醒您在就寢時間睡覺。
-每天早上在最佳時間伴隨著最喜歡的音樂神清氣爽地醒來。

【詳盡的睡眠報告分析】
-Sleep Monitor將會系統地分析您的就寢行為和睡眠模式，然後生成睡眠評分，以更好地改善睡眠。
-根據每週或每月的睡眠報告，科學分析睡眠數據，發現其中的變化。

【標記影響睡眠的因素/添加睡眠筆記】
-如果您在睡前喝咖啡、吃得晚、運動或有任何病理狀況，可以標記這些影響睡眠的因素或者添加睡眠筆記，發現這些因素/筆記是如何影響您的睡眠質量的。

【Apple Health整合】
-與蘋果健康數據完全整合，可同步步數和心率。

#Sleep Monitor高級版本#
√ 添加睡眠筆記
√ 解鎖全部催眠曲和冥想曲
√ 追踪鼾聲、夢話及其他噪音
√ 深入了解睡眠趨勢，更好的提升睡眠質量

#應用工作要求#
√ 將您的iPhone放在枕頭附近或床邊
√ 獨自入睡以消除乾擾
√ 電池充足

確保您的臥室安靜、黑暗、涼爽，睡前放鬆身心
祝您擁有嬰兒般充足而甜美的睡眠！

#關於訂閱#
Sleep Monitor為您提供三種自動續訂訂閱類型：
-週計劃（每週收費$4.99）
-月度計劃（每月收費$9.99）
-年度計劃（每年收費$29.99）

*付款將在確認購買時向iTunes帳戶收取。
*除非至少在當前訂閱期結束前 24 小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱將自動續訂。
*在當期結束前的24小時您的賬戶將被收取續訂費用，並確定續費費用。
*您可以管理訂閱，購買後在您的“帳戶設置”中也可以關閉自動續訂。
*如果提供的免費試用期的任何部分未使用，如果您在試用的情況下購買該部分的訂閱，那麼未使用部分將失效。
*如果您未購買自動續訂訂閱，您仍然可以正常使用我們的應用程序, 訂閱到期後，任何未鎖定的內容都可正常使用。

-使用條款：http://sleepmonitor.emobistudio.com/doc/termsofuse.html
-隱私政策：https://www.emobistudio.com/SleepMonitor/PrivacyPolicy.html
-聯繫我們：sleepmonitordev2@gmail.com

應用描述:
Zwift：室內騎行，其樂無窮

使用應用程式加入百萬人社群，為所有人帶來樂趣無窮的室內騎行體驗。無論你是經驗豐富的運動員，還是初次接觸的新手，在身歷其境的 3D 世界中體驗虛擬單車騎行，在壯麗的爬坡風景中挑戰自我，探索無盡的路線。Zwift 提供競速、團體騎行、騎行訓練以及結構化的訓練計畫，帶來紮實的鍛鍊成果。

連接你的腳踏車

將您的智慧型自行車 (如 Zwift Ride) 或自行車和智慧型訓練台 (包括 Zwift、Wahoo、Garmin 等)，順暢連接到你的智慧型手機、平板電腦或 AppleTV，即可在舒適的家中達成健身目標。

在 12 座身歷其境的虛擬世界中探索上百條路線。無論是在 Watopia 的壯麗坡道，或是 Scottish highlands 秀美風光，每次騎行都是全新的探索機會。

加入全球社群

加入充滿活力與熱情的全球社群。串聯朋友、結交新朋友，投入團體騎行、競速與活動。透過 Zwift Companion 應用程式，讓你無論是否騎乘單車，都能追蹤自己的資料，並串聯朋友、俱樂部與社群。Zwift 甚至能與 Strava 連接，確保提供無縫的訓練追蹤體驗。 

室內訓練計畫，量身打造

我們的世界級教練與冠軍車手為不同程度的車手量身設計各種訓練項目與計畫。無論你是新手，還是想更上一層樓，都能找到適合你的完美計畫。從 30 分鐘的快速爆發衝刺到長時間的耐力騎行，Zwift 提供靈活的選擇，還有上 1000 種隨選訓練項目，配合你的日程安排和目標。

隨時參與競速

與世界各地的車手一同較勁是最有效的鍛鍊方式。但不用害怕！Zwift 坐擁世界上最大的選手社群，囊括首次參賽的車手，乃至精英運動員，保證所有人都能參與適合自己的挑戰。
騎行與跑步！
不僅僅是車手，Zwift 也歡迎跑者使用。你可以直接購買 Zwift 的 RunPod，或同步你的智慧跑步機或步速傳感器同步，即可進入 Zwift 的世界，每一次散步或跑步都會讓你離目標更近一步。

立即加入 Zwift

現在就是最佳時機，享受運動樂趣又能獲得實際成效。立即下載 Zwift，無論身在何處都能立刻動起來，首次使用還可享免費試用。

立即下載
請造訪 zwift.com/terms 查看使用條款

I used to love zwift, but not sure what changed. I used it a year ago in 2021 to train for a 70.3. mostly fine. Started training for a bike trip couple months ago and it's awful. Nothing has changed besides the physical bike. Same wahoo kickr, same Garmin vector pedals, same Fenix 6 (for HR). Now my sensors drop all the time mid workout and zwift crashes mid workout losing my workout. Absolute garbage, I waste so much time trying to reconnect and yelling at it.
Excellent challenging-way to get fit
