I been using Zwift runners on my treadmill for a few years, have been very pleased but recently have had issues 10 mins into my run where the connectivity drops, the runner stops. The last three recent updates seems is where the issues started, before I never had these problems.
I have reached out to customer support three times and no one has returned my emails. 
That being said, I decided the only way to get their attention is by writing this review to alert others of the issue if you considering this app.
I have also have done the whole process of elimination, trying to figure out the issues knowing it isn’t on my end. Please fix the problem, cause it totally messes with my workout.
I love the exercise I can get at home with Zwift.

評論.標題: It’s fine, but I want it to be more advanced.
評論.內容:
The app is fine and does the job on an IPad while using a spin bike. But for the price of $20 a month, it’s really lacking. The UX and UI aren’t very good. I understand it’s meant to be a game, but it feels like a Wii game from the 2000s, and because of that, doesn’t feel like a serious training app. For some reason, you also need a secondary companion app to sync with Strava and other third party services. 

I want to be able to control the typography, HUD, guidance notices, and more. They pack too much stuff on the screen while you ride and riders should be able to control this for maximum effect. On my iPad Air, I can’t even make out what some of the stuff says. There wasn’t much consideration for device screen size scaling. And I can’t enjoy what little of the course I see.

If my employer didn’t cover the cost, I probably wouldn’t be using it.

Years of this app and I’m amazed at what still hasn’t been addressed.
Workouts still have broken cadence cues 
ERG mode doesn’t match the fluidity of platforms like trainer road
Most of all, you still can’t turn off the chat. Great if you enjoy watching people spew hatred and harassment while you ride but not really my style.
If you want an app focused on cycling, I suggest trainerroad. If you’re looking to take your forum and Facebook drama to the trainer Zwift is for you!
New York map has had issues for over a year and Zwift has not fixed. Consistent lagging, KoMs basically stall out the app. Pls fix
Excellent.

No way to talk to an actual person, even when f ordering expensive equipment. Chat bot sends you in circles.  Chat person slow, chatting always freezes.  Email answers are slow, and often require clarifications, etc.  You wait again.  Good app though.  Just atrocious support.  Will switch to Rouvy.
20 dollers a month now!  No thanks. Not worth it

Really had fun with this for a bit but the app is too slow and super laggy making it unusable. My laptop is a newer thinkpad and internet connection is fast. Very frustrating using this app, unfortunately cancelled my subscription and will be using training peaks instead

Connection issues, performance issues, image gets burned onto the screen - you name it. Worked so poorly with their own Zwift hub trainer that I’ll never go back. Get TrainerRoad or literally any other app and train for real. This “game” is a joke.
Please oh please add more pop-ups, starting and ending a ride. I’m sure there’s something else more that you can add. It’s becoming ridiculous.
A few surgeries kept me off the bike, but I’m back on. Thanks Zwift.

So the app kept prompting me to subscribe even though I was paying monthly thru apple.  Finally the app stopped working all together even though my subscription was still valid.  I contacted Zwift support and waited for 30 minutes on the chat for someone to respond.  No one ever did.  My recommendation is to find another app
I love Zwift but why very bummed they got rid of time of ghost riders under “Zwifters Nearby”. Can we get that back?

It work great for a while then none of my rides would save. It’s going on 2 weeks and the customer support has not been able to fix it. No luck talking to a real person unless it’s through emails. I’m about ready to give up on them.

This really is the secret to better cycling ability. It is better than having a personal trainer. You could never do these types of structured and productive workouts on the street. Certainly this is no replacement for outdoor riding, but one of the best things I ever heard a professional rider say was quantity outside and quality inside. I am a beginner to intermediate rider, one full Iron Man and one Olympic triathlon. But I feel like I’ve gotten much stronger using Zwift.

I bought a brand new canyon aeroad and tons of mods.  I couldn’t get off the bike.  I also have a Quintana Roo on rollers for cold or rain days. I used to dread indoor riding. To help this I ended up getting zwift and the zwift ride.  It took 2 weeks to really get into it.  Even still, out of saddle I still struggle a bit on the ride machine.   Since getting used to zwift, I have only take my bike out twice in a month vs 20+ days in a month.  I don’t want to go outdoors anymore.  So much work and time to prepare.  At home I jump on, off, see my kids who love to watch my races.  It’s a major game changer.  I also went from a 245ftp to 279 in a month.  The last road ride I did equaled 20+ ftp too.  I had so much power and with zwift, mainly because you don’t coast like you do on roads.  Zero crashes or bad experiences at all.   Well outside being ranked at a certain ftp and seeing guys steadily double it in races.

評論.標題: Apple Watch Integration Remains a Major Frustration
評論.內容: Apple Watch should be integrated better into Zwift at this point. It is very hit or miss. Lately I have spent 10 minutes or more each workout trying to get it to connect. I have an Apple Watch Ultra 2. If this remains an issue, I will 100% start trying other services. I have been loyal to Zwift for the last year or so but definitely starting to second guess this loyalty. This issue seems to only be getting worse

Months later, several up dates to the main app and the hub trainer, it’s working. The terrain is good the old. Video game look is fine I want the ride to feel good. Especially for the cost. The climbing portal is nice. The capacity to make up your own workouts is great. So thanks for getting better👍
Zwift is great to allow me to make progress at a measured pace.

評論.標題: Either the bike design or the app is flawed- no portrait mode?
評論.內容: How is it possible that the Zwift app cannot operate in portrait mode on an iPhone? The phone rest on the bike is designed to hold it that way yet still it doesn’t seem like an issue raised years ago is fixed. Either the bike design or the app is flawed
I can’t ride. It just shows me a still picture.
Why can’t we create custom runs?
I’ve deleted everywhere and tried to cancel and still keep getting billed.   Now I’m filing complaint to my credit card on fraud billing.   This app is a pain

My husband and I both ride on here. I typically tend to work a little later than he does and will start my ride as he is in the middle of his. Whenever I open my laptop to connect my resistance and other equipment, it continues to default to his and his equipment disconnects from the setup he had going in the middle of his ride and he gets really mad every time. I have no way to “forget” or remove his equipment from mine to make it stop doing this. Would be great if I was able to at least make my equipment the default and have it stop auto connecting to his - especially in the middle of his rides. I feel terrible. 

I never connected to his stuff before so I have no idea why it continues to select his before I can even go in and unattached without impact..

Zwift is the ultimate for indoor training.  I’ve used various types of trainers before smart trainers were an option.  The old way was boring and challenging.  Zoom to the current status of trainers:  Smart trainers are awesome as they respond to virtual terrain, yes the uphill grades.  Also, when you shift to a big gear and crank out the watts if shows on your avatar speed.

Zwift is the ultimate platform.  Others have tried but they mimic and fall short.  Zwift has the long term experience and the largest bulk of subscribers to create something that is absolutely engaging.  You feel literally transported to Watopia—The Zwift Cycling World.  It’s too cool, you see folks from all over the world cycling there.  You can go free-style and just ride. Or, you can enter a race, a group ride, or a workout.  Zwift has it all!  

If you want to be consistent, Zwift is a great option as you simple jump on your bike & trainer, then go.  Also, for those of us who deal with harsh winters, Zwift allows us to have fun, train and maintain or build our fitness during the snow & ice.  

I’ve purchased Zwift Trainers for 3 of my adult kids and they thank me regularly.  Even my wife who used to despise indoor trainers thoroughly enjoys and utilizes Zwift.  Thanks Zwift!
Frequent updates too
Very reliable app. Keeps challenging me all the time. Very easy graphics and reliable data.

App was amazing and now it has become worse.  Changes don’t make sense and make it harder to navigate.  No wrench for calibration, 
Why did you need to change the app, everything seems very spaced out, and  tabs menus are so cluttered with small font. You don’t need to change navigation just enhance it, like Xbox does.  Xbox is a poor example, but they accomplish this better than Zwift

評論.標題: Please fix the U turn button! (Or get rid of it)
評論.內容:
I’d like to suggest an “Are you sure you want to make a U turn?” dialog box. 

I was just battling it out at the last 500M of an hour long climb only to have a bead of sweat fall on the U turn button and send me booking it back down the mountain at 300 watts. Why? How often are risers making u turns in this world? 

Thanks
It's a good app, but there are apps like this that are cheaper.

I broke my femur road biking in 2016. During recovery I got on Zwift. Definitely helped get back in shape and biking again. Have been Zwifting since and it helps riding through winter and in spring ready to go. Never bored with the races , group rides, jokes and challenges.

Terrible experience to start with. I ordered the Wahoo KICKR Core from zwift along with a 1 year membership, however they didn’t send me a code for my membership. Dismal customer service, basically non-existent. No one to call or connect with, and the chat bot can’t solve my problem.
plans to fix?
Pretty good app and experience. Apple Watch connectivity is still rather flaky and wish there were more settings available to the user having to do with graphics and UI.

評論.標題: Not as good as it used to be
評論.內容: I have over 50,000 miles logged on Zwift. The experience has gone downhill since I started several years ago. Flaky heart rate detection.  Features like drafting are inconsistent, and are updated randomly. I wouldn’t even care about the price if it worked the same as it did three years ago. I’m currently looking for an alternative.
No helmet and full speed top-tube descending #HeroMode

評論.標題: I look fwd to zwift every day
評論.內容: I get in the app and i can see the stats I’m looking for. I can step up my game with some competition. I get rewards and recognition…but not too much. Overall, it’s a fun and rewarding experience with great outcomes.
Perfect for training when there’s bad weather. It does cost a bit though to get a setup. Very great for training though.

I was cycling on Zwift for about 5 years until they recently raised their rates *for a second time* from 15 to 20 per month (it was 10 when I first started). I can appreciate that the costs of running a business aren’t static, but the value this product delivers hasn’t significantly changed in 5 years to justify a 100% rate increase. This is basically the cost of a basic-level gym membership, except there’s only one piece of equipment, and I have to furnish it. Sad to have to cancel my subscription, but enough is enough.

The price increased without them telling me.  Poor service to increase without informing the customer if they want to keep it or not.  So I cancelled. 

Has some flaws where you can give thumbs up or wave at people.  Everytime I press those buttons from the iPhone app it doesn’t work.  None of them do.  Fix this and I’ll consider coming back when it gets cold outside again.  

And do better next time by informing the customer the price is increasing.
Súper práctico para cuando no tienes el tiempo suficiente para salir a rodar

When the app is working it is great. Customer service is basically non existent. If you experience technical difficulties plan on it taking over a week to resolve the problem. Requests for help are only handled via email. I don’t believe assistance is from real people but rather AI. The responses don’t address the problem and direct you to do things you’ve already told them you tried. They recently increased their monthly subscription by about 30% and there has been no additional benefit.

應用描述:
輕鬆瘦身是一款簡易卻功能強大的iPhone/iPod體重控制應用軟件。

你是否嘗試過瘦身卻因難以長期堅持而告失敗呢?

你只需每天輸入測量的體重,輕鬆瘦身將會根據目標體重將你的體重記錄製成曲線圖表。

了解體重和它的變化趨勢是控制體重最初也是最重要的一步。

輕鬆瘦身將這一步驟變得簡單快樂!
簡單帶來長久的堅持!
堅持帶來意想不到的瘦身效果!

輕鬆瘦身軟件的幾大特點:

 - 擁有簡易可愛的用戶界面。

 - 使用曲線圖表記錄並觀察體重和身體的脂肪比例變化!

 - 對每天輸入的身體數據進行體質指數計算並標示。超重的區域會在曲線圖表中用黃色/紅色標示出來。

 - 滾動縮小和放大曲線圖表以觀察以往的身體數據記錄。

 - 備忘錄可以記錄你的飲食和運動量。

 - 您就可以進行事項記錄了!

 - 數據導入和導出。

 - 設置密碼對你的隱私加以保護。

 - 更改設計主題。選擇您喜歡的主題!

 - 与健康护理应用程序连接，提供更多便利
现在支持向苹果的健康护理应用程序写入数据。当你在《简单饮食》上记录你的体重和体脂率时，它们将自动写入你的健康护理应用程序。


*:..｡o○ 高級新功能 ○o｡..:*

購買“刪除廣告 + 平均工具”附加功能可將圖表下方廣告刪除，取而代之為一工具欄。您可使用此工具欄來顯示平均體重和體脂肪圖表。平均值區間可選為一周、一個月或三個月。


********************** 注意**********************
此應用軟件為一款針對健康成人的體重減輕/管理工具。
本應用不提供任何的醫學建議也不能確保用戶能夠成功的​​達到目標體重。
如果您正在就醫或有任何的身體功能紊亂,請就您的體重管理問題諮詢您的醫師。
過分的節食或運動會傷害你的健康。嘗試根據自己的情況做適量運動並均衡飲食。
**************************************************


長久堅持,簡單輕鬆,享受體重管理上的進展帶來的樂趣!

使用輕鬆瘦身,擁有快樂輕鬆的瘦身之旅!

* 如果您有任何疑問或其他功能需求,請隨時通過以下方式聯繫我們:

http://www.simpleweight.net/zh/#contact

或者在Twitter關注@SimpleWeight,關注我,在不經意間提及我吧:)

* 請在iTunes商店留下您的評價。您的反饋對於本應以軟件的提高和改進具有重要意義!

評論.內容: 딱 필요한 기능만 심플하면서 쓰기 편하게 되있음
Really great app, easy to use, and it’s functions are good design for the weight record.

I’ve used this app since 2013, so about 7 years. I love it! Its super quick and easy to use. Just open the app, type weight, press ok. Done. It has the option write in notes, or rate your meal and exercise 1-4, (you decide what those rates mean). You can write in all those notes after you’ve logged your weight. 
Anyways, it shows ALL your weight data on a continuous line graph. You have the option to view the graph by day, week, month, 90 days, 180 days, 1 year, and 3 years, and you can scroll to see more of your data. Oh, you can have a target weight and it will appear as a dotted line on your graphs and when you input your weight a banner at the top tells you how much weight you’ve lost or gained since the last time you logged weight and it also tells you how close you are to your target weight. Anyways its super easy and great, and i love having so much data on it so i can see how my weight changes, and even recognize some patterns.
It’s a great and easy tool to keep tracking my weight.

I’m a Registered Dietitian Nutritionist (RDN) and a Certified Diabetes Educator (CDE) and I’m always looking for simple and easy to use, yet detailed weight tracking apps that display overall trends. Out of ~40+ that I’ve tried this one is definitely my favorite. I use it myself and recommend it to my patients that like using apps to keep track of their weight (some people still like paper). 
I completely agree with the app developer on the importance of looking at weight change trends. Looking at a weight at one point in time isn’t very valuable whereas trends are key to showing both short and long term success or it might show that you need to consider making a change, come up with a plan or reevaluate the current plan. It’s easy for people to look at a graph trend and see the big picture. A list of numbers isn’t as easy to comprehend. I also love the automatic BMI calculation. Most people don’t know how to calculate their BMI. 
Overall, this app is amazing. You can change what it looks like - I wish the app icon would change to the one I chose for the inside (wood isn’t cute at all). Another thing I love is the little Kawaii bear and how colorful the app is. The keypad where you type your weight is huge and easy to see. This app is SOOO easy to use, there’s pretty much nothing you need to learn since it’s self explanatory. It works great, it’s fast and I’ve never had any problems with it. I love that you can go back and enter previous weights and the date, etc. You can put notes in too - for ex: if you entered your weight for the day and your goal is weight loss. If today’s weight is up a few pounds from last week - you can put a note in as to why it’s up or what you think may have caused it to increase. For me, one time mine went up several pounds and I knew it would bec I’d just gotten back from vacation and wasn’t eating as healthy as I normally do so thankfully I put that in the note and if I ever need to look back and wonder why my weight went up, I can click on it and my notes pops up. I also use the notes section for tracking my temperature, blood pressure and oxygen saturation. Also if you weighed yourself on a different scale (at the gym vs at home or the doctors office, etc. you can put that in the note too). This is SUCH a nice feature :)
Overall I highly recommend this app. It’s the best I’ve used and I love it so much! 

Recommendations for the developer:
•Can you please let me add another person (technically my cat). I’m keeping track of her weight and I already have mine in there. I don’t want to add her weights into mine bec the trend chart would be a mess. I would love to be able to add a second person (or cat) :)
•Can you please add more options for what it looks like. I do like some of the options but the options are limited. Wether free or paid, I’d love to have more options.
•If this is even possible (I’m not app developer so I have no idea) - are you able to change the app icon to make it the same color/design as the one I’m using on the inside? I REALLY don’t like wood and it ruins the cute little bear bec wood is so yuck. That’s the first thing I changed when I got the app was the wood. I know a lot of other people feel the same way. 

Thank you for creating such a wonderful app. It’s so easy, but still has the important information I need for myself and patients. I love how you encourage people to look at overall trends rather than the number. Also - sooo many apps in the US only have the option of entering weight in pounds. I hate looking at my weight in pounds. So thank you for letting me use kg instead. 
I know this app is for adults but since you already have the kg option you should consider adding growth charts too and make it for infants and pediatrics too (or even pediatrics would be awesome). Add the WHO growth charts for 0-3yrs and the CDC ones for 2-20yrs. In the pediatric hospital and at pediatrician offices, they use kg and cm. In all pediatric settings they use kg and cm vs adults use lb and inches. Except for some adults (like me) who prefer looking at the smaller number (kg) rather than pounds, lol! I love your app and I hope you expand it further someday so I can use it for my infant and pediatric patients who use growth chart percentiles rather than the adult BMI standards. Thank you SO much, your app is my favorite :)

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS APP:
This app is AMAZING!!!!! As an RDN and CDE, I highly recommend it to everyone - whether your trying to lose, gain weight or maintain your weight, it’s the perfect app to use. This app gives you a lot of data considering how easy it is to just type your weight in. The flexibility and customization is so nice and above the rest of the apps out there. 
I LOVE IT and you will too!
I've used this app off and on for years because I like the simplicity of it. It feels private. I would like a function that reminds you to weigh in at a certain time.

Since I lost my favorite app WeightBot, I’ve been searching for a simple, easy-to-use app. This fits the bill perfectly. So simple. No fancy, over-the-top bloated junk. Just simple and easy. Overall cute design, too. Thank you!
no bugs at all and does exactly what you need. ived used this for a very long time and it has never failed me once
Simple & awesome!! I love how simple it is to keep track on my weight daily. I also like the teddy bear cheer me up.
Track your weight, simply. No gimmicks, just works.
I like the app to record my weight.   Every time my weight lowers, I feel SO great!
Has everything I need to know about my weight. Even lets me record multiple times a day, which other apps don't like.
Simple to use and I love how the graph works!
Been using for 2 weeks with new diet. Fun to use, beautiful charts with different views--very nice feature, ability to edit. Does its job perfectly
I hope I can set language in Chinese
Good
I've had this app for 3 years. I lost 45 on Weight Watchers & want to keep it off. So, I track my weight everyday. This  app is wonderful to use.
good! its helpful :-)
please think about updating the design to ios7, though.
Great app, design is very cute. Just what I was looking for! Please make the paid version without ads!
Good app. It's optimised for iPhone 5 too
I have been using the app for a whole. Love the bear reactions! I wonder if there is any way to delete the wrong weight I entered by mistake?
Easy to use, cute but useful. It's hard to believe this app is free of charge!
This is a very useful app with super cute UI for girls. <3
Thank you!!
很实用的一款软件

this is simple, cute, and easy. I only downloaded it today, but I love it already! すごくかわいいです。
ただ、こちらのアメリカバージョンでも日本語で使えるようにしていただけるとありがたいです!!

應用名稱: 我的綠洲:焦慮緩解遊戲,休閒遊戲
應用描述:
■為什麼您需要一款壓力緩解或焦慮緩解遊戲？
如今，放鬆的方法很難找到，因為我們沒有花太多時間在放鬆上，讓心靈療愈。
因此，‘我的綠洲：焦慮緩解遊戲’ 是一款讓人鎮靜的遊戲，旨在讓您放鬆心情。 在沒有把時間浪費在遊戲和壓力性質的內容下，它提供了一個充滿禪意的環境和鎮靜的氣氛，專門為壓力大的人們緩解壓力而設計。

■您想暫時休息一下嗎？
在我們輕鬆的遊戲中找到壓力緩解的方法。 立即下載“我的綠洲：鎮靜降壓遊戲”，然後通過點擊屏幕在幾秒鐘內釋放您的壓力！

■快速評價此成長游戲和舒緩遊戲的功能：
“我的綠洲：療愈遊戲” 可幫助您緩解壓力，放鬆並鎮靜心情。 這是一個空閒答題器和點擊遊戲，沒有任何激烈的控制，只有簡單的遊戲玩法和輕鬆的環境。
- 現實的大腦鍛煉，放鬆和滿足感足以讓人安然入睡
- 這款抗焦慮遊戲備有不同的清新心靈活動
- 高品質的放鬆聲音讓您釋放壓力並達到心靈抗壓
- 這款壓力緩解、寒意遊戲可讓您在幾秒鐘內達到壓力釋放的真實體驗
- 您玩這款冥想遊戲事備有流暢的控件，幫助您放鬆身心。
- 和平的聲音和鎮靜音樂可幫助您消除壓力讓心情平靜

■‘我的綠洲：焦慮緩解遊戲是如何緩解壓力’ 以及其運作方式？ 
在這款遊戲中，您將收集心形，收集各種動物，例如：狐狸、鹿、大象、長頸鹿、企鵝和鯨魚，並完成綠洲。
和平的聲音和鎮靜音樂幫助您在 “我的綠洲：抗焦慮放鬆遊戲” 中達到禪定的狀態
遊戲備有一個島嶼建造器，讓您的綠洲在輕鬆而鎮靜的氛圍中與周圍的生活互動時逐漸擴大。 這個簡單的攻牙遊戲旨在讓您在幾秒鐘內放鬆心情。 它的工作原理類似於抗焦慮遊戲，放鬆遊戲或鎮靜遊戲。

■島嶼建造器
- 島嶼建造器是這款鎮靜遊戲的主要功能，可以幫助您忘記所有壓力
- 該島嶼將擴大並創造出新的生命，例如樹木、花朵和動物
- 您的島嶼是您通過島嶼建造器打造的虛擬禪宗花園
- 立即在 “島嶼建造器” 中打造您的島嶼，並通過音弦進行調整

■點擊遊戲 (點擊遊戲有助於放鬆) 
- 輕鬆的點擊遊戲可以幫助您緩解壓力
- 點擊屏幕即可使用此點擊遊戲 UI 升級您的綠洲，讓自己鎮靜下來
- 點擊遊戲或答題器遊戲控件可以讓您通過點擊屏幕來完成所有操作
- 無需做任何事即可讓點擊遊戲繼續操作 – 所以，盡情放鬆和享受

■放鬆遊戲（鎮靜遊戲、抗焦慮遊戲）
- 通過鎮靜的聲音、平靜的界面，此焦慮緩解遊戲可以幫助您放鬆
- 舒緩的閒置遊戲玩法可以減輕壓力，讓您的心情平靜
- 放鬆的音樂讓您在緊張的一天中平靜下來
- 鎮靜的視覺效果能幫助您找到內心的平靜，並幫助您放鬆心情，使心情平靜
- 在綠洲放鬆後，睡覺變得更安穩 | 讓人滿意的遊戲

■鎮靜的聲音
- 此放鬆遊戲中的療愈聲音可以幫助您進入到和平的世界
- 通過放鬆遊戲的環境互動來播放輕鬆的旋律

應用名稱: IQAir AirVisual | 空氣品質預測 PM2.5
應用描述:
您將獲取來自世界領先的空氣污染數據提供方的可靠且最值得信賴的空氣質量信息，由政府監測站和 經過檢驗的IQAir 監測站組成的全球網絡，覆蓋 500,000 多個地點。

一款適合敏感人群（過敏、哮喘等），家庭，運動員、跑步者、騎自行車者和戶外運動者的必備APP。您可以通過獲取的健康建議、48 小時預測來規劃最健康的一天，並查看實時全球空氣質量地圖。 AirVisual APP會幫助您了解您呼吸的污染物、其來源和影響，並隨時告知您所在地區的主要空氣質量和野火爆發情況。

+ 歷史、實時和預測空氣污染數據：100 多個國家/地區超過50,0000 個地點的主要污染物和 AQI 的詳細數據，清晰易懂。通過增強的一個月和 48 小時歷史視圖來跟踪您最喜歡的地點的空氣污染趨勢。

+ 獲得長達7天的空氣質量預報：以便規劃您的戶外活動，以獲得未來一周最健康的體驗。您還能跟獲得風向和風速預測，了解風對污染的影響。

+ 2D 和 3D 世界污染地圖：通過 2D 全景圖和AirVisual Earth 3D 模型探索全球各地的實時污染指數。

+ 健康建議：遵循我們的建議，降低您的健康風險並儘量減少接觸污染物的機會。患有哮喘或其他呼吸（肺部）疾病的敏感人群的相關信息。

+ 天氣信息：為您提供溫度、濕度、風力、當前狀況和天氣預報信息的一站式服務。

+ 山火和空氣污染情況：隨時了解全球山火、霧霾和空氣污染情況。您可以隨時在交互式地圖上查看污染情況，其中包含實時和歷史數據、預測、新聞更新等。

+ 花粉數據：查看目的地的花粉情況並避免過敏。您可以根據未來 3 天的花粉預報來計劃您的戶外活動。

+ 6種重點污染物實時和歷史監測：追踪PM2.5、PM10、臭氧、二氧化氮、二氧化硫、一氧化碳實時濃度，觀察污染物歷史趨勢。

+ 實時空氣污染城市排名：根據實時 PM2.5 濃度，跟踪全球 100 多個地點空氣質量和污染程度最好和最差的城市。

+ 敏感人群空氣質量信息：為患有呼吸道病症如哮喘的敏感人群提供可靠的信息和預報。

+ 擴展歷史數據圖表：查看過去 48 小時的空氣污染趨勢，或過去一個月的每日平均值。

+ 遠程控制您的空氣淨化器：通過實時和歷史數據、比較、過濾器更換警報、預定開/關等功能，遠程監控以及操作您的 Atem X 和 HealthPro 系列空氣淨化器，輕鬆提高室內空氣質量。

+ 室內空氣質量監測：與 IQAir AirVisual Pro 空氣監測儀同步，提供室內讀數、建議和控制監測儀設置。

+ 空氣污染社區新聞：及時了解空氣污染時事、醫學發現以及應對全球空氣污染的進展。

+ 教育資源：加深您對 PM2.5 和其他空氣污染物的了解，並了解如何在患有哮喘等呼吸道或肺部疾病的污染環境中保持健康。

+ 覆蓋全球的空氣污染監測網絡：監測中國、印度、新加坡、日本、韓國、美國、加拿大、澳大利亞、墨西哥、巴西、法國、泰國、印度尼西亞、智利、土耳其、德國……以及北京、上海、首爾、孟買、新德里、東京、墨西哥城、曼谷、倫敦、洛杉磯、紐約、舊金山、巴黎、柏林、胡志明市、清邁等城市- 所有信息盡在AirVisual！

I’ve been using Skimble for six months now. After the trial I purchased the one year subscription and I’ve been recommending it to all my friends. I love the programs because they organize your workout schedule for you with a specific objective in mind (6 pack, losing weight, build muscle, core with Pilates…). If I could suggest something would be to add some class style workouts (not just static + YouTube videos), and to let you move the workouts directly from the month schedule (not individually with each workout in a specific program). I’m really satisfied, and I’m pretty sure I’ll be renewing my year membership!

But I still like the abundant features and how they incorporate with my iPhone app.

This app has so many great features to it. It guides you through exercises, which helps me personally stick to them, and it also has great detail of how to perform each exercise. This is a great way to start and stick to an exercise routine. Highly recommend!!

I am able to take my progress and do it so n the comfort of my body own space. The price is comparable to going to the gym. I’ve lost over 60 pounds doing various workouts with this app. I purchased the Pro+ version and it gives me access to more exercises and trainers and I’m able to create my own exercises for other people in the Skimble community to try out.

評論.標題: Not for the gym so much
評論.內容: I expected there to be more gym exercises. Instead the gym category had few machines workout (only cardio from what I could tell) and most were dumbbells and such that you can do from home. And why would you put workouts using just your body under workouts supposedly for the gym?? This app is great for home but if you want a gym machine workout routine, look elsewhere.

I’ve used this app before and liked it, so reactivated my subscription. My phone and the app give me a notification that I am currently enrolled with the Pro+ subscription but the app does not let me access any of the Pro+ content. I cannot find a phone number to call customer service so emailed the support address but have not heard back. This is really frustrating.
I did exercises on my watch and it won’t show on here when I allowed access.

This is the first and only fitness app I’ve ever downloaded, but because the app is so easy to use, offers a low subscription rate allowing access to routines available from real trainers including detailed trainer information & credentials, offers thoroughly coached and cued exercise routines, as well as plenty of free exercises Both of which you can repeat time and time again to see and compare your progress. The app also provides an interface to create and publish your own personalized routines and integrates easily with my mobile technology which allows me to view my workout progress and history. 

A couple minor Issues I recommend changes... The “alarm” icon could be colored red or yellow when an alert badge shows up on the icon, Settings and preferences could be easier to find and use, and the social networking tools are a little cumbersome. I like the ability to use the social media functions on the app to avoid the main stream social media and the “eye-roll” judgment from friends who don’t exercise. But, since these are hardly the focus of the app I consider these to be minor issues. 

From my experience using this app the priority seems to be appropriately focused on providing an interface for trainers and exercisers with a vast array of free workouts, and — until you subscribe — a modest (and expected) delay for advertising. I believe functions and features supporting background information and social media-type functions will improve as they gain more use; conversely, I could see an increase in their use resulting from improving these functions and feature as well. 

Meanwhile I give the app “two enthusiastic thumbs up”
Really enjoyed the app so far, love the diversity of exercises and workouts.  Have been using the free version but can see the value in the paid version as well.  Thanks!

This app progresses WAYYY too fast for a complete beginner. 應用描述:
透過OMRON connect，可以輕鬆記錄、檢視並無線同步您的個人健康數據。

OMRON connect是一款智慧型手機應用程式，可以從任何OMRON connect相容的健康器材無線收集測量資料。簡單易用的健康動態窗，可供查看最近的測量和追踪進度。

查看結果
OMRON connect健康動態窗透過清晰明瞭的圖像顯示測量結果和履歷，幫助您了解您的健康狀況。可借助這款應用程式確認血壓、脈搏、體重、體脂肪率、骨骼肌率、身體年齡、內臟脂肪程度、BMI、基本代謝等數值。 *需搭配使用可測量各項指標的相容器材。

分享結果
可以將OMRON connect的對應商品所測量的數值分享給Apple Health。

安全
您的測量資料已安全地儲存在您的智慧型手機中。

有關該服務的詳細資訊，請參考"https://www.omronconnect.com"。

有關OMRON connect推薦的智慧型手機的資訊，請參考"https://www.omronconnect.com/devices"。

有關OMRON connect相容器材的資訊，請參考"https://www.omronconnect.com/products"。

AirPods, Fitbit tracker，耳機或手機丟失了嗎？找一個AirPods或兩個AirPods。 Wunderfind可幫助您在幾秒鐘內找到丟失的設備。

Wunderfind可幫助您找到丟失的AirPods，Apple Pencil，iPhone，iPad，Apple Watch等。丟失了你的設備？此應用程序可幫助您在幾秒鐘內找到您的手機，平板電腦或手錶

Fitbit is a registered trademark or trademark of Fitbit, Inc. and/or its affiliates in the United States and other countries.

3.四處移動以顯示所顯示的距離分數。
你的設備應該靠近你。

評論.標題: THIS IS AMAZING! … but not so accurate
評論.內容: So i’m little dumb 10 year old who gave his iPad to his dad this week and hasn’t used it. When I gave it to him, it had my apple pencil on it.  But last night he noticed it was missing. We looked… and looked … and looked… yeah no success by looking. My dad had the brilliant idea of asking google cause google smart. google said a random bluetooth finder app so thats how we came across this app. at first we thought our dog ate it because she was moving with the pencil, but no chance. When we got to the kitchen it was WAY CLOSER but still too far. We looked in the cars because it was close to them, but no luck. After that we charged the iPad and ate dinner. Oh, but what does dad see? The pencil RIGHT BEHIND WERE WE WERE LOOKING!!! at least we found under the kitchen table and not been gulped up by my dogs. The real problem was, that I was right behind the pencil but it said 30 FT away. More like 2 FT away. Mid.

I had misplaced my Oura ring amidst doing loads of laundry. I thought it’s slipped off and been left at the laundry mat since that’s when I noticed it was gone not to mention I manually logged my workout so it wasn’t giving me an accurate last location. I hoped I took it off wit my other jewelry but it was not with the rest. I almost lost hope until I down loaded the app and it picked up that the ring was indeed in my apartment. The radar increased near my laundry but I put away my laundry and still no ring. Then I noticed the trash was next to the baskets and yes the radar increased even more. I nearly have a trash phobia and I only had a few days left before the ring’s battery died so I got the gloves, Clorox, soapy water, and extra garbage bags and build the courage. Honestly I was partly motivated to see if the radar was accurate and sure enough Lord behold, it led me TIGHT to my Oura ring!!! I didn’t even have to dig deep! Washed it bleached it and VOILA it’s like new! Saved me $700 for a new one being how my warranty had JUST expired two weeks ago. This app is SURE to stay!

評論.標題: Found my new Apple Pencil Pro
評論.內容:
My daughter gave me a Pencil Pro for Christmas, to go with a new iPad I’d just bought.  Four days later, I couldn’t find it anywhere.  I was pretty sure it was near the couch, but all I could see on the iOS settings screen or FindMy app was that it was connected when I was in that room.

I downloaded Wunderfind and confirmed that the signal strength was strongest over a particular part of the couch that I’d already searched several times.   Based on that, I was able to find it wedged between an obscure spot under the couch.

Worth every penny.

With “always” location services and with “only while using,” and quitting and rebooting phone, it still sends me bogus “lost” notifications every minute or two. Completely unusable at this point. 評論.標題: This app is as dumb as a rock
評論.內容:
Alright, so I lost my Apple Pencil. I don’t have the Apple Pencil Pro (I’m not a millionaire living in a mansion in Beverly Hills) so I can’t use Find My. I checked my Bluetooth menu in Settings and my Pencil was connected, so it must be nearby. I looked around everywhere and couldn’t find it, so I installed this app. Well, guess what? The Apple Pencil didn’t pop up in the devices menu at ALL. And yes, I did walk around.
Fast forward to about 10 minutes later, I stopped looking due to frustration and then I find the Pencil, just nearby in open sight. I hadn’t went to that area so maybe that was why it wasn’t popping up in the devices area.
I bring my Pencil right next to my tablet, and then I test whether or not it shows up in the devices menu. It still doesn’t, despite it being about 2 inches from my tablet. Incredible…

透過分享步數、BMI、動態卡路里、靜止心率以及睡眠時數等五項量測數據，每日告訴您因為生活習慣改變讓您的較實際年齡年輕了多少。即便沒有配戴穿戴裝置，依然可透過手機計步功能計算減齡結果。只要您越積極投入，將可帶來越顯著的減齡幅度，同時與南山人壽合作推出相關活動與您一齊BAM年輕。
 
此外，您可以用Apple HealthKit和其他平台連結以獲得您的健康資料。

人類私人教練很棒……如果你能負擔得起的話。

這就是為什麼我們認為你會喜歡它的原因：  

◆ AI驅動的鍛煉：新鮮的個性化計劃，適應速度比你說“再來一組”還快  

◆ AI驅動的食物追踪：拍一張照片，讓AI計算宏量營養素。是的，這麼簡單

◆ 鍛煉靈活性：無論是家裡、健身房還是月球基地，我們都有適合各地的鍛煉計劃  

◆ Apple Watch與動態島：因為在組間檢查手機在2023年已經過時  

◆ 還有更多：我力求讓這段描述簡短明瞭，但相信我，你的AI私人教練有很多東西可以提供，下載並試用，發現健身的未來！

評論.內容: Don’t waste your time trying to use this app. Don’t even try utilizing the 3 day trial. They will literally charge you the $100.99 instantly despite offering a 3 day trial and when you try to request you your money back… well.. forget about it. They won’t give it back. Save yourself the pain and take it from me. If it actually gave me the trial and I liked the app better than the one I’m using I would have actually considered buying it. Smh.. theft!

GymStreak is a very great app for progressive and effective changes and it is free.

I thought it was a great workout generating app. Probably my favorite workout app out there. But it is not practical to have my phone out on every set. They neeeed to be smart watch compatible. For this reason i had to go with a competitor instead of this app.
It’s really good. Have been using for months now and it has changed my life, literally. Totally worth it.!

I've been using GymStreak since I first found it several years ago. Liked it then. Love it now. The format makeover last year was a huge improvement on an already very helpful app. I like how change and progression are built in. There is a wide variety of exercises, and you can create your own. The animations are very good. The app is reliable with very few bugs historically. Finally, customer support is very responsive.

1/10/23: live the new version!

I signed up for a free trial - and the whole week of workouts they ‘assigned’ me were just body weight exercises. A few push ups, and a couple crunches. This was an ‘advanced’ workout. 

Also, the app crashed 3 times before being able to use it for longer than 4 minutes.
Great all great service just phenomenal

評論.標題: Bugs and glitchy but overall amazing
評論.內容: I genuinely love this app as a person who is new to fitness because it gives me a great starting point and plan with demonstrations. My only complaints are that the app is glitchy and it freezes/lags frequently and it’s quite annoying in the middle of a workout.

I click 'forgot password' end it sends me an email. I click the link and it takes me back to the app but doesn’t let me reset my password. I’ve tried restarting my phone and it won’t let me in. The link to my email app from this app also doesn’t work.

App is probably your best bet if your more of a calisthenics person but not great for weight lifters. Tried to find a way to contact support to see about a refund but they support page has been down for days and there is no published email address.

These must be paid reviews or people who are beginners in the gym. First of all I only purchased because I was tired of doing the same exercises and was looking to switch things up. Based on the reviews I blindly went ahead and purchased. BIG MISTAKE. Thank God I was smart enough not to spend a 100 dollars and was only out $33 instead. There is nothing special about the workouts. If you’re someone like me who already frequent the gym and already had a set workout routine then this is useless. Basically if you already know what you’re doing in the gym then don’t bother. If it was free maybe but it’s not worth the money. And the nerve to be charging $100 🙄. Needless to say I cancelled the same day. I wish there were more honest reviews to save me money.
Tytyty
Asks for your personal info, including email. Then wants $100/yr off the bat.

The workouts are not bad, I’m happy you can switch out sets. What’s unfortunate is you can’t swap it out for a personal exercise you enjoy. If you do then you can no longer rely on just the app to track your progress, which is a large part of its purpose. As an iOS developer it wouldn’t be difficult to implement. People suggest it to them quite often but I’m not sure they listen to their customers. It appears all their updates are quite random and don’t ever address what the consumer base necessarily desires, but at least they actively work on the app. Other than that, the app is far better than the few other paid apps I checked out. It would be worth trying the app out with their free trial
Love this app
They are always updating nonstop....the past four years always improving and getting better
When you start on the app, and you enter your metrics, the weight only goes up to 299lb! I’m 6’2” woman 305 lbs. Ridiculous. Also, it requires pay. Expected but disappointing.
Super

As of late the app continuously crashes and has a hard time running the timer when you’re using it. Initially was very good but now I almost want to delete. For an app you have to pay for this isn’t a good one.

I’m no stranger to a gym, but with the pandemic, a home gym became important. Gym streak is reasonably priced, I can choose what equipment I have access to and the options are endless in how I can create my workout schedule. It even switches up the exercises routine for me in the intervals I want. The progression feature is pretty good also (their working on further improving this). The swap out options are also great because they are narrowed down to options that target the area you are working on so your not overwhelmed. The customer service is also phenomenal. Response time and support on how to navigate the app is greatly appreciated! If you need some structure and help in finding a workout plan….. Gym Streak is a GREAT investment!!!!

應用描述:
Zepp Life 妳提供精準的運動數據記錄，豐富的健身訓練視頻，詳細的睡眠及運動分析。綁定更多的可穿戴設備，激勵妳愛上運動，享受積極健康的生活方式，迎接更加美好的自己。 


• 連接多種智能設備 
支持小米手環、米動手表青春版、小米體脂秤、小米體重秤、AMAZFIT運動手表、米動智芯等智能設備，智能跑鞋等； 

• 精準記錄每次運動 
支持跑步、騎行、健走和豐富的減脂、塑型等健身訓練內容； 
每次運動都能獲得專業的運動姿態和心率分析，讓運動更加科學有效； 
可視化的體脂曲線，讓數據更自由；

• 貼心的睡眠管家 
深入分析影響睡眠質量的各種因素，並給出改善建議； 

• 全面評測身體狀態 
通過小米體脂秤檢測10項身體成分數據，讓減肥更科學，同時也更早發現影響身體健康的風險； 

• 豐富的貼身提醒 
無聲鬧鐘振動喚醒自己，無需打擾枕邊人； 
來電、短信、微信、QQ、郵件等各種貼身提醒，不錯過每壹個重要信息； 
久坐提醒時刻關註妳的健康，遠離長期久坐給身體帶來的傷害； 


溫馨提示:
-本應用支援Apple「健康」，授權後可以將你的步數、睡眠、心率等健康數據同步到 「健康」應用.
-持續運行全球定位系統在後台可能會降低你的電池續航時間.

應用描述:
Transform Your Fitness Journey with Fitness Buddy – The Ultimate Workout Companion!

Featured In:
• Chicago Tribune: "It’s like having a personal trainer at home without the cost!"
• ESPN Magazine
• Gizmodo: "One of the best iPhone apps ever."

Achieve Your Health & Fitness Goals with Personalized Workouts, Meal Plans, and Progress Tracking! Fitness Buddy is your all-in-one fitness app for home and gym workouts, weight loss, and nutrition. Access customizable workout plans, hundreds of exercises, and meal plans that fit your goals, whether you're building muscle, losing weight, or staying active.

Tailored Workout Plans Just for You
Choose from over 20+ workout programs, including strength training, cardio, HIIT, and flexibility routines. With 2400+ workouts covering full-body, core, arms, legs, and more, you’ll find a plan for every fitness level. Perfect for gym enthusiasts and at-home workouts!

Easy-to-Follow Workout Guides
Get step-by-step workout instructions, HD videos, and helpful tips to improve your exercise form and stay motivated. Whether you’re new to fitness or a seasoned gym-goer, our guides make it easy to start and progress.

Unlimited Exercise Options
Explore over 2400+ exercises with variations in strength, cardio, HIIT, and flexibility training. Easily filter by equipment, body part, or difficulty to build your custom workout routine. From bodyweight exercises to dumbbells and machines, Fitness Buddy covers it all!

Stay on Track with Health & Weight Loss Goals
Track your progress, calories burned, and weight changes with our easy-to-use fitness tracker. Set goals, monitor your health, and stay motivated. Whether you're aiming for weight loss, muscle gain, or general fitness, Fitness Buddy keeps you on track every step of the way.

Customized Nutrition & Meal Plans for Healthy Eating
Access personalized meal plans to support your fitness journey! Choose from keto, paleo, fasting, and vegetarian diets with calorie and nutrient tracking for each recipe. Easily log and monitor your meals for a balanced, healthy diet that fuels your workouts.

Stay Motivated & Accountable
Connect Fitness Buddy with Apple Health to sync your progress, schedule reminders, and monitor your health metrics. Build lasting fitness habits and stay motivated with personalized insights and fitness calendars to track every workout.

Why Choose Fitness Buddy?
Comprehensive Workout Library – 2400+ exercises for home and gym workouts.
Goal-Focused Plans – Tailored workouts for weight loss, strength, and more.
Easy Nutrition Tracking – Personalized meal plans for every health goal.
Progress Tracking & Motivation – Visual insights to track your health improvements.
Transform your health and fitness journey with Fitness Buddy – the only app you need to achieve your weight loss, muscle gain, or fitness goals. 


*Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

We offer auto-renewing subscriptions with the following specifications:
• Subscriptions are 1 month or 12 months long.
• Payment will be charged to your Apple Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal.
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
• Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at: https://kodeon.ai/privacy-policy and https://kodeon.ai/terms-of-use
• EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Download Fitness Buddy today!

評論.標題: Misleading Pricing and Lack of Transparency
評論.內容:
I was excited to try this app after seeing the advertised price of $29.99 per year ($2.48/month). However, I was charged $3.99 instead, which doesn’t align with the pricing they promoted. This feels deceptive and misleading, as there’s no clear explanation for the discrepancy.

Customers deserve transparency and honest pricing. If there are hidden fees or other charges, they should be disclosed upfront. This kind of practice damages trust and makes me hesitant to continue using the service or recommend it to anyone.

I’ve reached out to support to resolve this, but so far, the experience has been frustrating. If you’re considering this program, beware of the unclear billing practices.

I have a premium subscription and have been using this app for several years.  The ability to develop custom workouts is a particularly important feature for me.  The latest update removes the ability to edit custom workouts — which has been a core feature for more than 10 years.  You need to fix this.

評論.標題: Latest update removes functionality, needs fixed
評論.內容: Love the app, been using it for years. In the latest update, when you edit custom workouts you can no longer move exercises up or down in the order if you decide to add something. Please fix.

I've tried several workout apps, and without a doubt, this one stands out as the best in terms of value, volume, and user interface. It has truly transformed the way I build and track my workouts. I highly recommend it!

評論.標題: No longer a great free app
評論.內容: I’ve been using this app for years and was great because it didn’t make you pay for great features. But that no longer is the case. Sad to say but they’re going to lose many users and see many more 1 star reviews moving forward.

The meal logging of calories for this app is pretty worthless. Most foods it gets the nutrition incorrect even when you scan the package. Other times it doesn’t find most of the foods when you scan the package. And if you search for a food, it usually can’t find it or finds only something very generic. Looks like it’s back to my fitness pal for meal logging.

評論.標題: No longer a free app for pre planned workout plans
評論.內容: There use to be a list of free fitness work out plans for the non premium accounts. There was a wide variety based off your goals. Now it’s just a list of exercises. Plus I have to also sign up for the app just to see the free list now.  As well as finding out after I signed up that there was no free work out plans…. I’m trying not to say anything over negative but this really grinds my gears. App deserves a thumbs down and no stars.

The reviews that say Fitness Buddy is an awesome fitness app dated prior to October 2024 are very true. This app has been a staple in my fitness life. However, the latest upgrade has locked out my prior fitness data, and removed access to custom built workouts and all access to any pre-built workout without a monthly subscription. It’s very disappointing. I hate monthly subscriptions, and would rather have the option to pay a higher fee up front. That’s what I did several years ago when I first bought the app. These ‘bug fixes’ are not a feature. It’s to force customers to pay monthly to get access to what they already paid for.
I like the app, I have a new iPhone and I cannot restore my subscription. I have sent 5 emails to support over the last week and a half, no response. Terrible!

評論.標題: App is long dead. I’m a paid premium user.
評論.內容: There is no way to create a custom workout, despite what it claims. It has instructions on how to create a workout, but the feature does not exist. I’ve messaged them numerous times over the last couple months, they will NEVER RESPOND. Plus this app crashes A LOT. This app is DEAD. Trust me don’t waste your time.

This is a all around good app but need a lot of work. It doesn’t have all the exercise machines that the gyms has so I have to manually type it.  Another problem is they need to have much more single leg exercises that I can log says left leg and right leg because I got injured and one leg is much stronger than the other. And the app often crashes on me mid workout and all my stats are lost. The recipes are good though:

評論.標題: A shadow of what it once was
評論.內容: So sad to reopen this app and see every feature that was once accessible just become completely paywalled. Such an insult to users.
Every app to assist with training was missing.  Fit buddy corrected issues after some speaking with support.  Thank you very much.

I recently purchased the premium subscription. Not only am I not able to access any of the premium features (workout and meal plans) but, I was charged twice! I like that app but would love to have this issue resolved.

Took a few minutes to figure setting up a workout, but the app has a lot of great features and connects with the other Azumio apps. I believe it’s worth becoming a premier member to enjoy ALL the benefits.

評論.標題: No content or help with the issue
評論.內容: I’ve used this app for YEARS. Loved it but then recently it started pulling up blank on the Discovery feature, then it randomly deleted all of my data for the past 4+ years. I reached out for support and got someone that acted like I didn’t know the basic process of logging into an app. I pay for this app and wish I could get my moneys worth. But they will NOT fix the issues so I cancelled my membership and switched to the STRONG listing app that is way better.

I have had this app since 2017 and paid the annual renewal with no issues and I’m current on my subscription. Opened the app and it’s blank, my saved workouts are gone, workouts period are gone. Tried to contact app support & nothing. Please help me get the product I paid for.

I’ve used this app for 5+ years, and now the discover tab (which has all the workouts I love doing), is completely blank. I know the sets and reps, but I enjoy using the app to log progress and share data with Apple fitness metrics. While it seems like a recent issue, it’s annoying and it’s pretty clear the app is barely supported anymore.

This app has been abandoned for too long. I report issues to the devs and they state they know about it and are working on it. 5 years later, the problem still exists, report the issue, and the same canned email is received from support. 

Now, the whole workout database is gone for over 3 weeks making the app pointless.

評論.標題: App peaked a year ago find something else
評論.內容: I’ve been subscribed for 4 years now and it was great for 3.5. Around 6 months ago they paywalled the portion that gave you recipes and tracked your calories (pay wall after the $30/year subscription). Now, the pre made workout plans are off the app as well and looks like it’s in an app that you need to pay for separately, making it the second paywall after subscription. You can still track what you’ve done and how many reps/weight, but why not just use a pen and paper that costs less than $30 a year?

App used to work great. For years and years.   I went to upgrade to premium again , and the app stopped working.  All white screens.  It’s a shame.  I got charged like twice for subscription trying to make the app work.
When I go to the gym it’s Russian roulette if the Discover portion for workouts actually works. It’s been getting very frustrating, I paid for a service that only works sometimes

I suppose I should have read it in the title, but this app is 100% focused on cardio training. Do NOT assume that “strength” training has anything to do with strength.  This app was 100% disappointing.  22000 of their 23000 reviews have to be bots.

I paid $30 for the year and cannot access the discover page or the workout programs page. I’ve reported this a few times and no response. I enjoyed this app while it worked. I checked for updates and re applied the app, no success. I won’t be renewing.

Sent an email two weeks ago about not being able to see my program even with a paid subscription and haven’t heard anything yet. I’ll be discontinuing my subscription; I wish I hadn’t paid it in the first place

Same workout routines for 5 years. They never change the exercises routines, for a paid app it is the most glitchy app on my phone, always errors out and restarts losing all info you did in that workout.
Have been using this app for more than 5 years. I highly recommend it especially if you don’t have a personal trainer and you love working out alone.

Used this app to track calories and workouts for years, and then they suddenly pulled the calorie tracking feature for premium. Reached out to customer support three times with no reply. Canceling my subscription and switching to another app

I’ve used this app for 10 years or more. I’m a premium member now, but I also used it a lot in its free version. I’ve created workouts, used meal plans and love the gentle wake alarm in the app. 

 But it seems that alarm function is gone? Is that the case?? 

I improved my sleep with that alarm. Please don’t say it’s gone.

評論.標題: Great App I paid for now its a subscription!
評論.內容: I purchased this app and absolutely loved it, it’s the best workout app I’ve used to track my weight training and I used to compete. Now the app is subscription based like so many apps now a days and I can’t blame them but you would think that the first purchasers of the apps should be grandfathered or something. Now the app is free to everyone and I paid for it. I’ve tried other apps after the developers changed to a subscription model but I keep coming back to this one.
App is no good. It crashes constantly and I wrote the company about it. They were not able to fix it and stated that I should just delete it.
It's a great app, but half the time I try editing a workout I have to start all over a d it can get really frustrating.
I can no longer see workout plans if just shows a blank screen and I ask cannot report a bug.

評論.標題: New paywall for access to different exercises
評論.內容: There has been a change in the way this app works. The developer has taken what used to be access to all the exercises and changed it to put maybe half or more behind a paywall. Meaning you cannot log normal gym exercises unless you pay up for their worthless premium membership. What a sad state of affairs, there are other workout apps out there. I will be using one of the ‘‘em going forward. Also, the app is now inundated with ads. This app is garbage now.

I love this app but there’s a glitch when editing workouts while training. 

I start a custom workout. I try to add/remove a set or remove a workout and it clears the entire list of workouts. There’s no way to get it back. I have to close the app and restart it. When I come back my workout has been marked as complete and I’m unable to go back and edit it. 

A bug fix or a feature to edit completed workouts would be nice. 

Thank you.

I have had a membership with this app for over 4 years. It used to be a good app, then they updated it and got rid of all the features I loved and introduced tons of new bugs… then they just completely quit caring about updating the app. It has had many of the same bugs for over 2 years now. The bugs that are very irritating is, after an exercise the app shuts down completely and you have to relaunch it. When you choose a time to exercise it keeps resetting to 31 minutes. Every single exercise you have to keep messing with this over and over until it finally works. I lose about 5-10 mins by messing with the bugs each time I exercise. It keeps reminding me that I haven’t exercised in days when really I exercise everyday. The only good thing about this app now is that the membership is cheap, just like the effort put into it. When my membership expires I will not be renewing, I tell everyone to avoid these apps due to the lazy developers.

I download this app because I wanted something that could basically be a personal trainer in app form. I’m not new to the gym and meal prepping but it requires a lot of energy to do on your own. I’m a full time student and have a full time job on top of that, so I was looking for something that required a little less thinking on my part and something I could just easily follow. 

***I spent a couple hours going through this app to get everything set up and here are my initial thoughts:

This app promotes that it builds workout plans and meal plans based on your needs. Although it does do this to a certain extent, the app is not fluid with itself. 

Pros:

It has a huge plethora of exercises to choose from and you can pick target areas and it will bring up a great range of exercises that use equipment or body weight. So if you want to build your own workouts this is an awesome feature. 

If your not looking for an app to do all the thinking for you and you like to customize everything it has a ton of resources. 

The recipes are super easy to follow and nutritional facts are provided.

You can also allow this app to share with the health app on the iPhone which I really liked. 

For beginners who just want to start somewhere, there is a lot of useful tools in this app. 

Cons: 

My first issue is that the meal planning doesn’t coincide with your workout plan. My initial desire for this app was to have a meal plan based around my gym routine. It feels as if the app doesn’t communicate with itself in that way. So for heavy lifting days it still gives me the same amount of protein and carbs as my rest days.

My second issue is the provided workout plans don’t give you enough detail about which plan to choose. I suppose I could just trial and error what works for me, but I don’t like feeling like I’m wasting my time hoping I’m going to see specific results and not doing the correct work to accomplish that. There is a small test that prompts when you open this tab, but I suppose I was expecting something more personalized. 

Another issue I had was the meal plans. When I first logged into the app, I looked at the different meal plans available and there is a very good range to work with, from vegetarian and vegan to clean eating to fasting to keto and paleo, to high protein or low sodium. So i was really happy initially with all the options. Once I went into my settings tab to customize what my goals were, my meal plans were restricted to keto, paleo, and the low sodium diet. I haven’t found an option to reset the settings, and I don’t like that I no longer have access to the other meal plan options. You can retake the meal plan test but I changed up my answers and still got the same results. 

It’s only 30$ a year so I’m not super mad I subscribed to this for a year, just isn’t fluid for what I thought it was. And it’s not the most user friendly. 

I was really hoping to get a meal plan that tailored to my gym routine out of the same app but I might have to go back to having them split to two apps. 

****I’m going to try to utilize what I can from this app for a couple months and may end up updating my review.

I accidentally downloaded this not realizing there was a cost. I do not want this app! Within seconds I worked to get this charge off my account and so I shouldn’t have to pay for it as I didn’t use it. But now I’m realizing that this is taking hours to figure out how to get reimbursed! Help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Prone to crashing, The nutritional database is very generic and needs updating.
App freezes

The app is great but at least once every single workout the app will go blank and force me to restart. I’ll then have to re-structure the entire workout again. It’s very frustrating when I’m paying for this app and it keeps crashing.
I download so many fitness apps. This is a favorite. I use it constantly.
Great app but didn’t give a five because two home workout programs won’t load.

I used to love this app but after months of doing the same workouts over and over, it would be nice for the developers to release some new workouts . It’s been months since they’ve updated this and even then, it was only for bug fixes.  For the amount of money they charge, they should release new content. I’ll be searching for something new
This app go harder than my Johnson in the morning! Get it now!

I figured out a way around what I posted below, so it’s good again.

I have been using this app for over a year, and I have loved it. After a run or a bike ride, I could do a quick strength training workout. I could specify the amount of time, what equipment I had, and what parts of my body I wanted to work, and it would give me a workout with a variety of activities. With the most recent update however, I can no longer do that. I have to choose pre-programmed workouts, and I have to do three repetitions of each one. I don’t like the new format and I miss the old feature. I may not renew next time my subscription comes around.

This app was the most comprehensive and flexible compared to all of the other apps I looked at. If you don’t choose it over the rest, the only reason I can think of is because some menu options are tricky to find. Otherwise you are missing out on keeping a comprehensive record of what you’re doing to go where you want to go! Don’t forget: failing to plan is a plan to fail. Failure to document means it didn’t happen.

評論.標題: Won’t let me cancel my premium account
評論.內容: I can’t afford it anymore and there is no way in the app to cancel my premium account. Really feels like a shady practice to me.
This app used to be free and allow you to access their exercise library and log your workouts. They’ve made all those features premium. Going back to Bodybuilding.com app, BodySpace.

應用名稱: 咕咚-跑步直播运动AI健身训练
開發者: Chengdu Ledong Information & Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
2亿人都在用的健身跑步骑行软件，一站式运动健身和马拉松骑行赛事活动平台，不论“运动小白”还是“马拉松大神”，你的运动健身需求咕咚倾力满足。上咕咚开启精彩运动人生，从第一步到每一步。

「独特、精准和稳定的数据记录和分析算法」
无论是用GPS还是内置各种运动健康传感器，咕咚通过独特的算法保证你无论是5K、10K、半马、全马跑步，还是骑行、健走、登山、越野、徒步、健身等都能获得精准的数据记录和实时分析，让你全面了解自己的运动和身体数据，更科学更安全的运动。

「运动手表管理」
轻松绑定多品牌运动智能手表，支持佳明、松拓、华为、高驰等运动手表数据连接，运动中获得心率等数据实时监测和语音指导，运动后数据自动上传同步，为你的运动健身保驾护航，你的每一次付出都被记录！

「全面的马拉松赛事活动」
从5公里到10公里，从欢乐跑到马拉松，甚至奥运会马拉松助力跑，咕咚带你完成人生首场马拉松，收获人生中第一枚运动奖牌。全年百余场线上主题IP赛事等你参与，还有海内外线下马拉松赛事一键报名，更有专业马拉松备赛训练计划，带你安全完赛达成目标，我们还有丰富的骑行活动等你来挑战，与众多咚友一起比拼骑行运动热度。

「AI新伙伴“配速兔子”」
你耳边的跑步私教，精准发现你的跑步潜力。咕咚最新AI跑步训练引擎配备咕咚算法，为你打造私人配速训练，提供配速稳定性评分及提升课程，帮你有效提高配速控制能力，在马拉松比赛中突破自己创造更好成绩！刷新PB！KEEP!!

「超有趣的运动社区」
干货分享、跑步装备测评、运动直播、同城互动、跑步打卡…专业的有趣的多样的内容都在这里，加入咕咚运动圈，和无聊枯燥、难以坚持的运动生活说再见！

「海量运动团&跑场&骑行路线」
哪里找志同道合的运动搭子？哪里找合适的跑步和骑行场地与路线？咕咚汇聚全国超20万运动团、跑团，各地跑友和骑行爱好者为你标记当地热门跑场、骑行路线和跑步路线。运动怎么会孤单，你在哪里，哪里就是主场！

「专业运动装备商城」
从华为运动手表到亚瑟士、特步耐克跑鞋，专业运动跑步装备应有尽有，价格优惠、保证正品，享极致折扣！

【海量健身训练课程】 
汇聚众多健身课程，内容丰富多样！无论是跑步前后热身拉伸，还是减肥、增肌、瘦身，都能找到适合自己的课程。专业指导，科学训练，让你在轻松愉悦中享受健身的乐趣。

「咕咚会员自动订阅服务说明」
1、订阅服务：咕咚会员连续包月（1个月）、咕咚会员连续包月（3个月）、咕咚会员连续包月（12个月）
2、订阅价格：连续包月产品为18元/月，连续包月产品为48元/季，连续包月产品为168元/年。
3、付款：自动续订型产品确认购买后，苹果会自动从您的iTunes账户扣费。
4、续费：苹果iTunes账户会在前面24小时内扣费，扣费成功后订阅周期将顺延一个订阅周期。
5、取消续订：可在iTunes/Apple ID设置管理中取消自动续订。在当前订阅周期相当于前24小时以上取消，将发生不会下期费用；前24小时内取消，即将过去下期费用，并自下一个订阅周期结束后、自动取消续订。
6、会员服务协议：https://tms.codoon.com/cms/pro/vipserviceterms.html
7、隐私协议：https://tms.codoon.com/cms/pro/1515984586540zrCU6w.html


注意事项
- 由于跑步功能具有后台语音提醒，切换至后台播报时仍会保持GPS连接。语音播报可以帮助用户在切换至后台时会播报速度等相关参数，但是GPS在后台持续运行会影响电池续航时问。
- 持续使用跑步 GPS 在后台可能会衰减您的电池寿命。
- 咕咚 已接入Healthkit，可同步运动数据到「健康」。

應用名稱: 健身房訓練: 健身紀錄 & 重量訓練
應用描述:
透過健身房訓練:重量訓練 & 健身紀錄專業設計的運動組數、反覆次數和重量，來鍛鍊肌肉、耐力、最大肌力或使身材變得結實！我們將依據您的目標和可用健身器材調整日常訓練，使您的健身成果最大化並幫助您超越自身極限。

• 身為初學者，您不知道怎麼開始，並對在健身房健身缺乏信心嗎？
• 身為一名經驗豐富的健美運動員，您想追求一些進階挑戰嗎？
• 您渴望鍛鍊肌肉、耐力、最大肌力或使身材變得結實嗎？
• 您對現有的健身日誌應用程式不滿意，正在尋找更全面的應用程式嗎？
• 您對昂貴的教練費感到猶豫不決嗎？
健身房訓練:重量訓練 & 健身紀錄能解決以上全部問題！

針對初學者 & 健身狂熱者 - 健身房訓練:重量訓練 & 健身紀錄將計算您的「一次反覆最大重量」，並將其視為調整日常訓練重量的重要指標。我們將為您提供由專家設計的客製化經典日常訓練，滿足您的不同需求。

無需筆 & 紙 - 連續記錄每組運動的重量和反覆次數，或一鍵記錄所有訓練內容。我們將儲存和追蹤您的資料，並透過直觀的統計資料和圖表向您展示訓練成果。

豐富的運動資料庫 & 指示 - 您能依據肌群、設備或關鍵字進行搜尋。我們的高畫質相片、影片與 500 多項運動的詳細說明，可協助您修正運動姿勢並避免受傷。

無數量限制 - 編輯沒有數量限制，包括編輯現有的日常健身訓練、建立專屬日常訓練，以及將運動新增至我們的資料庫。

出色功能：
• 無需筆 & 紙，即可簡單快速地記錄您的健身內容。
• 用專業設計的日常訓練挑戰自我
• 隨時編輯和重新產生日常訓練
• 用明確的視覺 & 文字指示修正運動姿勢
• 使用清晰的統計資料和圖表追蹤進度
• 可靈活調整的總休息計時器和指定休息計時器
• 500 多項運動，保持您對健身的興趣與新鮮感
• 建立專屬日常健身訓練，無數量限制
• 將任何您喜歡的運動新增至我們的資料庫
• 無需網路即可展開您的健身之旅
• 免費使用

- 享受專業設計日常訓練
浪費大量時間與精力卻沒什麼效果嗎？我們的經典課程由專家設計，能協助您更有效地鍛鍊特定身體部位！如果不符需求，您能更新可用器材與「一次反覆最大重量」，編輯並重新產生訓練項目。

- 掌握健身強度
不想受限於傳統的評分系統嗎？別擔心。我們將根據您選擇的基準來計算您的「一次反覆最大重量」。您可隨時更新或變更運動組數與反覆次數，保持自己的運動步調。

- 打造自訂日常健身訓練
想製作專屬日常健身訓練嗎？您能從我們的資料庫中產生任何訓練組合，沒有數量限制，還能根據需求設定休息計時器、重量、反覆次數和組數。此外，如果我們的資料庫中沒有您喜歡的運動，您可將其新增至我們的資料庫。

- 透過不同記錄形式追蹤進度
◆ 筆記 - 記錄每項運動的感受與技巧
◆ 長條圖 - 顯示每次運動的最高「一次反覆最大重量」、最大重量和最大訓練量

◆ 日曆 & 歷程記錄 - 記錄您的健身頻率、持續時間和強度

評論.標題: Incredible app, exactly what I needed to plan, time, and log workouts
評論.內容:
This app is perfect for anyone who wants to creat their own custom workout plan, as it contains the vast majority of exercises in their database (including a the muscles it hits, a tutorial, and execution tips) as well as an option that allows you to put the weight you will be using during each set, and a live rest timer that can be customized by the exercise. 

Overall, the closest app to what I needed. Wouldn’t recommend for those with little to no experience or research into lifting and who don’t know exactly what they want. Would also like more specific descriptions of which muscle the exercise is hitting (ex: just shoulders vs anterior delts). Also, a dark mode would be nice. In general, very few complaints and an extremely underrated app.

應用名稱: TeasEar - AMSR 史萊姆觸發器
應用描述:
擺脫快節奏的世界！

用各種奇妙聲音撫慰你的感官，舒緩你的壓力與焦慮。 完美逃離現實，潛入感官天堂。 《TeaseEar》以 AMSR 為基礎，這種最先進的放鬆方式遠勝冥想和白噪音。

運作方式
- 選擇材質
- 觸摸螢幕。 你可以輕按、滑動甚至是刮動螢幕。 放鬆你的手指！
- 聆聽觸摸時最舒緩的聲音，放鬆身心。

50 多種逼真又有趣的材質。 包括有史以來大家最喜愛的史萊姆。 看看這個：
優格 - 與覆盆子果醬混合的經典奶油材質
蜂蜜 - 如同果凍般的琥珀色材質
五彩紙屑 - 快樂的旋轉木馬

每週都會推出新的史萊姆呦！

想製造你專屬的虛擬史萊姆嗎？ 這很容易！ 而且免費！

只需先選擇基底，再添加增稠劑、裝飾和振動等級，這樣就行了。 瞧！ 您的個人史萊姆做好了，可以拿來玩囉。

訂閱價格和條款

請注意：您無需訂閱，即可使用該應用程式所有功能，還能免費使用大約 30％ 觸發器。

《TeasEar》提供「TeasEar 進階功能」自動續訂選項：
$7.99/每週 (提供 3 天試用期)
$24.99/每月 (提供 3 天試用期)

TeasEar 進階功能包括有權存取所有觸發器及每週內容更新。 在更新時，我們會升級現有的觸發器，使其更加逼真。同時每個月，我們還會推出多達十幾種全新觸發器。

這些價格適用於美國客戶。 其他國家/地區的價格會有所不同。實際費用會根據用戶居住國家/地區轉換為當地貨幣。
確認購買後，付款將從 iTunes 帳戶扣除。
除非在當前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂，否則將會自動續訂訂閱方案。
帳戶將在當前訂閱期結束前 24小 時內扣除續訂費用，並確定續訂費用。
用戶可以管理訂閱方案，並在購買後，前往用戶的「帳戶設定」關閉自動續訂功能。
免費試用期的任何未使用部分（如有提供），將在用戶購買相關訂閱方案時（如有適用）自動失效。

應用名稱: Sleep Cycle - 睡眠監測, 睡眠分析, 白噪音
應用描述:
起床也能很簡單

Sleep Cycle 是一種智慧型鬧鐘，能追蹤您的睡眠模式，並在淺眠時叫醒您，讓人自然起床，因此能徹底休息、精力充沛，再也不必把手機放在床上。Sleep Cycle 能利用聲音分析功能追蹤睡眠情形。

運作方式

• 睡眠可分成淺層睡眠和深層睡眠等不同階段。鬧鐘在哪個睡眠階段響起，影響您醒來後是否覺得休息充足。

• 您在睡覺時，身體會因為所處的睡眠階段而有不同動作。Sleep Cycle 擁有聲音技術專利，能利用聲音或震動分析功能追蹤睡眠模式、監控不同睡眠階段的床上活動情形。

• Sleep Cycle 接著會在事先設定的 30 分鐘範圍內（以鬧鐘設定時間為結束時間點），找出您淺眠時最適合叫醒的早上時間。在淺眠時醒來就像不設鬧鐘自然醒一樣，讓您覺得休息充分、精力十足。

• 您只需要在睡前啟動 Sleep Cycle，並將行動裝置放在床頭櫃或附近地板上即可。

連續獲得市面上智慧型鬧鐘評選第一名。榮獲以下各大媒體報導：CNN、Wired、英國衛報、華爾街日報、BBC、紐約時報。

--------------------------

免費功能

√ Sleep Cycle 榮獲專利的聲音技術或加速感應器提供睡眠分析功能

√ 詳細的睡眠統計資料和每日睡眠統計圖

√ 與 Apple 健康完全整合，可交換睡眠分析和心率資料

√ 精選鬧鈴

√ 搖晃手機或在手機上輕點兩下即可啟用小睡模式

√ 可自定叫醒時間範圍，最短是立刻（一般鬧鐘功能），最長 45 分鐘


付費版功能

√ 長期睡眠趨勢

√ 可將您的睡眠資料和全球睡眠統計資料做對比

√ 鼾聲趨勢：可查看鼾聲趨勢資料紀錄

√新特點！“是誰打鼾？”本應用能對鼾聲進行智能識別，分辨出睡夢中打鼾的是你還是你的伴侶，由此為你提供更加精準的睡眠分析。

√“咳嗽與咳嗽雷達”---它能追蹤、監測你的夜間咳嗽狀況並將其與你所在區域的咳嗽數據進行比對，為你做健康相關決定時提供數據與信息支持

√ 天氣：查看天氣如何影響您的睡眠品質

√ 心率監控：使用內建相機測量每天早上的心率（RHR）

√ 睡眠輔助功能：讓您更容易入睡

√ 睡眠備忘錄：查看喝咖啡、壓力大、健身或太晚吃飯這類事件對睡眠品質的影響

√ 睡醒心情：查看 Sleep Cycle 如何影響醒來後的心情

√ 線上備份：讓您將睡眠資料保存在網路上

√ 可將睡眠資料輸出到 Excel，進行詳細分析

√ 支援 Philips HUE 智慧燈泡：可模擬自然日出，以更溫柔的方式讓您醒來
