可選擇訂閱進階版。
  
一旦購買，系統就會向您的 iTunes 帳號收費。 系統將在訂閱有效期結束前 24 小時自動續約，並以相同價格延續已經購買的相同訂閱方案。 如要避免自動續約，請在到期前至少 24 小時取消訂閱方案。 若要管理或取消自動續約訂閱方案，請在購買後前往 iTunes 的使用者設定。 您無法在訂閱有效期間內停止訂閱。 購買付費版訂閱方案視同放棄剩下的免費試用期（如果有這類優惠）。 條款與隱私權：http://www.sleepcycle.com/terms-of-use.html

評論.內容: I have had this for years and the latest update is absolute terrible.    The sleep charts are confusing.   The app now thinks it takes me 3 hours to go to sleep when my average is 12 minutes.    I have premium and no idea how to contact support.   What was very helpful has made this app completely unusable.

I really like that I don’t have to wear a device to use this app. The information it provides is great. The graphs and visuals demonstrate what happens during my sleep. Love that it records your nighttime noises. Just wish it could distinguish between my and my husband’s snoring. I have zero minutes of snoring when he is out of town. So now we can hear and understands how much he really does snore. The ai sleep summary is also super helpful. Really like this app!

Not accurate at all.
Not enough informations.

評論.標題: Not as good as it used to be
評論.內容:
I've used Sleep Cycle for more than ten years.  I pay approximately $40 a year for the upgrade in order to keep and have access to my data.  It used to be a good, solid way to keep track of every night's sleep and be able to compare them over the years.  But the vendors have caved in to the temptation to make everything really fancy without adding useful features.
A few of the problems:
It is not possible to see the graphs in the horizontal format, which renders impossible reading any information from over a long period (e.g., ten years).  It is  not possible to compare two years, or five.  One cannot choose the measurements to view.  What used to be a straightforward, very informative graph of a night's sleep is now an appallingly tricked up mess of alarming colors, viewable only in the short format, not in horizontal mode.  And not transferable to a bigger screen, such as a desktop.  I have been assured that it is not possible to go back to the old graph.
This was a wonderful app until they had delusions of grandeur and went fancy, instead of making their product more flexible and therefore more useful.
Statistics don’t match
i am a sleepy boy! this brings me good sleep :)))

2,739 nights to be exact. I purchased it a long time ago and have been using it forever and recommended this app to all of my friends and family. The reason why I’m moving on is bc they keep removing all the features I had access to for years. 

Now I need to purchase the premium subscription to even see the most basics data. There’s something there that doesn’t sit right with me - the ‘ole bait n switch! Time to find another sleep tracker app.

I must say, I truly love this app! It is well worth the money since it’s so interesting, and you don’t have to use any type of wearable tracking device (huge perk since I don’t want to wear a watch or ring to bed!)
I am able to see my nights sleep laid out, which had been beneficial to my goal to improve my quality of sleep.

My one and only issue is, no matter what, it will say it takes me an average of 1 hour to fall asleep. This is not true! I am a person how knocks out the second my head hits the pillow. This reading affects my sleep “score” because for example it will say I slept for a total of 6 hours and 31 minutes, and took me 1 hour and a half to fall asleep. So in reality, I slept for almost 8 hours, but it only logs 6 and a half. I don’t really know why it won’t register how fast I am falling asleep, and it’s frustrating to be told I slept over an hour less, which isn’t the case. 

Overall I love this app and will continue to use it nightly. It’s fun!

Overall it’s great. But it’s missing a few key options.
1- I want to play white noise ALL night. This app allows max 90mins IN the app. And if I play it outside the app, the alarm noise doesn’t work in the morning, instead it just increased my white noise app sound to disturbing and confusing levels. (Wasn’t sure what was happening so I kept turning it down every ten minutes until I opened my phone a few times later!!
2- Edit sleep time? Or “Go back to sleep” button? I sometimes choose to sleep longer after the alarm. How do I “go back to sleep” or edit my sleep log after it’s been recorded. Now the data is inaccurate and says I only slept 4hrs and woke up at 6am. When the reality is, the alarm was going on and off through my white noise sound for 30 mins and I was so frustrated, when I eventually turned it off I went back to sleep for an hour and a half. But I can’t edit my sleep log?

評論.標題: Works fine, don’t need the AI
評論.內容: The app works great for tracking my sleep. I appreciate having a metric for it. What I don’t appreciate is having an AI feature that helps “discuss anything related to [my] sleep.” It’s stupid, frankly. I don’t like having AI everywhere, I don’t like its environmental impact, and I don’t like it in this app.

This app has so much potential but it seems that it isn’t functioning as intended. It is supposed to be using the microphone to detect snoring and coughing which it does but having the app run when you are wide awake watching tv it says I’m in deep sleep. Also features are continuing to be migrated to the purchased version. I’ve used this app, per the counter, over 700 times. Has an awesome alarm clock though.

I had this version free on my previous phone. Just upgraded phone and now it’s asking me to pay. I was grandfathered in to when it was first offered for free. I’m not sure why my data didn’t transfer over. Will give 5 stars if this can get fixed. I shouldn’t have to pay just because I got a new phone!!

This is the most robust, helpful sleep tracker out there. I love the new maps showing where people are coughing in my area. AI Product feedback: I want more integration with other data from the Apple Health app. Being able to have Sleep Cycle see that I worked out late and it affected my sleep would be killer. Also, you need to tone down the attitude on your ChatGPT agent. I had to tell it to quit talking like a cross between the Spotify DJ and Jason Mamoa’s version of Aquaman. It’s seriously off-putting. Pls chill it the f out!!!

評論.標題: Completely inaccurate after the new update.
評論.內容: Shows you’re awake for the first 5 hours of sleep until 2am randomly even when I know I went to sleep super early.  It has done this for many of my nights which renders the app useless because the data is inaccurate.
App baits you in but does not deliver.  Do not pay for it.  I feel I got ripped off!
So I have purchased and used this app for years, and just recently an update took away some features. Now they want to charge for those.  Guess I’ll find something else.

I used to love this app. After using Sleep Cycle for nearly 11 years, I am having to let go and find a better alternative. For 11 years, I never had to pay $39.99 for a premium subscription. I don’t care about the tracking, all I loved about this app was the ambient sounds (brown noise) and the sleep aid window where it wakes you up by gradually increasing the alarm’s volume. I think $40 a year is quite silly for this, so I will find an app that does not charge for the bare minimum.

It seems like the daily chats about my night’s sleep are very repetitive and don’t offer any new useful information. It constantly repeats the same suggestions, even those I have stated numerous times that I already do. The stats don’t align with my tracker and there is never an explanation of how they arrived at my sleep score.

評論.標題: One fatal flaw - choose a different app!
評論.內容: If you turn on sleep cycle on low battery, or the power goes out at night, IT SOUNDS AN ALARM  , waking you up in the middle of the night, to tell you to plug in the phone so you can track the bad sleep the app has caused you by waking you up!  Lots of other sleep apps do the same thing just as well as this one… but don’t disturb your sleep on purpose
Used to work really well but now it doesn't record my sleep at all. I haven't changed any factors such as moving it.

評論.標題: Was a good app but they keep removing features.
評論.內容: I love this app so very much. It’s definitely helped me get better at sleeping throughout the night. Unfortunately they keep adding features only to lock them up behind a paywall after you get used to having them. Cough tracking being the one that pushed me to write this email but there’s been so many others. I’m sick of apps doing this you’re not going to make me buy the app this way. It leaves a bad taste.

I’ve used this app for several years and love the insights and features.  The latest update which includes new graphics, however, is misinterpreting data.  Several nights it is saying it took me 3+ hours to fall asleep but that is inaccurate.  It messes up my averages and data.

評論.標題: I'm getting upset with these people.
評論.內容: There was a time when I heavily promoted this app. I purchased a lifetime unlock of this product. New features weren't included however, and they promote them endlessly to the point of annoyance. Now they are deleting essential features in their redesigns and adding boatloads of fluff. If they'd kept their original promise and let me keep the features I paid for I'd be happy. Now I'm looking at other apps. This is the only place I can find to contact them. Their drive to constantly increase their revenue stream is destroying my experience.

I have had this app for a couple of years and it’s useful if you tell it you are about to sleep.  I have it installed on my I watch and phone.  If you start the app with the watch. But sync it to your phone it will only keep, and save the data from the time you sync it to your phone.  It would be awesome if it would detect that you are going to sleep but I guess that technology doesn’t exist yet.    My main gripe is that you have to turn it on before you go to sleep.   I have unusual sleep patterns and I forget to turn it on because at that point I’m too exhausted to remember to activate the app.   It’s a waste of time and money.  Don’t purchase.  It really doesn’t track your sleep.
It wakes me up on time! But I really wish we could have less things on the premium and more on the normal other than pretty good!

Since the update. It is showing that I am taking a long time to fall asleep.  I know from my other apps that I take 5-15 minutes to fall asleep.  Sleep Cycle shows 1 hour 52 minutes for last night.  My other apps show 5 minutes.  I know I fell asleep quickly because I was very tired.  The update also changed my wake up sound.

I have been in contact with support and they are insisting that there is nothing wrong with the app.  I have been using the app for nearly 11 years.  My time to fall asleep is usually under 10 minutes.  Nothing has changed in my environment.  The only change is the last update.
I love this app because it helps me sleep better at night or naps

I’ve been using this app for 3 years straight for about 90% of the nights and this app works really well. I still don’t understand how but it understands my sleep exactly and I don’t use any heart rate stuff either. By far my favorite alarm and way of tracking my sleep. I haven’t payed for the membership once but I have considered it a couple of times. 5-stars well, well deserved.

評論.標題: Does not play well with iOS 17
評論.內容:
EDIT: Lowered to ONE STAR. Still crashes in the middle of the night about 50% of the time, I was even late to work. It has never behaved this poorly in the 10+ years I have used it. I had to stop using this app and cancelled my subscription.

I have been using sleep cycle for years and it’s been very reliable up until the last few weeks. Now, it constantly crashes in the middle of the night after tracking for 30 minutes or so, leaving me with no alarm for the morning. No reason I can find other than perhaps it doesn’t work well with the new StandBy function that I put it in nightly. Please fix this, I’ve stuck with this app for years because it worked great as a sleep tracker.

I have been using this app for several years now and now all of a sudden they want $30.00 / year to use all of their features….no in-between…used to love this app because of all the info it says it tracks and the easy use of the app.  But now I’m in search of a different one that won’t cost an arm and a leg.

Do not waste your time unless you want to waste your money on something so pointless.

I can google how to improve my sleep, and the clock app is free, easy fix.
I love this app but it would be nice to listen to the wind down sounds on my Sonos speakers via Airplay. Currently, they will only play on iPhone.

I’ve been using this app for a long time. I have a note filled with all of my funny sleep recordings, but now something is wrong with the share audio feature. It just pops up with a link to download app. Please fix!
you literally can’t use the app unless you pay.. wast of time

Stuck inside a mandatory trial offer? There’s zero buttons to bypass the trial. How is this legally acceptable? I’m on a mini.

Cannot close the app and reopen to bypass anyway. This is a legal issue. Cannot force someone to trial to use an app. 

Apple Store states “if the app does not offer a way to skip the trial, you can report it to apple support as a violation of App Store policies.” 

Yours does not offer a way to skip. No “X” no rejection of premium trial. I’ll be contacting support today as you’ve violated.

I am coming from my frustration with autosleeps lack of a friendly interface. I thought this looked like the best alternative, but it’s just lacking the detail I want in a single report. The price to me is just not worth it.

After going through lengthy account sign up they then tell you the cost.  Be sure to use Apple to log in and hide my email so if you decide the cost is to high then you don’t have to see email from them. Total waste of my time.

I have been using this app for years. I am a paid-feature user and really enjoy the insights each morning and weekly reviews of my sleep quality and patterns. It has never failed to wake me up and when compared to the tracking of my sleep by my Apple Watch, seems quite accurate. It's also fun to listen back to sound clips of my sleep chatter and snoring. Highly recommend this app to all.

評論.內容: Why certain features are not available in the U.S.?

評論.標題: Long time user. Big fan. One question
評論.內容: Sleep Cycle user since 2014, absolutely love the app!… question though, are we going to get some more sleep aids soon? It feels like the really interesting and mindful sleep aids have stalled out… and by stalled out I mean, “ask for more money with zero real new support for the user.”

評論.標題: Good but wish they’d remove AI
評論.內容:
This is a great app however it uses “AI” which brings to question both value and privacy of the application.

“AI” costs are set to soar which will also increase the cost of the subscription, making it a losing value proposition.

I’ve used this app for over 10 years, and the functionality and reliability have drastically declined. The intelligent snooze feature used to work very well and was the main reason I used this over a typical alarm. Now, most mornings the alarm just goes off at the end of the wake up phase.

Reaching out to app support was no help. When I told them that the issue still persists (and has gotten worse), even after troubleshooting, they said, “If our app doesn’t register you as in light sleep or awake it will ring at the end of the wake-up window.” However, I have instances where (according to the graph) I am in a light sleeping phase throughout the snooze period, and it still does not go off until the last minute.

I also reached out to support about restoring my online backup, which is now “expired.” I paid for the app once, and have always been able to restore my data with the online backup when I switched devices. The support person insisted I must have paid for a monthly or yearly subscription in order to access the online backup, although they have no record of my having paid for a subscription. The constant ads to upgrade to premium first thing in the morning are the icing on the cake, as I can’t imagine wanting to pay more for an app that does not deliver on its promises.

Used to be a solid app with constant updates, it’s gotten stale with little improvements after purchasing the app.  Now I get constant notifications about premium monthly subscription even though I purchased it as a stand alone app.  Company got greedy instead of learning how to add content like more sleep aids as dlc, or add in more features.  I’ve used the app for years, but other companies are doing it better.  Lots of features simply don’t work anymore.  The phase wake-up just wakes you up at the beginning of the alarm cycle, the hue component doesn’t work anymore.  They should work on getting the basics down and figuring out how to keep their old customers business instead of switch models after making it a one time purchase.  I bought the app, now I can’t use all the features.  Shame.

Wow! I’m so impressed by the amount of information that this app provides me with and how much it helps improve my sleep and productivity for the next day. I have a suggestion, this might already be a feature but, it would be great if you could have multiple recording sessions per night as I usually wake myself up talking and I’ve noticed if I stop the recording but then decide to go back to sleep and start a new recording it deletes the first recording. Are you only able to record once per day/night? This isn’t even an issue, more of a question/ suggestion.  Thank you for this app! I love it.
Love the app for the data and I stay for how it helps me manage my sleep. From going to sleep to waking up, I’m not jolted out of bed by my alarm and I can feel it when I wake up in the morning.
I’d like new bedtime rhymes. It’s been the same two for years. Words distract my thoughts and it’d be nice to have more variation.

評論.標題: Relieved my sleep anxiety and helped me lose weight
評論.內容: For a few years in a row, I had a type of sleep insomnia in spring. It sometimes got worse in fall, with the stress of school and work. In an effort to improve my health and finish losing some weight to increase muscle tone, I wanted to find an app that would help me know I’m getting the right amount of sleep. I have loved using Sleep Cycle and recommend it to any and everyone worried about their sleep or looking to improve their health
连日期都是错的，完全不能用

I’m honestly very surprised by this, I got the free trial because my partner and I wanted to record and see if we had been sleep talking to each other. Now I think I’ll pay for the full year! It’s so accurate on when I’m dreaming or lightly sleeping, and helps me record when I’m not sleeping well. It’s also really helpful with wake up times. I’ve noticed that the days that I don’t set the alarm I feel more tired throughout the day. Super impressed!

I have been a terrible sleeper my entire life so I got this app to hopefully gain some insight into my sleep. It gives me these magnificently high sleep scores in the high 90s even if I know I’ve gotten up several times at night. It isn’t reliable unfortunately,

應用名稱: 冥想(Brainpal)-冥想,白噪音, 助眠,睡眠偵測記錄
應用描述:
Brainpal是一款幫助您改善睡眠,冥想,放鬆減壓,情緒管理,緩解焦慮,提升專注力的身心健康應用。讓您每天正念和冥想，變得更快樂，過上更健康的生活。應用內提供豐富的定製練習計劃，包括睡眠故事、冥想練習等，助您實現全面的身心平衡。

遵循專業指導和定制計劃。

嘗試在忙碌的日程中進行 3 分鐘的簡短正念冥想課程，或選擇一天中任何時間進行較長時間的冥想。 聆聽 1000 多個舒緩的故事、平靜的聲音和睡眠音樂，為安寧的睡眠創造條件。Brainpal使用包含數千個文件的音頻庫，匯集了最適合您的日常冥想。 隨著時間的推移，你分享的越多，你的冥想就會變得越個性化和有效。


學習冥想基礎知識

Brainpal 的日常冥想分為 10 天計劃，教授適合您的目標和需求的基本冥想技能。 您將了解如何讓您的一天保持清醒，在幹擾中提高注意力，並在壓力時刻找到深度放鬆。

隨時隨地地理清思緒

Singles 是一種小型冥想，您可以隨時使用，甚至在旅途中也可以使用。 透過早晨冥想輕輕醒來，伸展身體，然後透過為您的旅程量身定制的冥想讓您的通勤不再混亂。 透過生動的呼吸練習來理清思緒，透過快速的「放鬆」、「充能」和「集中」冥想等方式減輕壓力、尋找能量並提高注意力。

透過睡前放鬆練習睡個好覺

透過我們的睡眠冥想、睡眠聲音和放鬆活動，您將輕鬆休息，這是首創的互動活動，利用雙側刺激和控制呼吸來幫助您在睡前放鬆並獲得更安寧的睡眠。 您還將體驗尖端的沉浸式冥想，它融合了振動、聲音效果和教練指導，創造出一種全新類型的冥想體驗。

將您的冥想練習提升到新的水平

無論您是初學者還是高級練習者，您都將直接進入真正正念的深處，因此您不會在表面上浪費任何時間。 作為我們免費年會員的參與者，您還可以訪問我們完整的冥想庫。

包含什麼

- 根據您的心情和目標量身定制的個人化引導冥想
- 幫助您發展冥想技能的 10 天計劃
- 一口大小的單一冥想，您可以使用它來從任何時刻獲得更多
- 首創的沉浸式冥想，透過振動、聲音效果和指導幫助您放鬆
- 研究支持的活動可幫助您放鬆並為安寧的睡眠做好準備
- Mindful Minutes 與 Apple 健康應用程式集成
- 10 個具體的冥想技巧來建立你的練習：呼吸聚焦、身體掃描等等

在冥想中，「一刀切」並不適合任何人。 我們都有自己的放鬆、專注和休息的方式。 Brainpal 有數千條可能的路徑，可協助您以自己的方式實現目標。

如需了解更多信息，請閱讀我們的服務條款(https://sites.google.com/view/mindcare-service-agreement) 和隱私政策(https://sites.google.com/view/mindcare- privacy-policy) ）。

應用描述:
加入這個領先的大腦訓練計畫，與全球 800 萬以上會員一起，提高你的認知能力！現在就來試試吧！

 全新！引入 GEIST 放松训练——通过我们全新的音频放松故事和练习、冥想游戏和日常小贴士，放松自己！是时候让自己休息一下了！ 

大腦愈強大，生活更美好。透過 24 款（共 720 關）富有挑戰性的趣味腦力遊戲，提高你的記憶力、專注力、反應力、邏輯思維能力和計算能力。邊玩邊提升腦力時，還可以跟蹤自己的進展統計。

評論
TechCrunch： “我承認，最近我迷戀上了所謂的腦力訓練遊戲。”

評價
5/5顆星 “棒極了-非常好的遊戲，可以讓你的頭腦保持忙碌狀態。很有趣。對孩子來說也很棒。”

5/5顆星 “很好！ 它確實能夠考驗你的頭腦！”

5/5顆星 透過完成不同挑戰，它讓我變得更加專注並且記憶力更好。我會向任何人推薦，讓他們來試試。”

我們的功能
- 24款遊戲，共計720关，可以訓練記憶力、邏輯性、專注力、反應力和工作速度
-圖表絕妙並且簡單易玩
- 根據你的意願，量身定制每日訓練內容
- 定期科學測試，向你展示所取得的進步
- 提供數據，展示你的長處和有待提高的潛能
- 還有很多！

GEIST背後的科學
GEIST位於神經系統科學的前沿。我們公司內的神經系統科學家團隊已經開發了多款遊戲，用於訓練記憶力、專注力等。基於神經可塑性科學的研究顯示，腦力訓練可以提升工作記憶和流體智力。

我們的大腦
較強的工作記憶可以使人學得更快，大腦連結性也可以得到提高。科學家發現，強大的大腦連結性是人類智力的一個重要組成部分，可以幫助預防老年癡呆症。他們得出結論，可以像訓練你的身體一樣訓練大腦。

GEIST高級版
你現在可以完全免費使用GEIST。可是，如果你想要將進步速度提高74%以上（平均值），我們推薦你升級到GEIST高級版。當你是高級會員期間，GEIST高級版會為你提供真正個性化、每日更新的訓練計劃；這些訓練經過優化，可以使訓練效果達到最佳。此外，GEIST高級版可以讓你無限制地訪問所有遊戲和數據。

評論.內容:

I was willing to overlook that initially, but considering all of the glitches and crashes that continue to remain unfixed and unaddressed, this app has become a disappointment, particularly because it had a lot of potential. C’est la vie.

Now that the developers appear to have fully jumped ship and essentially abandoned this app (leaving users requests for support and questions unanswered for months now) it is time for me— and you— to go read the reviews of a DIFFERENT app as we search for a worthy substitute.

應用名稱: 輕輕斷食 - 間歇性斷食追蹤、熱量體重記錄、減肥日記軟體
應用描述:
全球6000,000,000人在用的科學減肥方法！
這是根據風靡全球的間歇性斷食法（Intermittent Fasting，“輕斷食”）而打造出的一款簡單、實用的健康減肥APP。

還在戒糖戒碳？身體在被損耗！加入輕斷食，和我們一起重塑健康飲食習慣。
延緩衰老：禁食到達一定階段，細胞開啟自噬，對抗老起重要作用。 （該理論獲2016年諾貝爾生理學獎）

什麼是間歇性斷食？
間歇性斷食是科學規劃進食時間，什麼時間段內可以吃，什麼時間段內不吃。它不限制可選擇的食物範圍，更不是完全禁食、什麼都不吃。

什麼是斷食計劃？
常見的斷食計劃有14:10，16:8，20:4等等。最受歡迎的168，代表不吃東西的時間段長度是16小時，能吃東西的時間段長度是8小時，即如果早上10點吃第一餐，那麼傍晚6點是最後一餐。

間歇性斷食有效果嗎？
有效果。輕斷食迎合了低熱量的飲食趨勢與習慣，通過限制進食窗口，能有效降低體內血糖和胰島素水平，保持最佳身心狀態。同時，斷食期間隨著糖原的消耗，身體會進入酮症狀態，開啟人體的“脂肪燃燒”模式。

間歇性斷食簡單嗎？
簡單。您可能並不知道，斷食窗口中大部分時間都是在睡眠中度過的。通過有意識的認知到斷食窗口和進食窗口的存在，能培養科學健康的飲食習慣。

間歇性斷食安全嗎？
安全。間歇性斷食是一種順從自然的飲食生活習慣方法。持續性進食會使身體器官一直忙碌於處理消化食物的過程，而斷食期間，肝臟等內臟器官得以休養生息。

我適合間歇性斷食嗎？
輕斷食APP內有多種斷食方案，適合各類人群。不管您是新手還是有輕斷食經驗的人，APP都能細心引導你完成。科學進行間歇性斷食，讓您3天發現身體的改變！

輕斷食APP如何幫助您間歇性斷食

斷食指南
- 個性化斷食計劃：涵蓋當今火爆全球的14種熱門輕斷食方案，如：16/8、14/10、18/6、20/4；
- 全方位斷食指導：在斷食過程中，我們將全程指引輔導，並提供記錄追踪功能。何時開始、何時結束，讓您每一次的禁食數據都做到一目了然；
- 身體狀態追踪：隨著禁食時間，APP會提示您身體狀況各階段將產生的變化，如：血糖水平、糖原儲備、生酮狀態，代謝情況等。

斷食工具
- 數據追踪：體重記錄、飲水、步數等數據的記錄功能，隨時記錄查看身體數據；
- BMI：自動計算BMI，幫助選擇最適合自身的斷食方案；
- 同步數據：打開“Apple Health”同步開關，同步您的身高、體重、體脂、活動、熱量、食物、食譜等信息；
- 數據兼容：支持與MyFitnessPal，Fitbit等運動軟件和跑步軟件的數據兼容；支持與小米運動、華為運動等手錶和手環廠商的數據兼容；
- 同步經期：支持與美柚、大姨媽等月經記錄軟件的數據兼容，智能分析女性生理期不同階段的體重變化特點，個性化飲食和營養推薦；
- Apple Watch：支持蘋果手錶，貼心小組件。

科普內容
- 淺顯易懂的科普文章向您介紹間歇性斷食的相關知識，指導您如何選擇正確的食物，控制飲食。
- 教你如何計算卡路里，食物熱量與日常飲食中的熱量，比哥本哈根和生酮減肥更高效。

斷食統計
- 可視化您的斷食過程並跟踪斷食和體重的每日變化；
- 分析統計數據，揭示斷食過程中身體不同的模式；
- 智能提醒：完成每一個小目標，從而達到你的大目標。

免責聲明
間歇性斷食是飲食習慣的改變，不適用於孕婦/哺乳期婦女、18歲以下兒童或被診斷為飲食失調的人。請在使用前諮詢你的醫生或醫療保健專業人員。

*使用效果因人而異，APP中給出的意見和證明無法涵蓋所有典型結果。

健康應用集成:
Femometer Fasting - 此App與Apple Health App集成，因此您可以同步您的數據（需要 iOS 9 及更高版本）。 Femometer Fasting 還支持Face ID以確保安全。

訂閱政策
在輕斷食APP應用內成功訂閱，即獲得所有功能和個性化斷食計劃，包括飲食營養建議與指南。

取消：在您的蘋果帳戶-設置中操作
續訂：在現有訂閱期限結束前24小時，帳戶將收取續訂費用

This app is a life changing game changer for me. I could never stay consistent by myself when it came to starting my weight loss journey. This app keeps me excited to come back everyday to start/end my fast and track all my progress. In a little over a month I have lost 12 lbs. I know it says can lose 3.3/week but everyone’s body is different, it can definitely plateau but I for sure noticed while the scale wasn’t changing that I lost so many inches and my stomach definitely keeps going down almost by the day it seems. Also I researched that gaining muscle while losing weight can cause a plateau on the scale as well, I exercise at home for about 20 mins daily. I’m smaller than I’ve ever been since like 5 years ago. I know I will for sure meet my goal of losing 60 lbs. I thank God this ad crossed my path

Should at least give you a free option or a free trial so you’ll realize how basic it is.

應用名稱: 姨媽來咯 - 極簡月經例假記錄工具
應用描述:
■ 蘋果Today專題推薦
被蘋果推薦到「不僅是記日子」首頁專題


■ 給女朋友開發的App
因為女朋友說壹直找不到壹款簡單好用的姨媽記錄App
所以就自己動手開發了這款"姨媽來咯"

在設計過程中,把App Store上的相關軟件都下了個遍
發現真是的沒有壹款足夠純粹簡單的App
亂七八糟的數據讓人眼花繚亂
其實女生只要壹款有著最基本功能的記錄工具就好了

然後我就根據女朋友的需求做了這款姨媽來咯
名字也是她取的，她說比較容易讓人記住

上線之後得到了眾多用戶的好評
大家都覺得就需要這樣壹款極簡的工具
沒有社區、沒有電商、沒有新聞、沒有任何負擔


■ 功能介紹
- 圓盤設計：直觀明了的展示壹整個周期的情況
- 日歷查詢：翻閱歷史記錄的姨媽日期和未來預測的姨媽日期
- 條型統計：記錄周期波動情況，計算半年平均周期
- 色盲模式：針對紅綠色盲等用戶，提供切換形狀模式功能
- 快速記錄：壹鍵記錄姨媽到來和停止的日期

- Ï個性皮膚：針對不同審美用戶設計的多款皮膚（高級版）
- 雲端數據：保存數據到雲端，永遠不怕丟失（高級版）
- 姨媽提醒：準時提醒要來的日期和走的日期（高級版）
- 歷史記錄：輕鬆添加以前未記錄的姨媽歷史（高級版）
- 標記功能：為每天打上心情或親密行為標籤（高級版）
- 隱私保護：密碼開啟，防止窺屏（高級版）


■ 關於我
- 個人作品
蘋果推薦：「姨媽來咯」「時光提醒」「閃電記帳」「戀人清單」「日出月落」App

- 聯繫方式
我的郵箱：hanchongzan＠icloud.com
我的微博：＠韩重赞
我的知乎：＠韩重赞
官方QQ群：1090628787


有任何建議和想法可以隨時來微博私信我，我會繼續開發更多好的應用


■ 使用條款
高級版(包年版)是訂閱制的收費服務，這意味著您將為未來的訂閱使用而提前預支費用。當前您可以選擇以按年的管道來使用該服務。在每個訂閱週期即將結束時，您的訂閱默認將自動續費，除非您自行取消自動續費，或者由我們取消該服務。

- 費用：
當前我們為該服務提供了9元每年的標準服務價格，該價格可能會在促銷時期會有所變化。當價格調整發生時，新的費用將會在您的下一個訂閱週期發生。

- 退款：
當期的訂閱費用將無法退款。請務必在試用結束前自行取消服務。

- 取消訂閱：
如需取消續訂，請至少提前24小時操作取消。您可以通過如下方法取消：打開系統設置-點擊Apple ID -點擊訂閱-選擇姨媽來咯高級版，取消訂閱即可

使用條款: https://shimo.im/docs/UIHGP7VWuh4iYFZQ
隱私政策: https://shimo.im/docs/rVTkWg9Vh9GRVYg8

應用名稱: 計時器-加 – 鍛煉計時器
應用描述:
完美搭配高強度間歇訓練和間歇訓練的間歇訓練計時器

計時器-加一款簡單易用，適合高強度間歇訓練的獨特應用程序。

-能夠顯示循環和周期的次數和時長。
-間隔秒錶
-在背景模式中運作的計時器
-信息化的閃光燈屏
-可無數次計時，並記錄在鍛煉歷史中。
-語音提示

無論您是在家中、健身房鍛煉，是拳擊、綜合格鬥、健身或其他鍛煉活動，都可以使用我們的計時器應用程序。

Timer Plus 還附帶了一個Apple Watch應用程序，該應用程序允許您在Apple Watch上使用iPhone上已保存的自定義鍛煉。

此應用程序使用Apple Health Kit為了在後台運行Apple Watch應用程序。

應用名稱: 男性減重訓練 - 在家運動減重
應用描述:
最適合男性在家燃脂瘦身的減重應用程式！透過超有效的燃脂訓練，讓您減去腹部脂肪、消除男性胸部贅肉，擺脫啤酒肚。依照 30 天計畫進行訓練，每天只要花 5 到 10 分鐘，就能減重並維持好身材！

提供低衝擊模式，適合體重過重或是有關節問題的使用者。不需要健身房，不需要任何設備，只要利用自己的體重就能減脂增肌。您還可以運用圖表，追蹤燃燒的卡路里 和減重進度。

3 種難度
應用程式中有 3 種難度可選擇，不論初學者或專業人士都適合使用。由專業健身教練設計的訓練內容，將重點放在男性最困擾的部位如腹部、胸部，協助您迅速減重並打造腹肌。每天都有不同的訓練內容，讓您輕鬆堅持下去。

低衝擊模式
低強度模式提供和緩且有效的減重訓練，將對關節的衝擊降到最低，減少受傷的風險。


擺脫胸部贅肉
因為胸部贅肉而不得不一直調整 T 恤嗎？集中在胸部的訓練可以協助您減去胸部脂肪，擺脫令人尷尬的贅肉。

消除腹部脂肪
由於睪酮激素的影響，男性比較容易在腹部堆積脂肪。結合最有效的腹肌訓練，讓您更快減去頑強的腹部脂肪。

自訂訓練
從 30 種以上的訓練內容建立專屬訓練。如果您的膝蓋或背部受傷，別擔心，只要替換不適合的運動即可。您也可以調整運動順序和休息時間。為達到最佳訓練效果，建議您維持較低卡路里的飲食習慣。

功能
- 3 種難度，不論性別、初學者或專業人士都適合
- 低衝擊訓練
- 自訂專屬的訓練流程
- 不需任何設備、不需要健身房、自體重量訓練
- 減脂訓練、腹肌訓練、胸肌訓練、腿部訓練、手臂訓練
- 訓練提醒功能
- 追蹤減重進度和燃燒的卡路里
- 動畫與影片指導
- 漸進式提升運動強度
- 同步數據到Apple Health

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每月NT$ 340，每年NT$ 1,350。
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。

使用條款：http://pay.mobihealthplus.com/app/menlose.html

It has a lot of pros, like:
- The app can let you add other sports (like Tennis, Basketball, football.. etc)

-The app offers water reminder

-The app allows you to adjust your capabilities, like how many push-ups you can do

-The app have a step tracker
 
-The app have a daily streak, gives extra motivation

-The app have custom workouts you can pick made by professionals.

-Using the app is really easy

-The app doesn’t force you to pay at all.

And really tiny cons, like:

-Sometimes for me at least, it bugs and ruins my streak when I repeat the month.

-You cannot set custom sport when adding a sport in the calendar, like my recent sport I’ve been playing recently Padel. 

That’s all what I can think about currently, hope anyone who sees this review finds it helpful.

應用名稱: 薄荷健康-減肥健身輕斷食
應用描述:
15年積累，科學減肥。熱量計算、輕斷食方案、健康記錄。

【爲什麼那麼多人選擇薄荷健康App】
- 專注科學減肥方法，提供個性化減重服務
基於減重場景提供個性化方案，熱量計算、16:8輕斷食等科學減肥法，助力身材管理
- 管理減肥過程，高效助力減脂計劃
定製減肥方案、減脂食譜，記錄體重、體脂、圍度等多維數據變化，符合中國飲食習慣，健康高效管理
- 海量食物數據庫，熱量營養素一查便知
 15年來不斷完善的薄荷食物數據庫，涵蓋100萬+條食物的熱量及營養素數據，以中國食物爲主，方便實用
- 控制熱量攝入，便捷記錄、專業分析，高效管理
三餐熱量、運動消耗、身體數據隨手記， HealthKit、智能手錶綁定後可同步數據，記錄更加便捷準確
- 海量減肥成功故事，見證千萬用戶的改變
來自薄荷用戶真實減肥成功故事，分享減肥成功經驗、健康生活方式，收穫更好的自己
- 減肥互動，減肥知識、減脂打卡、結伴減脂不孤單
這裏有理解你的減肥夥伴，溫暖有力的鼓勵，專業的減肥營養知識，有趣好玩的減脂挑戰賽
- 薄荷商店，健康飲食新消費平臺
適合身材管理、運動健身期的控卡全餐、零食速食、智能硬件，薄荷自有品牌，一站安心購買


【免責聲明】
薄荷健康App所提供的健康方案僅供參考，用戶若患有疾病、長期服藥或其他可能會影響健康方案執行的，應當根據自身的健康狀況自行評估，必要時需在醫生或其他醫務人員的指導下進行。薄荷健康提供的任何方案，均不能代替醫生和其他醫務人員的診斷和建議，薄荷健康也不會提供任何醫療診斷或醫療建議。
薄荷健康App僅提供管理工具，體重管理的效果受多重因素影響，請理性看待和使用；薄荷健康App部分功能免費使用，部分功能僅限付費超級會員開通使用。

【訪問授權】
薄荷健康App需要您授權訪問以下權限，如果您沒有授權相關權限，可能會影響部分功能使用。
（藍牙、相機、通訊錄、位置、麥克風、運動、相冊、健康分享、健康更新）

【個人用戶信息收集處理】
薄荷健康App 包含的核心功能（健康評測、飲食分析、食譜推薦、社區、商城等）可能會收集、保存和使用下列與您有關的個人信息。如果您不同意薄荷健康app收集和使用您的相關信息，您可能將無法享受我們提供的相關產品或服務；

具體個人信息收集請點擊下方“用戶協議、隱私政策”鏈接查看。

【HealthKit】
- 將三餐摘要添加到HealthKit。當您在薄荷記錄每日飲食數據時，相應的飲食摘要數據將會同步到HealthKit中。
- 與HealthKit中的體重數據同步。當您在薄荷記錄體重數據時，此數據將會同步到HealthKit中；同樣，當您的HealthKit中增加了來自其它數據源的體重數據時，此數據也會自動與你薄荷賬戶下的體重數據同步。
- 與HealthKit中的運動數據同步。您可以將在薄荷記錄的運動數據自動同步至HealthKit，同樣，薄荷也可以獲取來自HealthKit的運動數據。

有關您的隱私和HealthKit數據的重要說明：
由於您的健康和營養目標的隱私性非常重要，因此我們默認關閉了這些新工具。要啓用HealthKit，請在薄荷應用中打開「我的薄荷」->「設置」頁面，並點擊「HealthKit分享」選項。然後，您需要向薄荷授予在出現的設置頁面中讀寫基本營養和鍛鍊信息的權限。如查授予與HealthKit共享信息的權限，則可控制使用這些數據的應用程序。當然，您也可以隨時更改薄荷與HealthKit共享或從HealthKit接收的信息。

- 隱私政策：https://one.boohee.com/store/pages/boohee_privacy
- 用戶協議：https://one.boohee.com/store/pages/boohee_agreement

【聯繫我們&意見反饋】
官方微信：薄荷健康
官方微博：@薄荷健康官方微博
郵箱：brand@boohee.com

應用描述:
Garmin Connect™ app 為您提供全方位的健康和體能資料。無論您是為了比賽、保持活躍或只是要隨時掌控健康狀況而進行訓練，Garmin Connect 都能提供達成您目標所需的資訊和靈感。 
 
將手機(1) 與 Forerunner®、Venu®、fēnix® 或其他相容的 Garmin 裝置(2) 配對後，您就可以檢視追蹤的活動和健康指標。此外，您還可以建立訓練和路線，並邀請排行榜上的朋友一同參加挑戰。 
 
有了 Garmin Connect，您可以： 
 
- 打造個人化的首頁，以便立即看到最實用的資訊 
- 以詳細的數據分析您的活動(3)
- 建立自訂的訓練和路線 
- 檢視健康指標趨勢，例如心率和步數 
- 贏得成就勳章 
- 與其他 app (如 Apple 健康、MyFitnessPal 和 Strava) 同步資料。 
- 取得 Garmin 裝置及其功能的支援 
 
請前往 Garmin.com 進一步瞭解 Garmin 裝置以及其與 Garmin Connect app 搭配使用的方式。 
 
(1)  請至 Garmin.com/BLE 查看相容需求 
(2)  請至 garmin.com/p/125677#devices 查看相容裝置的完整清單 
(3)  請查看 Garmin.com/ataccuracy  
 
注意：持續在背景使用 GPS 可能會快速降低電池效能。

14 months of daily use, I think I can offer a credible review. I use this app with a Garmin Instinct 2s for tracking my running miles, weigh lifting, e-bike commuting, mountain biking, hiking, sleep habits, weight, HRV, and fitness goals. That’s a LOT for one app to handle, and it does so admirably. Super stable, zero crashes on my IPhone 15. The ‘glances’ (tiles) in the app on the home screen are wonderful, and I join one or two challenges every month. The training readiness is really helpful if you’re planning any races, and if you’re new to racing, the coached race guides in the app are fantastic with options for various distances (5k to Marathon). I find the points you can earn by completing challenges to be just difficult enough to keep me motivated without them taking over all other fitness goals. I also sync from the app to Strava, where my athletic “social life” lives. The app is deep, so it’s not the simplest to navigate, but that’s a trade off  I’m happy to make for the feature set. If you’re into data, the Garmin ecosystem is King and this app is a must. Can’t recommend this highly enough: whatever other app you are using on your phone, I can virtually guarantee it isn’t supporting your overall health the way this one will.

評論.內容: I have had so much trouble trying to connect theses two goddamn apps. Why can’t I have the option to enter my calories manually??? This is such a huge flaw, and why I use my FitBit again. Had been an Apple Watch user for 7 years before making the switch to a Garmin watch. Have been liking the watch itself - battery life, focus on fitness, etc. 

However, with all the data that Garmin collects, the app interface, UX, and analytics are pretty abysmal. 

With Apple, the rings made it pretty easy to cycle through days and review progress for general movement and exercise. 
There is no such thing for Garmin. All stats are completely silod, and can only be compared within that specific metric (like steps). 

It’s not good looking - it’s not horribly ugly but you just get the feel looking at it and using it that it’s from 7-10 years ago. 

In summery, this app could be SOOO much more. Garmin has had the lead on Apple and others when it comes to fitness capabilities, but every year Apple (and others) catch up by adding more features and analytics to their OS. If Garmin doesn’t take their software more seriously, I could definitely see them losing a good bulk of customers over frustrations and people going back to Apple, Suunto, Coros, etc. 

I just invested heavily in this Garmin Watch however and would love to stay with Garmin for awhile - please listen to your customers and do yourselves the biggest favor by trying to close the gap between your software and amazing hardware.

深耕全球市场多年，我们精益求精，致力于打造更加优质的减脂减重健康解决方案。本次更新包括海量健身内容、优化用户体验以及行之有效的锻炼附加功能。您无需操心，我们已为您准备就绪完善的定制饮食方案、健身计划、饮水及热量追踪服务、计步功能以及诸多实用功能。

- 健身计划：个性化锻炼及膳食计划，旨在助力更快塑形

我们致力于为您提供出色的用户体验、轻松而有效的锻炼以及可根据饮食偏好（素食、传统、生酮等）调整的营养膳食计划，视频食谱则助力您的烹饪过程更加轻松方便！从此告别健身房，在家轻松塑造自信身材！

购物清单功能一招搞定！您无需写下所用食材，点击菜谱，即可立即将食材添加至购物清单。

此外，BetterMe App 已与 Health Kit 集成，您可以在 App 内追踪步数并记录饮水量与摄入热量。您可以在主页查看健身与饮食方案，设置锻炼通知则可获得实时锻炼提醒。新增的瑜伽、行走及跑步锻炼将进一步满足您的日常活动需求，致力于为您的健康保驾护航！

BetterMe 现提供多种订阅方式（半年制、一周续订制、免费试用等）。您可以在 iTunes 账户设置中随时取消订阅，但条款中未使用的部分均不会产生退款。购买确认后将向您的 iTunes 账户收取费用。iTunes 免费试用期的未使用部分（如提供），将在购买订阅服务（如适用）时被回收。

應用名稱: 我的健身工廠 My Fitness Factory
應用描述:
提供健身工廠會員們最便利的全方位 app，完整紀錄每日的運動訓練細節、飲食內容、身體數據變化。

• 日記紀錄：每次運動訓練內容與每日飲食詳細記錄，攝取、消耗多少熱量都知道
• 專家連線：與私人教練、營養師即時連線，掌握你的每日狀況，給予個人化的規劃與建議
• 數據紀錄：紀錄超過 10 項身體數值，圖表化呈現每一次的進步
• 目標設定：不論您是想減重、增重還是增肌的會員，這款APP將會依造您的目標與狀況，自動演算出最適合你的專屬計劃唷
• 運動資料庫：完整的有氧課程以及肌力訓練清單，方便會員們記錄自己每次運動的時間、重量、組數，並清楚計算當次運動消耗的卡洛里
• 飲食資料庫：上萬筆食物完整營養資訊輕鬆查詢，便利商店、外食餐廳、自煮食材都找得到
• 連結「健康 App」，自動匯入步數。

**本應用內的內容不能代替任何專業醫療建議或醫療諮詢。請隨時向您的醫生或其他合格的醫療服務提供者諮詢您可能存在的醫療狀況問題。**

客服介面很難用，打算要會員請假，結果 1. 不小心上下滑，結果就跳出要重新排隊 2. 排隊系統得畫面一直保留，不能做其他事，手機待機會被丟進無限等待黑洞，得跳出重排，不然可能地球爆炸才排到 3. 滑動異常脫離系統時，不會釋放隊列，導致能處理的人越來越少 4. 滑掉講到一半的客服後，竟然沒保持紀錄，找不到回去的點
（我2022到2024每年請假都遇到一樣的問題，這家公司感覺沒在維護了）
使用手機操作「線上客服」功能時，在切換到其他app後（讓健工app在背景運作），才1、2分鐘時間，切換回來時，就斷線了！難道要一直把健工App客服畫面維持在桌面不能動嗎？什麼事都不能做
一堆垃圾功能
網路等候太久，網站不好用，卡住再重新等候，浪費很多時間
查詢課表要一個區點，點進去還要一個個分館點，對於要查詢全部館的團課課表非常不友善，最進app很容易當機，希望查團課功能能更友善一點，也希望能增加老師請假的通知功能，而不是只有點進去看課表才會知道。
沒有考量客戶停車問題TC Texas1

應用名稱: SmartDiet - 體重管理和減肥日記
應用描述:
人氣的減肥APP是 "智能減肥" (SmartDiet)！
想減肥的朋友不可缺少的，體重管理減肥APP！

□■特徵
・啟動後立刻可以輸入信息的便利設計
・您可以使用簡體中文，繁體中文，英文
・方便使用的表格功能
・密碼登錄
・可以傳導數據·可以輸入進iPhone
・24個顏色以上的可選主題色
・可以保存記錄的功能
・蓋章功能
・提醒您不要忘記輸入

具體的請往下瀏覽。


□■使用方法

每日一回，僅僅輸入！
體重和體脂肪率，可以用備忘錄或者蓋章來記錄。

□■便利的功能

◆簡單操作完成
APP啟動時，關鍵詞自動表示，立刻可進行體重輸入！
然後，輸入完體重後，自動輸入脂肪率。

每天使用的APP，所以盡可能減少操作，可盡快完成的設計！
並且，不僅可以輸入小數點，也能連續輸入數值。

◆可設定輸入法
不僅體重和體脂肪率可以記錄，也可用備忘錄和蓋章記錄。
可以只記錄體重，記錄只想記錄的項目即可
選擇自己想記入的項目，每天都很輕鬆完成喲。

不僅備忘錄可以記入，飲食相關的內容或者，
鍛煉的情況也可以記錄全部細節。


◆便利的表格
1週時間，1個月，3個月，1年，3年期間
表格可以自由切換時間。

觸碰屏幕即可擴大，縮小表格。
長按一點，就可以確認這天的BMI或者數據確認，
表格上的數據編輯和消除也可以的。


◆密碼登錄
保護個人隱私，查看數據均採用密碼登錄功能！
指紋認證TouchID或者面部認證FaceID，最新機能對應。
當然，全部免費使用呢！


◆數據傳導功能
iPhone的機種變更或者iPad的數據也均對應！

並且可用電腦瀏覽數據，可以導入CSV文件。
iPhone的數據更新和機種變更，均安心對應，數據可以導入新的機種後繼續使用。
當然這個也是免費使用的喲！


◆豐富的主題顏色
24種以上的豐富主題可供您自由選擇！
從冷靜的男性向顏色，到可愛的女性向顏色。



◆廣告消除
這個是需要付費的，如果您想消除廣告。
如果您付過費用的話，同一個AppleID使用的時候，廣告均是非表示的。

◆鏈接Apple Health應用程序
  與此應用程序一起記錄的體重，體脂百分比和BMI可以註冊到“健康”應用程序。 只需使用此應用程序記錄，數據便會自動寫入Health應用程序。
  *設置方法：請在設置屏幕上的“將數據寫入Health應用程序”中進行設置。

◆便利的蓋章
Good、Bad、吃多了、聚餐、排泄、運動、有
7個種類的星星印章可以簡單標記。
不用一點一點的記錄備忘錄，蓋章即可簡單記錄！


◆其他的便利功能
・LB（磅）或者inch（英尺）利用單位可能
・溫馨提示您不要忘記輸入的功能
・iPhoneX或者iPad均對應
・早或者晚上的體重輸入，備忘錄功能對應
・胸圍，腰圍，臀圍的備忘錄記錄對應
・不僅僅是減肥，而是健康減肥！

SmartDiet（智能減肥）鼓勵您減肥，對男性，女性的美髮，健美，體能提高以及美容健康促進的支援。每天僅僅輸入就可簡單的完成啦！

表格可以確認每日的體重的減少·減量的情況，讓我們智能的減肥吧！

應用名稱: 7 分鐘鍛鍊 - 體適能應用程式
應用描述:
超過 300 萬名使用者愛用的 7 分鐘健身！經科學證實有助於減重、維持身材並強健身體。

沒時間？別擔心！每天只要花 7 分鐘進行簡單、快速且有效的健身，不需要任何器材或健身房，讓您在家中或隨時隨地運動。

以 HICT (高強度循環訓練) 為基礎， 7 分鐘健身應用程式經證實是「最安全、最有效也最有效率」的方法，可以減脂、鍛鍊全身肌肉和改善體適能。《紐約時報》曾指出 7 分鐘健身是「用最少的投資獲得最大健身效果」。

7 分鐘健身值得一試！您可以運用這款應用程式鍛鍊腹肌、雙臂、雙腿和全身肌肉。透過生動的 3D 動畫影音指導，您的個人教練會引導您進行每一項運動。每天揮灑汗水 7 分鐘，挑戰不同的健身運動，您很快就會看到成果！

為什麼選擇 7 分鐘健身？
* 簡短有效的 7 分鐘居家健身運動可快速看到成果
* 科學證實 7 分鐘健身可減重和維持身材
* 不需要任何器材或健身房，可以在家中或隨時隨地鍛鍊
* 適合初學者的健身內容，容易執行
* 30 天健身計畫協助您培養每日運動的習慣
 * 針對您困擾的部位進行分區鍛鍊

功能
* 生動的 3D 動畫影音指導，引導您進行每一項鍛鍊
* 健身追蹤器會自動追蹤消耗熱量和減重進度
* 逐漸提升健身強度
* 自訂每日健身提醒
* 可調整休息時間與循環次數
* 健身時搭配您最愛的音樂來維持動力
* 查看健身行事曆和健身報告，瞭解自己的進度
* 透過 Facebook 和 Instagram 分享健身資料
* 可與 Apple 健康同步資料

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每半年9.99美元
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。
 
隱私政策：https://abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html?pkg=com.abishkking.7minworkout
使用條款：http://pay.period-calendar.com/app/7minutes.html

評論.內容: I like the workout.But I wish you could get some new workout without having to pay.
I really enjoy this app

I’ve had this app for over a year and I love it. Easy to use, good choice of workouts, and I like that it tracks my progress. I was having problems with aggressive popup advertisements even though I’m a paid subscriber so I left a negative review but the developer then contacted me and told me how to reset it. Everything works great again.
¡This app is very good!
Just started it. So far so good. I plan to use it regularly as a second workout from my regular routine. So we’ll see.
تستاهلون مليون نجمة وكلش عاشت ايدكم ❤️ صار برنامجي المفضل وهاي اول مره ادخل واقيم برنامج لان صدك يستاهل ومجاني بالايفون مو مثل البقيه لازم اشتراك ،احبكم ❤️
This was one of the first apps to make it easy to follow the 7-minute workout published in the New York Times. It’s evolved to incorporate numerous variations. Easy to work in to my daily routine.
Very motivating and love the app design layout.

I had increased my time to 40 sec per exercise.  That is gone and now I can’t set that.  Setting is gone!

Why would you take away that makes it almost useless!
This is a very simple app that everyone can use if they want to get into working out, consistency is key!
Love it so much
I love this app, but when is the butt workout going to be out?

評論.內容: Great app if you're looking for cardio AND ab exercises like me and you don't have a lot of time to commit to a workout. Also works on a lot of other muscles and toning. I love it!
Amazing app!!👍🏽

MOOVO 團隊集結了一群對於未來城市有美麗想像的熱血年輕人，貢獻各自在全球市場營運、技術和城市科學的專長，共同規劃出適合現代社會的全新共享交通方案，更期待能對智慧城市交通服務的美麗願景做出貢獻。

應用名稱: Window - 間歇性斷食追蹤器
應用描述:
Window 是您隨手可得的間歇性斷食小幫手，協助您離健康更進一步。 我們使用的方法以科學為基礎且經專家指導，提供適合您及您生活方式的個人化建議！

間歇性斷食是一種受歡迎的飲食模式，能協助您減重並讓您感覺更健康。 Window 會協助您更安心、更正確地進行斷食。 追蹤您的斷食及飲食、設定並監控減重目標、記錄水分攝取，並取得營養師所提供的健康建議。 打造更健康的生活型態，Window 為您一手掌握！

** 做為一名免費 Window 使用者，您將獲得 **

• 斷食計時器 - 追蹤您的斷食期及進食期。
• 即時提醒 - 斷食期間開始或結束時取得通知。
• 體重記錄 - 建立體重目標並監控進度。
• 水分追蹤器 - 控制您的水分攝取。
• 健康部落格 - 和頂尖營養師學習，深入了解健康、飲食、身體以及三者之間的關聯。
• 和您的 Apple Watch 同步。
• 和 Apple Health 同步。

** 加入 Window 進階版來存取： **

• 個人化的斷食計畫。
• 所有斷食計畫 - 根據您當下的需求切換斷食計畫。
• 您的個人飲食計畫 - 取得營養師的早餐、午餐、晚餐飲食建議。
• 個人統計資料 - 持續追蹤您的個人統計資料，例如：體重、水分攝取等。
• 健康挑戰 - 利用小任務養成新習慣，例如：減少糖分攝取。
• 營養及情緒追蹤器 - 了解斷食如何影響您的身體及心靈。

無論你是想改善飲食習慣，或是想讓體重減輕一點，我們都會協助你走在正軌上，並提供所有你可能需要的支援及引導。

訂閱款項會於確認購買時計入您的 App Store 帳戶。 訂閱將自動續訂與計費，除非您在當前訂閱或試用期間結束的至少 24 小時前關閉自動續訂或取消訂閱。 當您在免費試用期間購買會員訂閱時，會喪失任何免費試用期間未使用的部分。 續訂費用取決於您選擇的訂閱方案。 
購買後，可至帳號設定管理訂閱與自動續訂，或者聯繫客戶服務。

Window 的設計目的在於作為追蹤間歇性斷食進度的工具，並非作為醫療或保健服務用途。 Window 應用程式的內容僅供參考。 在進行間歇性斷食或任何其他減肥計劃之前，特別是若您有懷孕或任何健康狀況的話，您應先行諮詢醫療專業人士。

祝追蹤愉快！

評論.內容: Had the app in the past and it was great, but now I can't even get past the manual plan screen. The "open eating window" and "start fasting" buttons do nothing.

評論.標題: Love the app, hate the price hike.
評論.內容: I have had this app for almost 5 years now. I use it religiously to track my fasting hours. For the most part it works really well. There are times it lags. Then there are times that it lags really bad. Luckily you can edit your times. Every year the price has gone up. This year the price has gone up by double!! So I was paying $39.99 and now it’s going to $89.99. That’s a hard pass. Why have such an increase? There is literally no upkeep for this app. I have never seen such a jump for an app. While I love using this app, I refuse to pay that amount of money. Especially in this economy.

評論.標題: Like the App- but not for double the price!!
評論.內容: I like the app, the calendar showing both hours fasting and eating window. I liked it enough that I paid $40 for the year. Just got notified they are more than doubling the subscription price! $90 bucks a year? I don’t think it’s worth that! I guess I’m looking for a new fasting tracker…

I cannot get the free version of this app to work!  You have the choice of a 12 hr or manual fast and the manual doesn’t work. I’ve had this app in the past, and it worked then but something happened where you can’t get the free version.

Since you updated it, you messed up your app! It constantly gives network error and does not open the app at all. It has become very bad. I used it every day, now I have to delete it and look for an alternative app.

Just downloaded this app 30 minutes ago and I just want the free version, but the subscription thing keeps popping up whenever I tap on anything. What type of useless app is this? Do you think that will make people want to spend money? It just shows people how annoying and money hungry the developers are. I haven’t even gotten a chance to do anything and this dumb subscription thing won’t stop popping up🤦‍♀️
Overall I like the product yet the challenges are not working and there is no working support link to contact for help.

i love this app very much personally i dont use it for fasting anymore i just use it to to track when and how long i eat throughout the day n such, i feel like theres honestly a few ways u can utilize this app! however the glitches have been soo frustrating lately, sometimes its perfect, and then sumtimes for a couple of days straight it will jus be so laggy n delayed as well as hard to even open, theres been a few times where ive opened the app and its glitched me back out three times ina row! i realize thats a common thing with apps sometimes but ive never had it happen so often and multiple times ina row the way it does with ur app. i would say if little things like that gets on ur nerves too much dont use the app but aside from that i have to repeat its a very easy and productive app to utilize!

This app should work to sync data amongst my iPad my phone and my watch but doesn’t. I have to choose which one to work with and be near it to enter data. The ability to edit water after the fact because this doesn’t sync amongst the three devices adds to the annoyance. And sometimes the water “meter” does not rest to zero for new day or fasting period. Overall nice app but not worth the money I paid. I’d go freebie version instead. Finally, while I can edit windows, I’m noticing that accuracy is not consistent - reports streaks that are actually far longer than posted … that I find particularly irritating! I have to go in and edit or just accept it believes that I broke I fasting streak when I didn’t. Guess I’m learning not to care … watch out as when I’m at the point I don’t more often than do care - I won’t pay for this app any more.
Then to see it’s doubled its price … absolutely not needed anymore!

評論.標題: Do not click on purchase this app!
評論.內容: It does not work and when I realized that after less than 24 hours of trying it, they refused to refund my money charging me for a whole year’s use of the app when I only used it for less than a day. Terrible customer service. I am an older adult and I think this developer is taking advantage of people like me. If the company is even run by human beings. Probably only AI. This app is a trap. DO NOT BUY IT!

Being a YouTuber, I’m always looking for great products and businesses to review . unfortunately, I was sadly disappointed with this app and I will never use it again. I canceled my order BEFORE my trial ended and was still charged. I’ve emailed them and still have not received an answer. 10 out of 10 do not recommend there are many other great apps to help with intermittent fasting.

I just wasted $60 for a yearly subscription. I was of the understanding that you can choose either one of the apps IF plans, or manually enter your own. In fairness you can manually enter your own, but NOT schedule ahead. This is of no use to me. I was hoping for a count down, alerts, motivation, etc for the IF plan that I entered ahead of time. This is not possible and will just be an expensive, useless app that sits phone for the next year.
It doesn’t give anything exceptional to think the price is worth it. I like the interface, but the information isn’t of a level that would make me want to subscribe for $89 or $59.

I really liked using this app at first.  Now it’s the slowest thing I use.  I cancelled my subscription because of all the app issues. It takes several seconds to minutes to have the app register your scrolling, moving a window time, accepting a challenge, logging weight, pretty much everything that’s done in the app.  I thought it was just my phone but other users have the same experience.  Definitely not worth the over $80 charge.  There’s other fasting apps out there that are not frustrating to use like this one is.
It would be helpful for the user to establish their own baseline for success regarding how often they weigh themselves.  Daily isn’t mentally healthy for everyone.
Other than reminding me when to start and stop eating In not really seeing the benefits😞
More like a time keeper.  Better to just download a free time keeping app. Tried to cancel/refund subscription but did not allow.

No matter how long I fast, when I go to end fasting on Apple Watch, it says I’m ending early (“under 12 hours”) and I’ll lose my data. I never fast under 12 hours. I reinstalled and same thing. I emailed for help and was sent an auto response saying sorry, they’re basically not responding to issues at this time lol. WHAT?

I contacted the support staff to assist in setting up Alternate Day Fasting. I selected this app because it has a “manual” feature. The response received from them was, “ at this time. Our team won’t be able to prioritize the specific issue you encountered. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.” $40 and they can’t be bothered.  Priceless.
How do I get a hold of customer service .

評論.標題: I have a couple gripes but
評論.內容:
I would love if there was an option to differentiate between a fast, dry fast, and most importantly liquid fast. Also the app hardly ever goes on sale and it’s so expensive for what it does which I am aware is my opinion and can be seen differently by others, but I’d love to purchase the yearly subscription.

Still a good app!

This app is reviewed as free and states free option, with subscription offer. Paywalls everywhere. Can’t even pick a fasting schedule without being hit up for money. Deleted and back to simple. This is totally garbage. Better free options out there. Keep on searching.

I purchased a yearly subscription to this last December and canceled soon after because it did not meet my needs. My subscription does not end until December 4th but I woke up today to a pending charge for $39.99. If this does not fall off my account, I will be disputing this with my bank as an unauthorized charge on my account. I am not impressed by this situation.

評論.標題: No cloud backup, so why bother?
評論.內容: Window was a fantastic app before the original developer sold it. Now, the app got so buggy I had to delete and re-install - I lost many months of fasting data because there is no cloud backup. Worthless subscription.

評論.標題: Terrible response to customer service don’t sign up they never respond!!
評論.內容: I have sent 3 emails asking for help no response except auto response that they got the email. I cancelled the app day 2 of 7 cause it was too complicated and I couldn’t get badges to work. Then they try to take $39.99 anyway. Subsequently I keep asking for them to shut this app off i don’t want it and don’t want the subscription and still no response!! I should have trusted my instincts not to try it
Help button goes nowhere.accidentally pressed end fast and can’t undo
Dont pay for it. It has nothing useful
Love it! Not glitchy. Motivation is abundant and it keeps me honest and on track with my goals.

評論.標題: Harassed me for not having a subscription that I have
評論.內容: My only real complaint about this app is that it will harass you if you turn off auto-renew. I personally turn off auto-renew on all subscriptions so I don’t accidentally forget and unintentionally continue to pay for a subscription I no longer use. I paid for a 1-year subscription to this app, which seems ridiculous because I don’t understand why an app that simply tracks when I’m eating and fasting needs a recurring payment, but whatever. I paid for a year and then turned off auto-renew. It’s been about a week now and every time I open the app I get a pop-up asking me why I ended my subscription that won’t close until I select an answer. I’ve answered it like 5 times this week. Anytime I just want to start my fasting period I get grilled with the same pop up asking me the same question.
This app is so hard to use. The fasting windows make no sense and no help available. Just a huge waste of money.
text scrolls too fast to read it all. can’t find directions to chart water, etc.

I signed up for a trial subscription but all this app does is just time your periods of eating and fasting. I tried to log onto the website to cancel my subscription but whenever I put in my email and password I get taken to the unsubscribe page. Contacted tech support to get help logging in but got a useless response then no response. Not good.
I like the simplicity of this app but is there anyway you can add more positive posts or helpful tips like here is keto option or something else. It’s just another tracking app.
Paying full subscription but the Challenge and other features not working.

App does an ok job monitoring fasting/eating windows but not much else. You can monitor weight but trend lines are not visually useful. No way to track food to learn relationships to activity, fasting, or other variables. Honestly I don’t need to monitor my fasting with an app. A clock works just as well. I was looking to connect all my data in other ways. Oh well🤷‍♀️

Window was one of the first IF journal apps to hit the AppStore. It WAS simple, appealing, helpful and a great value. So the “developers” decided to “fix it”. They bloated it with all this garbage no one wants or needs. Now you are forced to fill out a lengthy questionnaire before you can even see the app itself. Just look at the reviews. Anything from the last 3 years is largely negative. Great job wrecking a good thing!

評論.標題: Don’t make me give you a life story to use the app
評論.內容: Don’t make me give you a life story to use the app
You don't know what food to consume daily.

評論.標題: Used to love this app when it first came out
評論.內容: With all the updates it’s become far less intuitive to use and any time I earn a badge for a streak I can’t exit out of that page. I have to close the app on my phone.
Helps me to keep track of my progress

評論.標題: Honestly, I just don’t like the turquoise color of the app.
評論.內容: I wish you could change the color of all of the icons and lettering from this sea foam crap to something else. That’s literally why I canceled.
I paid for the $9.99 monthly subscription and they randomly charged for the yearly. Idk if they’re trying to scam people but this ain’t cool.

評論.標題: Great but there needs to be some fixes
評論.內容:
I really like this app from the tracking to setting my moods and earning badges. There are some things in the app that is pulling incorrect data:

- on my dashboard, it says I lost 33 pounds which is not true. It has my start weight at 166.8 pounds which I started with 137.5 pounds. I tried multiple times to change this but it doesn’t let me. Kind of a let down since I would like to know how much I’ve lost since starting the app

- on the stats tab, it says that my fasting started 4/17-4/25 but between 4/25-4/30 there is no data. When I check my dashboard tab (which is correct) it shows my progress from 4/25-5/3. This is skewing my shortest eating window to show 0.0 hours which is not correct.

評論.標題: This app isn’t working for me
評論.內容:
I am disappointed. I have been able to figure out some of how this app works but much remains a mystery.
There is no help feature or way to ask questions. At this moment it feels like to just wasted $10 and a lot of time and frustration.

The app is ok but IF is not helping. I eat so much more than before in each meal. Every day my appetite increases no matter how much water I drink. I am glad that some people find fasting helpful. I am giving 3 stars because it promotes fasting in a way that seems that research based and it is not.
Cannot use for over 325 lbs will use another app. I did like how it would integrate with iHealth app. But paid for subscription and now can’t use it to track my weight loss. Disappointed

Goods: 
 -Simple to Use
 -Informational
 -Appropriate Amount of Notification’s
 -Journal is Fun to Use and Follow
 -Water Intake
Bads:
 -Water Intake Sometimes Gets Deleted and Doesn’t Pull Through
Improvements:
 -Custom Water Intake Amount Instead of Only Having 8oz and 16oz (Most Bottles I Have Hold 20oz)
 -Option to Add Tea/Coffee/Vitamin Drink/Etc That Converts to Water Amount. Though You May Have 8oz of Coffee it Isn’t Actually Equal to 8oz of Water

評論.標題: I love some things but also frustrated
評論.內容: I love how it has the “diary” feature and the reminders. However, it’s not updating when I change my fast. For example, I am currently doing 16 hours. I normally stop eating at 6 and it always has my window close at 12. If I have some wine and stop my eating window at 9 it still says I can eat the next day at 12. Also, if I stop my fast early I will still get the reminders that tell me my window opens in an hour. Super frustrating that I’m paying for the app and it’s not calculating my fasts correctly.
App is constantly crashing mid use. Please update.

Something has happened where I can no longer enter my start and stop times. What’s up?
I started the app on my ipad and was trying to log in on my phone as well.  I couldn’t remember my password so I sent in the “forgot my password”. It says it will send me an email to reset my password but it never sends me an email. I need help to be able to use on both devices. 

Thanks

應用名稱: FitFit - 健身紀錄重量組數 重訓筆記 追蹤運動成果
應用描述:
FitFit - 您的個人健身助手與專業記錄工具
FitFit 是一款功能全面的健身紀錄App，專為幫助您追蹤、規劃和優化訓練而設計。無論您是想入門新手健身、提升重量訓練的效果，還是尋找適合的健體健美工具，FitFit 都能滿足您的需求。

核心功能亮點：
- 跨平台功能：隨時隨地透過手機、平板或電腦存取您的數據，打造流暢的使用體驗。
- 重量與次數記錄：精確記錄每次訓練的重訓動作、組數與重量，助您輕鬆掌握進度。
- 健身追蹤圖表：以直觀的圖表清晰呈現訓練成果，從重訓重量到每週健身日記一目了然。
- 健身紀錄：完整記錄每日訓練，涵蓋健身課表與健身動作大全。
- 休息計時器：提供專業的動作計時功能，科學管理訓練間的休息時間。
- 超過306種運動：包含豐富的健身入門動作和進階課程，滿足不同程度的使用者需求。
- 無限的訓練計畫與樣板：輕鬆建立個人化的健身計畫App，設計屬於您的健身菜單。
- 每週目標設定：為未來一週設定可實現的健身組數和目標，保持動力與有序的進步。
為什麼選擇 FitFit？
- 免費健身App：提供專業級功能而完全免費，讓您享受無負擔的健身支持。
- 專業級私人健身教練App：透過個性化功能輕鬆設計您的重訓課程，無論您是入門者還是資深訓練者。
- 視覺化進度：激勵人心的圖表讓您隨時掌握訓練歷程，從新手健身到達成健身目標。
- 全方位健身指南：從健身入門到健身書推薦，全面提升您的健康與體能。

適合的用戶：
- 想要記錄每日訓練的健身愛好者。
- 需要一款健身菜單App規劃個人訓練計畫的用戶。
- 尋找高效、直覺使用的健身課表App。
- 新手或進階使用者尋求專業的健身追蹤工具。
立即下載 FitFit，無論是健身打卡還是重量訓練，讓您輕鬆管理健康目標，實現理想體態！

「睡眠」App 的設計可協助你達成睡眠目標，包含獲得充足睡眠、準時就寢和建立就寢前的習慣。你可以輕鬆追蹤你的睡眠並使用鬧鐘聲或觸覺回饋在早上叫你起床。「睡眠」體驗包含就寢時間提醒、起床鬧鐘、睡眠追蹤、「睡眠專注模式」、「睡前放鬆」和長期睡眠趨勢顯示方式。

功能

• 設定睡眠排程來協助你達成睡眠目標和準時就寢。

• 佩戴 Apple Watch 就寢時可以追蹤你的睡眠階段和睡眠的時間長度。Apple Watch 會使用加速度計和心率感測器的資料來判斷你處於哪個睡眠階段。

• 開啟「睡眠專注模式」和使用「睡眠鎖定」來鎖定螢幕。點一下螢幕可讓時間、日期和早上鬧鐘的顯示亮度變暗。

• 使用「睡前放鬆」來協助你在睡前放鬆。「睡眠專注模式」也會在「睡前放鬆」期間啟用來協助你達成睡眠目標。

• 以輕柔聲音或觸覺回饋的鬧鐘叫你起床，讓你不會打擾周遭的其他人。

• 每天早上接收包含當天天氣預報和目前電池續航力的起床畫面，以便你記得充電。

• 在 iPhone 上的「健康」App 中檢視包含睡眠時間、睡眠階段、睡眠目標、呼吸速率和睡眠心率的睡眠統計資料。

• 在「健康」App 中查看「呼吸障礙」，並在「呼吸障礙」資料持續顯示中度或重度睡眠呼吸中止症的跡象時接收通知。*

• 手機透過密碼鎖定時，除了「醫療卡」以外，你在「健康」App 中的所有健康和健身資料都會進行加密。你的健康資料會使用 iCloud 在所有裝置之間自動保持更新，傳輸時或在 Apple 伺服器上都會進行加密。

*無法在部分地區使用。Apple Watch Series 9 和後續機型以及 Ultra 2 上可使用「睡眠呼吸中止症通知」。此功能是針對 18 歲以上並未被診斷患有「睡眠呼吸中止症」人，旨在偵測中度或重度睡眠呼吸中止症的跡象。

評論.內容: It is only as good as your ability to download it. Not.

評論.標題: Love the idea but needs to be able to track naps
評論.內容:
No nap tracking really is a problem since I’m such a bad sleeper. Like 3-4 hours of sleep a night not counting naps in the day for maybe an hour or so. Would like that feature. 
Also wouldn’t mind a “are you in bed yet ask” and a “are you up already” if you’re active outside your set window but it’s close to the end time. So cool but needs improvement

I’m having to enter an “In Bed” manually, with start & stop having same times, just so I know when I laid down in the bed.  Otherwise, I have to remember when I did and put it in later.   Wish there was a button to use that I could tap when I get into bed and again when I get out of bed, to input my start/stop for bed.  

I miss SleepBot.
Please fix this Apple

Used to be amazing. In watchOS 8, the alarm is not reliable and when it does trigger, it is a different much more subtle alarm that doesn’t wake you as well. Also is less reliable at keeping the screen off at night. It got thrown in with focus modes and so now it’s quite hard to activate.

Apple fails on this 👎🏻 MAJOR

You MUST set a sleep schedule 👎🏻 Not everyone has a steady time for sleep 

It doesn't track naps 👎🏻 There are those of us who need a snooze during the day 

Nothing about connection to HR or breathing 👎🏻 Apple has these features on the watch but fails to bring them to sleep?

No way to just track sleep on our own now 👎🏻This messes with Health & other sleep apps significantly. It makes tracking sleep a pain in comparison to other devices. 

Apple has a LOT of work to do to get this near its competitors
Designed to Sherlock real sleep apps
Compared to the Fitbit app and device the Apple Watch and sleep app don’t accurately track sleep.
Not very useful to be honest. Had to download sleep watch… app developers…. Take a look at whoop and do that
I had a Fitbit about eight years ago that was a lot more accurate at tracking sleep. I could literally be tossing and turning for an hour or two and my Apple Watch would think I was sleeping.
This doesn’t provide any useful sleep metrics like other sleep trackers do, and even Auto Sleep that runs on the watch is far better in the detail and insights it provides.
Given the amount of information Apple has through the watch, the App should really have more insights and features.
Does sleep track need an alarm to track your sleep? I didnt use an alarm last night woke up to no data

The sleep mode that normally keep the screen from lighting up is gone in WatchOS 8. It should be accessible under the do not disturb, but it’s now there. 

TO FIX THIS ISSUE

Under the Focus setting enabling mirror the phone and the additional focuses including sleep return.
This app to track your time in bed not your sleep.

應用描述:
簡單,清晰而美麗的 Tabata 鍛鍊計時器。

1. 藉拖曳來設定您的回合數,休息,工作等。
2. 藉觸碰來鍛鍊。

儘管本 app 使用上超級簡單,但我們沒有省略任何必要功能:
∙ 在鍛鍊時聽您的音樂 app。
∙ 以音效指引您歷經鍛鍊,讓您不用盯著螢幕。
∙ 您能離開本 app 而仍然聽到音效指引,以便追隨您在線上發現的鍛鍊。

∙ 有歷史和統計數據頁能回顧您先前的鍛鍊。
∙ 您甚至能從任何先前的鍛鍊載入設定！

如果您有任何疑問或建議,只需觸碰「聯絡支援人員」並告訴我們！我們會試著把您的想法,納入下次更新中。


This app includes an optional auto-renewable subscription (Premium Pass): Premium Pass beings with a free trial period, then an auto-renewable monthly subscription when trial ends. Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration/price selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hrs before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Apple Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the free initial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

應用描述:
最受歡迎的空氣質量應用，實時播報全球超過 180 個國家的空氣質量。

- App Store 首頁推薦優秀應用，現已登陸 Apple 官網。
- 能夠根據所在位置顯示當前地點的監測數據。
- 可查詢美國、歐洲地區的當日花粉數據與預報信息。
- 支持切換空氣質量指數計算標準，可選中國、美國、英國或印度標準。
- 當空氣污染加重時，您會收到一條推送通知，提醒您做好防護措施。
- 可將實時空氣質量指數顯示在圖標上，不用打開程序，從桌面就能瞭解最新空氣質量情況。

- 提供 watchOS App 與錶盤組件，抬起手腕即可查看當前空氣質量。
- 提供 iMessage 擴展，直接在聊天中分享空氣質量。

- 可與鐳豆空氣質量監測器連接，查看室內空氣質量，與室外情況對比，選擇防護措施，接收污染提醒。
- 可與飛利浦智控淨化器連接，隨時隨地瞭解室內空氣質量，控制淨化器的開關、風速，瞭解濾網使用狀態。
- 可與飛利浦 GoPure 車載淨化器連接，控制淨化器的開關、風速，瞭解濾網使用狀態。


「在意空氣」應用中包含廣告。您可以按年訂閱去除廣告服務, 為享受最完整的使用體驗, 並為後續的研發工作提供支持. 當前去廣告服務年費為 ¥6 人民幣, 在不同國家此價格可能不同. 如果您選擇訂購去除廣告服務, 款項將從您的 iTunes 賬號中扣除. 付費服務期結束前 24 小時您的賬戶會自動扣費續期, 您可在 iTunes Store 的個人設置中關閉自動續期. 已生效的付費服務期不可取消. 原「全國空氣質量指數」付費用戶可選擇「恢復購買」繼續獲得一年的去廣告服務. 

隱私政策: https://air-matters.com/app/zh-Hans/privacy_policy.html
許可協議: https://air-matters.com/app/zh-Hans/terms_of_use.html

評論.標題: This is a scam development team
評論.內容: This is a scam development team, Lots of people paid for this app, but soon it changed its name and began to charge again

I’ve tried so many AQI (air quality index) apps. With the advent of the Canadian wildfire season, the air in the Midwest has been exceptionally awful. This app uses my location (and doesn’t put a hit on my battery) to keep me informed about the state of the air I breath. I use it multiple times a day.  Being able to see WHAT is contributing to the AQI (PM2.5, O3, PM10, etc) is also useful for me. The Apple Watch complication works incredibly well!  The level of detail that has gone into this app is remarkable. The home screen widgets work really well too. You can stop looking, you’ve found the right AQI app.
Don’t waste your time
Welcome to Cloak

Also, it lets you visualize air quality over the last few days to see how bad (or good it's been) and even check air quality in different places to see which city you might want to move to (haha). Irreplaceable. Thank you so much to the creators of this app! (You could charge a few more dollars to remove ads and I would pay.)

*************************

The free version is supposed to allow for limited logs. That limit is 0. I was trying the app for about 20 minutes. Created a workout, watched an ad EVERY TIME I went to create a missing exercise. They do have many built in, I just happened to have some they were missing like goblet squat or farmers carry. I created a workout. Added some exercises, then added my set/rep targets and went to log a set. Added my reps and weight and hit the plus sign to add it to the log. Instead of logging, it comes up with the option to buy premium so I hit the X, and it makes me watch a video. It won’t let me add the set to the log. Watched their videos on YouTube to make sure I wasn’t doing anything wrong. I wasn’t. You can’t log a set unless you sign up for the trial. The app should at least let you log a couple of sets without requiring a trial. The purpose of a free app is to give users a good experience and get them to want the premium. Seems the purpose of this app is to get ad revenue.

應用描述:
Google Fit 讓你享有更健康、更有活力的生活！

決定該做哪種運動和掌握活動量以保持健康並不容易。因此，Google Fit 與世界衛生組織 (WHO) 和美國心臟協會 (AHA) 攜手合作，設計了可促進健康的「心肺強化分數」活動目標。

從事能讓心跳加快的活動可促進身心健康。從事中度運動 (例如用較快的步行速度遛狗) 時，每分鐘可獲得一分心肺強化分數；從事強度更高的活動 (例如跑步) 則可獲得兩倍的心肺強化分數。只要每週選擇五天快走約 30 分鐘，即可達成 AHA 和 WHO 的體能活動量建議目標。這個目標已證實有助於降低心臟疾病的發生機率、改善睡眠品質以及提高整體心理健康。

Google Fit 還可協助：

查看健身記錄
你可以取得深入分析資料及查看有關跑步、步行和騎單車的統計數據，瞭解你的心跳速率、速度、配速、路徑等資訊。

監測目標
你可以查看心肺強化分數和步數的每日進度。總是達成目標嗎？你可以輕鬆調整目標，繼續挑戰自我極限並促進身心健康。

記錄你從事的所有活動
所有體能活動都有助於促進健康。有了 Google Fit，你可以集中追蹤自己從事的所有活動。Google Fit 能夠與你喜愛的健身應用程式和裝置搭配使用，為你建立專屬的活動日誌。為了確保 Fit 可記錄任何健身活動，你可以手動新增其他應用程式無法追蹤的任何活動，例如有氧運動或 Zumba。

連結你喜愛的應用程式和裝置
Google Fit 可顯示來自多種與 Apple「健康」相容的應用程式和裝置的資訊，方便你全面掌握自己的健康狀況，持續追蹤你的健身進度。能夠與 Fit 連結的應用程式/裝置包括：Lifesum、Runkeeper、Strava、MyFitnessPal、Headspce 等等。

隨時隨地查看資料
你可以在日誌中查看 Google Fit 和整合應用程式的活動記錄數據匯報，也可以透過 [瀏覽] 分頁檢視完整資訊，這裡會列出所有身心健康相關資料。

如要進一步瞭解 Google Fit 及查看支援的應用程式清單，請前往 https://www.google.com/fit

評論.標題: You have to see it to believe it

It continues to do this all day long. SERIOUSLY WTH is wrong with this thing. I laughed it off before but after months of coming up short on my watch vs. this app I stupefied at this app.

評論.標題: Doesn't give points for move minutes
評論.內容:
Shows my cycling 33 miles in a little over 2 hours.  Only gives credit for steps. Manual entry of cycling then gives double the miles.

Removed from phone
App not working correctly for my sleep tracking, please fix!

Occasionally, Google’s own apps are better on iOS than on Android, but this is not one such case.

Today, according to this app, I acquired 14 heart points on a 1.5-mile, 22-minute walk…which I somehow accomplished in 4 steps. This was synced from my Pixel Watch, which says I got 13 heart points for that 2104-step walk.

This and numerous other bugs have been plaguing Google Fit FOR OVER A DECADE, and Google doesn’t seem to care to fix them. (It would take many, many paragraphs to detail all of the issues, and the best that Google’s customer disservice can manage is to recommend inane “troubleshooting” steps like clearing app cache, as though getting a new phone entirely doesn’t rule out client-side issues.)

Perhaps the Google Fit cloud service is to blame, but regardless, I’m happy to penalize the app with an appropriate rating.

This is just disgraceful.

I really enjoy Google Fit's activity summary. It is just enough data and nicely presented. I also like the weekly summary story.  My one qualm is that I have a Fitbit, which Google owns, to track my sleep and wake me up.  I don't understand why it cannot sync the sleep data to Google Fit on iPhone. It can do that on Android but not iOS. That is the one missing feature.

Good app overall. But obviously not syncing heart points across devices. I have both an iPhone and a Samsung. The heart points I acquired on Samsung phone is not showing up or counting towards heart points in my iPhone

I got this cause health app on iphone6s didnt have widget for app. Which this solved but 90% time the miles and steps in the google fit app never match miles and step that was in health app, and that were it was getting data.

I did like fact google fit measure heart rate and breathing.

I am now using StepsApp it pull right data and match health app and has a widget

This app is intuitive and easy. Or even a check mark over the day like on the Week view. I still like the app and will continue to use it- it would just be nice to have a quick visual to see how many days during the month that I met the goal.

評論.標題: Can’t Connect A Google Product to a Google App
評論.內容:
Wanted to see what the Google fit app was like as someone on the Fitbit forum stated Google appeared to have bought Fitbit and took all the good features and put them in the Google app. For background, the fitbit app received an update that took away many great tracking features and enraged 1000s of customers. Apparently you can’t connect the Fitbit app or a Fitbit device to the Google fit app. Really absurd in my opinion, and settles my decision to get a Garmin tracker or watch that is 1/2 the price of whatever garbage watches Google is putting out these days. 

Looks like Google bought out yet another company, did nothing good with the tech they acquired or weren’t intelligent enough to do anything with it, and then trashed the app in an attempt to increase their market share.

I love using Google Fit to track my workouts and check my health stats. I have been very happy with it syncing with my Watch Ultra but within the last several weeks I have noticed I am losing Heart Points after my workout. Today for instance when I left the gym and synced my data to the GF app I had 25 heart points. A bit later it now is reduced to 18 heart points??  I had been checking to see if the app needed an update and while it didn’t show as needing one when I searched for the app to leave this review it showed as needing to be updated. Hopefully this was the issue?
Why does the app sometimes take away steps? Sometimes, up to 1000 steps will be taken away in one fell swoop!
So disappointing that google fit can’t connect to Google’s own Fitbit product. Please fix
This app shorts me about 1000+ steps every day. I have 3 other apps that count my steps which all give me the same count.  But this app is always 1000+ steps less.
Instead of those circles whcho show the activity of each day in month, make it bar chart. I mean the same as week view but for 30 days.
This ap goes backwards when tracking steps.  It removes about 2000 steps per day.
Google fit product manager- when will we get a fitbit integration. Right now you are just an apple takedown response against their health app.

Google = Microsoft 20 ago - Fat big dying dinosaur. This app is so crappy and it doesn’t provide the correct step count for my daily power walk. Today, I did more than 5100 steps already but only record 2800 steps. The same issue has been happening for the past 2 months. I do consider Google product inferior product which is not really for prime time.

If Google has no interest to make a good product in Apple App Store, please just leave and don’t bloat the Apple eco system for this crappy software.

pS. It ignores power walking , jogging, hiking and running step counts so you can only use it for walking but not other exercises.

It’s inconvenient for iOS users to have to use both Google fit and Apple health. Users should be able to consolidate into a single source. Allow option to write sleep data to Apple health please.  Not only read data from Apple health into Google fit… especially with your upcoming subscription fee for sleep.

評論.標題: Looks like butt on a tablet.
評論.內容: It is currently 2023 and we still get apps designed for a phone screen with zero thought given to tablets.  Sigh.
I’m sorry to be a hater which I’m not but I can’t do the track workout for some reason and it makes me so mad so I am sorry for anyone seeing this but I don’t like the app that Michael

Google Fit is useless on iOS! It’s a much better App on Android! Besides the missing features, Fit has a mind of its own and counts steps backwards, and does not synch with Health properly. Really disappointing! Shame!

I am frustrated that Google Fit will alert me that I have reached my steps goal and my heart points and then the tracking ring would suddenly move backwards and deduct heart points and about 1,300-2,000 steps. I walk the same distance, same pace, and the same time duration but there are days that wouldn’t show that I’ve reached my goals. Sometimes, I would see that I have reached my steps and heart points goals for the week but would see some days with incomplete rings the following day.
Even I walked for 30m, the total steps didn’t increase. Sometimes, it even decreased though I walked for 20m more.

Fit worked great for nearly 3 weeks, and then it completely desyced from Health, losing roughly 2000 steps every walk. Threads about this get locked by Google claiming it’s Health’s fault, however their troubleshooting doesn’t work. It’s a pull issue with Fit and it gets confused. Refresh doesn’t work. Needs a manual sync option. Daily goals are meaningless if this doesn’t properly keep track of things. There are enough complaints about this to be a priority issue, but Google refuses to acknowledge it’s an issue with their app.

Update: it still just inexplicably breaks. You need to uninstall and reinstall to get it to sync. It’s crazy how they will deflect this problem as an apple health problem when clearly it has something to do with fit just ignoring the data after a while.

應用名稱: Sleepzy - 睡眠週期追蹤器及智能鬧鐘
應用描述:
Sleepzy是個智慧型鬧鐘，會追蹤您的睡眠模式、在可以感覺自然睡醒的最淺眠階段將您喚醒、分析您的睡眠品質，如果有睡眠債的話就會通知您。 不管您是早起的人還是夜貓子，每個人都應該要有這個應用程式。

改善您睡醒時的精神：
- 在最佳的時間點睡飽醒來—不再感到昏昏欲睡！
- 與 Apple 音樂同步，用你最愛的音樂當鬧鐘 - 設定一整天的心情

追蹤並分析您的睡眠：
- 設立睡眠目標、追蹤睡眠債–––保持動力來獲得足夠的睡眠時間
- 追蹤您的睡眠模式–––把重點放在不僅睡得夠久，而且也睡得夠好
- 瞭解您的睡眠品質–––調整您的日常習慣來提升 % 品質
- 獲得有用的每週統計數據

在睡前放鬆您的心情：
- 透過放鬆的聲音和古典旋律入睡
- 聆聽夢幻收音機：以 AI 生成的音樂和催眠的視覺特效來助眠

取得實用的見解分析：
- 收受每日個人忠告並以「深入解析」探索全世界睡眠統計數字
- 獲得您所在地區的天氣預報，在早上輕鬆規劃–––天

同步並保護您的睡眠資料：
- 備份您的睡眠資料並在需要時隨時還原
- 跟 Apple Health 應用程式同步您的資料 

Sleepzy + Apple Watch = 更多樂趣
用 Apple Watch 監控您的睡眠清晰又易於使用的介面會協助您覽睡眠概況

請注意，寵物或伴侶移動和發出聲響都可能會影響效果。

升級為進階版來：
- 透過進階統計數據深入瞭解，隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進度 
- 看看您會不會打呼
- 聆聽各式各樣放鬆的聲音和古典音樂
- 用特殊的呼吸技巧讓您靜下心來
- 解鎖所有睡眠深入解析
- 移除廣告

開始在最佳時刻輕鬆睡醒。 徹底改革您的早晨！

* 從不同的訂閱方案中選擇。 我們的標準訂閱選項有：
訂閱 1 個月並享 7 日免費試用 
訂閱 3 個月  
訂閱 1 年 

* 在您確認購買及每個續訂期間開始時，訂閱費用將透過您的 iTunes 帳戶進行收費。 有免費試用期的訂閱會自動更新為付費訂閱。 您可以在免費試用期結束前 24 小時於 iTunes 設定中取消訂閱或免費試用。 取消的動作將在您目前訂閱期最後一天的隔天生效，而您將被降級至免費版服務。 
* 請注意：如果您在免費試用期間購買會員訂閱，就會喪失任何免費試用期間（若有提供）未使用的部分。

要完全使用所有，必須允許存取下列權限：
* 麥克風––––這樣應用程式才能分析您的睡眠和錄下您在夜間發出的聲響。
* 通知 – 鬧鐘才會響。
* 存取媒體庫 – 您可將自己的音樂設定為鬧鐘聲響。
* 健康 App – 可將您的數據匯出至 Apple 健康 app。 
* 定位 – 可收到您所在地區的氣象預報。

評論.內容: Had to reinstall the app twice now because of this weird bug I get when I click on any notifications the app sends me. The thing is that when I click that notification that the app itself sends me, the ad is now a black screen that doesn’t let me close it and I have to end up deleting the app. I hope there’s a better solution than deleting and reinstalling, though.

I like the app as theoretically it has ALMOST everything that I’d want - so much so that I almost subscribed. However, the smart wake up seemed to always wake me up too early, whether using the microphone or accelerometer in the correct placement. This led to way more sleep inertia than desired.
Here’s what feature I would add to greatly improve the app, and, if you added it I would be forever sold: a light alarm WITH a smart wake up, where the app would sense the lighter phase of sleep THEN turn on a gradually increasing backlight (and possible flashlight). It’s how our bodies are supposed to naturally wake up. No one else in the app market does this, and it would be super helpful.

In 4 nights it says I have slept less than 2 hours. It tells you your phone needs to be plugged into a charger-that’s annoying. You have to tell it to start. No other sleep app needs to be told when I am going to sleep. It is supposed to wake you in the lightest phase of sleep during a timeframe. Not only did it fail to recognize a light sleep- I was awake and it didn’t go off. Instead it went off 17 minutes after my time range. The volume on the alarm ramps up way too fast. In about 5 seconds it’s very loud. You can’t tap a stop button to shut it up. You have to hold while it thinks. ‘Hold to stop’. I’m not trying to wake up the whole house! The wake up is jarring, not gentle. Here, let me wake you up late, require you to find your phone and hold for a few seconds while I ramp into concert level volumes. No TY. I should have stuck with the trial. Instead I tried a subscription. That was stupid.

1. This app records sounds, that’s all, which is completely inaccurate if
A. There’s a partner in your bed
B. There are ANY animals in the room at all
C. There are ANY noises you can hear in your room (traffic, noise outside, neighbors, kids)
D. If you have a noise machine, it thinks you’re up all night. Not joking. 

2. The recorded sound in no way can determine if you’re in deep, light, or REM sleep. It’s a guess, and a joke. 

3. To start “tracking” your sleep, you MUST set an alarm. My internal clock wakes me up around 6 every morning. I don’t want to set an alarm, thank you. 

4. If your phone is on silent, the alarm does not go off. All alarm apps should still go off if the phone is on silent, come on. 

5. The music and sounds are a joke. Poor quality and awful sleep/meditation tracks.

This App has been a great help with tracking my sleeping patterns and keeping me on a schedule of rest. 評論.標題: I really wanted to like this
評論.內容: I had this app a few years ago and really liked it. It was perfect for early mornings and helping me get just the right amount of sleep. However, now it only reads well if it’s laying on my bed. But then my phone gets too hot and stops charging at 80%. But if I use the microphone option, it can’t read anything at all and says either I didn’t sleep or slept too deeply. I wish it went based off my Apple Watch rather than off my phone. Because that would give a more accurate accelerometer reading than sleeping with my phone under my pillow. I keep coming back to this app hoping things have changed and been updated to a useable place, but they just haven’t. I will sadly probably have to delete it again and maybe try again in a few years.

應用名稱: 大姨媽月經期助手-女性健康攻略社區
應用描述:
大姨妈App，1.2亿女生都在用的女性健康攻略社区。

你是否遇到过这些健康问题？

月经日期记不清？总是被突袭手忙脚乱？

久备不孕很焦虑？备孕套路傻傻搞不懂？

大姨妈App可以这样帮助你：

预测月经周期：提前2天提醒你月经即将到来，做好准备，安心等月经到来。

智能推算排卵：每日提醒好孕几率，科学备孕。

1.2亿姐妹在这里分享他们的经期护理窍门、备孕孕育经验和健康生活瞬间，热情互帮互助、答疑解惑。在这里可以安心地向姐妹们提问，收获中肯有用的经验和建议哟！


【注意事项】

-大姨妈app已支持接入HealthKit，可同步您的基础体温、睡眠、点滴出血等数据到「大姨妈app」中，以便为您提供快速记录服务。

應用描述:
【透過睡眠捕捉寶可夢！】

在Pokémon Sleep的世界，你只要睡一覺，
與你擁有類似睡眠類型的寶可夢們就會聚集過來。
快來以完成「睡姿圖鑑」為目標，研究寶可夢們各種各樣的睡姿吧！

【Pokémon Sleep的一天】

■晚上
測量、記錄、分析睡眠！
只要將智慧型手機放在枕邊，然後好好睡一覺即可。
也可以使用智慧型手錶測量的睡眠資料遊玩。

■早上
寶可夢會根據你的睡眠類型和睡眠時間而聚集！
研究前來的寶可夢的睡姿，完成圖鑑吧！

■午間
把卡比獸培育得又大又壯！
卡比獸在吃下夥伴寶可夢撿來的樹果後，
就會長得越來越大。
隨著卡比獸的成長，說不定還能夠遇見寶可夢的稀有睡姿!?

【抓住睡眠好節奏！】

■確認睡眠資料
昨天睡得如何呢？
到睡著為止的時間是多久，
睡著後的身體動作有哪些變化，
有沒有打呼或說夢話……
這些詳細的睡眠資訊都可以在應用程式中確認。

■輔助舒適睡眠
睡覺時也有寶可夢相伴！
不僅有寶可夢相關的音樂助你入眠，
還有智慧型鬧鈴會在睡眠較淺的時候叫你起床，
讓睡眠舒適且趣味十足。

■和智慧型手錶連結
和Apple健康連結後，
即可將使用部分智慧型手錶測量到的睡眠資料
導入《Pokémon Sleep》以遊玩遊戲。
可連結的裝置可由此確認。
https://www.pokemonsleep.net/zh/devices/

■使用條款
https://view.sleep.pokemon.co.jp/legal/terms/index.html

■本遊戲為普遍級。
■請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。
■遊戲部分內容或服務需另行支付其他費用。

It's constantly not tracking sleep, telling me I wasn't sleeping cause "it's too noisy" when I'm literally sleeping and I have no clue how to prove it to  machine.
