I’ve been using Pokémon Sleep for a few weeks now, and while the concept is fun, the app still has some bugs, especially when paired with my Apple Watch. It often tracks my sleep in a weird way, sometimes recording more sleep than I actually got or missing parts of the night entirely. It’s frustrating because I was hoping for accurate sleep data, but instead I get inconsistent results. The gameplay aspect is cute, and I like the idea of connecting my sleep patterns to in-game rewards, but the tracking glitches really take away from the experience. Hopefully, future updates will fix these issues. For now, it’s a fun idea with a few kinks to work out.

評論.標題: Cute but tedious for no reason
評論.內容: Game is novel and a fun way to track sleep. However inteacting with the game is frustrating because of constant pop ups, loading, crashing, and other interruptions. It demands you go slow, but to a fault.
so much fun and encourages me to get more sleep. awesome app!

It’s a cute game, but tracking needs to be fixed. There should be a way to edit incorrect sleep tracking, delete a session if you accidentally put your Go Plus + into sleep mode, or use another device like an Apple Watch to track more accurately.
The tomagachi part is fun and collecting Pokemon is relaxing but the sleep tracker literally doesn’t work and makes the game almost unplayable unless you cheat and ignore their instructions.

I love this game but I’m quitting today because it’s too stressful. I have a lot on my hands and I want to have fun when gaming, this game just feels likes more tasks I already have to squeeze into my already busy life. 3 times a day I’m rushing to feed all my Pokémon and check all my notifications/etc and what does this game do to help it? Nothing at all they actually take their time with little animations that can’t be skipped while you’re trying to just feed your Pokémon and be on with your day. Waaaay too many overly drawn out redundant animations. Sayonara!

The app is motivating to sleep more, I enjoy the mechanics.
The issue is that the interface is SO SLOW.
And it’s impossible to speed anything up!
I just want to wake up, collect my new Pokémon sleep styles and move on with my day but every single click enters a render cycle of multiple seconds and there are so many clicks to do anything.
If they fixed the performance and allowed me to skip certain screens it would be a perfect app.

This game is so fun and I love it but it steals my time.
Does that make sense?

I’m revisiting my review now that I’m over a year into a subscription for premium. 

The app has become a boring and redundant chore. There isn’t truly anything incentivizing someone to stay, let alone play. My wife gave up two months ago. 

There isn’t a meaningful way to farm or buy incenses to attract the Pokemon you want. Incenses are locked to one a week, and you don’t get to choose which one you get or you can RMT from their shop for seasonal Pokémon. 

Being unable to trade or do meaningful things with friends in lieu of this is also sorely missed. 

Ultimately, it’s cute in the beginning, but not worth the investment of time or money.

I absolutely love this game and will continue to play it daily! 
1. I’d like to see added is a journal of what skill is being used so if you’re not watching every single you know what skill was being used by each Pokémon that mimics other Pokémon. 
2. I’d absolutely love to see other pokemon get added into the game to keep us wondering! I’d love to see the machop family just my opinion being my favorite Pokémon!

Where they really messed up though is that IAPs are priced for whales only, for everyone else it’s grossly overpriced. If gems cost 10% of what they currently do, they’d make way more money on this app
The sleep tracker is absolutely horrible. The dozing/snoozing/slumbering chart is way off and sometimes removed while hours from your sleep, ruining your data.

評論.標題: Love it, but no offline mode
評論.內容:
I don’t know what it is about all the mobile pokemon apps, but they all can’t seem to support an offline mode. 

I really like this game, but I can’t always play it. I am a Pokemon adult serving in my countries Navy. When I’m on duty on my boat, my phone doesn’t  get service. When I’m on deployment, my phone doesn’t get service. So i can’t connect to the internet during these times. 

Out of all of the pokemon mobile games, you’d think this one doesn't need internet, but it does. And it’s really disappointing because this game is a nice way to decompress. 

Sure, I have my Switch games I can play in the evenings, but it’s the unique features that this game presents that are things I wish I had at sea.

These features include:
-the sleep tracking. This is the whole point of this app. Sleeping well is an important concept when out at sea. With this app ive been able to identify things that help me sleep better.

-this app helps me wake up on time. A lot of times i find it hard to wake up and go when my alarm goes off. With this app, i can set my alarm slightly earlier than when i need to wake up and doing all the tasks like studying the sleep styles, catching the pokemon, and feeding them breakfast, it helps me wake up. By the time I’m done doing all of the sleep research stuff, I’m good to get up and go.  But I can’t do any of this stuff out at sea because this app needs internet connection. 

-this app is also a good fidget app, if that makes sense. During the day, i like to open the app to feed the pokemon lunch and check out all of the tasks i need to do to evolve them, etc. 

All in all, I really like this game, but because I cant use it when I’m out at sea, I loose incentive to play it when Im in port. It’s a good escape from the dull and dry world we live in, and it promotes healthy living, but i’m of a small percentage of people who are incapable of using it during specific periods of time. Because of this, there’s no reason i’d put money into this because, well, it’s unplayable for me. 

Please consider making an offline mode. Just a mode where one could track sleep and do the most basic of tasks. 

Thank you!

評論.標題: What every mobile game should be
評論.內容: Like many others, I jumped to Pokémon Sleep from Pokémon GO and I was fully expecting the Niantic treatment: being bombarded with microtransactions, and having all complaints fall on deaf ears. I was wrong—this game doesn’t feel corporate. This game feels like someone’s passion project, there is so much heart, soul, and dedication being continually poured into it. Updates come weekly, sometimes even more frequently, and players are often treated to gifts from various events, which are frequent and engaging. Despite the barrier to entry for unlocking this game’s full potential being so high, given the price of the PGPP and the optional (but highly useful) monthly subscription service, the payoff is reasonable and results in more engaging gameplay—that is, transactions do not feel predatory. Give this game a try, you’ll have a good time!

I really like this game!, it gets me excited to sleep and has some really cool Pokémon! My only criticism is the feeding process. In order to get new pokemon you need to feed them biscuits, but they get “all full” which just means you can’t give them more food. I really don’t understand this mechanic but it doesn’t make the game horrible. If you’re thinking about getting this game, than I think you should, it’s fun and has cute artwork.

評論.標題: Please make the morning routine better
評論.內容: Premium pass customer reconsidering where my money could be better put towards. Love this game to death, but as with a number of similar reviews- please, please make the options to go through the morning routine faster. I don't need to see all the bits and flair of everything I've been through countless times before when I'm trying to speed through everything as fast as possible just to feed snorlax on time. It's incredibly frustrating for this app to promote positivity and good sleep while at the same time making you rush through the morning while you're already so busy for completely arbitrary and aesthetic reasons, punishing you for getting the new sleep style dex entries you want with more time wasted as the clock ticks. A speed up or skip-to-next-section button would make everything so much better. I wasn't even aware of the 'review later' option because of the hard-instilled habit of the app making me go through things as fast as possible, and even then, if you miss the button once, you're forced to go through it all anyway. Making it a toggle option to review later on default would better the experience significantly.

I enjoy playing this game a lot as a Pokémon fan. I need them to fix the audio though, the app is always pausing my music or audiobooks to play in-game audio. Been happening for the majority of the year, would appreciate it being addressed.

Also, for whatever reason, when it loads multiple sessions from Pokémon Plus Plus, the Green default option is to skip reviewing. My sleep brain always clicks that on accident. I can’t imagine most players want it auto reviewed for them. 

Enable more options for default research preferences, I never want it to automatically review for me ever. I don’t want the green default button to be an auto review, that’s the whole point of the game, to wake up and review the pokemon that showed up. Also, again fix audio please.
Wishing the sings can last longer then the time limit but other then that not bad

i like it and the pokemon look cute when they’re sleeping
Even when linked to Apple Health. Please work on supporting Garmin watches. Apple watches have bad battery life and aren't suitable for sleep tracking as a result.

I use the Apple Watch Ultra 2 with the app. Now the tracking issue isn’t specifically with Pokémon sleep, however if the watch messes up the tracking there’s no way for you to fix it and encounter the Pokémon from that nights sleep. For instance. Christmas Eve, I woke up about 11 times to pee (I know trust me ridiculous… was not happy lol) and am a guest at my parents and sleeping in the living room, my dad is a night owl. He didn’t go to bed till after 6 am but before I woke up for the last time at 7:15 am because he was up watching tv in the living room. So as a result my watch thinks I slept less than 90 minutes last night because of the noise and bathroom use. I fell asleep around 11pm and woke up at 7:15 am. Take out at most and hour and a half for going pee and that’s still well over 6 hours of sleep. Again I know that the tracking issue lies with the watch, but how come I can’t adjust it in app and still have my encounters?
It takes forever to set up, had to factory reset my go plus plus three times to get it to work then it takes at least an hour of tutorials before you can even use it. Don’t waste your time.

Both methods provided inconsistent user experience, and it is frustrating to say the least the developers do not care about making this game work

評論.標題: Game is fun but doesn’t work with smart watch
評論.內容: The game is fun and all, but every time I’ve tried to transfer my sleep data from my Apple health or from my watch or use my watch instead of the tracking on the phone it just doesn’t work. I’ve tried not turning the sleep mode on in the app and just tracking my sleep with my watch and transferring it over doesn’t work. I’ve tried to track both at the same time and then transferred over it doesn’t work. My problem is I charge my phone on a standing charger because I wouldn’t want to have my phone laying right next to me on my bed where I could toss it off the bed while I’m sleeping. Not to mention it would be in the way of my sleep so the only way to accurately track your sleep is with the app your phone laying on the bed. I don’t get it. It says it allows your smart watch to track your sleep, but it doesn’t pull the data over so I don’t understand what the point of it is to have it connected to the app.

Honestly I really like this game but I have to give it 3 stars because it does not accurately track my sleep. It has been skimping at least 2 hours of my sleep time every day for the last week or so, which makes it harder to level up. Please make it where we can fix the times we slept

應用名稱: 女性健身 - 腿部訓練
應用描述:
覺得瘦腿好難？
想要瘦出大腿縫嗎？

本應用程式提供一系列多樣的訓練計畫，幫助您瘦腿、燃燒大腿內側脂肪，讓身材更有型。每天只要花不到 15 分鐘即可有效減去腿部脂肪、揮別橘皮組織。

我們的健身計畫由專業健身教練親自設計，包含多種有助瘦腿並雕塑大腿內側的心搏運動。運動強度一步步循序漸進，其中的健身運動更分為2 種難度，讓健身程度不同的人都能找到適合自己程度的運動：
新手級：適合剛開始鍛鍊腿部的人
進階級：適合想要挑戰自己的人

此外，還提供無需跳動的運動，以避免造成膝蓋疼痛，且一點都不會吵人。無需器材，也不用上健身房，只要 30 天，就能擁有更加性感緊實的大腿。

這些運動為何能幫助我瘦腿呢？
腿肌（尤其大腿肌）是身體最大的肌群。鍛鍊這些較大的肌群必須消耗更多能量，並可加速新陳代謝，讓您燃燒卡路里更有效率，助您燃脂、擁有更緊實的雙腿、並雕塑您的臀部。

這樣我會不會看起來塊頭太大啊？
女性與男性不同，體內睪固酮較低，不太容易變得大塊頭。我們提供的運動確實能幫您擁有更結實碩大的肌肉、肌肉線條漂亮的雙腿，但這些運動專為女性設計，只會讓您變得更苗條、身材更緊實！

為什麼我運動後看起來塊頭越來越大呢？
這不是腿部運動造成的，而是做的運動項目不對，或運動完忘了做伸展操。我們的運動包含詳細的教練指示與腿部伸展操，幫助您正確健身、不會變成大塊頭。

我能自訂我的健身計畫嗎？
當然可以！我們提供超過 100 種健身運動，您可自行決定要做哪些、自己調整健身計畫，以更符合您自身的需求。您可重複進行或刪除某些運動、更改運動順序、甚至自己重新建立一套健身計畫。我們的每日運動提醒更能幫助您建立好習慣，總有一天能擁有夢寐以求、苗條又緊實的美腿。

我能練出大腿縫嗎？
不是每個人都一定能擁有大腿縫，這和您的骨架、基因、體型等都有關。我們的運動將會盡可能幫助各種體型的人練出大腿縫。

精彩功能：
- 詳細的指示、動畫與影片引導您進行每項運動。
- 運動強度循序漸進
- 記錄您的減重成效與燃燒的卡路里數
- 每日運動提醒
- 自訂訓練計畫
-同步數據到Apple Health

Ok this is an amazing app! I love it so so so much!! I don’t even know where to get started. I love how there are for different exercise modes, and how each workout is only around 10-15 minutes. At the end, you will do 14. I love how it repeats the exercise halfway through, so you can get better at the exercise, and work that muscle another time during the workout. I also love that in each workout, part of it is 1 minute and 30 seconds of cooling down. (Knee to chest stretch, adductor stretch, etc.)   It is also super helpful that they have the animation of the person doing the workout, and they offer videos of each exercise, which is a super time saver when your heart rate is up and you don’t want to look on youtube for a video of that exercise! Overall this app is amazing!! Thank you so much!

應用描述:
「經期追蹤」提供方便且隱密的方式來讓你使用 Apple Watch 追蹤月經週期。輕鬆記錄月經，包含流量、症狀和受孕資訊。選擇接收月經或受孕窗口即將開始的通知。

功能

• 使用每日紀錄來註記流量和任何絞痛、頭痛和脹氣等症狀。

• 輕鬆追蹤排卵試紙中的結果，或基礎體溫計中的度數。

•「經期追蹤」會顯示下次月經何時開始和受孕窗口的預測。

• 當你在「健康」App 中記錄懷孕時，在「經期追蹤」中查看目前的懷孕週數並記錄懷孕期間的症狀。

• 開啟通知以便在月經或受孕窗口可能要開始之前接收提示。

• 在 iPhone 上的「健康」App 中查看包含週期記錄和統計資料的其他詳細資訊。

• 手機透過密碼鎖定時，除了「醫療卡」以外，你在「健康」App 中的所有健康和健身資料都會進行加密。你的健康資料會使用 iCloud 在所有裝置之間自動保持更新，傳輸時或在 Apple 伺服器上都會進行加密。

應用描述:
簡易瑜珈健身
► 聰明培訓計畫
► 即時運動指引
►根據自設目標的健身運動
► 健身操建製器

Yoga-Go 是一套全身型瑜珈鍛煉運動操，課程也能聚焦特定的身體部位，包括臀部、腹肌和腿部。
Yoga-Go 結合客製化健身計畫成為用戶全方位、隨時隨地可用的解決方案。現在就開始屬於您自己的瑜珈運動，為您的人生帶來再一次健康養生的好習慣。

***
使用YOGA-GO，您可以
• 按照自己的喜好與能力全身鍛煉
• 初學者和進階瑜珈好手7-30 分鐘的健身運動
•• 擁有健身操時間和卡路里追蹤器

集中在APP的所有瑜珈好處
• 試用心目中最適合的個人健身規劃器
• 從超過 500 種瑜珈體位法學習新姿勢
• 運用影音教學影片訓練瑜珈 
• 任選健身運動項目如下：瑜珈、普拉提姿、伸展運動等
• 透過全身操讓身體更強健柔軟
• 拿到一款每天考量您的自設目標、問題部位、健身等級和其他項目的嶄新演練工具，每天按部就班使用！

居家瑜珈健身
Yoga-Go是絕不花費您太多時間的簡易居家瑜珈健身來源。您可以隨時隨地開始。Yoga-Go 健身運動每段課程只花費您7-30 分鐘。

訂閱資訊：
您可以免費下載APP。進一步使用需要訂閱。我們可以自行酌情決定是否按照應用程式顯示的條款提供您免費試用。請注意：
• 選擇訂閱者須支付所在國家訂定的固定價格，以APP顯示價格為主。
• 確認購買後款項將自您的iTunes帳號支付。
• 訂閱會自動續訂，除非目前期間結束前至少24小時前關閉自動續訂功能。
• 您的帳戶將在目前訂閱期結束前24小時內支付續訂費。
• 您可以在購買後前往帳戶設定頁面管理自己的訂閱和關閉自動續訂功能。
• 取消訂閱時，您的續訂效期會到目前訂閱期結束為止。自動續訂功能將會停用，但目前訂閱將不予退費。

Yoga-Go隱私權政策：https://legal.yoga-go.io/page/terms-of-use
Yoga-Go使用條款：https://legal.yoga-go.io/page/privacy-policy

評論.內容: The new voice over for the chair yoga is wonderful! The voice is now crystal clear with detailed instruction for every breath and motion. So far all I have seen are mild stretching exercises for five or six minutes. There have been no workouts yet at all. Will it continue like this or will I actually see what you advertised and what I thought I was paying for??

The program has many options and features for my needs.
More interactions need to flow this well ! Great customer service !

I decided to try doing yoga because I have scoliosis (never surgically corrected as a teen), and felt my posture was getting worse.  I started using YogaGo almost 2 years ago and it has become part of my daily routine.  I am in my late 60’s and had never done yoga prior, so I like how YogaGo gives you a personalized routine based on your level of expertise, as well as the areas you want to work on the most. .  I do feel YogaGo has helped me to be more aware of how I stand, strengthened my muscles (core), and also helped with my balance.  I plan to continue as long as my body will let me.

I’m sticking to it! Chair yoga for this 73 year old has become part of my routine. I lost a few pounds, and some of the moves are now much easier. I am a runner, too, so hopefully the benefits I receive are not only viable, but worthwhile. Not sure what it’s doing, but I do it almost every day and I can only imagine howI’d feel if I didn’t do it.

Love this! I can control time and levels when I feel ready. I am so happy with my core and balance results within a 30day time!!!
I thought the app would be more intuitive and would push me more than it did. I also was led to believe that I got 12 weeks for $15. I was charged more for less.
Not sure I’m losing any weight but I love the mid day addition to my regular cardio workouts.
I thought I was signing up for chair yoga.  I’m not sure what happened because so tapped in a chair yoga add. I’ll finish this workout but will not sign up for anything further.

I have been doing this for 2 week and I love it. I really wasn’t sure how to navigate it when I first started but realized there were other sessions so now I’m up to 12 sessions. I have signed up for next month also. I feel much better. My neck and back feel 200% better. In the winter I hurt all over but with this yoga it seems to be gone. I’m 72.
I’m on day 7 and am feeling more flexible.
I was very disappointed that the guided videos are not captioned/subtitled. I'm Deaf and this is useless to me.
Yoga Go was just what I needed. The sessions are perfect for me. I use the app most days.

評論.標題: Substandard coding, Display does not follow iPad screen orientation
評論.內容: The app does not recognize the orientation of the iPad. Also, there is a stutter delay when casting to a newer Samsung TV. Wish there was a way to cancel this app but it appears that I’m screwed since there’s no support tab to contact the developers.

The instruction is great in the videos, just not sure what you're supposed to do to maximize effects. There is no instructions that I can find so I just do the daily exercise. Not sure what you are supposed to do after??

Should be much more explanation provided

評論.評論者: Make me look younger than I am
評論.標題: Quick, efficient way to tighten core
評論.內容: Love how efficient this wall Pilates program is. I get big results with daily short workouts!

評論.標題: I like it a lot but…
評論.內容: I wish it went a little slower between the moves.  I feel like I am rushing.

I bought the app because I thought it would help me to lose weight. So far, after eight days, I’ve lost 2 pounds. I must say, though that I am foundering and wandering around the site not knowing what to do except pick random workouts and start on them. There is no guidance about how I should go about losing the weight. No program per se to follow except doing the workouts. There are many available and I don’t know for sure which one I should be doing. Setting the limits. Is difficult because I’m not sure what they mean by beginner intermediate. Or advanced. I have been doing tai chi for seven years and the chai Chi out is very fundamental and far too easy. The chair yoga is nowhere near able to help me drop weight within the timeframe that they recommended. However, it may be too early to tell. It’s only been eight days. So I will continue to found her around and try to do workouts. There is no sequence of workouts that I can tell and I am hoping that they will become more difficult as time goes on. At this point, I’m not sure it was worth the investment. We’ll see.
I started doing wall Pilates for fun but now it is a great way to start my day everyday.
Time to get started! Great intro exercises and chi gong

First day with the app, the short intro practice was good. But when I tried to do an additional practice (tai chi) the video stopped loading several times. I’m on google fiber, up-to-date iPhone. No reason the app shouldn’t work. Frustrating first day with this platform.
Convenient, can be done on your own schedule… where ever you are.. on vacation, at home , etc.
I don’t claim to be an expert on anything but doing yoga in the morning gets me motivated to go on the rest of the day. Thank you for being available.

評論.標題: Yoga Go : the best support Team Ever!
評論.內容: I had a mix up signing up for this application, my bad, between the App and the website. This made using the application virtually impossible, the team specifically Chris helped make the IT / subscription issues functional. Now I have a whole year to explore what best for my health and well being. Thank you so much, R
These routines are challenging yet helpful. I am experiencing increased mobility in my neck, back and shoulders each day.
Can’t open it. I want a refund

Doesn’t show up on the settings section to review subscription information and then they auto renew and do not refund at all. They just guide you back to their refund policy. Very untrustworthy, seems like a scam to get additional money before you can cancel.

評論.評論者: i am not happy with u
評論.內容: Looking for an app to get me started, they want money up front and told me at 65 I could lose 110ps by July.
Didn’t think I was going to be watching an avatar and it feels impersonal and makes me not want to do it.  Also, the direction is bad and is not very good at explaining what I’m supposed to be doing.
I wish I could push myself more but I love the work outs

Never thought I could “move” again.  I’m old with knee replacements and very stiff joints.  This is the best, only 5 minutes a day, movement routine I could have ever hoped for.  Very easy to follow.  I never want to stop.
I love this so far!  I wanted to use the chair yoga since I’m 66.
So far too easy But I moved myself from beginner to intermediate - let's hope that will suit me better.
Love my yoga workouts!!
I’ve done yoga before in different classes and online.  This is the first program I’ve actually enjoyed!  Thank you!
I love this yoga app. I try to use it every day. I like how it is not too long and it is strengthening my core. I was not in the best shape to begin and I feel stronger every day!
I joined to practices Tai chi and it is amazing
Excellent communication and quick response to make changes to my subscription.

At 56, I realized that I needed to increase my flexibility. After trying a couple of other apps, I settled on Yoga Go. I have currently completed 67 sessions of either 10 minute wall Pilates or chair Yoga. I am starting to detect a difference in myself. I like that the sessions are short and focused. I wish it was possible to slow the session down because sometimes it feels like you are racing from one position to another. (Repeat six times - not possible in time allowed!) I like that the app does not try to push recipes, diets, calorie counting, or “lifestyle”. All I want is exercises, and that is what I get.

It has taken years for me to get to this place of reckoning. It has taken pain in the body and age to open my eyes, mind and heart to what is needed to be well in this physical plain. On that day of reckoning is when Yoga-Go came to me.  Timing is everything. And the time for Yoga-Go is now!

應用描述:
Fitbit 隸屬於 Google。共同合作可以讓更多人享受我們提供的健康與健身功能。

使用全球領先的應用 Fitbit，追蹤全天的活動、鍛煉、睡眠和更多活動，享受更加健康、更加積極的美好生活。使用該應用可在您的手機上自主追蹤基本活動和跑步，或與 Fitbit 的許多活動追蹤器中其中一部及 Aria Wi-Fi 智能體重計建立連接，全面了解您的健康，包括步數、距離、已燃燒的卡路里、睡眠、體重及更多指標。

追蹤活動：在您攜帶手機時，使用 MobileTrack 準確記錄您的步數和距離。使用 Fitbit 追蹤器，全天追蹤各項統計資料，如已燃燒的卡路里、活動分鐘數、睡眠、配對應用。

跑步更智能：透過使用 MobileRun，追蹤您的步速、時間和距離，改善跑步、步行和騎單車。您還可以控制音樂、獲取語音提示及使用手機的 GPS 功能規劃路線。（繼續使用在後后執行的 GPS 會顯著降低電池續電時間。） 

記錄鍛煉：使用 Fitbit 追蹤器追蹤您的運動，然後查看應用，瞭解您的統計資料、每日的效果及如何改善您的表現。 

監測心率：使用具備 PurePulse™ 功能的 Fitbit 追蹤器，在應用中分析心率圖。識別趨勢、管理壓力和查看您鍛煉的結果。查看靜息心率趨勢，瞭解何時您的健康正在改善。

更快速地記錄食物：使用我們的條形碼掃描器、卡路里估算器和擴充超過 350,000 種食物的食物資料庫，方便地記錄卡路里。快速查看您的飲食歷程記錄，并获得營養見解。

測量水合作用：快速記錄您的飲水量，確保鍛煉期間及一整天獲取適當的水分。

設定和管理目標：建立體重、營養和鍛煉目標，開始膳食計劃，保持正軌。然後使用彩色的易讀圖表和圖形，製作您的進步的直觀圖形。 

瞭解您的睡眠狀況：在應用中設定睡眠目標，並使用 Fitbit 追蹤器監測您醒著、不休息或安靜睡眠的時間。 

分享和競爭：與朋友和家人分享統計資料、傳送私信及在排行榜或 Fitbit 挑戰中競爭，保持聯繫。

保持動力：當您接近目標或已經達到一個目標時，彈出通知，令您在正確的方向上獲得激勵。 

無線同步：Fitbit 追蹤器可將您的統計資料同步到電腦和 200 多種領先的裝置，因此無需插入您即可持續追蹤進步。

管理體重：以無線方式連接到 Aria Wi-Fi 智能體重計，以無縫的方式追蹤您的體重、BMI、瘦體質量和體脂肪百分比，並查看隨時間的體重趨勢。 

Fitbit Premium：
- 提供月度和年度計劃，解鎖習慣形成計劃，音頻和視頻鍛煉以及高級見解。
- 免費試用期結束後，將向您的iTunes帳戶收取費用（如果適用）。
- 除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱會自動續訂。
- 帳戶將在當前期間結束前24小時內收取續訂費用，並確定續訂費用。
- 訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過在購買後轉到用戶的帳戶設置來關閉自動續訂。
- 如果提供免費試用期，任何未使用的部分將在用戶購買該出版物的訂閱時（如果適用）被沒收。
-  Fitbit服務條款：https://www.fitbit.com/global/us/legal/terms-of-service
-  Fitbit隱私政策：https://www.fitbit.com/legal/privacy-policy

評論.內容: App will not sync since last update
I’m attached to using my Fitbit!

Fitbit is pretty nice for simple trackers but lacks a whole lot of obvious features and has a lot of bugs.

Sleep often doesn’t register correctly. A lot of metrics are poorly explained or have figures that mean very little (i.e. poor graph labeling). There’s a big lack of customizability for watch faces (only allows pre-selected colors and metrics). Lacks integration with almost anything outside of Fitbit/Google so it falls behind in a lot of smartwatch comparisons. Is purposefully hard to integrate with things like Apple Health or any other health apps. Lots of syncing issues. The social feature is kind of terrible because you can only share a few metrics and that’s only if you fully integrate your Google account (which most of my older family members will never do).
The biggest upside is it gives me peace of mind for health conditions like afib, insight on training intensity, and monitoring my sleep.

Fitbit could be great if they actually tried, but they seem to have settled for mediocrity.
Let’s me do many things and keep tabs of my personal items like heart rate, distance walked etc.

評論.標題: Put it back the way it was
評論.內容:
Update:  After 6 years of loving my Fitbit Versa and NEVER taking it off, they released an update that ruined it entirely. I held out hope for several weeks that they would put it back the way it was… but clearly from the feedback and responses here, they are not going to fix it. It’s ruined and useless. I uninstalled the app. The Fitbit is thrown in the back of a drawer, untouched since Novemember 2024. I’m researching other options for tracking exercise, sleep, calories… because Fitbit app literally no longer DOES ANY OF THOSE THINGS! I’m not sure why they decided to make all of the wonderful, helpful features useless but that’s what they did. It is a real shame and makes me very sad but I’m moving on. Not worrying about this stupid app ever again.

Developers, is it going to stay awful and unusable, or is there a plan to put it back the way it was before the recent updates? Just revert back to the version from spring and it will be fine again. Otherwise it’s useless to even wear a Fitbit. Doesn’t record anything, can’t even see the data on the app, it’s just jumbled, monochromatic trash. Sleep no longer records anything. No steps are ever tracked. Useless garbage since the update. Prior to this, I never took it off since 2019 and I depended on it and loved it. It’s now in a drawer waiting to see if you revert back to previous version or not. Why did you do this to a perfect app? 

 Update… I keep checking to see if it looks like they have fixed it, and I can see from the continuing awful reviews that it has not been fixed. I guess it is going to stay broken forever? They are trying to drive us all to buy a Google watch? I will not. Google sabotaged Fitbit when they bought it.

I’m living some of the new features offered, cardio load, HRV. Fitbit really helps me manage my fitness and push when I can and rest when I need to. I do miss some old features, specifically the color coding for calorie burn. Seeing the yellow, orange and green really helped with a snap shot of my workouts and motivation. I wish they’d bring that back.
This really is the worst app I have on my phone. There are so many issues. I have reported some but rarely are they fixed. And more continue to show up.

My hubby wanted a step counter without a lot of other things that Apple Watch has.  I bought him a fit bit bc I had one years ago and loved it.  We tried for hours to sync it to the app and couldn’t even sign in.  Went on message boards went to Best Buy for help- when 2 Geeks can’t help and 2 Best Buy employees can’t figure it out you know it’s bad.  It appears when google bought them they took it and made it super complicated.  Trying to deal with google support was ridiculous and not worth the time for a simple pedometer.   So we returned  the Fitbit and will just go with an Apple Watch.  Super disappointed!
I can gauge and monitor my heath easily using Fitbit, now I feel lost when I don’t. Great company, great product I’ll always stick w/ Fitbit!

The Cardio Load still not working properly. I now get a “notice” if I am over, under, or on track, but I cannot set a goal to maintain or improve my cardio. Very annoying to have to close “X” out the notice everyday sometimes multiple times.
I have to manually synchronize my Fitbit with my phone. It doesn’t sync itself.

The main reason why I use Fitbit is to track my sleep I really like to see the duration I am awake, in REM sleep, light sleep, and deep sleep. WTH Fitbit? Why did you change the format. I don’t care how long I am restless. I toss and turn all night long! Restlessness is to be expected. The tracker was already telling me how long I was asleep. I want to know how long I am in the different levels of sleep. Please fix this! Put it back to useful metrics. Awake, restless and asleep are not very useful metrics to me. If you continue with these metrics I will use a different device to track my sleep and recommend other people not to use your product.

Show the Fitbit post-Google take over rating.  I bet it’s 1.5 stars.  But it’s deceiving in the App Store because the 8 years pre-Google the Fitbit app was 5 stars.  It was a sad suddenly decline, this is my last Fitbit.
I tried to sign in with my own email that I just got. It’s asking for some parental sign in. I’ll switch to Apple Watch. Never using Fitbit again. Keep in mind I’m almost 13. Actual garbage.

評論.標題: It’s awful if you stop wearing it then put it back on after a few months
評論.內容: My Fitbit wouldn’t sync back to the app, even after I removed the Fitbit and then tried to repair it to the app it would work
I’m 12 and didn’t let me set up my Fitbit charge 6 that I BOUGHT. all my money. Wasted. Oh you can only set up a for kids! Wach. YAY.

There is a bug (179 comments regarding it on the community board) where cardio load messages keep popping up, talking up 20% of the screen.  You click X to close the message and it doesn’t work.

The messages are appearing when you don’t have the cardio load function active.

There are several different scolding messages that it rotates through, all irrelevant and nonsensical.

評論.標題: The new target prompts are meaningless and annoying
評論.內容:
There’s a new prompt that shows up on the today tab in the app that says ready to hit your target today? And then some meaningless warning about being at risk of under- or over-training. Tapping the prompt doesn’t offer any additional insight about what to do or what the cardio load target means. Tapping the X to close the prompt sometimes works, but mostly doesn’t. It’s super annoying and I don’t understand the reason or utility behind it. I know I’m not the only one annoyed by this

Update: I got an unhelpful developer response directing me to a help article that doesn’t address the issue. How wonderfully useless.
De Fitnit tengo la mejor aprobación de Control de un Equipo Electrónico con relación a mi Salud.
I miss the ability to create a walking group with friends and compete with them. We stopped competing .The app was better before it was purchased by the Google.

評論.標題: Zero stars : Software wears out before the hardware does.
評論.內容:
Since a few months ago use to sleep analysis Rem/deep/light. That is now gone. Also use to see hart rate variability, again gone. Lots of features are gone. What has happened? I always had these before and now they are gone with no explanation. Don’t be greedy/evil google. Please bring these features back. Not a happy customer any more. 
Software wears out before the hardware does.  Sounds like.

I like my Fitbit! It tells me a lot of information about what is going on with my body. Recently though, it often does not give me my sleep score just the graph. It is frustrating. I like having a number!

評論.標題: Google is the worst thing to happen to FITBIT
評論.內容: I cannot connect my son’s Fitbit because Google is making it nearly impossible. I can buy a cheaper watch and connect it seamlessly. Waste of time & money.
Why do I have a minstrel option on this app? I am male. Need more treadmill and hit routines.

Ever since I got my fit bit started, I have been very serious about keeping fit!!!!  Lost approximately 21 lbs n have kept it off because of all the moderate/vigorous power walking I have been doing 5 days a week now!!! I really haven’t changed my diet much….perhaps eating more fruits/veggies…..candy is a little weakness of mine but haven’t gained weight because of it cause of my fit bit reminding me to keep up with my 10,000 steps!!! I’m absolutely obsessed with it…..LOVE IT…..n I highly recommend this to everyone who wants to stay fit n lose weight!!!   Donnie, RN
I switched from Droid (no problem) to I-phone (lots of problems)

I’ve had a Fitbit smartwatch for a few years. As of today they are taking away some of the data I’ve had access to since the beginning. Now if I want that information I have to subscribe & pay a fee. I’m disgusted with them. When this Fitbit dies (and it’s already fading) it will be replaced with an iwatch. Ugh! Don’t buy this device.
Does not sync steps, removed and added app, does not work

評論.標題: Worst UI update I’ve ever seen
評論.內容:
I have no idea what possessed them to overhaul their UI in such a horrendous fashion. It costs less to maintain an existing UI than it does to completely redo everything (I’m a UX designer, I would know) and the new one is objectively BAD, so I’m truly truly baffled. It looks like they fired their UX team and had a dev team do design work instead. Like what’s with all the buttons having double padding? Why is the padding so huge? Why are the buttons frequently touching/overlapping each other? Why is everything so GRAY?

I’m seriously considering moving to a different fitness tracker company, maybe Garmin? after my current Inspire 3 gives out. Which is bound to happen soon enough in my experience, because I had two Luxe’s die on me in almost 3 years.

I really really loved their old UI. I miss the vibrant colors and the cute illustrations of the sun and moon for sleep tracking. I miss how much easier it was to read everything and understand the charts and graphs. I miss the visual affordances each item on a page had. It’s been months since I foolishly updated my app and I’m still kicking myself. So it’s not even that I didn’t give myself time to acclimate. I hate it. Hate it hate it hate it. If there’s any way whatsoever to bring it back, please please for the love of god do so.
3 of Charge 2 in 6 weeks. Stopped receiving text messages and class hit and miss. C/S  no help basically silently say just deal with it. Very disappointed. Looking at going to Garmin.
Fitbit is awesome. I have been using for over 10 years and I love how user friendly it is and all the relevant information it provides.
I daily refer to my Fitbit to see how I slept, track my steps and other metrics to keep me on track.
I use it to train for foot races. Monitor my heart rate to control how fast run. Heart rate monitoring is great

I’ve had my FitBit Inspire2 for a little over a year. It worked great for a few months, but since then it’s been nothing but frustrating. I’ve constantly had to do hard resets, delete/add the app, log in/log out, reboot, etc. Tracking will be wildly off (either too high or too low by thousands of steps), sleep tracking has always been spotty, it will record activity incorrectly (walking recorded as biking or swimming, though this has improved over the last several months), doesn’t always accurately track routinely used routes, calls/texts don’t always come through. There are a few other annoyances but these are the biggest frustrations. 

Not a fan of the latest updates as it’s more cumbersome to see the same data over time. For example, I used to be able to scroll through heart rate and sleep  over a month/year rather than by week only. Daily Readiness and Cardio Load seem pretty inconsistent and useless. 

Ordered an Apple Watch. Can’t wait to switch.

A charge does not even last for a day. I charge my Fitbit Luxe in the evening before bedtime. In the early morning hours upon awakening it is already down to 42%. The charge doesn’t even last a day. The Fitbit screen goes black. Need to put it on the charger to make it work. The warranty should be for longer than a year. I really love the style of the Fitbit Luxe, it is too bad that it doesn’t last.  Very disappointed.
Does not show an accurate number of hours that I actually sleep
I like it.

This app hasn’t worked correctly since August/September 2024 after an update. I’ve been using the app since 2013 but now it has a lot of trouble syncing and doesn’t store the data when I finally do get it to sync. Yes I’ve reloaded and restarted as instructed dozens of times.

I love my Fitbit watch, but I am extremely unhappy about the longevity of the batterys. The most battery life I have ever gotten out of all the ones I have purchased is 2 years. Give, or take a little. I am also frustrated that you can’t just put a new battery in the watches and have to continuously purchase a new watch about every two years. I’d rather pay more money for a watch that last longer, or that you can just replace the dead battery with a new one.

評論.標題: Que pena no hablo ni escribo en INGLÉS.
評論.內容: NO ENTIENDO EL INGLÉS
This app helps me keep track of my steps daily. My goal is 15,000 steps at least 5 days a week. I sometimes look at the sleep part of the app, but I probably don’t use as much of the app as I should!
I Miss the challenge
I wish they would bring back the challenges. I loved the workweek hustle. I met many people over the years.
Horrible update that can’t even recognize intense activity yesterday. Leave the freaking app alone.

評論.標題: Fitbit is an excellent watch, but unfortunately the app does not support the Arabic language.
評論.內容: Fitbit is an excellent watch, but unfortunately the app does not support the Arabic language.

評論.標題: 不知道怎么下载其他软件
評論.內容: I don't know how to download the app. There are too few apps. Can't you download other apps? Fitbit versa4 can't download many software
You changed something in the app and GPS no longer works.

評論.標題: Cardiac load is a pain in the butt
評論.內容: Why are we suddenly forced into constant yelping about either overtraining or under training?!? Every day I’m faced with dire warnings that I’ve done too much. Or done too little. It’s a constant shower of negativity that bounces literally back and forth with no idea why I’m suddenly supposed to take the day off after the day before being told I hadn’t done enough. Why are we made to click these warnings closed to get rid of them? Why can’t we shut this off??  I cant figure out what the difference between cardiac load and zone minutes is anyway. I’m really annoyed that my happy place has become a nightmare of constant shaming me.

Watch is not sweat proof - I would outside year around and in the summer with the heat and sweating - the watch didn’t work well. Watch stopped working 8 months ago. I cancelled the app, but Fitbit is still taking the monthly $11 premium plan 👍 waste of time!!

When running the time registered is only in minutes with no seconds…that’s useless for a runner. It doesn’t log the various sleep items half the time. I could go on with more but there would not be enough room on this text. Very disappointing app.

應用名稱: 動動-運動計步器和跑步健身減肥教練
應用描述:
如果每走一步都是為健康投資，每坐一分鐘都是為健康透支，你今天是賺了還是賠了？從現在開始，與全球8000萬走路愛好者開啟活力輕運動。在「動動」，忠實記錄每次努力，遇見更美好的自己！
 
動動核心功能：

[精準計步，24*7小時記錄不停]
-無需額外配件，0使用門檻，最精準計步算法，無網絡運行，更加省電省流量。

[GPS記錄，定制專屬運動軌跡]
-可隨時追踪走跑、騎行、登山等運動軌跡，精準計算卡路里消耗。

[陪伴式智能教練，助你達成目標]
-為你量身定做減脂計劃，根據你每天的運動情況和體重變化，測算減脂進度，給出運動和飲食建議

[量體裁衣，海量課程供你選擇]
-聯合牛津大學碩士團隊，用簡單的運動，達到最好的鍛煉效果，加入”動動訓練營”見證身體蛻變。
-全網最全的走路課程等你來體驗。

[專業數據量表，進步一目了然]
-多元化使用場景，專業量表分析週、月、年，歷史數據清晰呈現。還有更多有趣的數據洞察。
-動動已接入 HealthKit，可同步運動數據到「健康」。

[快樂社交，和全球動友競賽共勉]
-和身邊好友組隊，實時步數比拼，更有好玩點贊互動。
-全球步數挑戰賽、5公里競速賽、放眼五大洲，總能找到志同道合那個TA。
-發表圖文動態，秀出運動生活點點滴滴。

[目標打卡，培養運動好習慣]
找到相同目標的小伙伴，從 0 培養健康生活方式，和「堅持不了」說再見。

應用描述:
《肥鵝健身房》是一款與眾不同益智休閒遊戲。暢快淋漓的合併玩法等你體驗，精緻可愛的鵝仔等你認領，獨一無二的健身房等你打造！

【遊戲特點】
——輕鬆上手，魔性合合。
一看就會的合併玩法+創新設計的合成元素+獨特有趣的道具系統，千萬精緻女孩的共同選擇，讓合成的滿足趕走無聊與煩惱，一起合合合不停~
——畫風治癒，特效華麗。
鵝仔的健身房日常活動，合併棋盤的特殊音效，畫面細節的精緻追求陪你沉浸體驗鵝仔世界的奇妙經歷。
——玩法豐富，樂趣無窮。
肥鵝卡牌的多彩鵝生，主棋盤訂單抽屜的劇情故事，構思無限的豐富活動……鵝仔陪你每一天，天天都有新鮮感～


※本遊戲內容依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「普遍級」。
※本遊戲為免費遊戲，但遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務，請依個人興趣及能力進行適度消費。
※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷或不當模仿，長時間進行遊戲，容易影響作息，宜適度休息及運動。
※本遊戲由艾樂思網路有限公司代理。若有相關疑問，請與本遊戲客服管道聯繫。

小心！越玩越上癮！

Active Arcade 就是有這種魔力！只要透過身體感應，你就能輕鬆、快速掉入這些超動感好玩的遊戲挑戰中，不可自拔！準備好了嗎？還不快「身」入其境這前所未有的AR互動遊戲！

——

好想運動，但想到人生好難就想放棄？
好想健康，但運動課的花費太奢侈？
好想有好身形，但沒時間可浪費在健身？

你的心聲，我們聽到了！Active Arcade 給你全然不同的運動新視野！透過眾多簡單、好玩的挑戰遊戲，即使你平常不愛運動，也會動上癮！來吧，再也沒有比這更有趣、更刺激的身體互動體驗了，你無需任何裝備與輔具，更不用強迫自己運動，只要跟著你的手機指引，就能盡情沈浸在好玩又新鮮的AR遊戲中！

一天只要幾分鐘，開啟 Active Arcade，你就會立即感受到它帶給你的樂趣與好處。
簡單動動身體，開啟感興趣的好玩遊戲，馬上就能沈浸其中，然後你會發現，你愛上這個瘋狂爆汗又熱血的自己！

沒有運動，只有享動！

——

全新型態的遊戲領域

你的身體就是遊戲遙控器！Active Arcade採用最新的AI全身感應追蹤技術，結合擴增實境(AR)的遊戲玩法，即時感測你的動作，並立即與你互動，為所有人帶來前所未有的互動遊戲體驗。


簡單操作 隨時玩樂

Active Arcade 無需特殊裝置、設備與輔具，只要將你的iPhone或iPad輕靠在靜止的物體上，如椅子、水瓶，或牆面，確保前鏡頭可以感測你全身動作，即可開始遊戲。更棒的是，透過 HDMI 轉接或AirPlay，投影螢幕到電視上，你家客廳就能一秒變身家庭遊樂場！

所有人都適用

無論年齡、性別、運動能力為何，所有人都能在 Active Arcade 找到最喜歡的遊戲！
這些遊戲既簡單，又無需任何運動技巧，更重要的是，還很好玩！像是，挑戰你的眼手協調程度的 Reaction、全身都要動起來的 Box Attack，後續也將定期推出更多新遊戲，絕對都值得你按下開始鍵！

親朋好友相揪鬥陣玩

如同真實的運動一樣，Active Arcade 也能讓你盡情與親朋好友瘋狂玩在一起！
跟其他線上運動遊戲不同的是，Active Arcade 想讓你更輕鬆快速地與朋友、家人一起共度快樂時光！眾多2人遊戲模式，讓你隨時隨地都能和親朋好友同時玩遊戲PK！

分享你最榮耀的一刻

Active Arcade 內建專屬你的精彩集錦，遊戲中所有互動特效、你的運動表現，將自動合成精彩片段，你可下載、私下分享，或上傳社群平台，分享你最榮耀的一刻，或者和親朋好友下戰帖，讓你遇強則強！

盡情玩樂 完全免費

Active Arcade 沒有廣告、無需花費、更不用訂閱！這是一個完全免費的遊戲APP，讓你無論何時何地，想動就動，想玩就玩。這麼棒，能不和全世界分享嗎？！

如果你有任何問題或想法，歡迎來信到 ios-support@activearcade.ai.
我們非常樂意聽取你的想法與建議。

應用名稱: 30天 - 減肥 健身 運動
應用描述:
準備好迎接30天健身挑戰了麽？今天就開始鍛煉，效果看得見，讓妳更健康！現在更有嶄新的訓練，健身計劃，配有高清視頻教程。

讓妳的全身肌肉更加健美，感受最完美的自己。用最少的汗水減掉多余的脂肪（沒有付出就沒有收獲！），30天讓妳看到明顯的不同。現在就來試試吧，按照30天健身挑戰訓練，把脂肪細胞減光光。

30天健身挑戰能為妳做什麽？每天鍛煉幾分鐘，堅持30天，就能看到自己慢慢變成妳追求的理想身材。從常規熱身運動開始，再做相應訓練，讓妳全身都苗條起來。

最初幾天進行低強度訓練，逐漸增加訓練強度。超越妳的期望，實現每日目標，和朋友們在社交平臺上分享。很快就會看到自己體重減輕，肌肉更壯。

30天健身與HealthApp完美結合，用戶可以自動將30天健身的運動數據導出到HealthApp,還可以將HealthApp的身體測量數據導入到30天健身。

30天訓練完成後會發生什麽改變？妳將擁有：
• 健美的手臂
• 平坦的腹部
• 蜜桃臀
• 纖細的大腿
• 比基尼身材
• 有型的腹肌

自2016年以來，全球下載量超過250萬次，每天有成千上萬的活躍用戶，好評如潮：
“用起來很簡單，大愛”美國用戶，2017年9月
“在節食的同時，從來沒用過這麽有效的軟件。壹個月我就練出了腹肌。向所有可以鍛煉身體的用戶推薦這款軟件！”澳大利亞用戶，2017年7月
“這是踏上健身之旅的好方法”南非用戶，2017年9月

每個人都很特殊，身體也是如此。天天鍛煉，強身健體，遠離疾病，如糖尿病和肥胖癥。馬上下載30天健身挑戰吧！

30天健身這款應用適合所有所有健康狀況的人群，由於每個個體自身情況不同，所以無法確保具體健身效果。開始之前請先尋求醫生建議，並仔細閱讀我們的相關政策。

評論.標題: A Personal Trainer for a fraction of the price!!!
評論.內容: First of all let me say I’ve written about 3 app reviews in my lifetime to include this one; but I really felt it was necessary to let everyone know this is the REAL DEAL. There’s no pressure, the exercises don’t leave you embarrassed (if you’re completely honest at the beginning about your workout level), and you can literally do it ANYWHERE. I’m in the military, and people assume that automatically causes you to be fit for some reason. Gravity affects us the same way! Lol I used to be a toned 140-145, had a baby and became a balloon— peaked at 205 (I’m 5’2). Became extremely unmotivated 24/8 first time mom. Not to mention working out was not happening (regrettably) during pregnancy at all. I was a cliche and signed up on the 1st of January... and I’m still going hard !! It was rough at first, but it felt good! And as the time passed and I started communicating with the feedbacks on the workout it just got better from there. I feel amazing. I’m not really seeing all the results just yet, but I’m only like 18 workouts in. I could go to the gym for free, but I’d rather pay for this any Day..I can literally workout on my on time and still be at home with my little babe, with pants or not! It’s amazing... I do the workouts in my office when I need a pick me up, and sometimes get my coworkers to join in! Go for the trial and you won’t regret it!! Thank you guys for EVERYTHING! Can’t wait to see my summer results!
I love this app
it is an amazing app. It works so good and it is very exercising and I love how they have the timing and it shows you the end and what your results are.👍🏻
I’m a mom of 4 and a very successful photography studio. 30 days fitness is the only app that keeps me coming back. I love their workouts. Who’s not up for a good challenge? 🥳
Get it will not regret

應用描述:
使用MUSCLE BOOSTER健身規畫器，讓健身計畫變得更好、更強、更快，更有難度！

當您在家鍛煉或到健身房健身，Muscle Booster的智慧訓練演算法將引導您按組重覆、重覆範圍和各組動作之間休息，讓您達到訓練目標。
 
MUSCLE BOOSTER的適用對象
Muscle Booster專門針對關切自身健康、外表及想要看上去讓人驚奇的男性開發。APP等同於私人訓練員，不論是在家中或健身房，都能幫助您練就完美體態。

如何開始？
設定目標：減重、增肌或更有活力
挑選您想要加強的部位：雙肩、胸部、雙臂、後背、腹部、雙腿
輸入您的個人資料，如年齡、身高、體重、健身級數等

MUSCLE BOOSTER的運作原理
我們的智慧演算法會根據您的目標和個人資料建議個人化的健身計畫——有氧運動、力量、恢復和低強度恆速有氧運動，能放大您要的成果。

基本計畫將連續進行60天，並顯示在行事曆上。各週健身計畫將根據您的進度和反應更新(如果前面的健身動作對您來說太簡單或難度太高)。
此外，您也可以進行健身庫裡的200項健身動作。 

另外食譜資料庫也納入APP (目前限英語版)。

Muscle Booster 整合 HealthKit 後，您可以從Muscle Booster 匯出營養和運動數據 到HealthKit，以及從 HealthKit 健身數據、體重和身體測量 到 Muscle Booster。

訂閱資訊：

您可以免費下載應用程式。進一步使用的話則需要訂閱。我們可以自行酌情決定是否按照應用程式顯示的條款提供您免費試用。請注意：
當您選擇訂閱時，您需支付應用程式顯示針對貴國制訂的定價。
款項將在購買確認後計入您的Apple ID帳號。
除非現期結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂功能，否則訂閱會自動續訂，而免費試用會自動轉為訂閱。
您的帳號將在目前訂閱期結束前24小時內被酌收續訂費用。
您可以在購買後前往 App Store 的帳戶設定管理訂閱和關閉自動續訂功能。
取消訂閱功能或免費試用時，您的訂閱/免費試用仍有效力直到現期結束為止。自動續訂將會停用，但現期訂閱一概不予退費。
詳情請參閱我們的

除了已購買的訂閱外，我們可能會為您提供額外收費的附加項目（例如健身指南、VIP 客戶支持服務），可以是一次性的，也可以是經常性的。 此購買是可選的：您的訂閱不以此類購買為條件。 所有此類優惠都將顯示在應用程序中。

評論.標題: Well worth the small annual fee
評論.內容: After an accident in 2019, I was sent down a different career path where I wasn’t nearly as active anymore. I was fearful after hearing doctors, nurses, physical therapists, and pain management specialists all tell me not to do anything or I could be paralyzed. I didn’t feel as bad as they said I was, but listened out of fear. I went from 170ish to 190+ in about 5 years and I felt disgusting. Years after the injury, I decided to start walking. I’d stretch beforehand. Walking led to jogging. Jogging is pretty jarring, so I got this app, hoping to add core strength to support my lumbar. I bought a Maxtrainer to reduce impact on my discs. The combo has been great! I’m not the type to stare in the mirror, but I’ve noticed here and there I’ve got veins starting to pop here and there that I haven’t seen in years! I’m not looking to get jacked, just rewind to years of a more active life with a fit body. This app has done this and more! It doesn’t get boring, and it’s highly adjustable to meet needs, even on a daily to day basis. If I’m hurting or sore I can reduce the exercise time, choose back injury or shoulder injury to tailor workouts to my needs. I can even swap specific exercises on the fly if it hurts! My only complaints are, sometimes it doesn’t recognize that I just did a workout. Not a big deal, but it’s nice to see my workout count go from 211 to 212 etc. It’s frustrating to put in a 15-20 minute workout and see the counter hadn’t moved and it still shows the “start” button (like I haven’t done it yet). Another complaint is I’d really like to have an option to have favorites, when you do a daily set of exercises that just hurts good, it’d be great to be able to repeat that later if you wanted, as opposed to never seeing that combination of exercises together in a daily workout again. Overall, VERY pleased, I feel much better! I don’t feel like a washed up, broken veteran anymore. I feel like I’ve regained some discipline to look like I could still hop back in formation and show the new recruits that age doesn’t mean you can’t still be a weapon!

Let me start by saying I am a woman and apparently that makes a huge difference when using this app. I started working out with my brother about 7 months ago. We go to the gym about 5 times a week. My brother uses this app when we go and he is able to select our target areas for that day and create a custom gym workout. Our work schedules recently changed and we are unable to go together now. Now that I go to the gym by myself I decided to download the app and paid for a one year subscription since I always like the workouts on the app. Well I put my personal details in and tried to create a custom workout and was caught by surprise when I realized it does not give an option for gym workouts. I thought maybe I did something wrong and asked my brother for help but he was unable to find an option for gym workouts as well. That is until we change my personal details and selected male instead of female. The gym option is only available if you have the settings set to male. Also on the female setting under equipment it only has 26 options (no gym equipment) but on the male settings it gives 64 options (including gym equipment). Had I known this app was more targeted towards men I would have downloaded a different app. Women go to the gym too. I pay for a gym membership and I should be able to put in my CORRECT personal details and goals and get proper GYM workout.
My husband and I are doing this together. Starting our second week and it has been encouraging and challenging. Would recommend
Why would I pay for some app that I have no idea what it does .

應用描述:
你是否夢想擁有平坦的腹部、纖細的雙腿和健美的翹臀？Gravity Fit讓你30天獲得想要的結果：針對問題部位選取合適的運動；或根據你的需求和身體參數，生成客製化健身計畫，全面鍛煉你的身體。

我們保證，你會像其他用戶一樣，實現你的健身目標：

「我要感謝Gravity Fit提供了一個這麼好的訓練計畫。在無需改變任何飲食的情況下，這個應用程式幫我在一個月之內減掉了3公斤！:)」
——台灣用戶小雅，2022年7月

「起初，我是被這種又簡單又短的訓練課程吸引住的（我很懶！）。剛開始的時候，訓練課程看起來真的是很容易的樣子。然後運動量會逐步遞增，但是依舊不會佔用你太多時間。目前已經可以看到效果了，我會繼續加油訓練。」
——台灣用戶珊珊，2022年11月

Gravity Fit為你準備好你需要的一切，幫助你將定期運動變成一種習慣，實現你的健身目標。只要你願意，隨時都可以進行鍛煉，無需任何設備器材！

客製化健身計畫
我們的算法可以根據你的資料（目標、性別、年齡、身高、體重、健康問題），為你選取合適的運動計畫，並根據你的進度對計畫進行調整，讓你每天都有不一樣的運動體驗。此外，我們還精選出100多個不同強度的運動短課程，來針對主要肌肉群進行訓練：腹肌與核心肌群、臀肌、手臂、胸部。

隨時隨地鍛煉
無論你有多少空閒時間，不管是5分鐘還是45分鐘，我們都有適合你日程計畫的運動內容。你隨時可以開始訓練，不需要購買啞鈴或其他任何健身器材。無論是在家還是在健身房——你都可以自由選擇鍛煉的時間和地點。

由專業健身教練設計的運動課程
所有健身計畫皆基於「後燃效應（Afterburn effect）」的科學方法，由獲得認證資質的教練親自設計。運動項目與訓練負荷都經過精心的選擇和整理，確保你在運動過後依然持續燃燒卡路里長達30個小時。

避免受傷，運動無憂
新手健身時很容易受傷，因此我們必須重視安全問題。每次訓練開始前，都會播放詳細的語音說明和高畫質指導影片。如果您之前受過傷，只需在你的個人資訊中記錄受傷部位，系統就會自動將不適合的運動項目從訓練計畫中移除。

更多功能，為你提供更加有效、有趣的健身體驗：

-   	離線模式：
無網路連接？只需提前下載訓練內容，即可離線運動。
-   	適合你的運動節奏的音樂：
根據你的運動節奏和喜好自動生成音樂。
-   	透過Apple Watch健身：
透過腕上的手錶即可完全掌控你的鍛煉進程，無需時刻查看手機。
-   	7天24小時，隨時與教練對話
持有認證資質的教練7天24小時在線，為你解答疑問。
-   	時刻追蹤運動進度
與Apple健康應用同步，發送運動資訊到HealthKit健康平台；從HealthKit導入體重與身體參數相關資料。

注意：在開始訓練計畫之前，請務必咨詢醫師有關健康方面的注意事項。

訂閱資訊

-   	訂閱可享受我們所有運動計畫的無限使用權限。
-   	有包週、包月、6個月或12個月的方案可供選取*。
-   	使用iTunes帳戶輕鬆付款。
-   	這些成效驚人的健身計畫將自動續訂，幫助你保持良好體態。
-   	如果你需要進行更改，可以隨時在「iTunes帳戶設定」裡管理你的訂閱偏好。

*價格根據美金訂閱價格、依照 Apple 的「App Store Matrix」換算表等值計算。

隱私政策：https://www.gravityhome.fit/privacy
使用條款：https://www.gravityhome.fit/terms

評論.標題: 严重微信同步的时差问题
評論.內容: 我是北美用户。这程序界面还好，功能也配备很出色。很好的应用。但是微信运动同步上有严重时差错误！它会在本地美国时间零点自动清零当天数据，但在中国的凌晨零点计算单天数据，因此，美国用户只能传送美国凌晨零点到美国早上9点（相当中国零点）的数据到微信上。9点以后到晚上零点的数据被自动清零前不传送。这个问题出在清零是使用了本地美国时间，而截止时间又使用了中国时间。合理做法是统一用GMT时间或统一用中国时间。
以前可以记录平板支撑的时间，怎么这个功能没了？本来还希望这个功能可以继续改进，因为找不到合适的app记录这个，现在竟然没了，有点失望… 还有，群组功能实在太简单了，只能看其他成员的成绩，都不能交流…

應用描述:
最新消息！現在可以和其他Pokémon GO訓練家在線上對戰了！馬上來試玩GO對戰聯盟吧。

加入世界各地訓練家的行列，一起探索周遭世界並尋找寶可夢吧。Pokémon GO是一款風靡全球的遊戲，下載次數超過10億次，榮獲Game Developers Choice Awards「最佳手機遊戲」獎，並獲選TechCrunch網站「年度最佳應用程式」。
_______________

隨時隨地探索寶可夢的世界！
 
捕捉更多的寶可夢，填滿寶可夢圖鑑！
 
和你的夥伴寶可夢一起踏上冒險之旅，讓你的寶可夢變得更強大並獲得更多獎勵！

在道館對戰中一較高下，或是……

和其他訓練家在團體戰中聯手捕捉強大的寶可夢！

Let’s GO！

只要在「健康」app 中的隱私權設定中允許Pokémon GO讀取資料，「時時刻刻模式」就能在關上應用程式持續計算步行距離。

注意事項：

本遊戲為免費遊玩並提供應用程式中內購功能。欲獲得最佳遊戲體驗，請使用智慧型手機遊玩。

建議在安定的網路環境中遊玩，以取得精確的位置資訊。

我們無法保證本應用程式可在未搭載GPS機能，或是只能以Wi-Fi連線的裝置上正常運作。

今後進行更新時，系統需求及對應裝置可能有所變動。

本資訊最後更新日為2019年7月11日。

對應裝置：搭載iOS 9或以上版本作業系統的iPhone® 5s / SE / 6 / 6s / 6 Plus / 6s Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 8 / 8 Plus / X。

本遊戲不支援第五代iPod Touch、iPhone 5c或更舊的裝置。

請至Pokémon GO官方網站確認更多關於對應裝置的資訊。

我們無法保證本應用程式可在平板電腦上正常運作。

我們無法保證本應用程式可在所有裝置上正常運作。

持續在背景執行GPS功能可能會劇烈消耗電池電量。

應用名稱: 分貝計（音頻頻譜分析儀）
應用描述:
「分貝計專業版」具備功能完整的音量計，測量準確度獨到，並整合了頻譜分析儀。 使用專業分貝計校準。

「測量音量的最佳方式」 - AppAdvice

這個世界充滿噪音：汽車、電動工具、人群、機械和其他來源所產生的噪音，經常接觸的話可能導致永久聽力受損。 對於希望避開有害噪音量以保護耳朵的人們而言，音量計非常實用，但誰想花幾百元美金購買呢？

「分貝計」是一款免費的應用程式，提供專業品質的測量結果，並使用實際 Nor140 的高準確度分貝計校準。 您可使用「分貝計」測量環境噪音音量，儲存測量結果與地點，並與他人分享測量值。 「分貝計」兼具實用性與時尚設計和優異的使用者體驗：這款強大工具不但精巧，價格也比專業音量計實惠許多。

(請注意，「分貝計」這款音量計應用程式無法取代專業器材，僅應用於個人目的。)

功能： 
● 高度準確的測量。

● 整合功能完整的頻譜分析儀。 

● 儲存每次測量的地點資料。

● 能自訂測量值的名稱，並重新命名現有測量值。

● 將測量結果匯出為 CSV 或音訊格式。

● 能儲存、匯出或播放所錄製的測量結果。

● 八音度頻帶分析儀 

● FFT 圖 (快速傅立葉轉換) 

● 線性與對數刻度

● FFT 大小高達 16384 

● 提供眾多視窗功能

● 最大值追蹤

● 所有所選頻率皆提供最大值與最小值

● 優美圖表

●Health App集成。 將測量的噪聲水平和聽力圖直接導出到Health應用程序。

App提供可選的月度和年度訂閱：
付款將在確認購買時從您的iTunes帳戶中扣除。 訂閱將自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉autorenew。 根據您的計劃，您的帳戶將在當前期間結束前24小時內收取續訂費用。 您可以在購買後隨時管理或關閉Apple ID帳戶設置中的自動續訂。 請注意，免費試用期的任何未使用部分將在購買自動續訂訂閱時被沒收。 在此處查看我們的使用條款：https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/94359518

評論.標題: I woke up to a high pitched constant sound
評論.內容:
After looking all over Google, I finally found a forum to get a decibel reader app. Narrow it down. 

After sleeping on the couch for over an hour, I finally decided to go back in my room with this decibel reader.  

Indicated to me that it was a Z value, and that to being likely caused by a microphone. 

I ended up figuring out that my computer microphone was turned on in the middle of the night and was echo pitch ringing. 

I’m not sure how but I’m working on that.  Probably some douche waffle. 

Anyhow, this is great app for figuring out what type of noises around and what kind of damage the noise could be causing.
I typically just use it for playing, but overall is very fun and very good quality because I having fun with this decimal meter so I would rate it four star.

I realize that this is not a “medical exam“ but it is kind of nice to know any random way what this test is finding. It’s not extremely scientific, but if you found something that I need to be aware of before, I realized it that would be pretty nice. I am a farmer, so I’m welding, grinding, driving tractors, all kinds of noise around me and I know I don’t have perfect hearing. But this was interesting I thought for sure my left ear was better than my right. There are some stones I can’t hear it my wife can in a kind of concerns me. I’m going to check in on the site more often. I took this test with a set of noise canceling Bose quilaphone headset

應用描述:
FitCoach - 一款健身應用程式，適用於想要開始新的積極生活方式、培養健康習慣、減肥、健身、強健體魄並且感覺身心舒暢愉悅的人。

功能特色：
► 個人訓練計劃
► 計步器
► 健身過程中的音訊提示
► 訓練提醒
 
 Fitcoach應用程式適用人群
 FitCoach應用程式專為關注自身健康、有減肥和塑身需求，但沒有時間去健身房的人们而開發。
 
 如何開始使用FitCoach？
 設定目標：減肥、增肌或提升活力
 選擇想要鍛煉的部位：腹部、臀部、腿部、臂部
 輸入個人資訊，如年齡、身高、體重、體質水準等。
 
 Fitcoach如何運作？
 根據您的目標和個人資訊，我們的智慧演算法將為您制定個性化鍛煉計畫，結合有氧運動、力量訓練、恢復訓練
 根據鍛煉進度和回饋，每週更新訓練計畫（根據訓練的難易程度）。
 
HealthKit：
FitCoach與HealthKit集成一體，因此您可以將FitCoach中的營養和鍛煉資料導入HealthKit，也可以將HealthKit中的健身資料、體重和體測資料導入FitCoach。

FitCoach 也整合 Fitbit 應用程式，讓您可以將數據從 Fitbit 匯入 FitCoach。

 ____________ 
 
訂閱資訊：
您可以免費下載應用程式。進一步使用的話則需要訂閱。我們可以自行酌情決定是否按照應用程式顯示的條款提供您免費試用。請注意：
當您選擇訂閱時，您需支付應用程式顯示針對貴國制訂的定價。
款項將在購買確認後計入您的Apple ID帳號。
除非現期結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂功能，否則訂閱會自動續訂，而免費試用會自動轉為訂閱。
您的帳號將在目前訂閱期結束前24小時內被酌收續訂費用。
您可以在購買後前往 App Store 的帳戶設定管理訂閱和關閉自動續訂功能。
取消訂閱功能或免費試用時，您的訂閱/免費試用仍有效力直到現期結束為止。自動續訂將會停用，但現期訂閱一概不予退費。
除了已經購買的訂閱項目以外，我們也可利用一次性或定期循環付款方式提供您額外收費的附加項目（例如健身指南、VIP 客戶支援服務）。這項購買是選配項目：您的訂閱條件不限於此。所有這類優惠將顯示在應用程式裡。
 
 欲瞭解更多資訊，請參閱我們的
 常見問題：https://fitcoach.fit/faq-ios.html
 隱私聲明：https://legal.fit-coach.io/page/privacy-policy 
 使用条款：https://legal.fit-coach.io/page/terms-of-use

評論.內容: This company bills monthly even if you do not approve a subscription * They make it impossible to stop the monthly fraudulent billing *

評論.標題: Broke what used to be a great app
評論.內容: When I first started using this app, I was able to customize my workouts by choosing exactly which days for each type of workout (I.e. cardio, strength, stretching), how many times a week and add or remove extra workouts. Now I am limited to only twice a week for each exercise, including low intensity like yoga and stretching. AND I can no longer choose which days I get to do them. WHY would you break a great app for no apparent reason?! It no longer meets my needs at this point and I have cancelled the subscription.

評論.標題: Horrid business practice would be 0 if I could
評論.內容:
App is charging me via Apple Pay even though Apple Pay has no record of a subscription for this. Because of this, there doesn’t appear to be a way to cancel the payments.

It’s an illegal enigma wrapped in a corrupt conundrum. Shadowy business practices ought to be shut down.

When you first download the app, it ask you multiple questions and continues going on and on and it seems like you’re about to get correct help and progress until your plan is made. Then your only option is to pay for the app which is ridiculous.

I enrolled but over time forgot my password. In attempting to reset I used the website which recognized my email but informed to reset my password on the app.  When trying to reset on the app I am told my password is not recognized.  I've paid for the past 6 months and just notified that payment was made for another 3 months.  Despite writing for support several times I've still had no contact.  I'm beginning to suspect this app is a scam since it seems to me there is no customer service concern or care.  If I don't get a response in the next week I will be requesting intercession of my state's consumer Consumer Protection Agency, the FTC and Econsumer.gov.
I canceled my membership long time ago they keep charging my card and would not reimburse my money. I highly do not recommend it.
Be careful people this website will charge your cards and you will not even know
Still getting charged for cancelled subscription

I decided to try the 7 day trial and canceled promptly on the fifth day. I have a screenshot of my cancellation which shows the date. FitCoach continued charging me for March, April, May, June, and July, unbeknownst to me. I have sent three emails in the last month, received one response saying they have a heavy workload and will get back to me ASAP. There is no phone number to call. I have had to go through my credit card company to try to get my money back.
I’ve been trying to cancel for six months now. Only to have them continue to charge an extreme fee for a nominal service.
Tried to contact them twice .  No one ever got back with me.

I canceled this months ago and deleted the app too.  It doesn’t show in my apple apps as being active BUT they are still changing me and I can’t find out how to contact them.  The website makes you download  app and the app wants me to reinstate my subscription but I’m not risking another unauthorized charge!

Excelente

評論.標題: Be Wary of Automated Renewal Charges
評論.內容: App is decent functionality wise but customer service is not good. I thought I’d canceled and, within minutes of the next charge hitting my credit card, I immediately contacted customer service for a refund and they said no and offered me a free year instead? They seem to employ the tactic of baiting you with discounted or free blocks of time so they can collect on automated renewal with absolutely no grace if you forget to cancel.

評論.標題: Their cancellation policy is a rip-off.
評論.內容:
They get you out to their website to pay the subscription for two reasons:

1) to skirt Apple’s cut (don’t blame them there), and

2) to keep you paying as long as possible.

I reviewed my “active subscriptions” several weeks ago, and it was not among them. Then a few days ago I was hit with over $50 on my credit card. Of course I check Apple first, then in the app. Cancel my subscription and request a refund. They’ve gotten me for several billing cycles, and I’ve never used it. I’d cancelled and requested a refund within 2 hours of billing, but they say “sorry, no refund”. What a malignant way to do business. They just want to milk you for all they can get.
They charge you through PayPal, almost impossible to cancel your subscription. Shady…..
I really enjoy the workouts and how you can customize your own week. I love it!
I don’t like the computer generated voice.
Asked for refund.  It was ignored.  Huge mistake to click on this site.

I can’t figure out to upload my workouts’
First day easy

I am confident this app content is helpful based on the reviews I see. My negative review has to do with how they conduct their business which I believe lacks customer responsiveness, integrity, and fairness.  I had a subscription that I did not use, and the renewals are on auto renewal. I received an email of my auto renewal, and immediately went to cancel the subscription, and following the process given to contact the app owners sent an email to their support as well as a message within the app requesting a refund of the money just charged me for the next three months of use, which I was not going to be using. I received an auto reply saying customer support was busy and would get back to me on my email, as well as a separate “sorry to see you go” message. I’ve seen no response to my request for a refund, and I’ve sent another message, and still 12 days later no response. Since this app is not through Apple, but directly with Fit Coach, you have no assistance with customer service nonresponsiveness, or issues with integrity of fair business practices. My lesson is you should be wary with allowing this Fit Coach business to process your money based on my experience.

評論.標題: Bait and switch! More money spent than just the promo
評論.內容:
This is a very difficult app to cancel. This is the second time that I tried to cancel this subscription from within the app. It automatically renews without any advice! 

 Bait and switch - you will pay more than the promo, as the app doesn’t let you cancel until after the promo expired and it renews at least once!!!!!! They say that all of the info is in their terms… BUT THESE TERMS DO NOT APPEAR UNTIL AFTER THE PAYMENT OF THE PROMO went through, AND CANCELLATION’s BUTTON IS GREYED OUT- so no cancellation until AFTER the second payment is extracted from you.

The phone number attached to this company never goes through. The support email did not answer when I stated that I had already canceled. 

 I will be complaining to Apple and any other service due to BAIT AND SWITCH MARKETING TACTICS. No way to contact customer service as of yet (more than 3 months). The excercises I purchased were supposed to be Pilates but they were exercises on a chair for a grandma. There were nothing like wall Pilates or barre ballet exercises. Again: The promo does NOT allow the CANCELLATION BUTTON to activate UNTIL THEY CHARGE THE ADDITIONAL 66.65 dollars!!!! Be AWERE!!! The app cancelation button DOES NOT WORK. Moreover: There is NO WAY this app has 4.7 stars without BOTS!!! I went one by one through all the reviews NOW! And 98% of the helpful reviews were ALL 1 stars!! This definitely needs to be reported up to Apple and Samsung companies to be deleted and investigated further.

The first day the coach was to meet me at 8 pm did not show up after committing to the schedule I cancelled it next day but no refund for the app or coach that i paid. Have sent 3 emails to support asking for refund but no response.
I been trying to cancel and won’t let me. Keeps charging me.

I have five different injuries and I’ve had 82 surgeries so there’s not much I can do so. I’m gonna have to sign out of this class, but trust me if I would’ve beena lot younger than I am and no injuries I would do this. It looks like a lot of fun so I’m gonna have to cancel.

However, I can’t use the app unless I renew my subscription, even though it’s not expired yet. The app support does nothing and there’s no customer service for FitCoach.

評論.標題: Wanted to love this, but so many glitches
評論.內容: I really thought this was going to be a great way to keep me accountable. The workouts are good, but it is not user-friendly…at all! First off, it takes forever to open the app, I sometimes have to go all the way out and try again. Secondly, I wrote an email to ask how to work the “fasting” portion because you have to start it on the day after the current day… makes no sense. No response after a full week of waiting. It always says I’m on day 0/28 even when I’ve done all the items needed each day. So, it doesn’t count down the days. I’m going to finish out my 28 days and move on. Don’t waste your time, it’s a very frustrating app.

I have no recollection of signing up for auto renewal - when I cancelled on the day of notice; they refused to refund.
Buyer beware.

應用描述:
Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
[Description of auto-renewing subscriptions]
1. Instructions for continuous monthly subscription
--Subscription period: 1 month
- Subscription price: 1 yuan for the first month, 15 yuan per month thereafter
2. Instructions for subscribing and unsubscribing
--Payment: Debit through the user's iTunes account, and the user will pay immediately after confirming the purchase
--Renewal: Apple’s iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours of expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period
--Unsubscribe method
Solution 1. Open the Appstore on your phone, click the blue avatar icon in the upper right corner, and then go to "Subscription"> "Huawei Sports Health" to cancel the subscription.
Solution 2: 24 hours before the expiration of the current subscription period, go to the iTunes/Apple ID "Settings Management" page and turn off the automatic renewal. Cancellation within 24 hours before expiration will result in a subscription fee.
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN
--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

VO2 max. 6. There is option to add note to any value eg. Abnormally high blood pressure because I ate salty meal. 7. When I disconnected my watch from BT from the phone my watch date was completely erased ie. it should have been back synchronized from my phone. 8 synchronization takes ages. 9. There is no way to offset or adjust blood measurements. The watch appears to be -5 points incorrect. 10. The Exercises in the app seem to have 4 randomly chosen exercises and nothing more. 應用描述:

應用名稱: 蜗牛睡眠-睡眠监测,鼾声梦话记录及深度睡眠分析
應用描述:
适合每个人的睡眠健康管理！做自己健康的第一责任人！

蜗牛睡眠是一款基于睡眠监测算法、鼾声筛查算法多项国家发明专利的专业睡眠监测应用，全球已超7000万用户在使用。

通过睡眠监测，为您精准记录日、周、年睡眠数据，帮助您了解深睡眠、浅睡眠等睡眠分期情况，并通过统计分析得出您的睡眠效率和睡眠质量，提供失眠预警和改善睡眠的相关建议；

通过声音记录，为您分析整晚打鼾情况，包括打鼾音频、打鼾时长、打鼾分贝、打鼾部位、打鼾严重程度和阻塞程度等多维度分析，提供打鼾预警和改善打鼾的相关建议；同时也为您记录和分析整晚咳嗽、磨牙和梦话等内容。

蜗牛睡眠的功能：

SnailSleep 3.0 AI智能睡眠监测算法
睡眠监测和梦话、鼾声、磨牙等声音记录
60+睡眠指标和40+睡眠图表多维度数据科学解析
深睡眠（黄金睡眠）记录分析、睡眠效率和睡眠质量等评估
打鼾部位、打鼾时长、打鼾分贝和严重程度等评估
失眠、打鼾等睡眠健康预警及改善方案
天、周、年睡眠趋势统计和分析
智能闹钟浅睡唤醒
2000+优质音乐科学助眠引导

适用于：

-想了解自身睡眠质量如何的人。
-有打鼾（影响自身健康和人际关系）或失眠（入睡难、睡眠浅、多梦惊醒和早起）困扰的人。
-想记录自己梦话、磨牙等夜间声音和行为的人。
-重视自己健康状况，希望改善亚健康问题的人。
-压力大、易感焦虑紧张的上班族和学生党。
-想记录宝宝整晚睡眠的宝妈人群。
-需要摆脱早晨被闹钟惊醒的困扰。
-想通过音乐引导和疗愈的人。
-想尝试使用的人。
以上这些场景与需求，蜗牛睡眠可以帮你完美解决。

       蜗牛睡眠-作为睡眠健康伴侣应用，将陪伴你度过夜晚美好的睡眠时间，培养你的良好睡眠习惯，感知并记录下你的睡眠过程，为你呈现可视化的睡眠报告，帮你更了解你的睡眠。让你不用手环，也可以同样了解自己的睡眠状态！在此次升级中与Apple Health健康平台完全整合，使得记录到的睡眠数据可以顺利地在这一平台上进行同步，同时Apple Health也让你能够在一个综合性仪表盘上查看这些数据。这意味着蜗牛睡眠4.0版本中你可以将你的睡眠数据同步至Apple Health（可选）。

“蜗牛睡眠”你的枕边伴侣，让你的睡眠有效率，改善睡眠健康，每天精力充沛！

关于使用Health kit（中文名叫健康）数据说明
(1) 当你需要使用Health kit（中文名叫健康，后续文案表述统一为Health kit）服务与我们产生数据链接时，首先需要你“打开蜗牛睡眠”-“我的”-打开“Apple Health”（默认关闭），此时，我们会明确告知你我们需要获取数据及简要功能说明，如你确认需要使用Health kit服务，请你点击“同意”，反之，你可以“拒绝”。
(2) 当你同意我们与Health kit服务产生数据链接时，请你在“睡眠分析”类目中允许“蜗牛睡眠”睡眠数据（主要是卧床时间、起床时间）写入到Health kit里，这将有利于你更好更方面管理睡眠，除此之外，我们承诺不会从Health kit获取其他无关数据。
(3) 我们承诺你通过我们使用Health Kit的数据不会用于广告或应用其他商业化服务目的。同时请你也注意，你使用我们服务可能会存在广告，但是你使用Health Kit中的数据不会用于广告或应用其他商业化服务目的。
(4) 我们承诺不会向任何第三方展示、出售任何Health Kit获取数据，并且我们承诺建立严密技术措施确保你数据的安全。

I just started the 5 mins workout. I liked it.
great workout. I love that you can change the length of it and that there is another leg workout you can select to change things up.
It's awesome for sneezing in a 5min-10min workout on the go!
Simple but hard

Was looking to switch up my workout routine, have not been doing this long but you will feel sore from doing it. They are quick if you only have a couple of minutes, and there are other workouts for different body parts. I Enjoy it overall.

I love the quick work out. It's perfect for working out on a tight schedule. My only complaint is that it only gives three seconds when switching one exercise for another and it's not enough time when one is not familiar with the work out routine. I'd suggest the transition time to be at least five seconds.

Okay, so I, like any other girl, would like to look fit and muscular. I just started this 2 days ago, and I can already feel it!!! I can't wait to keep going and see more results! 
 I totally recommend this app to anyone trying to tone their body. 
The workouts are customized to your ability of exercise and it is just an incredible app, and I just want to thank the creators.

評論.標題: I love it and told so many people about it!
評論.內容: So convenient, and so effective! Thank you! I told my doctor I exercise with an app on my phone and he was surprised and amazed!
Take it with me everywhere even when I'm traveling

I can't say enough about these workouts. My favs are legs & butt. I just figured out after months of having these apps that u can select #2 for more free workouts. Lol! I am always sore the next day. I like to do these when I don't feel like doing my regular routine or as add-ons when I have extra energy.
Have been using it for years off and on. 2-3 wks before I really need to look in shape I'm been religious about using this app. It's the easiest and very effective.
Really makes me work
Straight forward work out!!! Works for me.... Slim n toned!!!
This works

Great app 
You really feel the burn ✌️
I'm going to keep this short and sweet. This is a great app that you can use anytime anywhere.
An alarm can be set to let you know it's workout time. You can do all or some if the exercises. You can repeat.  It's a great app!
DOES THIS HELP YOUR THIGHS GET MORE MUSCLE ON IT
The 5 min workouts are perfect for my afternoon slump!!
The most convenient way to work out, ever!
These exercises really work, because they are targeted to a specific body part you can focus it and feel the burn. Nothing but love for this app. ❤️❤️❤️

評論.標題: Pretty good; way better than guesstimating things to do yourself.
評論.內容: I use it a few times a week. Great!
It is such a great app I've only had it for a month or so and I can see a thigh gap already forming
Great app for a quick workout in the go!

I love this app. I use it for a quick leg workout and especially when it's raining outside and I can't run outside. I also use it in conjunction with the Butt, Arm, and Ab apps for a good overall toning experience
I can feel the burn after each workout
Totally love it. Use it every day

應用描述:
一起和全球居家保健品的領導者OSIM，展開您的健康生活。
