評論.內容: Speaker connection issues.  It seems like you have to connect to multiple speakers in the Bluetooth settings in order to get the sound to connect properly on the chair.  Any suggestions on how to fix this it’s rather annoying?
quick response from the app developer.  I searched for a msaage chair for a long time to have a good neck and shoulder program.  OSIM UDream is the best chair I found on the market,

評論.標題: App crashed and the control panel doesn’t work
評論.內容: The app will crash in the middle of the massage program. The massage program continues but the chair can’t return to upright position after the program ends because the Bluetooth keeps failing to pair and the control panel is non responsive. Trying to climb out of the chair to turn off the power is dangerous! Please fix the bug and let me know how to reset the control panel while sitting in the chair without unplug the power.
The app does not recline the chair therefore the programs do not get started. Please fix the bug.
The APP is not connecting well with the massage chair. The chair is not reclining when pressing the APP button! Please repair

應用名稱: 瘦身旅程 - 記錄體重與身材的點滴變化
應用描述:
流行的瘦身記錄應用，記下瘦身過程中的點滴變化！

用照片記錄和分析每日體重、體脂、身體圍度以及身材的一切變化。 現在起，瘦身的點滴進步，將清晰可見！

每天簡單的兩步：記錄體重+自拍體形。您還可記下每天的飲食、運動、體脂、身體尺寸等資訊，全面記錄瘦身過程。

瘦身旅程同時提供了一套實時的數據備份和同步服務，來確保您數據的安全性和私有性，以及讓您可以在多臺 iOS 設備上訪問它們。

功能列表：

- 體重跟蹤曲線（自動計算BMI，支援公斤、磅、市斤和英石）

- 身體圍度跟蹤曲線 (頸圍、胸圍、肩寬、臂圍、腰圍、腹圍、臀圍、大腿圍、小腿圍、等)

- 身體成分跟蹤曲線 (體脂肪、體水分、骨骼肌、去脂體重、內臟脂肪、基礎代謝率等）

- 實時的數據云備份、云同步服務

- 支持 iOS 健康

- 每日體形自拍

- 不同時期的體形對比

- 支援不同時間範圍及手勢縮放的圖表

- 記錄飲食、運動、身體尺寸以及任何文本資訊

- 密碼保護，以防他人查看您的記錄和照片

- 目標體重設定，自我激勵

- 通過身高，推薦最佳體重

- 可添加過去的記錄和照片

- 生成帶有體重、BMI資訊的每日照片

- 生成不同時期體形對比照片 (可附帶不同時期的體重資訊)

- 輕鬆通過Twitter、Facebook、微博、微信分享瘦身進展，與好友互相激勵

- CSV 文件格式的數據導出

---

自動續訂相關：

瘦身旅程 VIP  -  每月

- 身體尺寸管理
- 身體成分管理
- 超級圖表
- VIP專享動態主題

確認購買後，您的 iTunes 賬戶將會進行付款。
付款賬戶在當前訂購周期結束時將自動續訂，您的 iTunes 賬戶會再一次進行付款。同時，您可以在當前付費周期結束前至少 24 個小時取消自動續訂。
訂購後，您隨時可以在 Apple ID 賬戶設置中管理或者關閉自動續訂。

---

軟件許可及服務協議：http://fitjourney.co/eula/eula-zht.html
隱私政策：http://fitjourney.co/privacypolicy/ChineseT.html

---

（ 如需諮詢，請電郵至 support_zht@FitJourney.co ）

評論.標題: 目前看到的最简单的体重记录软件
評論.內容: 目前看到的最简单的体重记录软件，推荐下载
软件很好用，记录清晰便捷

I love all the things you can track with this app. You can use pictures to track your progress and make notes to track things not available yet. It is great for weight loss, but I can see it being helpful if you want to build muscle as well.
Continual errors when submitting email verification code to register. Is this just an app trying to harvest email addresses and phone numbers for spammers?

I’ve been using this app on and off for about 3 years and when I first got it the only thing you could do on it was track your weight, which was literally all I wanted. I used it for about 6 months then I kinda gave up on losing weight for whatever reason, but when I started back up I decided to use this app again because it was truly perfect for what I needed. When I downloaded it again I found that there were quite a few more features that could be used but you had to pay a monthly subscription, it’s only like 0.54 cents a month and the added features help track not just your weight but how much your losing in different parts of your body (body composition) and you can look at different charts to see your progress. I love it. There’s no annoying ads, they don’t try to get you to download other apps, nothing annoying about it really and it’s super cheep.

I’ve been using this app for 2 months and I hate that I can’t see my progress all on one page. I have to scroll and scroll side to side across weeks of weight and measurements to see start to present progress. Most apps allow you to view this in one glance. It’s like it’s very “zoomed in” and there’s no way to “zoom out” and see all your info at once. Very annoying. You just don’t get the same satisfaction of seeing how well you’ve done with it set up this way. 🤷‍♀️

評論.標題: Needs to have landscape option on the main view!
評論.內容: It’s a weight app, tracking your weight as a horizontal linear graph, and yet it doesn’t rotate to landscape. I feel this is a HUGE downfall for an otherwise sleek, functional app, and such a small fix! Since I use it on my iPad I have to take it off its magic keyboard and rotate it sideways just to do a simple function.

評論.標題: Works great and I love the UI.
評論.內容: Perfect app! Does what it is supposed to and it does it extremely well t

評論.標題: Overall, great... but a few concerns
評論.內容:
This is wonderful to see your progress and milestones. However, I don’t like how this app only focuses on the weight. I think that it should also include good habits and exercising as a goal. When it is all about the weight, you’re never going to be happy. 

Another suggestion is to make the weight goal as a range, since you won’t stay the same weight forever (due to water weight) For example, you can choose a range between 5 pounds. Then your goal is to stay within the range. 

But this app has a good setup and it is very easy to use.
It will be better if we could see several lines combined in one pic in the superchart. For now it works great.

Blown away by how minimalistic yet comprehensive the visuals are... unfortunately, I’m unable to use most of the features in free version (and I’m not able to register to access the VIP options). There is no information on cost of membership made available either

Great app, used for years and it’s awesome to have for historical. Wouldn’t add any features EXCEPT the ability to go back in time on the super charts so that you don’t always have to view the most recent data. Great you can “zoom” but want to “slide” too. :-)
I’ve had this all the way through my weight loss and toneing and now through my muscle gain. It has been so simple and user friendly. Love it so much!
I love this app so far! Very user friendly
I seriously love this app better than all of the others I’ve tried. I’m already 16 pounds down and I love being able to easily track my progress!!

Very easy to use and I love the look of it. No clutter, no trying to be all things.

Simple tracking. Easy to enter data and notes. I especially like that- I can add journal entries and photos for certain milestones and I can easily zoom out to see progress over time.
Simply awesome
Great way for people to track their progress quickly.
Works beautifully, love the ability to customize what I want to track.

評論.標題: Free, convenient and just what I needed
評論.內容: I’ve been trying to lose weight for quite a while now with mixed results, mostly negative. I realized that every time I made progress, I would inevitably gain back most of the weight I lost. I started tracking what I ate in the app along with my weight and saw a direct correlation between the weight and the types of food I was eating. Not a big revelation admittedly, but when you see how your behavior drives your results you can make the necessary changes and stay consistent which is key no matter what weight loss philosophy you subscribe to.  Of course, you could do all this yourself, but the app is free, convenient and just what I needed
This is a very pretty & easy to use app, but they fail to mention in the description that keeping track of body measurements will cost you $0.49 a month.

I love the simplicity of this app and that is also has everything needed.
I upgraded the body measurements 
Helps me keep track without having to have multiple apps
I love this app.

I’ve been using this app since it came out and I really loved it. I just got a new phone though and when I put the app on my new phone, it’s asking me to upgrade to put my measurements in now. This app isn’t free anymore and because of that, I’m sadly switching to Progress.
Great way to track my progress - I like this better than MFP for weight tracking.

Graphically Beautiful, easy to utilize data. I got it because I have a scale that measures body fat, etc, but doesn’t have Bluetooth to sync with an app, so I have to manually enter data. Apple Health didn’t have all of the readings my scale is capable of. This app has all of them (just added body water %age! Was looking for it before & it wasn’t there but is now) Keeping track of body water helps you know if a weight gain is actually putting fat back on or just temporary water gain, and helps you track if your hydration is adequate or not, or excessive.
I’m using on iPad. Simple but effective with all necessary info fields.
It works flawlessly at what it is supposed to do. I think if you could add workout tracking to it, then it would be phenomenal.

I’ve had this app since 2012. I’ve loved it since I first got it,...of course I always thought it could maybe offer some more frutares to make it the one and only one.  And Now ! Here it is! All these wonderful addons!  Love how it integrates with apple health, love how I can track everything and love the smart graphs.

I’ve been using this app to track my weight (daily) and measurements (weekly) for about 9 months. The app is solid, intuitive, and reliable. The in app purchases are worth the money. I’ve lost almost 130 pounds while using this app. 

I’d like a way to export my data into Excel for some analysis (I’m a nerd like that), but I really have no complaints about this app.

評論.標題: It takes forever to sync with apple health
評論.內容: And I cannot use the app while syncing!
I just downloaded this app and it was exactly what I was looking for. It’s beautifully designed and easily navigated. I can’t wait to start a visual track of my weight loss goals!
Keeping track of my weight loss and taking helpful notes is a breeze with this Ap. The graph is easy to see and it helps motivate me. Luv this Ap!

評論.標題: A free weight tracking app with a beautiful user interface
評論.內容:
I been looking at bunch of apps now to track weight and they all are good but this one stands out with it’s amazing interface.

I been using this for two weeks now and am really impressed with the amount of detailing the team has put in this. Kudos to the team and definitely a big thumbs up for keeping this app free.

I have been struggling with losing weight but tracking it and actually seeing the difference between each photo really helps me :) I love this app I love how you can put progress photos along with your weight
This is honestly a 5/5 I would 100% recommend getting this app! 😁
I’d really like to be able to more easily get s broader view of the Chang Ron weight over time. There is no way to zoom in or out.  Instead you have to swipe. This gives a limited sense of progress
Awesome app just what I wanted love the app easy to use very helpful

I’ve been using Fit Journey since 2014 and it has helped me track my fitness journey and body weight and progress greatly. I would highly recommend this app if you enjoy the simplicity and ease of keeping up with your health accomplishments 🤗
I paid for body measurements but the app only tracks one of each. Disappointing!

I’m big on data analysis, and I find it really motivating to have an app that lets me do that. The interface is nice and not fussy. 

Then next frontier for this app is being able to track factors like menstrual cycle, sleep, etc. to track the correlation.

Love this app definitely the best one what I would add is the custom measurement for example if I train a specific movement for example 100m sprint or maximum rep range with a set or specific time than it would give me more value I am sure the developer will add this functions as than it will replace lots of app there that measure health stuff.

I’ve been using this to help track my measurements and see improvements i like that i can add pictures as well... i track here a couple times a month so it shows me the areas where I’m losing or gaining inches 😍😍😍
After how many times it asked me to rate I want to give it 4 stars. But I can't deny that this app is e x a c t l y what I was looking for. Definitely worth $6

評論.標題: Phenomenal tracker for those in prep
評論.內容: As a competitor in contest prep this app gives me everything that I need in order to track every aspect of my physique. The easy to use interface and sleek design makes using the app a pleasure. This app and the add-ons are a must have for anyone that is serious about body re-composition.

I’ve been using for nearly three years and still love it. The interface is intuitive and not cluttered with distractions or cheesy nonsense. The charts and milestones are built into a clear, minimalist layout (although I think you can choose and personalize the look). So I can see weight gains and losses over the last three years and look at trends to see where I have to be more thoughtful. Being able to see it all laid out simply also helps to focus on goals; the app can calculate your ideal weight and show the difference from your current each time you enter data. Feels good to lower that number little by little. Wish other apps were as clean and user conscientious as this one.
App works great and it’s the first I’ve seen that will take pictures to show true progress. Numbers don’t always tell a picture so it’s a great feature
Works for me! Simple and easy to use. You're able to update your weight as well as add a picture on particular dates and then look at the cumulative graph

I track my weight in other apps but like how I can add photos and measurements to this one.  It gets my weight every day from apple health and apple health gets it from my Bluetooth scale.  All I have to do is get on each day.  I track my calories in Lose It! Would be nice to zoom out on the weight graph.  It’s nice that the app doesn’t have an opinion about gains or loss like some.

評論.標題: Has what I want to track in a simple interface
評論.內容:
The rest of the apps I tried had the things I wanted to track, but too complicated visual distractions. 

I do which you could set a time goal for when I want to have lost the weight by. 

Psychologically, it would probably better togiveboth the amount of weight lost first with the amount of weight tobe lost shown second.
I loved this app when I first downloaded it it now I can’t access my photo albums to up load my pictures.

five star app, only problem with the new update is crashing when saving a pic to the camera role. hoping its fixed soon.
update: the app does not ask for photo access, stopping it from saving pics.

應用描述: 三健客採用漸進式專業教學方法，以不造成運動傷害為原則，建立專屬於您的健身計劃。無論是想健身、減重、維持健康等需求，三健客都會陪伴您一起成長，快踏出第一步吧！運動紓壓的最佳去處，讓您的身心充分享受運動的每一刻。如同小說《三劍客》一般，你們都是我們的達太安，三健客會是您最好的健身夥伴！

應用名稱: 睡覺時間 − 睡眠週期追踪
應用描述:
更快地入睡並醒來！
- 了解你的睡眠週期和睡眠質量
- 睡著舒緩的音景
- 用手機測量靜息心率
- 沒有需要的可穿戴設備！你的手機完成了這一切

擁有超過3500萬用戶，屢獲殊榮的睡眠時間應用程序遍布全球。

“Azumio滿足了對睡眠分析的準確，先進的算法的需求，這種算法可作為完整移動健康解決方案的組成部分進行消費 - ”斯坦福大學Paul Zei博士

5/5“我已經嘗試了幾個應用程序，記錄睡眠時間和體驗類型，睡眠時間界面是迄今為止最好的。這很容易理解和使用簡單。“

5/5“迷人的結果。它非常有效地提供有用的信息。“

特色：TechCrunch，Mashable，Lifehacker，148apps，eHealth等等......

＃1睡眠分析應用程序在美國
＃1在日本的睡眠分析應用程序
＃1睡眠分析應用程序在英國
＃1澳大利亞睡眠分析應用程序
＃1德國睡眠分析應用程序
＃1法國的睡眠分析應用程序
＃1中國睡眠分析應用程序
＃1睡眠分析應用程序在俄羅斯
＃1加拿大睡眠分析應用程序
… 還有很多。

-----------------

主要特點

√用一個手勢設置鬧鐘

√睡著的聲音或白色噪音！

√即使在靜音模式下，鬧鈴也響

√選擇我們的20個內置報警器中的任意一個

√或從iTunes喚醒您最喜愛的歌曲！

√帶有睡眠週期分析功能的Sleep Lab™ - 輕度睡眠，深度睡眠，R.E.M.

√詳細的每月和每週圖表

√先進的喚醒優化算法

√即時心率積分檢測脈搏後喚醒

√完整的歷史和圖表使比較容易

√在雲上備份和恢復您的睡眠數據

√我們易於閱讀的界面不需要眼鏡！

√蘋果健康集成

睡眠呼吸暫停，打鼾問題，疲勞，壓力，疲倦，疲憊，缺乏睡眠，夜間睡眠障礙，夢想，需要白噪聲，環境聲音，音景，平靜的自然旋律，睡眠日誌記錄等等的人非常適合。我們為用戶製作睡眠時間，我們很樂意聽取您的反饋意見 - 告訴我們您的想法，以便我們能夠在下次更新中實施您的想法和建議！

我們提供具有以下規格的自動續訂訂閱：
- 訂閱期限為1個月或12個月
- 每月$ 29.99美元的1個月訂閱費為9.99美元
- 付款將在確認購買時向您的iTunes帳戶收取
- 訂閱自動續訂，除非自動續訂在當前期限結束前至少24小時關閉
- 訂閱可能由用戶管理，並且可以在購買後通過轉到用戶的賬戶設置關閉自動續訂
- 在有效訂閱期間不允許取消當前訂閱
- 如果提供免費試用期的任何未使用部分，則在用戶購買該出版物的版稅時將被沒收
- 我們的隱私政策和使用條款：https://www.azumio.com/page/privacypolicy

注意：在後台繼續使用GPS會顯著降低電池壽命。

甜蜜的夢，
Azumio團隊

評論.內容: I needed an app to track my sleep for our insurance plan to pay us. I tried app after app for a week and all wanted a subscription. Finally I found this one and it worked perfectly!
Used this app for years for my alarm. The ads won’t click away now to even use it. Deleting and getting something else

評論.標題: Ads that can’t be clicked away
評論.內容: This app has now started to have ads that can not be clicked away, and they don’t time out. Makes the app completely useless.

This is the only free sleep app I’ve found that actually works! I have considered upgrading, but I can’t find anything that explains the premium features. I wish it would give some examples of sleep reports or sleep programs, but that’s literally my only complaint, so, highly recommend.

評論.標題: loud ads, ads in foreign languages, bad reviews
評論.內容:
I've had the app for years and the devs have experimented with ugly ways for them to make a buck off of you - playing loud pop up ads as you're setting your alarm  - I even have gotten ads in foreign languages where the close button is (I assume) the word "close" in that language... not to mention how they hound you to set up an account (more data collection).
I've also had my share of mid-night crashes that cause me to miss waking up on time. 
very unsavory and antagonistic view of their user base - avoid this app.
Have waken up late for work twice now due to the alarm not making any noise. Will be switching apps immediately
Love the waves on the beach sound, so peaceful.

I cannot believe yall read all these comments and decided “oh we’ll put a blaringly loud noisy ad to promote our premium app and the only way to get rid of it is to go and ignore the ad”. The weird freaking alieny music that gets louder by the second unless you X out of the ad is absolutely insane. I’m honestly shocked that you guys really did this. Absolutely horrible. Would not recommend.
I’ve been using this app for about 4 years now and I love it. It really makes a difference and helps me get insights on my sleeping habits
Amazing
Stop having loud ads!!!

How is it OK to play a noisy commercial at midnight when I am setting my sleep timer on next to my sleeping spouse. Sleep time you have to do better! It us not OK to blast a commercial on full volume at all. I understand the need for commercials, but please turn off the sound!
Been using this app for almost 10 years and it is very reliable

Allow users to disable volume change

I don't use an alarm, I just use the vibrate and the analysis. Don't touch my volume. Edit: Huh, looks like the Alarm Volume maxes out regardless of its setting. This is DANGEROUS. Do not max my volume ever, I might have buds in. My ears still hurt :(

評論.標題: I have been using this app since April 2014
評論.內容:
When I first started using this app, it was amazing. It actually recorded when I would sleep and listen to the deep/light sleep periods. 

Something happened one day when it updated and it never worked the same. If I remember correctly, it was related to the iOS restrictions to curb apps monitoring you all the time. So I believe they were forced to change the algorithm to checking in periodically rather than constantly. 

This led to a less desirable tracking. While although that was great at the time, what I love is the alarm. 

You set your window, mine is 30 minutes. And if I set my alarm at 7, it could wake me up anywhere between 630 and 730. It tries to listen more during that time and if I stir, it’ll play the gradual melody to wake me up. 

What gets people is the snooze. Shake the thing and it’ll snooze. There’s another parameter you can set to lower the snooze time and the amount of times you can snooze. If you say 10 mins, but say you can snooze 3 times, that’s 30 mins. My alarm would then max wake me up at 8 by my example. 

So on average if I want to wake up around 7, I would set my alarm at around 6:10. 

If you want a “hard wake up” like a normal alarm clock. This app is not for you.

I’ve used this for years- love the simple dial interface- always works for me- love the ability to flip my phone for snooze- fantastic product. Recently I’m unable to get iTunes to launch to pick my soundscape- maybe a bug? iOS 15.6.1
Was late because the alarm never went off. And they make you sign up for an account. Useless app. Don’t bother downloading.

The red x on the ads does not remove the ads, it launches the ads!  Please remove the red x if the ad is not allowed to be removed.  That is just mean!  

The screens are also very unintuitive, I would never buy premium with such a bad design.

I tried it free and decided to buy it. But it won’t allow me to add my name to the account, therefore the app won’t generate reports!! I’ve contacted the company and no response. Thinking about canceling soon if no response or help.

評論.標題: Full volume autoplay ads- that’s what you want at bedtime!
評論.內容:
You used to be able to bypass the ads by disconnecting from the internet— not anymore. 

The free form of this app is unusable. It’s not a free app with purchase unless the grub hub commercial jingle really gets you sleepy— it’s just a paid app.

評論.標題: Doesn’t work and can’t get resolution
評論.內容: I really wanted to like this and paid for it with the 30 day free trial. However, it doesn’t work. It simply alarms and doesn’t gradually awaken you at your least sound sleep. I don’t need an alarm. I already have that. I contacted support and was told the developers would be contacted and was given instructions to cancel. I didn’t want to cancel, but to get it to work. Frustrating!
Doesn’t work all of the sudden says not enough data, nothing I have changed, I don’t know how I don’t have any contact person.

評論.標題: I searched for apps that would work with my iPhone.
評論.內容:
Somehow I am signed up for the premium version, and there is no available customer support.
Definitely deserves a call to BBB.
This ap is amazing if you have trouble waking up in the morning
Only real complaint is when I set the alarm the screen goes black over and over while I try to close all the ads that pop up (also one of the ads was porn which is weird because this is apple).

...then they “updated” it.  All the screens are bright white. Terrible to look at when you’re about to go to sleep.  Black it out please.  I don’t mind the ads, but the app also maxes out the volume when the alarm goes off. Give me a setting to disable the audible alarm. The buzzer wakes me up, I haven’t heard the alarm in years, but if it snoozed and I’m looking at something on my phone, when the alarm goes off again, (only buzzing, not audible yet) the volume jacks all the way up, regardless of what I’m doing.  Nothing like looking at a YouTube or TikTok and having the audio go from 15% to 100 instantly with no warning.  It’s ridiculous.  There’s one setting for alarm volume in the app, but it does nothing.  Anyway, it used to be an amazing app, now I’m looking for something better.

I wanted to try this before buying but there were so many ads on the screen I couldn’t even get to any page for help without being confronted with more ads to get me to upgrade!  Frustrating!  Deleted.
Alarm stoops working for an unknown reason. Bug report sent in but it is still frustrating that I cannot rely on this to work when I need to get up.

I love the app when it works. The customer support when it stopped 6 weeks ago has been nonexistent. I’ve tried all the channels available to reach them for support. I have a premium subscription that renewed in mid Feb. I updated my phone soon after and now I’m in an endless loop of trying to access premium features and the app saying you already have a subscription. Great, let me in!!! So I guess I just made a donation for the year. I get things can go awry, but no response for support is just sad. Here’s to hoping this reaches someone at Azumio that solve issues or cares to.

I downloaded the app and set the time I wanted to wake up. All of a sudden there's a swarm of bees! The sound continued even when I closed the app. It woke up my partner and scared the crap out of me. Had to delete the app to make it stop. Maybe this was one of the adds the other reviewers mentioned?

Maybe this is a great app but you’ll never know bc it’s impossible to figure out how to use it. There is lots of flashy “concept” content if you dig around but nothing that actually tells you how to use the bleeping thing. I downloaded it and it immediately decided I was trying to sleep... at 10 am. Now it’s 11:41 and it’s telling me my alarm is set for 6am. I don’t want to get up at 6 am. I can understand waking me up +/- 30 minutes from a time I set. Or after it’s done some machine learning of my sleep patterns. But it has literally only “known” for a few waking hours so why is it trying to force me awake with only six hours of sleep and one and a half hours before I normally get up!?!?
I think it's a good app and I would purchase it if it wasn't so expensive. There are a few changes of course. But lower the price you may get better results. Mahogany
I have depression and anxiety so im sleep deprivated and so this app really helps to know how much im sleeping and how much im awake would recommend 10/10

評論.標題: Updates are slowly making this a one star app
評論.內容: Can we PLEASE get back the ability to type in a wake up time?!? The dial is beyond frustrating to set when your sleepy and half awake, and tends to jump around as you’re trying to release it. I end up settling for a “close enough” alarm clock half of the time. Do better. This is an easy fix.

There's no valid reason for the app to require an email/FB account (no Apple sign in) to run. It also collects way too much personal information that's irrelevant to sleep tracking. What does the user's full name have to do with an alarm? It doesn't even matter whether you claim not to transfer any data for other uses; the mere inclusion shouldn't be happening.

評論.標題: Alarm turns itself off. Dangerously unreliable
評論.內容: I’ve been using this for sleep tracking for 7 years. The sleep timer just disappears sometimes. Cancels itself in the middle of the night, no alarm goes off. This is obviously unacceptable. It's gotten so bad lately that I can't use it anymore.

評論.標題: Stopped being reliable when updated to iOS 14
評論.內容:
I have been using this app for years! I don’t even use the sleep tracking, I love it solely because I can flip my phone to snooze the alarm. 

However, ever since updating to iOS 14 the app had become very unreliable. I set the alarm for 5:30am every night and sometimes it goes off in the morning. But more often now it won’t go off, and when I check my phone it says the alarm is set for 5:30pm...I don’t get it.
I tracked my sleep for one night now the app crashes on opening.

I have to use this app for Virgin Pulse employee health points.  It is just ok.  It is not very accurate as it will log times I am asleep as awake.  I think it picks up my dogs movement.  Recently started crashing every time I try to open it so now I can’t use it to gain employee health points.  If it were not for my employer points, I would not sue this app.  There are so many other ones that I can sync with my Apple Watch and would be more accurate.

評論.標題: Not accurate. Just an expensive alarm clock.
評論.內容: Tried app for a week and saw inconsistencies. For example: Yesterday the app indicated that I was awake from 1 am till 1:30 am. I am a heavy sleeper and was so tired from work yesterday that there was no way I was awake that time. And data gathered by this app can’t be detected by Virgin pulse. So I am deleting this app.

評論.標題: Only keeps 5 days of data, don’t get this app
評論.內容: When I click my summary, it only saves 5 days of data, and over writes the old data! I’m extremely disappointed in this app
After first successful tracking after log in, the app won’t open again.......tried multiple re-install and just wont work once logged in

評論.標題: Takes ad money from Trump and NRA
評論.內容: Such a shame. I love the app, but they literally take money from far right propagandist. Lots of surveys that ask intentionally confusing questions that defend nonsense. I might just keep the app to throw their racist and propagandist surveys off.
Allows ads by fascists. These people are taking money from fascists for their app. Truly disgusting

評論.標題: Alarm sound removed from free version.
評論.內容: I have been using the same song to efficiently wake up and it was removed and forced under a premium subscription. I will NEVER under any circumstance buy “subscription only” apps on my phone. I would have payed $50 just to have the alarm that has helped me wake up but I guess I am going to have to find another app. One time payments are fair, subscriptions are predatory if you aren’t going to use the service to its full potential.

評論.標題: Very good sleep app (Apple Watch support needed)
評論.內容: Thank you for such a fascinating sleeping app with the great methodology of tracking sleep quality! There is one more amazing improvement can be done: please creat an app for Apple Watch to be able to place the charging phone at night far away from the head because any charging phone creates strong electro-magnetic field. And it’s better to avoid being in the center of the electro-magnetic field while sleeping. Avoidance of the field will bring an ultimate sleeping quality and will place azumio above serious competitors of Sleeping Analysis Systems.

評論.標題: Makes sounds while in silent mode
評論.內容:
While I love this app and have multiple years of data with it, the free version started to add random sounds about 6 months ago. To be clear, there are sounds WHILE MY PHONE IS ON SILENT. This is so obnoxious that I’m considering deleting it despite the lost data. Definitely not the right way to convince me to upgrade. 

Tldr; don’t get this app if you don’t want to wake up your partner or scare yourself half to death with random shouting noises in the morning.

評論.標題: Not nearly as convenient as other similar apps
評論.內容: I starting using this app because it is compatible with Virgin Pulse (and my employer’s Heath incentives program).  But I have only been able to successfully log a single night of sleep. The app crashes constantly, even after uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times.  And the ads are incredibly annoying. Would definitely recommend Sleep Cycle or others over this.
It helped me to get back to normal schedule, which i struggled to do for half a year now

I use this app to track sleep for an employer program. I gain points which convert to money in my pocket. This is the only app the program recognizes because I use an Apple Watch for my activity tracker. This app fails me 50% of the time. I’ve missed out on thousands of points! Some mornings there’s no data like it hasn’t been set the night before. Just blank for the night. It’s so FRUSTRATING! I will continue to use it as I have no other options. I have complained to the support people and they don’t seem to be concerned. 👎🏼

應用名稱: 跑步記錄器 - GPS跑步健身教練
應用描述:
《跑步記錄器》是個強大的活動記錄工具，能夠記錄您的健身活動所跑的距離、速度、時長、及燃燒的卡路里量。我們的跑步距離記錄工具能夠利用GPS地圖精確記錄您的跑步路線。您可即時查看您的活動細節。

此跑步訓練應用程式專為減重而設計。其中結合了一般跑步、慢跑與衝刺，幫助您有效燃脂並減重。這個好用工具適合新手使用，也能符合不同程度與目標的健身愛好人士需求。

適合不同目標&程度的訓練方案：

* 間歇式步行計畫
專為甚少運動、能夠負荷低強度運動的人設計的減重計畫。還能增進健康、幫助健身！
* 跑步新手
專為較無經驗的新手跑者設計的跑步訓練計畫，幫助您養成健康&經科學證實有效的跑步好習慣。
* 5公里方案
新手跑者也適用的跑步方案，幫助您從無到有，慢慢達到跑五公里的目標，加強跑步訓練，讓您燃燒更多脂肪與熱量。
* 10公里方案
較有挑戰性的跑步方案，為有經驗的跑者設計。您可照著這個跑步計畫達成跑超過十公里的目標，成為更強大的跑者！

享受跑步過程
您是個較無經驗的新手跑者嗎？還是您覺得跑步很無聊呢？或者無法養成跑步習慣？不用擔心，試試這個跑步應用程式中的間歇跑步計畫，發現跑步的樂趣，以絕不無聊的方式開心減重！

詳細的跑步健身記錄
- 以地圖記錄您的跑步路線
- 自動追蹤記錄您的健身進度
- 即時記錄熱量、距離、時間與速度
- 計算總跑步距離與平均速度
- 以表格記錄您的體重變化趨勢
- 量身訂做的健身提醒
- 可手動編輯的跑步機運動數據
- 同步數據到Apple Health

強大的音樂播放功能
- 支援各式各樣的音樂應用程式
- 從您自己的播放列表中播放您最喜歡的歌曲
- 允許在運動過程中切換歌曲
- 搭配音樂運動，能加強您的動力 35%！

隨時充滿動力
- 語音教練加強您的訓練成效，引導您進行每個健身運動
- 只要利用 GPS 記錄運動過程，即可獲得語音回饋，告知您所跑的距離、速度、燃燒的熱量等
- 用社群網站帳號分享您的成就與跑步路線
- 提供各種燃脂、減重、均衡飲食的小撇步

請注意：
● 背景持續使用 GPS 記錄功能，可能會消耗大量電量。
● 開始進行任何健身計畫之前，請先諮詢醫師。

會員說明
- 無限制地訪問所有功能，訂閱價格，每月6.99美元，每年29.9美元
- 訂閱費用將從您的iTunes賬戶收取。
- 訂閱到期前的24小時內將自動續訂。如有需要，請於訂閱到期的至少24小時之前取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，您可以在iTunes的“賬戶設置”中管理您訂閱的項目，也可在此菜單中取消訂閱。
- 訂閱後，免費試用期內的未使用部分將被作廢。

隱私政策：https://abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html?pkg=com.leapfitness.runningplan
使用條款：http://pay.period-calendar.com/app/running.html

It's simple and effective without complicating something that is already a chore for most of us. It's designed to help you succeed with minimal effort but with consistency. I enjoy the fitness micro videos very much and I'm highly motivated because of it. Thank you for being here!

應用描述:
Seconds被廣泛認為是行動裝置HIIT和Tabata訓練的最佳間隔計時器。除了受到Apple推薦，亦有名人和私人教練向全球客戶推薦。 
 

間隔定時器功能： 

• 大型全屏彩色編碼顯示螢幕，易於遠距離閱讀。顯示螢幕可以橫向或縱向顯示。 

• HIIT、Tabata和循環訓練範本。自訂範本用於建立每個間隔。複合編輯器可將多個間隔計時器合併為一個。 

• 說出您的間隔名稱，以便在不看螢幕時進行鍛煉。Seconds甚至可以提前警示即將到來的間隔。其他警示包括嗶嗶聲和鈴聲。 

• 使用Tabata鍛煉協調您的音樂。每個間隔都可以分配自己的音樂，讓您將音樂的強度與HIIT鍛煉的強度相匹配。 

• Seconds在背景中執行，您可以關閉顯示器，或在HIIT計時器處於活動狀態時使用其他應用程式。 

• 匯出與匯入。與朋友分享Tabata計時器或從網上下載並安裝於Seconds中。 


附加功能： 

• 以橫向和縱向工作的秒錶，強調顯示最佳和最差單圈時間並與Apple Watch同步。 

• 具有5個預設持續時間的快速存取倒數計時器（Apple Watch上僅前3個）。升級的使用者可以設定自己的預設持續時間。倒計時與Apple Watch同步。


APPLE HEALTH： 

• Seconds可以使用Apple Health來：保存鍛煉或正念的會話，讀取身體測量值和出生年份以結合心率監測器計算卡路里消耗。

I started using this to plan and lead workouts 5-6 years ago. I am so glad I got the paid version. I can save workouts, copy and paste parts of them to create new ones, change the time, rest, sets, and more. I have dozens of workouts now and they are so easy to pull up and/or modify on the fly.

So essential to my workout schedule. Also Great for teaching yoga and personal trainers. this app lets me customize each workout for specific clients without having to ruffle through a bunch of papers and books. 評論.內容: I have been using seconds for 8 years.   This allows me to create a variety of different workouts and offers all the features that I was looking for.

Extremely well thought out customization options that go far beyond the minimum. My favorites are the fantastic full-screen display, and the ability to set the volume of the timer’s beeps separately from the media volume. 

Well worth the price.

評論.標題: The best interval app out there!
評論.內容: This app is awesome! It has been a game changer for me with my workouts! I like to do interval workouts so this app is perfect for that. works great, but this company is so greedy. you can only use the timer you create once, and then you have to pay. what am i paying for?

Love the app, great functionality. Use it for stretches, core workouts, and runs.
I use the app for HIIT on my rebounder and appreciate all the ways I can customize my workouts. No issues! Worth it!

A friend introduced me to this app when I started teaching fitness classes, and I love it. There was a learning curve at first (like anything new) but after 9 months of using it, it’s my favorite tool for programming group fitness classes! Keeps me on track for the entire time I instruct.

應用名稱: 寶寶樹小時光-這裏有妳最珍貴的記憶
開發者: 宝宝树(北京)信息技术有限公司
應用描述:
寶寶樹小時光-我們和妳壹起幫寶寶留下壹份回憶。
寶寶樹是壹家成立了17年，服務過數億母嬰用戶的上市企業。寶寶樹小時光為寶寶樹傾力打造的壹款以記錄孕期、寶寶生活為主的APP。
不但可以免費原圖上傳，且不限量的安全存儲。還能夠以家庭為單位的多人記錄，二孩或多孩寶寶也可以在同壹小家得到展示。
既解決了多人記錄同壹小家保存的問題，還讓家庭成員無論何時何地都能第壹時間查看寶寶照片和視頻。
多種隱私設置，多樣的上傳方式， 給了妳更多的自由選擇權；妳既可以在這裏和其他寶媽交流，也可以安靜地回憶寶寶和孕期的每壹個瞬間。

--實用功能盤點--

【記錄成長】寶寶視頻、寶寶照片壹鍵上傳，自動生成時光軸！

【家庭共享】私密家庭空間，寶媽寶爸、爺爺奶奶、外公外婆，全家記錄，毫無壓力，權限自由設定。

【安全存儲】銀行級備份機制，永久保存；支持原圖上傳，不減清晰度。

【早教育兒】從胎教音樂到寶寶兒歌，從每日知識到營養輔食，各種育兒資源應有盡有。

【社區發現】全世界好玩有趣的內容每日更新，在線分享輔食教程、育兒經驗、護膚美容、親子遊好去處......總有壹點讓妳找到歸屬感。

應用描述:
WomanLog是女性的月經和生育日曆。

WomanLog 經期日曆和追蹤程式是您追蹤月經週期的最佳選擇。

值得信賴. 實用貼心. 操作簡便.

WomanLog 應用程式擁有諸多精選功能，方便您追蹤經期。

主要特點：

* 經期追蹤，無論經期是否規律均適用。

* 預測經期、受孕期和排卵期。標準和高級模式（基於先前收集的經期數據，並根據前幾個月中月經週期長度的波動情況而異）。

* 預置 100 多種症狀，還可選擇體重、基礎體溫、心情、藥物使用情況、性生活、宮頸黏、圖表等更多功能。

* 各類日常提醒：月經、排卵、體重、基礎體溫、綜合維生素片、乳房自檢、避孕藥、避孕環、避孕帖、甲羥孕酮避孕針、宮內節育器。

* 將數據分享給您的伴侶，並在不同裝置間同步數據。

* Apple Health App support: Allows to read/write Weight and Basal Body Temperature data, Menstruation, Sexual Activity, Spotting, etc.

* Apple Watch support

更多選項:
密碼保護
妊娠方式
跟蹤多個日曆

WomanLog Pro:
宮頸粘液監測
週期概況 (以電子郵件發送 PDF 檔)
注 + 事件發生時間 + 提醒
月相
排卵檢驗
懷孕檢驗
血壓/脈搏
皮膚 (30)
沒有廣告

訂閱資訊

智慧助手的其他功能：

* 更詳盡地預測月經來潮日期。有關月經來潮時間的變動可能性。
* 受孕期的受孕幾率將以百分比的形式顯示。這有助於您更有效地備孕或避孕。

• 確認購買後，我們將向您的 iTunes 帳戶收取相應費用。
• 訂閱將自動續訂，除非您在當前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂功能。
• 我們將在當前訂閱期結束前 24 小時內向您的帳戶收取續訂費用，續訂價格與您的初始購買價格相同。
• 購買後，您可在帳戶設定中關閉自動續訂功能。
• 使用者訂閱該項目後，免費試用期的未使用時長（如有）將全數作廢

使用條款: https://www.womanlog.com/terms_of_use
隱私權政策: https://www.womanlog.com/privacy_policy

聯絡方式： womanlog@womanlog.com

This app is pretty accurate from month to month.

評論.標題: Be Careful: Inaccurate and Shady Use of Personal Data
評論.內容: I’ve been using this app for years. It’s usually 2 to 3 days off of when my actual period begins but I always continue to use it because I like to know about when my period is going to begin. However, I just tried to log into my account to back up my data, and for some reason the device, the app will not recognize either one of the only two email addresses I’ve ever had in my entire life. so although I can’t log into my own account, this app continues to collect my own personal data that they can do whatever they want to with apparently. I reached out to their customer service who was very unhelpful and just kept telling me to click forget password when I explain to them again that that will not work, because neither one of my email addresses is being recognized by their app. They got snippy with me and just told me the same thing again. I will not be using this app any longer, but I guess it doesn’t really matter because they’re still gonna be able to collect all my personal data. The only thing I know to do is to try to delete as much information as possible out of out of the account, so just be wary of using this app and know that, even though they say they are not going to sell it to third parties that doesn’t mean they won’t. I am a researcher in data privacy and I know that company say this all the time and it’s not true.

評論.標題: Deserves to be the #1 period tracking app
評論.內容: I’ve used this app to track my menstrual cycle for the past 10 years. Not kidding. I have been tracking since 2012. It’s so easy to access all the past data. I can easily see the times I’ve been on birth control with the emojis they have. The calendar is simple and easy to understand. You can track so many things, like mood, weight, pregnancy, medicines and other stuff, but I use it for tracking my period, birth control, and sex. It’s cool that you get a summary of your statistics, can get a download of the data or even send it via email. Very useful during visits during the gynecologist. I also like that it send push alerts to remind me when my period may come. I also feel very confident using it since I know my data is safe.

I’ve used this app for many many many years probably (5 -6) to track my monthly cycle and my fertility forecast.  Dates and symptoms are regularly pretty accurate. Overall a great affordable app for those that struggled with keeping up with your cycle.

I have been using this app for several years. I, like many other women, began using it after I chose to finish having children. It is very helpful for me to keep track of my cycle and any symptoms I have each month so that I can reference when I see my doctor each year.  I encouraged my daughter to use this when she began her cycle.  Thank you for keeping the basic version free.
Accurate

Been using this app for a few years and it’s always been helpful to track my symptoms of PMS and let me know when my cycle will start. More recently, I’ve started a new medication & this app has allowed me to track every single side effect on my body to let my doctors know how I’m responding to the medication. Very helpful!
I really like this app so far really recommend it !

I have used this app for more years than I can recall… it has been incredibly helpful in tracking my cycles and even knowing when my children were conceived.

It is incredibly annoying and makes me want to go find another app. Please fix this problem so that I can continue using the app I have loved for so long.

智能訓練計劃
•根據您的個人參數和目標
•專注於您身體的脆弱部位

與Apple Health同步，因此您可以將我們的應用程式中的運動數據匯出到HealthKit，並將HealthKit中的健身數據、’體重和身體測量值匯入我們的應用程式。


關於使用APP和關於使用APP的資料
訂購使用條款和訂購詳情

應用描述:
Relax是什麼？

Relax是一款能夠預測未來寶寶長相，幫助你和你的寶寶深度睡眠、減少焦慮、盡快放鬆的App。通過使用App，您和您的寶寶可以獲得在深度睡眠，擺脫失眠，舒緩放鬆，進行呼吸練習和睡眠指導等方面的最佳幫助。

未來寶寶預測：
你是否對自己未來的寶寶長相充滿了好奇？無論是待孕的準媽媽準爸爸，或是未婚一族，現在只需上傳您與伴侶的照片，即可根據父母照片自動合成寶寶照片，幫助你預測未來寶寶的長相。

一鍵變年輕：

您是否懷念美好的童年時光？是否想念你還是孩童的樣子？ Relax時空穿梭機帶你重返青春，上傳你的照片一鍵就能變年輕。

變老時光機：

你想滿足未來的自己嗎？我們都期待著未來的發展，並希望我們能更好的遇見自己，Relax變老時光機帶你一鍵預測未來自己的長相。

放鬆助眠音樂：

父母都渴望讓寶寶整夜安睡，並按計劃進行規律的小睡，但讓寶寶入睡並保持睡眠狀態並非易事。 Relax可以幫助您的寶寶平靜並減輕壓力，在短時間內快速入睡。

在幫助您的寶寶入睡方面，沒有什麼能比得上令人放鬆的聲音了。

Relax能為您做什麼？
Relax將提供各種冥想主題和輕鬆的音樂主題，幫助您每天放鬆生活。無論您是冥想的初學者還是高級學者，都會有新的體驗等著您。

主題包括：

√寶寶快速入眠
√寶寶放鬆音樂
√寶寶深度睡眠
√擺脫焦慮
√緩解壓力
√情緒管理
√治療抑鬱
√提高自信
√治療失眠
√深度放鬆
√白噪音
√還有更多......

聯繫方式：feedbackrelaxteam@gmail.com

------------------------------

這是一個自動續訂訂閱，購買後您可以在帳戶設置中管理和關閉它。訂閱後，您可以無限制地訪問Relax的所有內容，包括冥想和音樂，並可以進行離線收聽。我們每兩週都將對冥想和音樂的內容進行更新。錢款將在確認購買時從iTunes帳戶中扣除，如果您想取消訂閱，必須在當前訂閱到期之前至少24小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱會自動續訂。帳戶將會在當前訂閱結束前24小時內確定並收取續訂費用。當用戶購買該產品的訂閱時，免費試用期的任何未使用部分將被沒收。

大魯閣實業(股)公司，全新推出大魯閣PLUS，整合旗下7個業態，並將支付感應設備更新，只要下載大魯閣PLUS，一次下載，立即成為大魯閣7個事業體APP會員！
免帶卡，會員條碼隨身攜帶，隨時可以掌握各事業體最新動態。
票券、代幣線上化，現場人流及時觀看，預約系統事先搶位，線上購票(物)免排隊，讓客戶盡情玩遍各種活動，打造消費者在食衣住行育樂的新選擇，並傳達大魯閣想帶給全客層美好體驗的服務理念。

注意事項:

1. 設定所屬電信商的「拒絕業務廣告簡訊功能」。該功能可能導致無法正常接收開通碼簡訊，請聯繫所屬電信商關閉設定。
2. 使用來電攔截APP(如Whoscall)設置廣告號碼攔截或設定黑名單，由於開通碼簡訊為系統發送訊息，可能判斷為廣告，請解除攔截或封鎖，避免簡訊接收失敗。
3. 手機容量是否已達上限。因各手機型號容量不同，若近期未收到任何簡訊，可能已達容量上限，請刪除部分資料後再重新操作。

若有APP操作使用問題，敬請您致電聯繫，大魯閣服務專線 (04)3608-1188
服務時間:星期一~星期五AM9:00~PM18:00，我們將為您協助排除。再次感謝您的支持與體諒。

● 場館資訊：提供場館清單與各場館位置
● 即時人流：查看各場館健身房及游泳池即時人數
● 場地搜尋：可以依據運動場地類別搜尋，可於中心內搜尋，也可跨中心搜尋
● 課程搜尋：可以依據課程類別搜尋，可於中心內搜尋，也可跨中心搜尋
● 場地資訊：提供場地說明與收費標準
● 場地預約：確認運動場地類別後，開始預約，可以選擇時段、日期，顯示可預約場地清單，點選預約該場地
● 運動行事曆：以行事曆方式顯示個人已預約場地/課程紀錄

● 個人檔案：編輯上傳個人照片及個人資訊
● 場地消費紀錄：顯示各項消費紀錄

應用描述:
腹肌鍛煉是一款移動健身應用程序，可幫助您在家或在健身房鍛煉腹肌，是您六塊腹肌的真正肌肉助推器！

您的完整健身星球可在家中進行數千次腹部鍛煉。

這個健身應用程序非常適合健美愛好者和初學者，事實上，在我們為您的日常健身而設的 fp 應用程序中，您會發現每個目標的許多例程：女性鍛煉、男性鍛煉、減肥鍛煉、減肥等等。

一個真正的健身星球，將幫助您實現目標，您一直在等待的私人教練作為肌肉助推器。

就像一個真正的 pf 教練，這個星球健身應用程序將為您提供具體的減肥訓練計劃，去除愛的把手並獲得完美的六塊腹肌。您將擁有一個真正的鍛煉計劃器和許多訓練腹部肌肉的例程，並且可以在每天 24 小時內隨時進行，並且您可以在家進行訓練。

在短短 30 天內改善您的身體，跟踪您的鍛煉，學習新的腹部鍛煉，通過著名的 P4P 鍛煉燃燒腹部脂肪。

您的 fp 教練將在您的鍛煉過程中為您提供準確的指導，就像健身房中真正的私人教練一樣，但您可以根據需要在家鍛煉，並且您可以選擇何時進行家庭鍛煉！

你所要做的就是投入你的意志力，剩下的我們來處理;-)

如果您仔細遵循私人教練的指示，而不會錯過鍛煉，並且顯然可以控制飲食，我們的承諾是在短短 30 天內完成六塊腹肌。

我們的腹肌訓練應用程序可以免費下載，部分功能完全免費，而其他功能如果您決定訂閱即可訪問，選擇權在您。

免費功能：

     • 由經過認證的私人教練創建的 10 多個例程。
     • 為您的家庭鍛煉進行體重訓練。
     • 顯示每個單獨練習的呼吸蠟。
     • 健身教練在鍛煉過程中用真實的聲音指導您。
     • 腹部鍛煉發生器，只需點擊 3 次。您可以選擇腹部的哪個區域
       訓練，強度水平和鍛煉的持續時間。
     • 將您喜歡的腹肌鍛煉添加到日曆中，並選擇您每週鍛煉多少次
       想要重複它，創建您理想的鍛煉計劃。

付費功能（需要訂閱）

     • 不同私人教練針對不同目標制定的鍛煉計劃。
     • 能夠使用您喜歡的 Ab 鍛煉來創建和保存個性化鍛煉。
     • Fiton 健身日曆，用於跟踪未來的鍛煉。
    • 解鎖所有腹肌鍛煉以訓練您腹部的所有區域：下腹肌、其他腹部
       和斜ab。
    • 在家增肌


建議：將我們的健身應用程序與 myfintesspal 應用程序結合使用來改善您的飲食，因為請記住，要擁有雕刻的腹部，您需要減脂並鍛煉腹部肌肉；-)

評論.標題: P4P: Adapts to your physical level
評論.內容: No matter your physical shape, this app, Passion4 Professionals allows the user to customize their work out according to their fitness level. It does not assume any physical level and allows users to set personal work exercise by beginning, intermediate, and advanced levels. In each of these levels, one can customize personally the set duration by the length of the workout, by the number of repetitions all with music provided, or from your own personal music list. By being able to advance through each of the levels, it’s a great deterrent to Workout Muscle Resistance, which is common in exercising at the same level for a long period of time. with its built-in calendar when can see your progress as you advance through each of the exercises. Definitely a five star workout phone app. it’s worth every penny!

評論.標題: Great family of apps but now WAY too expensive!
評論.內容: I’ve been using this and other P4P apps regularly for over a year. They are FANTASTIC, and I was delighted to pay $10-$15 for lifetime access to each of them. I was talking them up to all my friends and family, and just at the time I went to install a few of them on my wife’s iPhone (she’d seen me doing some of the workouts and wanted to start on them too) I found that the company had eliminated the lifetime purchase option for selected apps in favor of a monthly subscription to all the apps that costs over $150 a year, which we can’t afford (you can get gym memberships for less). Although I understand the power of a subscription sales model from a revenue perspective, I question the wisdom of P4P’s move in this direction (despite Apple’s encouragement to its developers to go this route) because from a consumer perspective - in my view -the value is not there, and I truly hope it doesn’t backfire on them. Also I’m saddened by the move because it will limit the number of people who can benefit from P4P’s outstanding work. I remain hopeful that P4P will reinstate some type of lifetime purchase option.

I’ve been doing this every day for the pass year, and I definitely see a difference! I couldn’t even do the beginner ads! Now I could do all of the intense without getting tried! I love this app, but the only thing is, I wish they added something to use for the Apple Watch. Yeah, this app is amazing even if they never put one for the watch, but it would be soooo much better if they did. But other than that, I still love this app!!!

•輕鬆養成運動習慣：每天只需2,000 步，讓運動變得簡單有趣。

服務條款與隱私政策：https://www.hahago.app/privacy
聯繫信箱：hahago.service@gimmatek.com

管理InBody的用戶端。

1. InBody 
透過InBody測量報告和分析可瞭解詳細的身體情況。
InBody Band讓您在家也可以輕鬆完成InBody測量。

2. 運動
記錄運動和運動所消耗熱量（一天消耗的卡路里）並進行管理。 InBodyBand可顯示步行圖表、各段時間的步行記錄等。

3. 報告 
顯示最近一個月内的消耗熱量和身體組成分析走勢圖（身體組成變化）。 

4. 排名 
根據最近一周的步行數和InBody分數排名。排名可顯示會員和手機通訊錄的排名情况。

5. 睡眠
連接與InBodyBand來更仔細地查看你的睡眠時間和睡眠的詳細分鐘。

6. 首頁
首頁面板顯示InBody、運動等各個項目的主要指標，清晰易操作。

*InBody App provides that Users can sync steps / body composition data to the Apple Health app.

App提供服務項目如下： 
1. 就醫指南 : 
   1-1. 醫院資訊 : 臺中榮民總醫院歷史沿革與發展近況介紹。 
   1-2. 交通指引: 提供院內地圖,交通路線,大眾交通工具與停車資訊,電子地圖路線規劃等完善來院交通資訊。 
   1-3. 醫師專長 : 依科別及醫師顯示各醫師專長資訊。

2. 處方資訊 : 可自行依藥名或藥碼、依病人服用中處方或直接掃描本院藥袋上的QRCode，查詢處方相關資訊及用藥指導。

3. 衛教資訊 : 
   3-1. 依科別及疾病別查詢相關衛教資訊。
   3-2. 提供影音衛教資訊。

4. 預約服務 : 
   4-1. 行動掛號: 提供民眾來院門診看診掛號服務,包含初診與複診掛號作業.掛號時,可即時查詢各科別門診班表與預約狀況,如預約是否額滿,門診停診與代診資訊等。
   4-2. 慢箋預約: 可直接預約慢箋領藥。 

5. 進度查詢:
   5-1. 看診進度查詢 : 提供門診看診進度，讓看診民眾可在來院途中與院區隨時掌握看診資訊(可依科別或個人)，讓看診的時程與行程安排更為方便與自由。
   5-2. 領藥進度: 提供門診各藥局領藥窗口進度資訊，讓民眾可在舒適的地點輕鬆的等候領藥。
   5-3. 檢查進度: 提供電腦斷層檢查進度查詢功能，讓檢查的時程與行程安排更為方便與自由。

6. 預約查詢:
   6-1. 查詢取消掛號: 提供門診預約掛號查詢與取消掛號功能。可查詢的門診掛號預約資訊包括:看診科別、醫師、時間、診間、位置、就診序號與預估報到時間等，更加入了給醫師的話功能，讓民眾在彈指間即可輕鬆記錄看診時要給醫師的訊息，此功能亦可修改預約通知的時間。 
   6-2. 慢箋查詢: 提供民眾查詢已預約的慢箋領藥資訊。

7. 行動繳費:
   7-1. 提供民眾依個人或掃描帳單上的條碼，輕輕鬆鬆完成醫療費用，省去排隊繳費的等待時間。
   7-2. 提供網路信用卡繳費機制，輕輕鬆鬆完成醫療費用，省去排隊繳費的等待時間。
   7-3. 繳費查詢: 在完成簡訊認證後即可查詢三個月內使用行動繳費的記錄。

8. 提供定位導引功能 : 提供室內定位導引功能，可依大樓別、樓層或診間號碼(名稱)導引您到想去的地方。

9. 提供個人健康管理功能，可顯示180天內本院門診身高/體重、血壓/心跳、疼痛分數，亦可由此頁面快速查詢掛號記錄、快速掛號(詳如2.說明)、看診進度查詢、處方查詢、領藥進度(可顯示當天處方箋情況)、檢驗報告查詢(可查詢本院提供的58項檢驗報告查詢)、個案管理(原健康管理提供之功能)

10. 提供合作院所查詢上轉或下轉查詢功能

應用名稱: GetFit 设计的 健身锻炼计划
應用描述:
啟動一個專屬於你的計畫，那裏有為你量身打造的健身體驗。由語音說明、計時器、和秒表所組成的影片將指引你並為你解說運動技巧，以確保你的動作正確。

在尋找一個經過證實的有效健身計畫嗎？參加四項大師課程計畫中的其中一項，這些都是由 GetFit 認證過的教練所設計並親自使用過的健身計畫：

- Fat Destroyer
- Power & Strength
- Post-Pregnancy
- Bikini-Ready

已經有自己的例行健身公式了嗎？這樣很棒！用高強度間歇性訓練 (HIIT) 增添變化與強度。覺得某塊肌肉特別不給力嗎？那就試試「分離式」肌肉訓練，從各種角度給予它刺激。想嘗試一些從沒想過的新方法嗎？探索「每日一招」 (WOD) 並忘記那些日復一日的單調運動吧！太忙沒時間？那「七分鐘訓練」就是你最好的選擇。

HealthKit 習慣於與 Apple Health and Activity 同步，所以你能從我們的 app 匯出鍛鍊資料到 HealthKit 並從 HealthKit 匯入健身資料、體重和身體測量數值到我們的 app。

該應用程式有下列幾種訂閱選項：
- 3個月沒有試用期
- 12個月，包含 7 天免費試用期

款項將在確認購買時，向 iTunes 帳戶收取。  
- 免費試用訂閱將自動續訂，除非在續訂前的24小時之前將其取消
- 訂閱會自動更新，除非在目前訂閱期結束的至少 24 小時前關閉自動更新 
- 免費試用期的任何未使用部分（如果提供），當用戶訂閱了該版本時將不予提供
- 用戶可以自己管理訂閱，可在購買後至使用者「帳戶設置」中關閉自動更新續訂功能
- 帳戶將在當期結束前 24-小時內被收取續約費用和確認續約成本

請注意，沒有啟用訂閱的話，您將無法使用應用程式功能。

服務條款：https://getfitapps.com/terms.html

I really enjoy this workout program. It’s set up as 24 session programs of circuit training. You can set your difficulty level and all workouts are doable anywhere. It also provides verbal instructions with each workout to help you adjust your form. I don’t like that you can’t mute the instructions. After you know what you’re doing, you should be able to just listen to music. However this isn’t the biggest deal. 

On the down side, for the cost of the program, they don’t do many updates or support. I’ve had an issue with days repeating for over a year. I reached out a year ago and was told this was a known issue and they are fixing it with the next update. I reached out again today and got the same response. It doesn’t seem like they take any issues or bugs seriously and it really is annoying to repeat workouts when it’s not it’s intended purpose. 

Other than this issue, there could be improvements made on the app itself. Workouts completed don’t sync if you skip a day and or if you move ahead a day. 

Email from support:
The issue you describe is already forwarded to our team and they are working hard to fix it in the upcoming update this week. It may take a bit of time for us to fix this, and we'd really appreciate it if you could give us this time. Stay tuned and don't miss it!
