- 通过高质量指导视频演示每一步训练过程；
- 提供正确的训练技巧

作为 BetterMen 用户，您可以根据锻炼、饮食及成本来选择最适合您的订阅版本。

我们的6个月高级订阅计划可无限制地访问每个可想象的锻炼程序的每个级别，以换取一次付款。 此外，用户还可以订阅1周。BetterMen 将在订阅期结束前的 24 小时内将自动续订。您可以在 iTunes 账户设置中随时取消订阅，但条款中任何未使用的部分均不会产生退款。付款将在确认购买后记入 iTunes 帐户。免费试用期的任何未使用部分，如提供，将在购买订阅服务（如适用）时被回收。

BetterMen 已与 Health kit 集成，您可以前往“健康”应用程序查看您的活动数据。
我们欢迎一切建设性的批评意见。BetterMen 的所有健身专家、减重专家、膳食专家及开发人员致力于提升 BetterMen 用户体验，为满足更多客户的需求而不断努力。

点击此处了解更多有关我们的条款与条件的信息 - https://betterme.world/terms

評論.內容: This app says it has an at home option but the exercises provided have to be completed at a gym as very few people would have the equipment at home. It’s misleading, the interface doesn’t provide much user choice after initial setup. Not a good app.

Very disappointed in this app. Ads on FB showed chair workouts and after going through the 20 questions  and specifically saying home workouts I got a plan that included gym equipment and not a single chair exercise. Wasted my money.

For context, I’m stationed overseas in Bahrain.  So the WiFi isn’t the greatest or as ubiquitous as it is stateside.  Which presents a problem because you can’t use the app without an internet connection.  My workout is effectively tethered to the internet.  Why am I paying for an app that I can’t use unless I’m connected to the internet?  Why can’t it save my data and push it to the servers when I reconnect?  

I selected workouts to do at home thinking at most I would need a way to do pull-ups.  Nope, first exercise requires dumbbells.  Seriously at home workouts for $30 requiring gym equipment.
Was good for a week and then quit working. Had to go through all the questions again and get the app working correctly. And then it crashed again and quit working. What a waste of my time.

The exercises are demonstrated well. The app is a little glitchy. Scrolling is not smooth. Some exercises say to do X number of reps (e.g., planks) instead of saying hold for X number of seconds. Other exercises are in sets of 3, like lunges, but the demonstration shows only one side at a time, so it’s unclear if the user should alternate legs.

評論.標題: Dope app to take out the guessing
評論.內容: Easy to follow. Don’t always have time to gather, draw up and figure out routines for each body part and shuffle them so I don’t plateau and this app takes that guessing out of it. Switches up so if your doing legs on mondays, chest on tuesdays, back on wednesdays, you can cycle thru this program different days for an amazing 12 week program and pump. Adjusting ur weights and keeping track of ur own progress should be easily included in the app, a space to jot down numbers that’s all that’s missing. But I love the programs. Don’t cheat urself. Increase those weights weekly. Do about six programs each week (chest, legs, arms, back, core, shoulders) for 12 weeks, then you can do some of the others like at home, calisthenics, muscle building, fat burning, for additional weeks. It really gives you ah Years program you can cycle thru. Make the necessary changes to the weights and exercises pending on what you have at home, to change your body and life. 🫡✊🏿🔥
You only get a few workouts with yearly subscription when you try to open other ones you have to pay extra for add ons
Seems well designed but be cautious I opened it to a special offer. It said $39 a year I clicked yes. Instantly my Apple account was charged $49. That is unfair.

評論.標題: The plan I was shown was $$$
評論.內容: Paying isn’t the first step, they want you to waste your time first. After you do all that you need to pay to see more. You don’t even know what you are getting, most likely the same plan they already show to thousands of people. So I’m planning on paying them no more attention.
I cannot go to gym and work out so i purchased this app  for home work out but not really as they are advertising. really disappointing.
Complete rip off. I wanted the at home work out but got the gym one
I told the app that I want in home exercises, I paid for a year and now all it shows is machine workouts. Ripoff.

Sign up and pay for your plan, only to find out there are other things you are required to pay for in addition. I don’t like being ripped off and lied to, and wouldn’t get fitness instruction for my dog from unscrupulous scam artists. Reporting them to the App Store.

評論.標題: Pague y no puedo obtener los ejercicios me pide pagar de nuevo
評論.內容: Pagué durante 3 meses 40 dólares y ahora no tengo forma de iniciar sesión. Me obliga a responder preguntas y pagar nuevamente. ¡Esto tiene que ser una ESTAFA!

I got this because I like the idea of chair workouts, or being able to work out from home, without a bunch of equipment. No matter how I set the app, it creates workouts with gym weights. No starter for me, wish I hadn’t paid for the app to find out it’s not what’s advertised.

It works as expected at times but the menu page blows up and prevents me from continuing during a session. This really threw my experience off and during those adrenaline fueled sessions it’s not the best time to throw you off. Work outs are effective but wished they had options to filter equipments used. Even the home gym course requires a bit of equipment usually found at the gym or park.
I signed up and checked the workouts from home option. First exercise routine had me using exercise equipment. So much for that.
Le puse ejercicios en casa y cuando abro la app me salieron ejercicios con máquinas.
I am new to the app as of today! Kinda disappointed this app don’t tell u what days to do certain workouts. Cause I’m confused on what days I should do what. Really could use the guidance.

I thought I would give this a try for
something different to do at home. Bought the 3 month package. When I went to check it out and review all the workouts it was all gym based. I selected the home workout because I don’t go to a gym and I wasn’t interested in that. I guess I’m out some money. Fooled me once.

評論.標題: Paid 3 months now cant use it!
評論.內容: Paid for 3 months and now have no way to login.  Forces me to answer questions and pay again.  This has to be a SCAM! Please be careful!

評論.標題: No way of tracking weight or skipping
評論.內容:
This app is not worth the value. There was no free trail to test out the app. If that was the case I would have not purchased. 

There is no place for tracking the weight you are using and no way of skipping a piece of the workout if you are unable to get on that machine.

評論.標題: App was glitchy, contact form doesn’t even work
評論.內容: I was trying to contact you to request a refund as I was hoping the programs would have more options for at home workouts as opposed to need gym equipment. I could even submit the contact form. And your developers website returned an error so I’m forced to write this review. Please contact

Don’t buy this app. This is a scam. The app charges you a subscription then adds on additional fees for meal plans and other upgrades. You can’t use the app unless you purchase upgrades within the app on top of your subscription fee. The workouts are basic workouts you can find on the internet for free.

I spent $119 for a lifetime membership and wanted to switch my workouts from gym to a home plan, and was expected to buy the app again after only owning it for ten minutes.  Not sure I am impressed with what I saw and not intuitive.  Go elsewhere.

I purchased the 3 month plan last night thru Apple Pay. I have the receipt and I can see it in my subscriptions. I was able to open and see workout plan provided to me. I went to open app just now and it’s like it’s a new customer asking to get started and go thru the whole questioning process of what I’m looking for with no options to sign in or anything. Please help

I told my partner I paid for a workout app for one year and that it was a set price - 

But every time I open it up there pops up more options to pay for more assistance- My partner is convinced I am spending too much money on this app because I was under the impression it was a yearly fee for all services- 

Do not suggest buying this app - you have to pay for more than what’s advertised

App not as advertised. It’s very rudimentary like an app from 8 years ago. The text doesn’t even fit on the screen. The interface is terrible and the exercise programs are even worse. There is no calendar program like what is shown in advertisements. The workouts have no real rhyme or reason. I’m requesting a refund. This is a total scam.

I signed up for this, thinking it would allow me to work out at home and not the gym. I don’t have a complete gym at home, and I advise anybody considering using this application to ensure you have proper home equipment. Putting the app into home mode assumes you have a complete set of weights at home, like a bench press, dumbbells, a workout bench, etc..

This is a very basic app as far as a work out regime. Going from easy to medium to hard only consist of changing the amount of reps, not an actual exercise. You also have to keep the app open in order for the time to adjust.

評論.標題: It does offer 100% phone workout but isn’t intuitive how to set that up to start
評論.內容: Thank you

The app developers use lots of language that reinforces negative body image. Turn off notifications if you buy this app. I don't have access to a gym but on the very first workout they wanted me to have weights. There is no way to turn off equipment in the settings. Regardless the exercises are easy to follow. Food planning is not included in the basic app but there is a giant button for it on the homepage. This company has really aggressive ads and lots of them but really it's like the Temu of fitness apps all looks and once they have your money they don't care. Not worth the cost. Especially since the homepage has graphics that look like erotic cartoons. Not a serious company. Try another company.
They will steal your money I paid $25 for something that I thought would be different than any other app...it doesn't program any workout for you you have to pick what you want to do makes no sense

I was looking for a structured home workout app and came across this one.  It appeared to have everything I wanted.  The problem is that it is NOT structured.  I specified that I was doing the exercises at home, and it keeps wanting me to use machines that you would only have at a gym.  When I reached out to support, they just said to “scroll” past those and find ones that would work.  So how is this structured?  You set up goals in the very beginning with weight loss, but you get to pick and choose what you do?  Not sure how this is supposed to work.  And don’t even think they will stand behind it and give your money back.  That is not going to happen.

I wanted to like this app and support it, so I signed up for $30. I used the app for 1 week before the app had an update that signed me out. When I updated, my purchase was not being recognized so I couldn’t use it. To add insult to injury, they started sending me “special offers” for a lifetime sub for $40. So you mean to tell me you ripped me off the first time, but now you’re trying to get me to do it again? I want a refund immediately.

There is no custom 28 day workout plan, as advertised. You get access to different workout programs based on the body part you want to work. Some of them have twelve workouts, some have over 60. But there is no calendar that says “do this workout on day one, day two etc.” So I don’t see any custom 28 day plan built just for me. Of course, you don’t find out any of that out until after you subscribe. Oh, the nutrition plan also costs extra. If you go through this process on the website instead of the app, the price is different, FYI. Buyer beware. For what you pay for, you can find all these workouts on the internet for free.

評論.標題: Not good - surprisingly bad in some areas
評論.內容:
At this point in work out app evolution certain things should just be done well, this app is not one of them.

The quiz they have you take is utterly useless and only serves to clutter your “Home Screen” and perhaps feed them marketing insights.

Exercises that are worked on two sides only account for one side - side planks, lunges etc. this next one is somewhat critical, there is no option to swap out exercises that you cannot do from injury or ability. There is no adaptation to how well you completed one to the next. Oh finished you 10 push ups on a Monday? Tuesday let’s do one handed clap push ups 🙄.

I did not get a trial. It took about 5 sessions before I saw just how poorly executed this app is and I do not understand how anyone gives this app over 2 stars. Even the artwork is borderline cringy.

I requested a refund. The best I can do now is warn others to find a different app/program for fitness.

評論.標題: Don’t have gym equipment at my home!!!
評論.內容: I keep deleting the app and restoring it for home workouts but the app has me doing workouts with gym equipment I do not have at my house.

I paid and content didn’t unlock. The contact form is not working. Please issue a refund

PS: great customer service. Helped to resolve h to the issue

評論.標題: Please , make you app so that it is TV CAST compliant
評論.內容:
I can then subscribe to your app. Notify me then as it will be easier to us like playing a CD with excercises on the TV and following up.
 Your excercises are highly rated so I am not going to rate your app alone. When you make the app Tv CASTABLE you’ experience a new customer attracted to your app.
Very juvenile design. App doesn’t work half the time and the workouts are ridiculous. I want a refund!

There are a bunch of works outs given. However, there isn’t a plan or anything that say start with this then do this. For example, calisthenics and weight loss groups, do both in same day? Which order? What about the 7 min workout group? It’s clear as mud. Asked a question on Facebook messenger, no response.

Be careful with application as interface is not developed, exercise program disappears next day of usage. Some buttons are shifted and you cannot press them, or when you press them they take you to a different exercise program. It’s just that someone “made” an application to withdraw money for a low-quality product!

I join the lifetime membership option, last week to do the 28 home workout.  The app is giving me exercises as if I’m in a gym and not at home. Every time I try to adjust the workout it defaults to a gym workout with weights and gym equipment which I do not have. Please refund my membership!

評論.標題: Other apps are cheaper and accomplish higher quality workout
評論.內容:
Had a couple of issues with the app displaying graphics on iOS. The graphics zoom in when scrolling left and right between the work out choices making it annoying from a user interface standpoint.

The “info” button during the workout session sometimes does not match what the workout is about.

The user should know about switching left to right sides because the workouts are biased right sided.

Wish there was a small trial or try out period before committing the user to buy.

Other apps such as Fitness Plus is cheaper year round and offers a far better quality workout for iOS users.
There is a glitch in my app, any workout I open the same workout opens up, I tried re installing and it’s the same scenario, please refund or fix my issue or give me a solution to fix this bug

評論.標題: Proceed with caution or Don’t start the trial. There is no cancellation button anywhere in my app.
評論.內容: Proceed with caution or Don’t start the trial. There is no cancellation button anywhere in my app.

I am thinking this app is a scam. They charged my card twice for two different amounts on the same day and time. 

I immediately cancelled the subscription and contacted my credit card company to cancel the charge.

評論.標題: App hasn’t let me use it in 3 months
評論.內容: If this App would let me use it for the full term I bought it for it would be a great app.  It has done this to me twice.  It shows that It expires March 27th.  I haven’t been able to use it since January of this year.  Boooooooooooo 👻
I like the app but I selected “ home” workouts but in the app it’s only showing me “gym” workouts.  Not really happy about that since I do not attend a gym.

應用描述:
Apple Fitness and Apple Fitness+
Get a comprehensive view of your fitness including Activity details and history, training load, Trends, Awards, and Sharing with family and friends. Subscribe to Apple Fitness+ for thousands of workouts and meditations that help you stay active and mindful, with fresh content dropping every week. 

APPLE FITNESS

SUMMARY TAB
• Personalize the Summary tab in the Fitness app on iPhone to see what is most important to you including your Activity Details, Workout, Mindfulness, and Dive sessions, Trends, Awards and more.
• Set goals and check your progress throughout the day.
• See details of your estimated active calories toward your move goal with the Move ring.
• Customize your rings by the day of the week or pause them for a rest day, week, month, or more.
• View your historical workouts from any third-party fitness app. 

With Apple Watch
• See your total exercise minutes toward your Exercise ring, and your stand hours toward your Stand ring.
• See important metrics from each workout, like average pace, distance, calories burned, and more.
• Review your training load, which uses the intensity and duration of your workouts to help you understand the impact of your training over time.

SHARING TAB
• See how your friends stack up with highlights of their activity or start a friendly competition.

ACTIVITY APP ON APPLE WATCH
• You can also view progress toward closing your Activity Rings, see all-day Activity metrics like total steps and distance, plus past workouts, meditations, and dives, and view your training load in the Activity app on Apple Watch.

APPLE FITNESS+
Apple Fitness+ is the world’s most welcoming fitness and wellness service and is available in the Fitness app on iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV. 

12 WORKOUT TYPES, PLUS MEDITATION
Expert trainers keep your routine fresh with 12 workout types, from 5 to 45 minutes:
• Strength
• HIIT
• Yoga
• Core
• Pilates
• Dance
• Kickboxing
• Cycling
• Treadmill (Walk or Run)
• Rowing
• Mindful Cooldown

GUIDED MEDITATION
• Renew and grow with themes like Sleep, Calm, and Gratitude. 
• Also listen from the Mindfulness app on Apple Watch.

FOR YOU
• The For You space is your personalized fitness and meditation studio, with recommendations that reflect your favorite activities, trainers, time, and music.

CUSTOM PLANS & STACKS
• Stay consistent with Custom Plans. Select activities and days of the week and Fitness+ will create a plan for you.
• With Stacks, select combinations of workouts and meditations.

PROGRAMS & COLLECTIONS
• Programs help you prepare for a new adventure, from staying active during pregnancy to getting ready for snow season. 
• Go for a goal with Collections like 30-Day Core Challenge or Run Your First 5K.

ONSCREEN METRICS
• See interval timers and coaching right on-screen. 
• With Apple Watch, see personal metrics like heart rate and calories burned.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
• Enjoy audio workouts with Time to Walk and Time to Run.
• Artist Spotlight features workouts with playlists from iconic music artists.

SHARE ACCESS
• A single subscription includes 6 family members.

*Apple Fitness+ not available in all regions.

If you subscribe to Fitness+, payment will be charged to your Apple Account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. See https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww for the Privacy Policy. Fitness+ Terms and Conditions can be found at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/us/terms.html.

評論.內容: Was working great, until this month. Four times I got an award reward, only to have it gone the next day. Very discouraging.
I met the December 2024 monthly goal but that badge has not yet appeared.
I'd like to see snow shoveling as a choice for an exercise activity.  I live in north east and this is real exercise!

評論.標題: Great trainers, great motivation, little improvements needed
評論.內容: I’m really enjoying fitness! I think the trainers are great and motivational (love them using sign language!!). I like how the workout is integrated with my Apple Watch. 2 pieces of feedback 1. I wish I could rate the workout once I’m done and 2. I would like a cool off period for the treadmill ones where my app continues to track my movements. Chances are high that I’m gonna continue my movement to cool off and not just stop walking/running.

Hoping this finds its way to the developers. I recently signed up for the Fitness+ Subscription, because I’m looking for some yoga flows I can listen to. When searching for recordings, it would be helpful if I could “select multiple” when filtering, and sort in descending order when viewing the results. I want to be able to select both Chill Music and Hip Hop, but not Latin, and see flows that are 30-45 min long. But to do that I have to also view the shorter options with the music that I am not interested in. I’m sure this is applicable for other types of workouts as well.
A well designed app with incredible workouts that are very easy to follow and fun to engage in. The meditations are simply beautiful !
When opening the app I can’t see my data. The app is stuck on the fitness plus with no way to get off the free trial.
This app used to track my steps, activity, etc. and now it doesn’t. All my settings are correct and tried contacting Apple support. Nothing has worked. It is so annoying.
VO2 Max indicator is no longer working.
I really like all of the motivational comments I have been receiving

I came from Samsung watch and Galaxy s23 and the Apple watch fitness interface is so disappointing. It doesn’t track activity automatically like Samsung and half the time it doesn’t even track anything. I paired it to the machines at Planet Fitness and it still didn’t track properly. I have gone back to Samsung health and my galaxy watch.

I have used Apple Fitness for multiple years and appreciate the variety of workouts available and the ability to customize workout plans.  Please create more  prebuilt plans like the 3 perfect weeks of strength- it’s fantastic!!
App has stopped tracking my exercise.

I bought my iPad thinking I could use the same fitness app as my phone to track heart rate while indoor cycling but on a bigger screen that is also streaming video. Nope. This iPad version only works for their fitness+ classes. What a disappointment

Stand doesn’t work anyway give options to remove useless goals and swap for steps 
plus have 5k and 10k goals for walking as well as running

評論.評論者: That one kid who just games
評論.標題: Good on watch GARBAGE on iPhone
評論.內容: So I have completed my rings on watch a couple of times and accidentally started an outdoor walk and stopped it after 8 seconds, now I have a phone, I was like “yay!!! I have a phone!!! But I didn’t know that a preinstalled app didn’t work on it, like I was excited to start using fitness on my phone, it doesn’t do anything, I can’t do it on my watch, it kinda broke, (I got a new one) but since my new watch isn’t set up yet, I kinda just am like “zero steps?! I’ve walked for so long!!!” Then I find out, you can’t use it, even tho iPhone is like the main apple device for walking, plus watch is impossible to type so I can’t find stuff on it, so iPhone is best for it! Add the feature, before Jan 20 2025.
I have enjoyed this app but in the last couple of months the monthly challenge is not registering completed.  I like the challenges to help keep me motivated. Hope this gets fixed soon.
Boy am I glad I didn’t pay for this app. It’s terrible. Not compatible with Samsung. Ugh!!

I like what the health app offers especially for the watch purposes. Unfortunately I can only find this garbage app on the watch. Not a fan of it as on the Apple health app there’s more things to track
I upgraded my phone and now it stopped working all together. I've already did everything I found to fix it and it still doesn't work.
Siri has started trying to force a Fitness+ subscription in order to record my walks even though it not required. Not into it

評論.標題: I love this app- but wish layout different
評論.內容:
I love this app I’ve been using it for 2 years. I love that new workouts are added every week!

I wish that “my library” was further up on the page rather than scrolling all the way to the bottom, and I wish you could put filters in on your library to quickly access workouts by various trainers or set times.
Seems like it’s since the latest update - but not accounting for rings goals & not importing all data from explore the world.

I have been really enjoying the fitness+ workouts and have been pushed by the trainers. The class variety is awesome! Rating it a 4 because I wish there was a functionality after a workout to either end the workout or add another workout and continue my workout click so I wasn’t starting and stopping to workouts. That way it could be one continued workout. Other than that, this a feature is super slick.

評論.標題: Does not connect to Apple TV
評論.內容: Unable to connect my Apple TV with family sharing of Fitness+. All apps are up to date and accounts logged in. Select Other account on TV, a pop on phone says connect to Fitness+? Confirm, then nothing happens… so much for an integrated ecosystem. Ha.

This app was working fine for a long while. Now I can’t see my rings. No, it’s not paused. I can see everything on my watch but not my phone. Yes it’s paired. I’ve cut the phone off, repaired my watch and it’s not working. I can the rings during fitness+ workouts and then it goes away. I’m not going to keep paying for inconsistency.

I really would like to see things  like yardwork, lawn mowing, shoveling snow & other practical things like this designated as exercise - because they are. I am not one to go to a gym. But I work in my yard alot. I shoveled snow for 1 1/2 hrs yest. All it does is at steps & probably inaccurately since there is arm movement & I wear an Apple watch now. But i had phone in pocket also
I regret switching over to an Apple Watch and using this app. Every run/bike ride now involves the workout randomly pausing on me.
I walk for 24 hours it give me 9grand thank you apple
Would be much better if it had a fitness tracker like weight,reps,etc

This app would be perfect if we had the option to fast forward or rewind. It's incredibly INFURIATING to be 20 minutes into a workout and call comes in and it closes out of the app and sometimes it gives me the option to resume where I was and sometimes it doesn't.
Last 4 days the fitness app isn’t counting my steps but yet the ring closes.

I’ve used the fitness app for a few years now and the glitches are the worst of any app I’ve had. I really enjoy the workouts but it doesn’t work half the time. You’ll be in the middle of a workout and it pauses. You’ll have your watch on and it’ll tell you it can’t find your watch. The app itself isn’t user friendly. There’s basic filters. It’d be great if I could filter the videos I’ve done from most watched to least. It’d be great if I could fast forward/rewind, especially when it randomly glitches and it’s in the middle of a set overall, the workouts are good but the app is trash. Not worth the single price. We pay the bundle because we use the additional storage and apple tv, otherwise I don’t suggest anyone to buy it.
Since the latest update, none of my monthly challenges have logged, despite having completed them. Annoying.
It ok for counting your steps - that’s about it.

It would tell me that I have closed all the rings of a day, which usually happens after workouts. However, towards the end of the day, usually after 10 pm, it tells me again that I’m ‘so close ‘ to completing the move ring. This repeatedly happens. The contradictory information is very confusing. I don't recommend this app.

One star for fatal flaw. Was using a free trial of this app to squeeze in a couple more minutes of movement into a busy schedule. It was fine, even though a little boring, for a few workouts then the app decided to stop playing videos. Spent 20 minutes troubleshooting, seemed to have gotten lucky because a video started playing but when I ended the workout so I could restart using airplay to a bigger screen, the issue started again. So now it is time to get ready for work and instead of a workout to clear my head and hype me up for the day I had to troubleshoot an app I use as a consolation prize for a real workout and write this stupid review. Extremely frustrating.
For a paid workout app I expected more. Where are the industry leaders? Why do we have instructors that are not fit, teaching how to be fit? Huge miss.

I like the weekly plan feature	but is missing capabilities. Can’t edit a plan, can’t replace a workout. It has glitches, I asked for videos with no equipment and it still put workouts with requirements in my weekly plan.

I’ve been using this app for a few years now. Its detail is typically very accurate. I walk the exact same route 3 times a day every day. I’m walking my energetic dog. I’m somewhat confused that some days the distance reading is off. I’m thinking of discontinuing the use. I now know the distance, I choose not to be dismayed by faulty accuracy. I’ve decided to cease using this app permanently.

Update 1/7/2025

Please STOP sending me emails with offers for your Fitness apps. They don’t function properly and I would be an idiot to pay you a monthly 
Subscription fee. No thank you.

I love this app for general health and fitness tracking, and I love the concept of Fitness+ BUT it needs a lot of work from a user experience perspective. Every exercise and meditation is so generally named, there’s no way of knowing what type of strength training (upper, lower, full body) or what type of mediation etc you’re getting into. I wish the names of videos were better titled and there was a more organized structure overall.

I’ve used the app for a couple of years but a week ago started experiencing new glitches. The workout app won’t allow me to start up a new workout. Two days ago I had to restart both my phone and my watch then go in to start the workout. Before this, would’ve rated it as 4 stars. Now I’m giving it 1 star since I can’t log my workouts. Super frustrating!!

Zero way to log exercise minutes with normal daily activities. I just cleaned my entire house & the app says 2 exercise minutes?! Seriously, I swept, mopped, vacuumed, & shampooed carpet… all in just over an hour (house is over 3000 sqft), so it’s not like I was taking a Sunday stroll here. Took nearly 90 minutes to stop sweating and cool down. So yeah, I KNOW I should have logged at least 20 minutes of exercise. I used to have a fitbit before this and I hate to say it (not really), but the app for fitbit was nearly 100% customizable (not to mention a 100% complete app). This is my first Apple Watch (9 series) & it’s cute I guess, but for the price I find it excessively restrictive & expensive to buy all the apps necessary to customize things correctly.
This particular app is useless for anything aside from a step tracker. You want to know any details on accurate calories burned or exercise minutes? Yeah, good luck, there’s yet another app for that 🤦🏻‍♀️

I was trying it for free and I was frustrated by the lack of transportability from my phone to my MacBook (couldn’t workout on my laptop) and I couldn’t use my Chromecast to cast it to my TV. I also found that I couldn’t easily rewind the workouts if I missed something. 

The quality of the workouts didn’t matter if I couldn’t use them anywhere but my tiny phone. 

I cancelled before they could charge me for something so useless to me, luckily.
I really like this app and how it tracks my progress but it’s always SO delayed and that’s frustrating to see in real time workouts

Sometimes the workout will randomly stop playing halfway through, which is annoying, but the real kicker is that when you restart the workout it plays from the beginning with no way to skip ahead. Desperately needs fast-forward/rewind.

評論.標題: Awards not updated glitches turning me off
評論.內容:
I have been using this app for over 2 years now every thing was fine but since the past  2 months my awards are not getting updated and i work very hard on achieving my daily goals but if they donot get updated i feel very discouraged Thanks 
 Pls show daily updates
 Daily updates are still not showing Iam achieving my daily goals too I dont want to delete the app 
 There is too much history pls fix the glitches 
 Perfect month for November not showing too
Its become annoying now updates only show twice a month the rest there is nothing
December awards also not showing I completed them in December 
Last update was in November
My family members snd friends have iphones and their awards are being updated
Why are they not showing in my application

i see a couple (thousand) people complaining abt this app, but for me, it does what it says and i don’t have a problem. love the awards and the option to build a plan, which both work in harmony to keep you motivated, something i often struggle with.
Si existe donde ponerle el horario en que duermes avísenme, a mi me despierta en la madrugada varias veces a decirme que me levante
It has stopped counting steps, distance and flights but reports calories. Useless. Reviews show countless people having this issue. Fix it.

當您購買了自動續訂功能後，代表您完全瞭解並同意以下的相關資訊和使用規則：

查詢保單資訊

長庚醫療財團法人為秉持以病人為中心的服務理念，透過行動資訊系統提供民眾在台北長庚、林口長庚、桃園長庚、基隆長庚、嘉義長庚、雲林長庚、高雄長庚與鳳山醫院更加便利的服務，方便民眾掌握就醫資訊。

長庚行動資訊系統提供以下服務項目：
1.認識長庚、就醫指南和交通指引：
讓您到院前多一分了解長庚醫院。
2.行動掛號：
讓您一指間就能掌握各醫師門診時間，辦理掛號。
3.掛號查詢：
讓您查看掛號的資訊，並且透過手機提醒通知看診相關事項。
4.掛號紀錄：
掛號及查詢的資訊留存於手機，透過快捷掛號迅速完成下次看診掛號，節省時間。
5.看診進度：
利用存於手機的掛號資料，查詢醫師看診的進度。
6.預約通知：
提醒您已掛號的門診資訊。
7.系統設定：
提供彈性選擇，可預設連結的醫院、提醒通知的時間、預設留存的掛號紀錄以及資訊選單排序等功能。
8.行動繳費服務：
提供行動繳費服務不限銀行，使用銀行活期存款帳戶即可完成門診費用繳費，使用前請先確認完成設定「我的親友」之姓名、身分證號、出生日期及扣款銀行帳戶。

開發者: 中山醫學大學附設醫院
應用描述:
「中山附醫 e 點通」是中山醫學大學附設醫院提供的智慧行動服務，通過此升級，助您 e 指搞定掛號就診的所有需求！只要註冊登入後，即可享免費雲端備份，包含個人資料與家人資料，不論是換新手機或是手機弄丟了都不用擔心資料遺失!

特色行動服務:

【 AI 科別推薦】 通過用戶輸入的年齡、性別、不適部位，以先進 AI 技術分析症狀關鍵詞，匹配醫療大數據資料庫，推薦可能的症狀集合，並基於此推薦看診科別。
【 AI 醫生推薦】 基於 AI 分析的症狀集合與看診科別，推薦相關科別的專長醫生，並自動導向預約掛號。
【慢箋預約取藥】 提供慢性病連續處方籤的取藥預約及查詢服務，無需排隊領號碼牌，直接到藥局輕鬆取藥。 掃描處方籤 QR Code，不用輸入繁瑣資料，即可一鍵預約。
【慢箋紀錄管理】 提供慢箋記錄管理的功能，讓您輕鬆管理您與家人的所有慢性疾病連續處方箋。個人化推播提醒服務，貼心通知領藥時間，讓您不再忘記下次慢箋領藥日期以及回診日期，避免用藥中斷的風險。
【抽血叫號】 輸入抽血排隊號碼，可獲得即將到號提醒與到號時間預估。
【檢驗報告查詢】App內可直接查看各項檢驗報告結果，隨時存取好方便，家人報告經同意也可線上查看。
【收藏功能】 透過掛號歷史記錄，方便再次預約相同醫生，亦可關注收藏該醫生，方便日後快速掛號。
【我的家人】 輕鬆為家人建立資料，方便您替家中長輩、孩童快捷掛號、查詢紀錄、與設定手機推播提醒。
【癌症治療副作用】 癌症放療/化療後，還需要填寫一堆紙本表單很麻煩，透過 APP 輕鬆紀錄每日癌症治療相關副作用，幫助醫師了解您在家的健康狀況。

就診行動服務:

【行動掛號】 依照症狀、科別、醫生、日期等，多種方式掛號，並可即時查詢不同院區的門診、班表與預約狀況，如預約是否額滿、停診等資訊。
【掛號紀錄查詢】 輸入您或家人的證件號碼和出生日期，即可輕鬆查詢歷史紀錄與取消掛號，貼心提供手機推播提醒功能。
【入院通行證】出示 APP 通行證即可免插健保卡，無需排隊、快速通行避免群聚，並可即時查看在本院的疫苗接種狀態、最新PCR檢測結果與快篩檢測結果。
【看診進度】 即時查詢看診進度，隨時隨地掌握看診資訊。
【到診時間預估】 註冊並登入後，AI 自動建議到達診間時刻，幫助您妥善安排時間
【行動繳費】 透過 APP 的行動繳費服務功能，只要輸入簡單資料，不論是門急診、住院或自費醫療費用都以輕鬆支付，遠端操作刷卡繳費，再也不必到批價櫃檯排隊。
【回診提醒】 註冊並登入後，可享醫師預約回診提醒功能，從此不怕忘記回診。

用藥行動服務:

【用藥管理】 三大個人化用藥功能，讓您輕鬆管理療程資訊、藥品須知、和療程進展。
 　• 我的療程 : 集合所有療程資訊與藥品注意事項，再也不用擔心找不到藥單，系統自動幫您紀錄，更有貼心的衛教資料報你知。 
 　• 今日用藥 : 按照您的作息, 智慧提醒用藥時間, 讓您在對的時間吃對的藥量，並同時紀錄您的藥品庫存。 
 　• 療程進展 : 輕鬆依據日期與療程追蹤用藥進度，方便您掌握整體療程進展。回診時，還可以方便醫生查看用藥紀錄，作為下個療程的用藥判斷。

應用名稱: 高醫醫療體系掛號系統
開發者: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital
應用描述:
高醫醫療體系掛號系統，提供中和紀念醫院、市立小港醫院、市立旗津醫院、高醫岡山醫院的行動掛號服務
 
服務項目如下：
 
1. 醫院資訊：提供各院區醫院簡介與樓層配置資訊。
2. 交通指引：提供院內地圖，交通路線，大眾交通工具與停車資訊，電子地圖路線規劃等完善來院交通資訊。
3. 行動掛號：提供民眾來院門診看診掛號服務，有選醫師、選日期、選科別等門診班表查詢方式，掛號時，可即時查詢門診班表與預約狀況，如預約是否額滿，門診停診與代診資訊等。
4. 查詢取消掛號：提供門診預約掛號查詢與取消掛號功能。此功能亦可修改預約通知的時間。
5. 預約通知：掛號後可設定預約通知，在設定時間到達時，於手機顯示門診預約資訊，以提醒民眾按時赴院看診。
6. 看診進度查詢 ：提供門診看診進度，讓看診民眾可在來院途中與院區隨時掌握看診資訊，讓看診的時程與行程安排更為方便與自由。
7. 病症參考：提供病症關鍵字查詢，並給予看診科別建議。
8. 醫師簡介：提供各院區，各科別醫師聯絡方式、學歷、經歷、專長等資訊，並可查詢該醫師門診班表來進行掛號。

應用描述:
"OKOK International" 是一款與智能藍牙體重秤配合使用的應用程式，已成功幫助千萬用戶高效達成理想體重！通過這個應用程式，您可以使用藍牙秤來檢查和管理有關體重、體脂、體水分、肌肉等各種健康指標。同時，OKOK 提供體重記錄、體重趨勢變化及分析來記錄您的每一次改變，支持添加多位家庭成員體重。

此應用程式支持蘋果的"Health"應用，如果您授權，我們可以將所有體重數據同步到您的Health應用中。

會員說明

付款：如果您選擇購買會員服務，費用將從您的iTunes帳戶支付
續訂：如果您選擇了自動訂閱，蘋果iTunes帳戶在到期前24小時，系統會自動從您的帳戶扣費，扣費成功後訂閱周期順延一個訂閱周期。

取消訂閱：如需取消訂閱，請手動打開蘋果手機“設置”>>>進入“iTunes Store與AppStore”>>點擊“AppleID”，選擇“查看AppleID”，進入“帳戶設置”頁面，點擊“訂閱”，選擇OKOK會員取消訂閱即可。如未在訂閱期結束的至少24小時前關閉訂閱，此訂閱將會自動續訂。

付費用戶服務協議：https://www.tookok.cn/license/okok/cn/member_apple.html
隱私協議：https://www.tookok.cn/license/okok/cn/privacy.html

關於"OKOK International" 應用程式的更多信息以及我們提供的服務可以在 http://www.tookok.cn/index.html 找到。

What they really are are raking in the dough from ads, often a plethora of them, shove down your throat with the intention of selling you a subscription. The numbers they give based on weighing oneself on said scale are questionable at best, I would love to see the scientific algorithms are using to determine some of these claims. If there were actual science behind their numbers and the app itself wasn’t so buggy I’d consider subscribing but as it stands now the only thing that I care about is the rest of the numbers I can do myself. so if you’re buying one of these inexpensive scales, do not expect the world from the app, it’s what we get in today’s world.

應用名稱: 臺北市立聯合醫院行動掛號
應用描述:
臺北市立聯合醫院行動掛號提供中興、忠孝、松德、和平、婦幼、仁愛、陽明、林森、中醫門診、昆明十院區，在手機平台上提供
1.行動掛號：提供民眾來院門診看診掛號服務，掛號時，可即時查詢門診班表與預約狀況，如預約是否額滿，門診停診與代診資訊等。
2.地圖指引：提供google map電子地圖路線規劃等完善來院交通資訊。
3.看診進度：提供門診看診進度，讓看診民眾可在來院途中與院區隨時掌握看診資訊，讓看診的時程與行程安排更為方便與自由。
4.掛號查詢：讓您查看掛號的資訊，並且透過手機提醒通知看診相關事項。
5.預約提醒：提供民眾設定變更與關閉預約提醒功能。
6.關於系統：提供資訊系統相關說明。

如有任何問題請與我們聯絡：
臺北市民當家熱線 1999 轉 888 本院客服中心(外縣市請撥 02-25553000)

bebird是一款專業個人健康護理類App，通過wifi與bebird可視采耳儀連接，可以在App顯示清理耳道的實時畫面，個人可以輕鬆安全的享受采耳過程。

評論.標題: Used to be great but now it has really bad bugs
評論.內容: I have used this company’s ear products for years but now it is unusable. Video images constantly freezes making the product unusable and unsafe. Product also has difficulty connecting or will drop connection. Absolutely loved their products and view them as a necessity now, but I am afraid if they do not fix these issues soon I will be finding another brand

I’m not sure if people here just aren’t tech savvy, but the instructions were clear enough for me to have this thing set up in 2 minutes. Turn it on, connect to its WiFi (not your own WiFi, the devices WiFi), go back to the app and take it from there. I will way, there were some connection issues with the device itself, it would disconnect from the app a few times or just turn off, but I just kept reconnecting it. Wasn’t that much of a hassle. Got my ear cleaned out and cleared me of the anxiety attack I was having since I couldn’t hear out of one ear because it was so clogged. I’m happy.

The most recent update or firmware update to the actual device has made it to were I have to put the brightness so low it’s almost off because it whites everything out if it’s at 50% or higher. Worked perfectly before the most recent updates.

評論.標題: I heard you loud and clear
評論.內容: Simple to set up and works as it should. I recommend bebird you won’t be disappointed
Stop working after one day. But when it did work it was awesome. Sent back and replaced it the next day, because it did work great. Always willing to give it a second chance. Thanks

There’s also nothing really wrong about it. It does the job very well and as it’s supposed to. Just a little laggy with the screen time the time if you don’t charge it, but that’s pretty much all I have to say about it.

WiFi and cellular connection both are on and every time I opened the app send me straight to WiFi.  I am going to trie with android but I bought because it was for iPhone.

As much as I love the Note 5, I am very disappointed in the poor performance of the WiFi connection over the last two iOS (17&18) updates. It is a string of Bebird Note 5  refusing to connect to either my iPhone 15 Pro Max or my 6th Gen iPad Pro 12.9”, or when connected, constant drop-outs or disconnects while the device is in the ear canal. I cannot tell if it is the Note 5 or the Apple device initiating those issues. 
When it works it works great. But, it is not working the majority of time. I cannot have the screen go black when using! 
Again, this appears to started happening at some point after upgrading to iOS and iPadOS 17 and has gotten worse under 18 (currently on 18.2).
One other improvement to consider is allowing the app on either device to go to landscape when rotated.
Love the products. Easy to use app. Only complaint I have is the tips on the products themselves can come off

It's nice but each video does not need to take up as much storage as it does!!! I wish there was a way to crop the videos in app or lower the quality before filming to just 720p or something like that.
After the latest updates I cannot connect to the internet anymore.
Useless product, sending it back.

Idk what the bad reviews are about. Worked instantly. Really helpful to get junk out of ears. IPhone on WiFi Bluetooth off, press button on the device which starts a WiFi called bebird, connect your phone to that WiFi. Boom there you go. Couldn’t be easier... also the thing came and stayed charged even after sitting for months

You can see all kinds of things in your ears, nose and mouth, very clear camera and you can take pictures to view later or to show a doctor. I’m not sure why all the negative reviews because I took mine out of the box, downloaded the Bebird app, turned the visual ear cleaner on, tapped on Bebird in my WIFI setting and it connected right away, no problems at all! Not sure if some people are not reading the instructions correctly or trying to connect using Bluetooth or what, but I really like it and would recommend it to anyone!!

I used to love this device and the app, everything went super well and was pretty clear. However this new update to the app, it's been super laggy and almost dangerous to use because you can't see as well. I was going crazy, restarsted my phone, deleted the app & downloaded it, turned the device on and off. Until I read reviews that it was happening to a bunch of other people. I purchased this ear wax removal and didn’t expect it to be this good of a tool instead of wasting money going to the doctor to remove my ear wax I have a tool that can do it within 10 mins… best purchase of the year gets the job done great!!!! The app works really well too was able to set it up perfectly in a minute. Only critique is I wish it came with some sort of forceps attachment!!

I prefer to use this on iPad since it has a bigger screen and won’t complain about “no internet, switch to cellular data” like my iPhone does. The problem is this app does not seem to support landscape mode. I always have to rotate my iPad from landscape to vertical and then back to landscape to get the image to rotate and that can only be done from within the camera view, not the Home Screen. If they allowed the Home Screen to be landscape this would fix that issue. The other problem I have is the image is always mirrored/reversed. I have to tap the ear icon to flip it and then it’s correct but it never remembers this setting. It also never remembers the camera brightness setting. Please allow these settings to be saved rather then being reverted each time. If these three things could be fixed then the app would be 5 stars. As for the product, it works well and I recommend it but I wish they made the tips smaller. Even the smallest blue rubber scoop is too big. A smaller one would make the job easier.

August 2024 update: the latest version of the app is even worse then before. The app doesn’t work in landscape at all. The settings have completely disappeared. The camera is super laggy and choppy when I never had that issue before and you can’t even see the percentage of the battery anymore. I’m so frustrated with this downgrade I’m about to throw it out and find something from a different brand.

I can’t even get it to connect to my WIFI. The WLAN option does not show up in the bebird settings even though my phone is connected to our house wifi. Please update this so I can try the cleaner and I will rewrite my review.

I don’t know why people complain about connecting the device, mine connects immediately, no lag, no problems at all.
It works so fast and I finally could clear my ears. Loving this device so much!!!
The first time I used it it worked great. Since then, the camera transmits nothing. I get a blank screen in the app, even though it shows the camera is connected.

應用描述:
~~~嘉義聖馬爾定醫院開通『慢箋預約領藥』貼心服務~~~ 慢友們可以多加利用，這樣就不用在醫院等候拿藥囉!!!
 
全能掛號王榮獲 2014 年經濟部工業局金企鵝 App 最佳潛力獎、2014 年資訊月百大創新產品!!!
「全能掛號王 SeeDoctor」是您專屬的就醫解決方案行動 APP！！
「全能掛號王SeeDoctor」為全國第一家深入整合醫學中心及醫院的行動掛號APP，我們投入非常多的心力與時間，直接與醫院溝通並取得同意，進而提供民眾一個便民、跨醫院的行動掛號服務，讓你只需用「全能掛號王 SeeDoctor」, 就可以進行不同家醫院的掛號、看診進度查詢和掛號記錄查詢。
 
現提供超過103家以上大型醫院就醫服務，其中 50 家醫院更提供行動掛號、看診進度、掛號查詢/取消的直接界接服務，所有資訊皆與醫院同步。
 
現服務的醫療院所包含：基隆長庚醫院、基隆長庚醫院情人湖院區、台北長庚醫院、台北馬偕醫院、淡水馬偕醫院、林口長庚醫院、桃園長庚醫院、新竹馬偕醫院、臺中榮民總醫院、雲林長庚醫院、臺中榮總灣橋分院、嘉義長庚醫院、臺中榮總嘉義分院、臺中榮總埔里分院、高雄長庚醫院、高雄醫學大學附設中和紀念醫院、高雄市立小港醫院、高雄市立大同醫院、高雄市立鳳山醫院、台東馬偕紀念醫院、北市聯合中興醫院、北市聯合仁愛醫院、北市聯合忠孝醫院、北市聯合陽明醫院、北市聯合松德醫院、北市聯合林森中醫院區、北市聯合和平婦幼院區、北市聯合昆明醫院、中壢天晟醫院、楊梅天成醫院、台北宏恩綜合醫院、同仁醫院、廣川醫院、聖保祿醫院、壢新醫院、聖馬爾定醫院、埔里基督教醫院、⋯等等。
尚有許多家醫學中心服務正在洽談中，我們將盡快提供大家更多的醫療院所行動掛號預約服務!!
 
功能說明：
1.行動掛號：選擇要看醫生的醫院、科別、門診表進行掛號預約，同時提供停代診的即時訊息
2.看診進度查詢:即時查看醫院內各科別之看診進度
3.醫院資料：簡介、交通資訊、門診表
4.註冊登入：記錄家人掛號資料，一鍵快捷完成複診掛號，省時又方便
5.我的最愛：將常用的醫療院所加到我的最愛，可快速點選
6.掛號記錄：查詢過往掛號記錄，並可直接快捷掛號複診
7.掛號查詢：即使是醫生協助回診掛號或是用電話/電腦掛號，亦可利用查詢功能，將資料完整存到掛號記錄當中，方便進行所有掛號資料管理。
另提供台大醫院、三軍總醫院、台北榮民總醫院、慈濟醫院、新光醫院、光田綜合醫院、澄清綜合醫院、臺中醫院、彰化醫院、高雄國雄總醫院⋯等看診進度查詢服務。
 
「全能掛號王 SeeDoctor」以改善醫病關係為我們首要的目標，持續在與醫療院所做深入的溝通與合作，將陸續提供更多更棒也更貼心的服務給民眾，讓民眾看醫生、管理家人的健康更方便。
如有任何問題，請聯絡全能掛號王服務團隊 service@seedoctor.com.tw，或至全能掛號王粉絲團 https://www.facebook.com/seedoctortw

評論.內容:
It's like they were paid extra to take a cool, sexy device and pull all the fun away from it. There is no way to remote control within the device. When you connect, you need to do it on a mobile website and make a profile both in the device and share a social media profile. It claims to want your exact location before it will work. 

When using the device remotely, it fills the screen with "sexy chat bubbles" with your and your partner's names on them. Full of stuff you never said. There is actually no way to chat, it is just these random things. They're in your and your partner's face and they are creepy and gross. 

The bad experience goes on and on with literally every feature of the app. Creepy and gross and unsexy at every turn. 

Buy something else.

I held down the “tail” part for 3 seconds and then it connected to the app. I did not have to use my Bluetooth connection. From there, each time after you charge it, you will have to squeeze the tail to reconnect. But it works! And I’m so excited to use it. 評論.標題: I used to be able to connect via the link, now I can’t
評論.內容: The link people send you to connect via text used to bring me into safari and I could control the device but now it brings me into the app and nothing happens. It just opens the app to the 2 options for live play and activities 😾

Let’s start with the bad: it does not connect very well with Bluetooth, unless the connected phone is within pocket distance of the inserted toy it will not stay connected, meaning you can’t connect to your partner’s toy and stay connected the full Bluetooth range. The work around is connect using your girl’s phone and have her leave it in her pocket. She has to send the remote request to you and then she has to keep the app open for it to work. The last issue is battery life because you might get 30-45 minutes of full power play time but it takes about 4 hours I believe to recharge.

Now the good: when you do the workaround I said above it works great and it’s incredibly hot watching her squirm in public from a few flicks of your fingers, listening to her whine about being so close and beg for you to push her over the edge. So in regards to it being quiet and effective it’s perfect.

For this review me and my girl used the Mr. Devil version 1

It keeps saying I must confirm Bluetooth. We tried everything imaginable and nothing. Not only is this app trash but they don’t even have a support team to help clean up the trash. I will tell my girlfriend to burn this piece of garbage.

應用描述:
iNO健康是iNO合晶國際於2019年為追求健康推出的應用程序，它知道你胖在哪裡！身體健康指標，輕鬆對應，健康狀況一手掌握！讓你一分鐘看懂自己的狀況，且能記錄努力的成果，是你健康的小管家，讓你創造更多可能。

注意事項
- 該App支持蘋果的‘健康’，一旦授權後，我們將將您的健康數據同步到蘋果的健康應用，方便您對您的健康進行管理與查詢。

彰化基督教醫院成立超過百餘年，以耶穌基督救世博愛之精神，宣揚福音、服務世人，為持續提供以患者為中心的和善貼心服務，推出「彰基行動服務」APP，希望透過行動上網裝置的普及，可以讓民眾隨時隨地即時的關心自已的健康狀況，讓行動電話也可以輕鬆的進行預約掛號、預約慢性處方箋領藥、及掌握最新、最即時的醫師看診進度，進而節省到院就醫之等待時間，也可以透過「彰基行動服務」APP所提供的用藥資訊查詢功能來關心自已所使用的藥物相關資訊，除以上功能外「彰基行動服務」APP也提供了豐富多元化之醫院資訊供民眾瀏覽參考，歡迎下載使用。謝謝

彰化基督教醫院 祝福您有美好的每一天！


■《 彰基行動服務APP功能簡介如下 》
線上預約掛號
看診 / 檢查室進度查詢 / 抽血進度查詢
領藥燈號查詢
用藥資訊查詢

停車場空位查詢
蘭醫師LineBot
虛擬健保卡專區

【會員專區】
1.我的檢驗報告查詢
2.藥物不良反應查詢
3.血壓/血糖量測上傳
4.醫療記錄(門診、住院、檢查排程、同意書專區)

■《 彰基行動服務APP使用常見問題 》
1. 申請加入會員後一直未收到密碼簡訊。
Ans：申請會員後3~5分鐘內會收到簡訊通知，如未收到醫院之密碼簡訊，有可能您的電話門號有設定「拒收商務訊息」所影響，需解除後該設定後才會恢復正常。

2. 查無此會員資料?
Ans:醫院為保護民眾個資安全，僅開放醫院之患者可以使用會員服務，當您在彰基總院加入會員時，登入時就必需要彰基總院之畫面上進行登入，如到其它院區登入即會出現查無會員資料訊息。


※. 如無法正常使用「彰基行動服務」APP所提供的功能時，請多利用APP內「反應APP問題」功能，將您所遇到的問題直接反應給開發人員，以利開發人員協助排除問題。

本APP 部分功能需使用GPS定位，作為場管進出場BLE裝置掃描使用(若該場館有提供BLE進出場裝置)。長時間使用GPS在後台運行可能顯著減少電池壽命。

應用名稱: 女性日曆 - 大姨媽月經經期管理助手
應用描述:
女性日曆——爲女性月經期大姨媽提供溫馨的呵護和嚴謹的推算,留下寶貴紀錄,健康生活每壹天。 

【主要功能】 
1.科學的預測功能，讓您有效的管理安全期、月經期和危險期的時間 
2.簡明的日曆功能，讓您直觀的浏覽月經期大姨媽 
3.每天健康小貼士，根據生理周期爲您貼心提示 
4.可以根據實際情況對每個月經周期進行設置，可以查看設置的曆史紀錄，計算得到平均周期數據 
5.可以對日期進行備注的功能 
6.可以對日期設置提醒的功能

評論.內容: It's ok
I like the app
This is the best app it's predicted my cycle exactly to the date love & it's cute & fun
I like the app so far

I downloaded multiple similar apps and this one was a keeper. Easy to use, cute design, and helpful tips for each day throughout menstrual cycle. No need to make in-app purchases like some of the others out there, this app offers everything that I need!
It's so easy to use I recommend this to any one who want to track a woman's cycle. The lil tips for each day are informative

I like this app because it is very simple. I don't need a ton of different things in a tracker to enter. I just want to be able to enter my dates and have accurate predictions which this does. 

It also has little information that appears on the calendar that gives facts on what's going on with your body at this time. I find it interesting.

I give it four stars for its spelling and grammar mistakes on the facts. Also due to the fact it's hard to correct a date entered for your menstration cycle if a few days have gone by.

However, I do recommend this app for those who want a simple calendar!
I've only had this for a few days but I love the women's health tips and it seems to work great.
The dialogue box is written in English but when choosing an action, e.g. "done" or "ok", it's written in Chinese characters...scratching my head on that one but I'm passing at the same time.
This app seems pretty good. It's nice to know when I'm going to start.
